name: Ibiza Corso Hotel & Spa
address: c/Illa Plana, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Ibiza Corso Hotel & Spa is a luxury hotel located in the exclusive area of Marina Botafoch Harbour. It offers free access to its gym and unique spa with crystal walls. Each stylish, air-conditioned room at the Ibiza Corso has free WiFi, a balcony and a flat-screen TV. There is also a safe, and a private bathroom with bathrobes and slippers. There are 2 restaurants, one with panoramic views and the other one located in the pool area. You will find an outdoor pool and an indoor one at the spa. The spa also has several types of showers, steam baths and an oxygen room. Pachá nightclub is 15 minutes’ walk away. Ibiza Airport is 11 km away.

name: Argos Hotel
address: C/ La Mola, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: This modern seafront hotel is by the peaceful and family-friendly Talamanca Beach on Ibiza’s east coast. It is just 2 kilometres from the capital, Eivissa. The Argos Ibiza has an outdoor swimming pool with sea views. There is also an outdoor hot tub, an indoor pool, a gym and a terrace with sun loungers. The hotel's elegant restaurant and bar offer a range of dishes and sea views. All rooms are air conditioned. The Argos Ibiza is set 100 metres from the seafront promenade. This is an ideal setting for walking and jogging. Ibiza Casino is also nearby.

name: Bg Hotel Nautico Ebeso
address: Ramon Muntaner 44, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Hotel Nautico Ebeso is set on Ibiza and offers 4-star facilities as well as free Wi-Fi and a seasonal outdoor swimming pool. The multiple amenities this modern hotel features include a 24-hour reception, bicycle rental and an express check-in and check-out feature. The hotel has 123 rooms and has been recently refurbished. In sunny weather, an outdoor terrace provides a nice place to relax. The rooms are air conditioned and include a private bathroom, a mini bar and a flat-screen TV. There is also an in-room safe, a ceiling fan and a desk. Hotel Nautico Ebeso's on-site restaurant offers international-inspired meals, which can enjoyed on the al fresco terrace. In the evening, guests are welcome to relax in the comfortable lounge bar. A wide selection of dining options are also found in the surrounding area. Ibiza Town's popular attractions and landmarks are within close proximity to Hotel Nautico Ebeso, with Figueretes Beach just a short walk away. Amnesia is within a short car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: Hotel Mim Ibiza & Spa - Adults Only
address: Carrer de Carles Roman Ferrer, 8, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: This stylish, Art-Deco hotel is next to the beach and close to central Ibiza. It offers a fantastic outdoor pool, a nightclub and a roof terrace featuring stunning sea views. All air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Es Vive have been carefully decorated. They come with free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TV, minibar and a private bathroom. The restaurant has 1930 design and serves a range of international cuisine including New York-style brunch dishes and deli sandwiches. The Experience bar features chic furnishings and vibrant décor. Hotel Es Vive has a spa offering a wide variety of massages and beauty treatments. Hotel Es Vive is close to Ibiza’s most famous nightclubs such as Pacha or Space. The restaurants in Playa d’en Bossa beach can also be reached within walking distance of the hotel.

name: Ocean Drive Ibiza
address: Port Deportivo Marina Botafoch,66, Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Ocean Drive Ibiza is inspired by South Beach and decorated in a Miami art-deco style. The hotel is even more impressive at night, when it is lit by blue neon lights and visible across Ibiza's bay. The rooms have a minimalistic, exclusive design style. All include free WiFi. The hotel's rooftop terrace, the Sky Bar, allows you to take in the outstanding view of the Mediterranean Sea, the castle and the old town of Ibiza directly opposite the private harbour of Marina Botafoch. The ideal spot for those looking to enjoy the islands famous nightlife, it lies just a short distance from clubs such as Pachá, Lío and Chinois. Meanwhile, during the day, spend your time relaxing on the golden sands of Talamanca Beach, a 5-minute walk away.

name: The Standard, Ibiza - Adults Only
address: Carrer de Bartomeu Vicent Ramon 9, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Attractively located in the centre of Ibiza Town, The Standard, Ibiza - Adults Only features air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a terrace. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. At the hotel, the rooms include a balcony. All rooms in The Standard, Ibiza - Adults Only are fitted with a TV and free toiletries. The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or American options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean, Mexican and international cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and halal options can also be requested. Speaking German, English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock. Popular points of interest near The Standard, Ibiza - Adults Only include Figueretes Beach, Ibiza Port and Marina Botafoch. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 6 km from the hotel.

name: Cala Llenya Resort Ibiza
address: Carrer Des Botafoc, 2, 07850 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Cala Llenya Resort Ibiza has a garden, shared lounge, a restaurant and bar in Cala Llenya. Among the facilities at this property are a concierge service and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, karaoke and a kids' club. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Selected rooms are equipped with a kitchenette with a fridge and a microwave. At Cala Llenya Resort Ibiza each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or a gluten-free breakfast. Cala Llenya Resort Ibiza offers a children's playground. You can play table tennis and tennis at this 4-star hotel, and car hire is available. Speaking German, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are ready to help around the clock. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Cala Llenya Beach, Cala Mastella Beach and Cala Nova Beach. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 29 km from Cala Llenya Resort Ibiza.

name: Hotel Royal Plaza
address: Pere Francès 27-29, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Royal Plaza has an ideal setting just 200 metres from Ibiza Town’s harbour. It features a spa and a rooftop swimming pool with views of the city, the cathedral, and the Mediterranean Sea. The Royal Plaza’s bedrooms are comfortable and well equipped with bright decór and air conditioning. Each has a pillow menu, satellite TV, a minibar and a safe, which can store notebook-sized laptops and tablets. The onsite spa has an hot tub and a sauna. Treatments include massages, wraps and aromatherapy. Le Relais restaurant serves a range of Mediterranean cuisine. The Belvedere poolside snack bar offers views of the old town and organises Full Moon Dinners in summer. Royal Plaza has easy access to the centre of the UNESCO World Heritage Site of Ibiza Town, which features many shops, bars and restaurants. The hotel is just 500 metres from the city’s cathedral and Dalt Vila area. Airport transfer is available at a surcharge.

name: Suncoast Ibiza Hotel - Adults Only
address: Calle Pais Vasco 12, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Located just 100 metres from Figueretas Beach, the Suncoast Ibiza Hotel - Adults Only - is a 15-minute walk from central Ibiza Town. Rooms at the Suncoast Ibiza Hotel - Adults Only - are simple and functional, with bright décor. Each room comes with free WiFi, a free safe and a private bathroom. The Suncoast Ibiza Hotel - Adults Only - is a short bus ride from world-famous clubs such as Pachá. There are also many bars and restaurants nearby. Suncoast Ibiza Hotel - Adults Only - has TV and air conditioning in all rooms and offers a games room with a pool table, and all bathrooms are recently renovated.

name: El Hotel Pacha
address: C/ Del Historiador Juan Mari Cardona, 3, Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: This chic hotel, in the heart of Ibiza Town, is 100 metres from the marina. It features air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi, an outdoor pool and free parking. Rooms at El Hotel Pacha - Entrance to Pacha Club Included are bright and spacious, decorated in natural tones, All have a private balcony and seating area. Bathrooms feature bathrobes, slippers and a hairdryer. Hotel Pacha’s restaurant serves creative, avant-garde cuisine. There is a snack bar, elegant terrace bar, and room service is available. Guests at El Hotel Pacha - Entrance to Pacha Club Included have free access to the seasonal Pacha Club until 16th October. The hotel also offers free gym, pool area, sun loungers and day-time events at Destino Ibiza hotel, located 5 km away. The hotel concierge will be happy to help with restaurant and club reservations. An airport shuttle service is available on request, and you can hire a car, boat or plane at the hotel.

name: Hotel Vibra Maritimo
address: C/ Ramon Muntaner 48, Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Set on the seafront near Ibiza Town, Hotel Vibra Marítimo is 300 metres from Figueretas Beach. It offers a gym and indoor pool, and all rooms include a private terrace and free WiFi. Rooms at the Hotel Vibra Marítimo are functional and bright. They include air conditioning, satellite TV and a private bathroom. The Hotel Vibra Marítimo's reception can arrange bicycle, motorcycle or car rental and kayak and paddle surf are available for a cost. The hotel is 1 km from Ibiza Port where guests can catch a ferry to Formentera and the Hippie Market at Es Canar. A historic castle, as well as many lively bars and restaurants are 700 metres away in Ibiza Town.

name: One Ibiza Suites
address: Passeig de Ses Figueretes, 7800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Set in Ibiza Town, 20 metres from a sandy beach, One Ibiza Suites boasts a seasonal outdoor pool and a sun terrace. The property has a roof terrace with a bar and sea views, and it also has a sun terrace with a heated infinity pool exclusively for adults only. Every room is air conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV, a terrace or a balcony. They include a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. One Ibiza Suites features free WiFi throughout the property. Other facilities available include a fitness centre and a conference room. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant. Dalt Vila is 2 km from One Ibiza Suites, while Marina Botafoch is 2.2 km away. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 6 km from the property. Private valet parking is available on site under request.

name: Sir Joan Hotel, part of Sircle Collection
address: Passeig Joan Carles I, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: When you stay at Sir Joan Hotel, part of Sircle Collection in Ibiza Town, you'll be near the beach, within a 15-minute drive of Port of Ibiza and Bossa Beach. This 5-star hotel is 0.9 mi (1.5 km) from Talamanca Beach and 2.4 mi (3.8 km) from Dalt Vila. Make yourself at home in one of the 38 air-conditioned rooms featuring MP3 docking stations and flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries. Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer. Marina Botafoch - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi Bastions - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi Ibiza Ferry Terminal - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi Paseo Vara de Rey - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi Teatro Pereyra - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi Port of Ibiza - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi Ibiza Museum of Contemporary Art - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi Ses Feixes Wetlands - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi Talamanca Beach - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi Dalt Vila - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi Baluard de Sant Pere - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi Necropolis del Puig des Molins - 1.6 km / 1 mi Museu Puget - 1.6 km / 1 mi Archaeological Museum of Ibiza - 1.6 km / 1 mi Ibiza Cathedral - 1.6 km / 1 mi The nearest major airport is Ibiza Airport (IBZ) - 10.3 km / 6.4 mi Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours). Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including an outdoor pool and bicycles to rent. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a reception hall. Enjoy Asian cuisine at Izakaya, one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Relax with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. Cooked-to-order breakfasts are available daily from 8:00 AM to 1:00 PM for a fee. The following facilities or services will be unavailable from September 26 2023 to May 22 2024 (dates subject to change): One of the dining venues The property is closed between October 29 and April 17. You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: Deposit: EUR 250 per day A tax is imposed by the local government and will be collected at the property. The tax is reduced by 50% after the 8th night of stay and children under 16 years of age are exempt. Other exemptions and reductions may apply. For more details, please contact the property using the information on the reservation confirmation received after booking. A tax is imposed by the city: From 1 November - 30 April, EUR 1.10 per person, per night, up to 9 nights, and EUR 0.55 thereafter. This tax does not apply to children under 16 years of age. A tax is imposed by the city: From 1 May - 31 October, EUR 4.40 per person, per night, up to 9 nights, and EUR 2.20 thereafter. This tax does not apply to children under 16 years of age. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Fee for cooked-to-order breakfast: approximately EUR 25–39 per person Airport shuttle fee: EUR 150 per vehicle (one-way) Covered valet parking fee: EUR 35 per night The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Cash transactions at this property cannot exceed EUR 1000, due to national regulations. For further details, please contact the property using information in the booking confirmation. The seasonal pool will be open from March to October. This property advises that enhanced cleaning and guest safety measures are currently in place. Disinfectant is used to clean the property; commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant between stays; bed sheets and towels are laundered at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F. Personal protective equipment, including masks and gloves, will be available to guests. Social distancing measures are in place; staff at the property wear personal protective equipment; a shield is in place between staff and guests in main contact areas; periodic temperature checks are conducted on staff; temperature checks are available to guests; guests are provided with hand sanitizer. Contactless check-in and contactless check-out are available. Individually-wrapped food options are available for breakfast. Each guestroom is kept vacant for a minimum of 24 hours between bookings. This property affirms that it follows the cleaning and disinfection practices of Safe Tourism Certified (Spain).Sembo

name: Hacienda Na Xamena, Ibiza
address: Urbanizacion na Xamena Buzon 11, 07815 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Offering amazing sea views from its clifftop position and from its stylish rooms, this impressive hotel is located in Na Xamena, on Ibiza’s north coast. It offers a spa, a gym, tennis court and 3 swimming pools. Hotel Hacienda Na Xamena’s spa has indoor and outdoor areas, including the Suspended Waterfalls Thalassotherapy Circuit which offers fantastic views. There is a massage area located in a bamboo hut which faces the sunset in the west. The Na Xamena has 2 restaurants, including a poolside bar that serves snacks and drinks for informal all-day dining, and a very chic Mediterranean-inspired space with terraces on various levels overlooking the sea. The bright, air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Hacienda Na Xamena feature a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a private bathroom. All have a private hot tub and many have a mini-pool looking out over the Mediterranean Sea. There is a 24-hour reception and staff can provide information about what Ibiza has to offer, and they can help to arrange transport, car rental and reservations at restaurants or nightclubs. You can drive to Ibiza Town in 30 minutes from Hotel Hacienda Na Xamena, and Sant Antoni de Portmany is 35 minutes away. Es Canar, with its famous hippy market, is 30 minutes’ drive away.

name: Aparthotel Vibra Lux Mar
address: Carrer Ramon Muntaner, 78, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: The Lux Mar Apartments are just 300 metres from Figueretas Beach and a 10-minute walk to Ibiza Town Centre. All studios and apartments have a balcony and some have sea views. The Lux Mar Complex has an outdoor swimming pool with a sun terrace and free sun beds. Free WiFi is available. The restaurant offers buffet-style international cuisine and pool-side service is available. There is also an on-site snack bar. Guests can rent cars and motorcycles, and receive general information about the area from the 24-hour reception. Ibiza Old Town is just one kilometre from the hotel. The beaches of Las Salinas and Playa d’en Bossa are also nearby.

name: Montesol Experimental Ibiza
address: Passeig de Vara de Rey 2, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Montesol Experimental Ibiza is located in the heart of the historic centre of Ibiza. Set in a neo-colonial building it is equipped with 33 rooms, each decorated in colonial style and by interior designer Lázaro Rosa-Violán. Featuring a terrace on the Passeig de Vara de Rey street and a rooftop with views of the UNESCO-protected medieval city centre, this boutique hotel has a gastrobar and a terrace with views for special events. Each bright, air-conditioned room has a wardrobe, a desk and a safety deposit box. Guests will find a variety of shops, restaurants and bars few metres from this hotel. The Ibiza Harbour is set a few steps from the property and the pier where scheduled ferries to Formentera leave is a 5-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Vibra Algarb
address: Av. Pedro Matutes Noguera,107, 07817 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Hotel Vibra Algarb is situated on the beach of Playa d’en Bossa, offering out-door pools for adults and children and a sun terrace. The rooms feature a private balcony. The buffet restaurant at Hotel Vibra Algarb serves international cuisine and the poolside bar offers snacks and light refreshments. Guests can also enjoy a cocktail at the lobby bar. There is free WiFi throughout. It features rooms with air conditioning, satellite TV, free WiFi, free safe and a private bathroom with amenities. There is a frequent bus service from the stop located just outside and linking to Ibiza Town, located 3 km away from the hotel. Hotel Vibra Algarb is located in Playa d'en Bossa, 1 km from Ushuaia and Hï Ibiza.

name: Hotel Vibra Mare Nostrum
address: Avda Pedro Matutes Noguera 53, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Hotel Vibra Mare Nostrum lies 100 metres from Ibiza’s Playa D’En Bossa Beach. It is a budget hotel with a swimming pool, fitness centre and children's pool. Most rooms at Hotel Vibra Mare Nostrum have a private terrace. All rooms have air conditioning and satellite TV. Free WiFi is available. Guests enjoy free access to the fitness centre at Mare Nostrum. The complex also has a tennis court, games room and table tennis facilities. Hotel Vibra Mare Nostrum offers a buffet restaurant with show cooking. There is also a poolside bar and a lounge with a TV. Hï Ibiza Club is a 15-minute walk from the complex, and a bus stop can be found just outside the hotel with direct access to Ibiza Town, 1.5 km away. Ibiza Airport is approximately 6 km away.

name: Sud Ibiza Suites
address: Ramon Muntaner 34, 7800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: No description found

name: Hotel Torre Del Mar
address: Calle Carlos Roman Ferrer, Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Torre del Mar Hotel, on Ibiza’s Playa d'en Bossa Beach, features an outdoor pool, and spa. There is free WiFi, and most rooms have sea or mountain views. The air-conditioned, bright rooms with modern décor feature a private balcony, flat-screen satellite TV, and a free safe. There is a free minibar, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. The Torre del Mar spa includes an indoor pool, sauna, hot tub and Turkish bath. Massage service and treatments are available for a surcharge. The hotel also offers a 24-hour gym and billiards. The Excellence Terrace features Balinese beds, hammocks and an exterior hot tub. Regional and international cuisine is served in the hotel buffet restaurant, open for breakfast and for dinner. 24-hour room service is available, and packed lunches can be requested. At Bar Sa Punta del Dalt you can enjoy drinks and cocktails and Restobar Miramar serves Mediterranean food and drinks throughout the day. Torre del Mar has a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. Free parking is available on-site, and Ibiza Town is a 5-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Vibra Lei Ibiza - Adults only
address: Carrer de Galicia, 22, Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Hotel Vibra Lei Ibiza - Adults only is 100 metres from Ibiza’s Figueretas Beach, 10 minutes’ walk from the old town. This hotel offers free WiFi, 24-hour reception and an outdoor pool with a sun terrace. Air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel Vibra Lei Ibiza - Adults only have flat-screen satellite TV, a free safe and a private bathroom. Some include a private balcony. Guests can relax in the TV lounge, which has satellite TV. A car rental service is offered, and you can book excursions. Ibiza Airport is a 10-minute drive away.

name: INNSiDE By Meliá Ibiza Beach
address: C/ Granada 3-7 - Bahía De San Antonio, Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Located in San Antonio Bay and with direct access to Cala Pinet Beach, INNSiDE by Meliá Ibiza Beach features an outdoor pool, terrace with Balinese beds. There is free WiFi throughout the accommodation. Rooms have simple, bright décor and feature air conditioning, satellite TV and a private bathroom. Guests can make use of the full-equipped gym. The hotel has a buffet-style restaurant and there is also a bar serving Mediterranean cuisine and all-day breakfast on request. The Rooftop Nine provides views of the island sunsets. San Antoni de Portmany is 5 km from the hotel and Ibiza Old Town and the island’s airport are less than 30 minutes' drive away.

name: Grand Hotel Palladium
address: Calle Los Lirios, 55, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: This 5-star hotel is next to Siesta Beach, in Ibiza’s Santa Eulalia. Grand Hotel Palladium has a salt-water outdoor swimming pool, a terrace with sunbeds overlooking Santa Eulalia Bay and a springwater spa. Rooms at the Palladium offer free Wi-Fi, satellite TV, mini fridge, kettle and a private balcony or terrace. Rooms are spacious and bright, with elegant design and classic wooden furniture. Grand Hotel Palladium has a bar and a restaurant, serving fresh Mediterranean cuisine. It has a terrace overlooking Santa Eulalia Bay. The Grand Hotel’s indoor spa includes a freshwater pool in Roman-bath style. There is also a sauna, a steam bath and hot tub. Treatments like mud therapy and massages can be booked at reception. Free private parking nearby is available and car rental can be arranged at reception. Golf de Ibiza Golf Club is less than 5 km away. Santa Eulalia’s Old Town and harbour are within a 15-minute walk.

name: The Ibiza Twiins Hotel
address: Avenida Pedro Matutes Noguera - Playa d'en Bossa, 07800 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Ibiza Twiins is an innovative concept, looking for its customers to explore and discover the island of Ibiza through the senses. The different areas in this complex are the experiences at your disposal content of great tourist interest and cultural heritage through technology. It consists of Joy and Life, two twin buildings with spacious and comfortable rooms elegantly decorated. Every corner of Joy marks the character, the joy of the island and the essence of the Mediterranean with a gastronomy full of Bio proposals. The personality of life is reflected in an elegant and modern environment that envelops customers in an exclusive atmosphere where experiences will become their identity.Sembo

name: Palladium Hotel Palmyra - Adults Only
address: Avinguda Del Doctor Fleming, 18, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Palladium Hotel Palmyra is set on Ibiza and provides 4-star accommodation as well as free Wi-Fi. It also offers an outdoor pool, a 24-hour reception and massage services. The hotel provides a garden to relax in, as well as free public parking on site. Airport transfers, a dry cleaning service and a laundry service are available on request. The rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a desk, a private balcony and an in-room closet. Guests of Palladium Hotel Palmyra can enjoy the in-house bar, ideally based for a drink. A wide variety of eating options can also be found in close proximity to the property. Palladium Hotel Palmyra is within walking distance of Cafe del Mar. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to organise tours and activities in Sant Antoni de Portmany.Revato

name: Cala San Miguel The Club
address: Carrer de Ses Oliveres, 1, Ibiza, 07815 Sant Joan de Labritja, Ibiza Island
description: Discover this unique and exclusive 5 star adults only hotel in San Miguel An oasis of calm that you will never want to leave This adults-only hotel pays the greatest attention to detail and everything is designed to ensure your senses relax as soon as you arrive Our modern and elegant public areas are spacious and bright with impressive views and a fresh and modern Mediterranean decoration to your holidays the best of days An iconic hotel and destination where you can take refuge pamper yourself and enjoy some quality time A hotel in which the island cuisine with its fresh local ingredients guarantees the best tastes of the Mediterranean Enjoy relax and party in the same place enjoy the nightlife with DJs and live music in the eveningsBarcelo.com

name: Stic Urban Hotel & Spa
address: San Antonio, 30, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Situated in San Antonio and with San Antonio Beach reachable within 600 metres, Stic Urban Hotel & SPA features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a tour desk. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar. At the hotel, all rooms include a desk. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, all rooms at Stic Urban Hotel & SPA have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms are fitted with a terrace. At the accommodation the rooms have bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available each morning at Stic Urban Hotel & SPA. The hotel offers a spa centre. Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help. Popular points of interest near Stic Urban Hotel & SPA include Calo des Moro Beach, Es Pouet Beach and San Antonio Port. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 18 km from the accommodation.

name: Mondrian Ibiza
address: 20 Calle Atalaya, 07849 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Overlooking the turquoise waters of the Balearic Sea on Ibiza s scenic eastern coast, Mondrian Ibiza brings its chic sophistication, inventive design, and extraordinary service to the Mediterranean. The hotel will feature 154 spacious guest rooms infused with Mondrian s signature aesthetic. Two inviting, lounge style pools offer captivating coastal views, while three innovative dining destinations bring the flavors of the Pityusic Islands to life through crafted cocktails and creative cuisine.accorhotels.com

name: Grand Palladium Palace Ibiza Resort & Spa
address: Ctra. Playa D'en Bossa 7, 07817 Sant Jordi de ses Salines, Ibiza Island
description: Located in Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Grand Palladium Palace Ibiza Resort & Spa is a 1-minute drive from Bossa Beach and 8 minutes from Las Salinas Beach. Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Grand Paradiso Ibiza - Adults Only
address: Calle Lugo, 2, 07829 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Situated in San Antonio Bay, 500 metres from Playa de Pinet, Grand Paradiso Ibiza - Adults Only features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation offers an ATM, a concierge service and organising tours for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. A continental, American or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Cala Pinet Beach is 1.1 km from Grand Paradiso Ibiza - Adults Only, while Port des Torrent Beach is 1.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

name: Paradiso Ibiza Art Hotel - Adults Only
address: Avenida Es Calo, 64-70, Illes Balears, 07830 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Situated 2 km from Ocean Beach Ibiza, Paradiso Ibiza Art Hotel - Adults Only offers an outdoor pool, an Art Gallery inside the property and free WiFi. There is free private parking on site. Featuring bright 70's-style furniture, each suite comes with a Smeg fridge and Marshall speakers. They all include a balcony, air conditioning, a kitchenette and a private bathroom. Pool towels are provided. A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed in the breakfast area located by the pink pool. Paradiso Ibiza Art Hotel - Adults Only also features a fashion shop and a tattoo studio. Ibiza Airport is 13 km from the accommodation and a 25-minute drive will take you to Ibiza Town.

name: Hard Rock Hotel Ibiza
address: Carretera Playa D'en Bossa 10, 07817 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Hard Rock Hotel Ibiza is located right on the beachfront in Playa d'en Bossa. This modern hotel has a large open-air stage hosting prestigious weekly concerts. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. This large hotel has 2 outdoor pools and a spa with a hot tub and sauna, as well as a gym. There is also an exclusive private beach club with beach bar next to the hotel, and a range of chill-out areas. Hard Rock Ibiza is decorated with a range of music memorabilia. The stylish, air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers. The windows also have blackout curtains. There are 6 on-site restaurants and various bars. The hotel also offers a venue for teenagers, and there is an entertainment programme for children. Ibiza Airport is just 7 minutes' drive from Hard Rock Hotel Ibiza.

name: Bellamar Hotel Beach & Spa
address: S'Espartar, 2, Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: The Bellamar offers indoor and outdoor swimming pools, and a spa with gym. The hotel is set next to Ibiza’s San Antonio Bay, just 50 metres from Es Pouet Beach. Free WiFi is provided. The hotel is near the seaside promenade. The centre of San Antonio is just 1.5km away. This lively town is famous for its nightlife. Rooms at the Bellamar are modern and comfortable. They are soundproofed and air-conditioned. Each room has a terrace, satellite TV and a bathroom with hairdryer. The hotel’s wellness centre has a sauna, hot tub and steam bath. It also offers massages, body wraps and other treatments. There is good access to the town centre by bus. There is a bus stop outside the hotel. Boat services also connect the hotel to the town and other beaches. There is also free public parking nearby. This seasonal hotel opens from May to September.

name: Ebano Hotel Apartments & Spa
address: Begonias, 22-24, Ibiza, Balearic Islands, Spain, 07817 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Ebano Hotel Apartments & Spa is located 300 metres from the beautiful Playa d'en Bossa Beach and less than 3 km from Ibiza town. This apartment complex offers an outdoor pool, gardens, a restaurant-bar and free WiFi. Featuring plenty of natural light, each air-conditioned apartment comes with a private balcony. They have a fully equipped kitchenette. There is also a lounge with a sofa bed and 2 flat-screen TVs and Bluetooth radio. There is 24-hour reception, and staff can help you to purchase tickets or rent a car. Nearby you will find shops, bars and restaurants. Within 5 minutes’ walk of Ebano Hotel Apartments & Spa are Ibiza’s famous beach clubs, Space and Bora Bora.

name: Hotel Gran Sol
address: Calle Soledad 49, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Set 100 metres from Caló d’es Moro Beach in San Antonio, the Gran Sol Hotel has a large swimming pool with a sun terrace and snack bar. Free private parking is provided however subject to availability and spaces can not be reserved in advance. All rooms at the Gran Sol feature a balcony, air conditioning and satellite TV. They also have a private bathroom complete with hairdryer. Table tennis facilities available as well as pool tables. The gardens offer an area in which guests can relax or sunbathe. Buffet meals are served at the Hotel Gran Sol and guests can also walk into the centre of San Antonio where there are many bars and restaurants. The beaches of Cala Grassio and Cala Grassioneta are just a short stroll down the coast.

name: Catalonia Royal Ses Savines - Adults Only
address: Calle Ses Estaques, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Offering beautiful sea views, views over Ibiza Port and the island of Formentera, Catalonia Royal Ses Estaques-Adults Only is a beachfront hotel in Santa Eularia des Riu in the Ibiza Region. There is free WiFi available throughout. The hotel has 2 swimming pools: an infinity pool in the upper terrace of the building, together with a sundeck with sun loungers and Balinese beds; and a 2nd pool is in a gardening area in front of the hotel. Here there is a pool bar, and a gym is also available. All rooms are spacious and bright. They all have a private furnished terrace with sea views, a sofa with a smart TV and chargers for all types of smartphones. They all have an ample bathroom with shower, hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers. Some rooms have a private furnished terrace with direct access to this pool. A varied breakfast, including local products, is served every morning until 11:00 at the on-site restaurant "La Mar de Santa Restaurant & Beach Bar", which has a large terrace with sea views. Outdoor massage services are available at an extra cost. The restaurant is specialized in Mediterranean cuisine and dishes from Ibiza such as the traditional bullit de peix. The hotel also offers free tea service, with drinks and finger food, from 16:00 to 22:00. Ibiza City Centre is within 30 minutes’ drive while Las Dalias Hippy Market is 5 km away.

name: Romeos Ibiza - Adults Only
address: Carrer de Lleo, 3, 07829 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Located in San Antonio Bay, only 300 metres from the nearest beach, Romeo´s Motel & Diner - Ibiza provides accommodation with a restaurant, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a bar. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property offers bike hire and features a garden and terrace. All units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel every room is fitted with a private bathroom, SMEG mini fridge and a Marshall bluetooth speaker. A breakfast is available daily at Romeo´s Motel & Diner - Ibiza. The hotel has a wedding chapel. Guests can also enjoy the Play Room bar featuring karaoke and pole dance, and all the facilities in the Paradiso Ibiza Art Hotel, located 100 metres away. Ocean Beach Ibiza is 3.2 km away. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

name: W Ibiza
address: Carrer Ricardo Curtoys Gotarredona, 37, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Much anticipated and off the beaten track, W Ibiza luxury beach hotel strikes a pose on the palm-fringed, sand-drenched beachfront of Santa Eulalia. The seasonal escape mixes the parallel realities of Ibiza with a magnetic pull that turns up the sass. This is where you get to stay and play with a brand that was made for the White Isle. Sun-kissed and diverse, Ibiza is more than an island, it’s a brand. This is where flower power meets club culture and myths, legends and nature amplify the compulsive, enigmatic spirit. As the third largest town, Santa Eulalia totally owns its relaxed pace and cosmopolitan attitude. Offering up a heady mix of local art galleries, trendy boutiques and amazing dining, alongside gorgeous beaches and dive-deep sea. Just 21km from Ibiza Airport, you can style it out among the chic marina and hotspots in no time. Worried about leaving your furry friends behind? Bring them along! Our hotel is pet friendly and welcomes trained pets.Marriott

name: Sol Beach House Ibiza - Adults Only
address: Pare Vicent Costa, 2, 07840 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Sol Beach House Ibiza is located in a quiet area of San Eulalia, right on the seafront. This hotel offers a fitness centre and 3 magnificent pools with large terraces overlooking the sea. The bright, pretty, air-conditioned rooms at Sol Beach House Ibiza feature a furnished terrace with side or full views of the Mediterranean Sea. They also include a private bathroom. The hotel's outdoor restaurant, The Kitchen Buffet Restaurant, serves mediterranean and international cuisine with a local flair. It features 3 bars, Sol Shack Chiringuito pool-side bar, the Rooftop Bar and the Lobby piano bar. There is also WiFi available, as well as a large sun terrace and gardened areas. Sol Beach House Ibiza is located just 300 metres from San Eulalia Port, and 1 km from shops, restaurants and entertainment. You can drive to Ibiza Town in around an hour, and Ibiza Airport is 20 km away.

name: Dorado Ibiza - Adults Only
address: La Ruda, s/n, 07817 Sant Jordi de ses Salines, Ibiza Island
description: Set on the beachfront, Dorado Ibiza - Adults Only and following a musical and rock and roll-inspired theme, all suites are unique. Dorado Ibiza - Adults Only offers suites decorated with gold and turquoise finishes. Guests will have free WiFi access, a Marshall sound system and wonderful sea views. Each suite comes with a seating area, a bedroom and a bar with a Marshall fridge. Suites also include air conditioning, a 42-inch flat-screen TV with USB port, kitchenette and a mini bar. There is also an iron and coffee and tea. There is a pool bar, where guests can enjoy a drink by the outdoor pool. Beach and pool towels are offered. Big sun beds and free towels are included. The accommodation has rooftop terrace and a small night club, and there is often music and events taking place. Dorado Ibiza - Adults Only is 3 km away from Ibiza airport.

name: El Puerto Ibiza Hotel & Spa
address: Carrer De Carlos Iii, 24, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: El Puerto Ibiza Hotel Spa is situated in Ibiza Town, 500 metres from Ibiza Port and the Ferry Terminals to Formentera. This property also provides guests with a terrace and with meeting facilities. The property is 800 metres from Dalt Vila. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. Rooms feature central heating, minibar, and a flat-screen TV. The bathroom comes with bath or shower. A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. There is an à la carte restaurant and a bar. The hotel offers a spa and wellness centre that includes sauna, Turkish bath, and thermal showers. A pool, a solarium, a fitness centre, and massages are also available. Ibiza Bus Station and the shopping area are 300 metres away. Popular points of interest near El Puerto Ibiza Hotel Spa include Marina Botafoch, Pacha and Hard Rock Cafe Ibiza. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.

name: Ca Na Xica - Hotel & Spa
address: Crtra De Sant Miquel, Km 10.2, 07815 Sant Miquel de Balansat, Ibiza Island
description: Ca Na Xica is a former country estate converted into a luxurious hotel. Offering beautiful views and a swimming pool, its spacious, stylish suites all have private terraces or balconies. All of the air-conditioned suites in Ca Na Xica offer flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. All are decorated with white walls and authentic wooden furniture. They also have pillow menus. The property has large, airy lounges and a tree-lined terrace with sun loungers. Massage can be arranged on request. Access to the spa is free for hotel guests. Ca Na Xica is located between Santa Gertrudis and Sant Miquel. The beach is about 3 km away, and there is free on-site parking. The property offers bicycle hire.

name: Els Pins Resort and Spa
address: Carrer Des Calo, 07820 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Facing the beachfront, Els Pins Resort & Spa - Emar Hotels offers 4-star accommodation in San Antonio Bay and features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, garden and shared lounge. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking is available on site. Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, certain rooms at Els Pins Resort & Spa - Emar Hotels also offer a sea view. At the accommodation each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A buffet breakfast is available daily at Els Pins Resort & Spa - Emar Hotels. The hotel offers a terrace. You can play table tennis and tennis at Els Pins Resort & Spa - Emar Hotels, and car hire is available. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Cala Pinet Beach, Playa de Pinet and Es Pouet Beach. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 16 km from Els Pins Resort & Spa - Emar Hotels.

name: Fiesta Hotel Cala Gració - Adults Only
address: Ctra. Cala Gracio, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: No description found

name: Hotel Simbad
address: Ses Figueres 22, Talamanca, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Set on the beach in Talamanca Bay, 3 km from Ibiza Town, this hotel offers an outdoor pool with sea views. There is a free spa with a gym and hot tub. All Hotel Simbad Ibiza rooms have air conditioning and satellite TV. Most have balconies with sea views, and there is free WiFi throughout. The private bathroom comes with amenities, and you can rent the safe. Simbad Ibiza has 2 restaurants. One offers an à la carte menu and the other serves a buffet-style breakfast and dinner. There are also 2 bars with terraces, offering panoramic views of the bay. Free sun loungers and parasols are available at the Simbad’s large outdoor pool area. The spa includes a sauna and indoor pool. There is a 24-hour front desk. The Simbad has a tour desk, where you can rent a car, and free on-site parking is offered.

name: Oku Ibiza
address: Carrer Portixol, 2, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: OKU Ibiza features a restaurant, fitness centre, a bar and garden in San Antonio. Featuring a terrace, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests. The units in the hotel are equipped with a coffee machine. At OKU Ibiza every room includes a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or a buffet breakfast. OKU Ibiza offers an outdoor pool. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Café del Mar, Golden Buddha Ibiza and Cap Blanc Aquarium. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 22 km from OKU Ibiza.

name: Hostal Sunset Ibiza
address: Barcelona, 7, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: The Hostal Sunset Ibiza is situated in the centre of San Antonio, just 250 metres from Calo des Moro Beach. It offers free WiFi and a seasonal outdoor swimming pool. Most rooms at Hostal Sunset Ibiza include a balcony or terrace and all of them private bathroom. They also have a safe and free air conditioning. The bars and restaurants of San Antonio are also just a few minutes’ walk away. Ibiza Airport and old town are just 15 km away from the property. A bus stop is located 500 metres away. The tour desk can arrange car rental, and provide information on the surrounding area.

name: Amàre Beach Hotel Ibiza - Adults Recommended
address: Calle de La Rioja, 9, 07829 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Amàre Beach Hotel Ibiza Adults Recommended in San Antonio Bay, in Bou Cove's waterfront, features 3 seasonal outdoor swimming pools as well as direct access to a pier. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. All air-conditioned rooms come with a balcony, desk and flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms offer access to an exclusive lounge. Other facilities at the hotel include the Amàre Club, which features 3 different areas offering music, food, and entertainment by the sea. There is also a rooftop terrace with a bar, and the Hayaca Restaurant whose chef has a Michelin star. The wellness area offers beauty treatments and the gym has sea views. Luggage storage is offered and the hotel has a 24-hour reception, a tour desk and room service for guests. Online check-in is also offered to all guests. You can hire a car or bicycle. Kumharas cocktail bar can be found nearby. San Antonio nightlife is just 4 km away. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 13 km from the property.

name: Camelina Suites
address: Carrer Valencia, 4, Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Torrent Bay Club is just 100 metres from the beautiful Port des Torrent Beach and 5 km from San Antonio. It offers an outdoor pool for adults, an outdoor pool for children and bright air-conditioned apartments with a private balcony. Free WiFi is provided. The Torrent Bay apartments feature tiled floors and smart décor. Each one has a seating area with sofas and satellite TV, as well as a kitchenette with a microwave and coffee-maker. There is a large garden with loungers and a children’s playground. The complex also has table tennis facilities. There is a restaurant that serves snacks and breakfast daily. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Ibiza. You can also hire a car or bicycle on site. You will find other amazing beaches nearby. You can drive to Cala Bassa in 5 minutes and to Cala Tarida in 10 minutes. Ibiza Town is around 20 minutes' drive from the property.

name: THB Ocean Beach
address: Carrer de Bellavista, 1, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: THB Ocean Beach Hotel - Adults Only is set just metres from the sea and offers great views over Sant Antoni Bay. It has swimming pools for adults and a gym. THB Ocean Beach Hotel - Adults Only is located in the Ca’n Obrador area of Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza. Diving classes and excursions can be organized from reception. All rooms have air conditioning, a balcony or terrace and satellite TV as well as free WiFi. Most have views over the swimming pool. The THB Ocean Beach Hotel - Adults Only offers car, bicycle and quad-bike rental on site.

name: Los Felices Ibiza - New Opening 2024
address: Carrer Madrid, 07829 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: No description found

name: My Way Luxury Ibiza Studio - Ab Group
address: Argelagues 18, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Apartamentos My Way, a property with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, is located in Playa d'en Bossa, a 10-minute walk from Ushuaia Ibiza and Hard Rock Ibiza. Buffet breakfast is served daily at El Limonero restaurant located across the street. The apartment offers a balcony. A car rental service is available at the 24-hour front desk. Hï Ibiza is 800 metres from Apartamentos My Way, while Ses Salines Nature Reserve is 6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 4 km from the property.

name: Barceló Portinatx - Adults Only
address: Venda de Portinatx, 62, 07810 Sant Joan de Labritja, Ibiza Island
description: The Barcelo Portinatx offers an exclusive and welcoming adults-only environment in one of the quietest areas of Ibiza. A fairytale setting perfect for a stay relaxed on the seafront and the opportunity for lovers of sports to enjoy all kinds of water sports hiking or cycling.The hotel is just 20 metres from Portinatx beach close to the enchanting Ibizan town of San Juan and 40 minutes drive from Ibiza Port; this hotel offers travellers a small sanctuary for a restful holiday. Its fully refurbished rooms half of which are Junior Suites have sea views and some have a hot tub on the terrace. The hotel has a large sun terrace 2 swimming pools an outdoor Wellness space a terrace with panoramic views of the sea and a Beach Club. There is also free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel.Barcelo.com

name: Ibiza Sun Apartments
address: Deessa Tanit, 3, 07817 Platja d'en Bossa
description: Located 200 metres from Playa d’en Bossa Beach, Ibiza Sun Apartments features 2 outdoor swimming pools, a hot tub and a bar. Ibiza Town is 3 km away. Suites at Sun Ibiza have air conditioning and feature modern minimalist décor. There is a living room with a sofa bed and a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, and a kitchenette. Free WiFi is included. On site you will find SunThai restaurant, a chill out terrace with loungers and sunshades, and the Sun Wellness area. Staff at the 24-hour reception can arrange several activities. Sun Ibiza Apartments is close to Ushuaia and Ibiza’s most popular nightclubs and bars. Ibiza Airport is just 3 km away.

name: Gatzara Suites Santa Gertrudis
address: C/Venda de Parada 6, 07814 Santa Gertrudis de Fruitera, Ibiza Island
description: Offering a seasonal outdoor pool and sun terrace, Gatzara Suites Santa Gertrudis is situated in Santa Gertrudis de Fruitera in the Ibiza Region. Some rooms have a seating area where you can relax. For your comfort, you will find slippers, free toiletries and a hair dryer. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is featured. There is a 24-hour front desk and shops at the property. The hotel also offers bike hire and car hire. Ibiza Town is 10 km from Gatzara Suites Santa Gertrudis, while San Antonio is 11 km away. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

name: Agroturismo Can Guillem
address: Carretera Santa Gertrudis, Km 0,100, Santa Gertrudis de Fruitera, Ibiza Island
description: Offering an outdoor swimming pool and large gardens, Can Guillem is a stylish converted farmhouse set in the Ibizan countryside. It offers free Wi-Fi and is located 5 km from Ibiza Town. The interior of Can Guillem features traditional tiled floors and whitewashed walls. Each air-conditioned room has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. Can Guillem offers massage services and a hot tub. Car and bicycle rental is available and you can also hire a boat or take sailing lessons. The hotel offers a charming terrace and you can order meals on request. In Ibiza Town there is a wide variety of restaurants and bars, as well as the world-famous nightclub Pacha. Ibiza Golf Club is a 15-minute drive from Can Guillem. A shuttle service to San José Airport, located 10 km away, is available on request.

name: Invisa Hotel La Cala- Adults Only
address: Calle Huesca, 1, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Situated 250 metres from Santa Eulalia Beach in Ibiza, this adults-oriented hotel offers spacious rooms with a furnished balcony and flat-screen TV. The spa includes a gym and sauna. The hotel has an outdoor pool surrounded by a sun terrace with free loungers. Guests can rent towels. Invisa Hotel La Cala offers a buffet restaurant where local and international dishes are available. Drinks and snacks can be enjoyed in the bar area. Free WiFi is available in public areas. Ibiza Town is 14 km away. Car rental can be arranged at the hotel’s tour desk.

name: Occidental Ibiza
address: Carrer De Valencia, 23-27, 07829 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Occidental Ibiza (formerly Barceló Pueblo Ibiza) is set just 350 metres from Port d'es Torrent beach,and features 3 outdoor pools, a children's pool and an on-site buffet restaurant. Air-conditioned rooms have a flat-screen TV, minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Free WiFi is available. Occidental Ibiza's buffet restaurant has a terrace. Guests will also find a lounge bar, and during the summer, a pool bar. San Antonio is only 6 km from the hotel, and Ibiza Town and Ibiza Airport are only 18 km away.

name: Hotel Tres Torres
address: Bahia Ses Estaques, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: The Hotel Tres Torres faces the Santa Eulalia del Río Sporting Marina, 14 km from the city of Ibiza. There is an outdoor pool, and all of the rooms have a private balcony. Free WiFi is provided. The Tres Torres offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with a TV and private bathroom. Some rooms have sea views. There is snack bar and the reception is open 24 hours a day. The hotel is located close to the centre of Santa Eulalia, within 10 minutes' walk of a range of restaurants and bars. Ibiza airport is 22.5 km from the property. RESERVATIONS OF 5 ROOMS OR MORE MAY BE SUBJECT TO DIFFERENT CONDITIONS AND ADDITIONAL SUPPLEMENTS.

name: Can Arabi
address: Calle Torrente, 07819 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Can Arabí is a charming former farm surrounded by orange and olive groves, just 2.5 km from Ibiza Town. It features an outdoor pool, hot tub and spacious patios and terraces. The rooms at the Can Arabí are each named after one of the trees on the island of Ibiza. They offer rustic design, air conditioning, satellite TV and a bathroom with bathrobe. Breakfast is included in rates at Can Arabí. There is also free Wi-Fi in the public areas of the property. Can Arabí offers free on-site parking and is just a short drive from the small village of Puig d’en Valls. Here guests will find a supermarket and local bars and restaurants.

name: Grand Palladium White Island Resort & Spa
address: C/ Playa d'en Bossa, 07817 Sant Jordi de ses Salines, Ibiza Island
description: Located halfway between the airport and Ibiza city, this magnificent beachfront resort is ideally located in Playa d'en Bossa, offering a quiet and peaceful setting, but yet close enough to the most avant-garde and fashionable district of the area. With its spacious and tastefully decorated guest rooms and a world-class spa offering exclusive beauty treatments, the establishment is a perfect place for those seeking a relaxing holiday, full of luxury, in a beautiful environment. When it comes for dining and wining, guests will be spoilt for choice by the huge variety of restaurants and bars offered by the hotel, which serve delicious local and international specialities. From lying on the beach or enjoying the hot tub of the outdoor swimming pool to practice sport activities and different games, the hotel features a wide range of facilities that will entertain both adults and children.FarePortal

name: Hotel Rural Xereca
address: 7813 C/Torrent, Puig D`En Valls Santa Eulalia Del Rio, 07819 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Hotel Xereca is situated in Puig den Valls, 3.2 km from Ibiza Town. The pet-friendly hotel has an outdoor pool and sun terrace, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the snack bar. Nearly all rooms and suites have a private terrace or balcony with views to the garden or pool area. All rooms have a private bathroom with extras as hairdryer, free toiletries, bathrobes as well as flat screen TV, minibar and coffeemachine. Bike hire and car hire are available at this farm stay and the area is popular for golfing. The area is popular for boattrips and watersports. Located very quiet but very good connected Salinas Beach is just 8 km away, Playa den Bossa 5 km, San Antonio 12 km and Ibiza Airport 8 km. Airport shuttle services are available on prior request, and subject to availability.

name: Hotel Riomar, Ibiza, A Tribute Portfolio Hotel
address: C/ Del Río, 48, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Where the river meets the sea, a place of natural wonder from which energies are channeled. Ocean Brasserie & Bar, lounge and terrace, is a place to immerse amongst a community of leisure, making for an affirmed connection to life under the sun. Relax at the Pool Deck or with a morning yoga session in TRIBE, our secret garden. Hotel Riomar Ibiza is another world, where dreams are fueled and inspiration is found. A residence for ideas and a place where community evolves.Marriott

name: Mirador de Dalt Vila-Relais & Chateaux
address: Plaza de España, 4, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: This historical property overlooks the Mediterranean from its hilltop position in central Ibiza Town. It offers elegant rooms with free WiFi and a whirlpool bath. The air-conditioned rooms at the Mirador de Dalt Vila feature parquet floors and stylish décor. Each one has plasma satellite TV and the bathrooms come with Bulgari products and a bathrobe. Mirador de Dalt Vila offers breakfast until 12:00. It can be served in the room. The hotel has an outdoor pool with loungers and a hot tub. Staff at the 24-hour reception can help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events. Ibiza Airport is just 15 minutes’ drive away. A public parking area is available 3 minutes' walk away. A free valet service is available.

name: Grupotel Ibiza Beach Resort - Adults Only
address: Carrer de Sa Cala Den Xuclar, 50, Sant Joan de Labritja, Ibiza Island
description: Offering an outdoor pool and a free spa with sauna and hot tub, Grupotel Ibiza Beach Resort - Adults Only is located in Portinatx, just off the beach.There is free WiFi throughout. Bright spacious rooms are air-conditioned and feature hardwood floors and a flat-screen satellite TV. There is a desk, a dressing room and a safe is available at an extra cost. The private bathroom comes with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Set in a quiet area, the seafront Grupotel Ibiza Beach Resort - Adults Only offers a buffet restaurant and a bar. There is also a TV lounge and evening entertainment programme. There is a 24-hour reception and you can hire a car or exchange currency at the tour desk. Ibiza Airport is a 40-minute drive away.

name: THB Naeco Ibiza
address: Calle Mostoles, s/n, 07820 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: The THB Naeco Ibiza is situated around 50 metres from Es Puet Beach. This hotel has an outdoor swimming pool. The rooms have a living-sleeping area and a balcony. They include satellite TV, free WiFi and a sofa bed. The hotel offers a 24-hour reception. Breakfast is offered and the accommodation has half-board rates with a la carte dishes. There is an on-site bar and the property is situated close to many restaurants and bars. Other facilities in the area include car and scooter rental. THB Naeco Ibiza is a 30-minute drive from Ibiza Town, whilst Ibiza Airport is around 20 km away. Can Marça Cove is a 45-minute drive from the hotel.

name: Apartamentos Vibra Jabeque Soul
address: Carlos Roman Ferrer 25, Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: The spacious apartments at Jabeque are located in between Playa de Figuertas and Playa d’en Bossa. All accommodation features a balcony with spectacular views of the sea. At Apartamentos Vibra Jabeque Soul-3SUP there are separate swimming pools for adults and children as well as a poolside snack-bar. Billiards and table tennis are also available to guests. Free WiFi and a free safe are available. The apartments have air conditioning, a small kitchen including a fridge, and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. A bus service runs from outside the hotel, giving guests ease of access to Ibiza Town which is 1 km away. Ibiza Airport is just 10 minutes by car. Reception is open 24 hours and provides car and motorcycle rentals. WiFi is also available.

name: Can Vistabella Boutique Resort
address: Camino de Benimusa, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Set within gardens, Can Vistabella Boutique Resort has been fully renovated in 2019 and features a swimming pool surrounded by a sun terrace and loungers. All accommodation features a terrace and free WiFi. Free parking is available on-site. Can Vistabella Boutique Resort is located up on a hill, with views over Portmany Bay and is a short drive to the beach. Rooms include coffee maker, fridge, and kettle. Some rooms include a flat-screen TV in the living room, which leads to the terrace; and a kitchen fitted with electric cooker. Bungalows offer a lounge-dining room with double sofa bed. Other facilities at the property include a restaurant and bar, located by the pool, a yoga deck and outdoor cinema. The property also offers massage and beauty treatments. Ibiza Airport is approximately 22 km from Can Vistabella Boutique Resort. Many bars and restaurants as well as popular clubs are a 5-minute drive away.

name: Marble Stella Maris Ibiza
address: Ctra. Cap Negret 16, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Marble Stella Maris is located in a resort Surrounded by six hectares of lush gardens and pine trees, in Cap Negret, 3 kilometres from Ibiza’s San Antoni. It offers swimming pools, a multi-purpose court, a mini golf course and tennis courts. Marble Stella Maris features white low-rise buildings surrounded by gardens. All the rooms include air-conditioned, flat-screen TV and a fridge. Some rooms have a balcony/terrace with sea/garden views. The animation team organises several sport activities and it is provided for all ages. The complex serves breakfast, lunch, dinner, snacks, and local alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages. Marble Stella Maris Ibiza offers WiFi for free throughout the hotel. At the resort rent a car available, ideal for exploring the island. The property is located in a hilly environment and offers a free buggy service to carry guests and their luggage from and to reception. Available from 08:15 to 23:45. Time Schedule could change by daily operations and weather conditions.

name: Petunia Ibiza, a Beaumier hotel
address: Carrer de Sa Pala Marina, Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Offering a shared swimming pool and garden, Petunia Ibiza, a Beaumier hotel is located in Cala Carbó, 550 metres from the beach. The property offers accommodation with air conditioning and free WiFi. Featuring garden or sea views, each room comes with a seating area and flat-screen TV. The private bathroom includes a shower or bath and hairdryer. A supermarket can be found 800 metres from the property. Sant Josep de Sa Talaia is 12 km away. Guests can reach Ibiza Airport in 30 minutes’ by car.

name: Hotel Anfora Ibiza
address: Calle Cardona 9, Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Set just 100 metres from Es Canar Beach, Hotel Anfora Ibiza features terraces, swimming pools and an outdoor spa and fitness area. There is also an on-site restaurant. Air-conditioned rooms are spacious and bright, and include a TV, safe, hairdryer and free WiFi. The restaurant offers a breakfast buffet, and both international and local cuisine. Guests will also find a pool bar serving cocktails, and a lounge bar. Hotel Anfora Ibiza has courtesy rooms where you can shower on check-out day and leave luggage. Punta Arabi Hippy Market is 850 metres while Chirincana Bar is just 100 metres from the hotel. Sant Eulalia can be reached in a 10-minute drive, while Ibiza Airport is 45 minutes away by car.

name: Can Lluc Hotel Rural
address: Cami Des Terset, Ctra Sant Rafel a Santa Agnes Km 2, Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Featuring an outdoor pool, a wellness area, and a restaurant serving a free buffet breakfast, Can Lluc Boutique Country Hotel & Villas is set in a valley in the heart of Ibiza. Each air-conditioned room includes a flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar, kettle and Nespresso coffee machine. Bathrooms come with a hairdryer, bathrobe, slippers and welcome toiletries. Each room is decorated differently. Some have a private terrace, while other have a fireplace or a hot tub. Can Lluc Restaurant is specializes in Mediterranean and local cuisine. The restaurant offers a small range of dishes made with fresh produce grown at the property. The wellness room features a Finish sauna, a hot tub and a fitness area. Massages and beauty treatments can be arranged at the hotel. Ibiza town and San Antonio are both around 10 minutes' drive away. The hotel is well connected to the main highways and roads.

name: Hostal Molins Park
address: Joan Xico 42, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Hostal Molins Park is located in a quiet area of Ibiza Town, 500 metres from the centre. It offers an outdoor pool and air-conditioned rooms with a TV. The rooms at the Hostal Molins Park feature tiled floors and simple décor. Each one comes with a safe, minibar and a private bathroom. Some rooms have a private terrace. Next to the guest house’s 24-hour reception is the snack bar, which serves a daily buffet breakfast. Staff at reception can arrange car and motorbike rental, as well as offering tourist information. Wi-Fi is free in public areas. There are many bars, restaurants and shops within a short walk of Hostal Molins Park. Ibiza Cathedral, also located in the Dalt Vila area, is just 400 metres away.

name: Eurostars Ibiza
address: Calle Ramon Muntaner 25, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Attractively set in the centre of Ibiza Town, Eurostars Ibiza features air-conditioned rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The hotel has a terrace and a spa centre. The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. Certain rooms come with a kitchen with a fridge, a minibar and a stovetop. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and vegan options. Popular points of interest near Eurostars Ibiza include Figueretes Beach, Playa d'en Bossa Beach and Ibiza Port. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 5 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Osiris Ibiza
address: Platja Es Pouet 1, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: The Osiris Ibiza is a family-run quiet hotel located next to Es Puet Beach in San Antonio Bay. It offers an outdoor swimming pool and large sun terrace with sea views. Rooms at Hotel Osiris include air conditioning and satellite TV. Some rooms also feature a furnished balcony with views of the sea or gardens. San Antonio centre is a 15-minute walk along the seafront promenade. In front of the hotel there is a regular bus service to the town centre and other beaches. Water sports are available nearby. Osiris offers a lounge area with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV. There is also a lobby bar which serves the poolside terrace. A buffet breakfast is served every morning and an attractive buffet with international cuisine is available in the evenings.

name: Hotel Vibra Vila
address: C/ Galicia, 12, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Hotel Vibra Vila features a small rooftop pool and terrace, with free sunbeds and stunning sea views. Located next to Figueretas Beach, it is 1 km from historic Ibiza Town. The Hotel Vibra Vila offers functional, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. Rooms include a mini fridge and a private bathroom. Free WiFi is available. Hotel Vibra Vila serves a buffet breakfast. The hotel also has a TV lounge. The hotel is a 15-minute walk from central Ibiza Town, and just 10 minutes’ walk from the port area. Many famous nightclubs, including Hï Ibiza, Amnesia and Pachá are a short drive away by taxi or the island’s Disco bus.

name: Can Salia
address: Caló 108, 07829 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 45 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with refrigerators and stovetops. Rooms have private furnished balconies. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and microwaves. Amenities Dip into one of the 2 outdoor swimming pools or enjoy other recreational amenities, which include a 24-hour fitness center. This Mediterranean aparthotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge). Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge). Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a computer station, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Property Location Located in Sant Josep de sa Talaia (San Antonio Bay), Can Salia is within a 15-minute walk of Punta Xinxó and Cala de Bou Beach. This 4.5-star aparthotel is 12.1 mi (19.5 km) from Port of Ibiza and 11.8 mi (18.9 km) from Dalt Vila. Dining Satisfy your appetite with Mediterranean cuisine at Miramare, a poolside restaurant where you can enjoy drinks at the bar/lounge, take in the garden view, and dine alfresco. Dining is also available at the coffee shop/cafe. Wrap up your day with a drink at the poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 8:00 AM to 11:30 AM for a fee. name: Aparthotel Vibra Mogambo - Adults only
address: Carrer Murtra, 6, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Set in Ibiza’s lively Playa d'en Bossa, the Aparthotel Vibra Mogambo - Adults only are just across the road from the beach. The complex offers an outdoor swimming pool. Each Playasol Mogambo apartment features a private balcony, air conditioning and satellite TV. The open-plan living area has a sofa and a kitchen corner. Free WiFi is available. Aparthotel Vibra Mogambo - Adults only are set in 2 separate buildings, each with an onsite restaurant and bar. The complex offers car rental and a safety deposit service. The apartments are 600 metres from the world-famous Space nightclub and Bora Bora beach bar. Ibiza Town is 3 km away, and there is a bus stop next to the complex.

name: Can Beia Hostal Boutique
address: Carrer de la Soletat, 30, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Can Beia Hostal Boutique is situated in the heart of San Antonio, within walking distance of the beach and an area with lively atmosphere, restaurants and bars. There is free WiFi throughout. Rooms are air-conditioned and come with a private bathroom with a shower and a TV. The beach of San Antonio, is a short distance from the hotel, offering a wide range of activities, from windsurfing and sailing to parasailing and pedaloes. You can also catch a ferry to the beautiful beaches of Cala Conta and Cala Bassa, situated nearby.

name: Amistat Island Hostel Ibiza - Albergue Juvenil
address: Calle de Santa Rosalía, 25, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 360 air-conditioned guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms feature showers, hair dryers, and toothbrushes and toothpaste. Amenities Enjoy recreation amenities such as a seasonal outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace. Additional features at this Mediterranean hostel include complimentary wireless Internet access, a television in a common area, and tour/ticket assistance. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Event facilities at this hostel consist of a conference center and a meeting room. Property Location Located in Sant Antoni de Portmany, AMISTAT Island Hostel Ibiza - ALBERGUE JUVENIL is a 2-minute drive from San Antonio Sunset Strip and 14 minutes from Cala Bassa Beach. This hostel is 9 mi (14.5 km) from Es Vedrà and 10.4 mi (16.7 km) from Marina Botafoch. Dining At AMISTAT Island Hostel Ibiza - ALBERGUE JUVENIL, enjoy a satisfying meal at the restaurant. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the poolside bar. Continental breakfasts are available daily from 8 AM to 11:00 AM for a fee.
