name: Aparthotel Vibra San Marino
address: Lugo, 07829 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Situated 7 km from Sant Josep de sa Talaia and a 5-minute walk from the beach, Hotel Apartamentos Vibra San Marino features an outdoor pool and offers accommodation with air conditioning. All rooms and studios include a balcony. Each has satellite TV, and studios are also equipped with a glass-ceramic hob and a fridge. The private bathroom comes with a shower. Free WiFi and a free safe are available. The property also has a terrace. You will find shops and restaurants within 200 metres of the San Marino. The lively Ibiza Town is 20 km away, and Ibiza Airport can be reached in 25 minutes by car.

name: Palladium Hotel Cala Llonga - Adults Only
address: C/ Po. Box 40, Playa Cala Llonga, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Palladium Hotel Cala Llonga - Adults Only is just 100 metres from Cala Llonga Beach. It has a swimming pool and the air-conditioned rooms have private terraces and a hydromassage shower. Palladium Hotel Cala Llonga - Adults Only has a stylish chill-out area with a hot tub and Balinese sunbeds, providing wonderful Mediterranean views. There is free WiFi in public areas, and an air-conditioned satellite TV lounge. The hotel offer Show cooking restaurant and Buffet. There are also 2 bars, one of them offering live entertainment. All of the hotel´s rooms have comfortable furniture, flat-screen satellite TV and iPod docking station. They also have a minibar and a laptop-sized safe. Palladium Hotel Cala Llonga - Adults Only also has a large sun terrace with loungers and a tennis court.

name: Sandos El Greco Beach- Adults Only
address: Cala Portinatx, Portinatx, Sant Joan de Labritja, Ibiza, 7810, 07810 Sant Joan de Labritja, Ibiza Island
description: Set in the northern end of Ibiza, Sandos El Greco Beach - Adults Only is located on the beachfront of Portinax offering stunning views of the Mediterranean Sea and access to the white sand beach. The hotel boasts an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre. There is also a wellness centre with beauty treatments and massages available at a cost. Guests will also find a chill-out area with a whirlpool. There are 250 rooms spread throughout five floors. All air-conditioned rooms feature free WiFi, a Led TV, telephone and a balcony. Each, has a bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. There is a la carte restaurant, where guests can enjoy an included dinner for stays of 5 nights, a snack bar by the pool and an air-conditioned buffet restaurant with show cooking and a pizzeria. Sandos El Greco Beach also has 3 bars. Sandos El Greco Beach - Adults Only has a 24-reception, an entertainment program and snorkeling and cycling can be arranged. Ibiza Airport is 29 km from the hotel.

name: Ama Ibiza
address: C/Bruc Nº 3 · Playa de'n Bossa, 07817 Sant Jordi de ses Salines, Ibiza Island
description: This apartment complex is located in the first sea line in Playa d'en Bossa. In the immediate vicinity guests will find numerous shops, bars, restaurants and cafes. The links to the public transport are situated within a few meters from the hotel. The revolutionary concept of the establishment breaks all the topics of Ibiza. This is the first settlement of the island pure trend. Visitors may rescue the best of the Pitiusa's tradition and pass through the filter of relaxed luxury: one rabidly contemporary interior. Guests can also enjoy music, events and parties in a privileged environment.FarePortal

name: Hotel Boutique Ses Pitreras
address: Calle Valladolid 1, San Antonio Bay, Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: This stylish and exclusive small hotel is located in Sant Agustí, only 200 metres from the beach. It offers an outdoor pool, a restaurant, a spa and free Wi-Fi throughout. Hotel Boutique Ses Pitreras features 7 rooms combining both Ibizan and minimalist décor and offering views of the garden and the pool. Each air-conditioned room has been carefully decorated and comes with flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Some rooms have a hot tub or a private terrace. The restaurant at Ses Pitreras is surrounded by beautiful gardens. The spa includes a sauna and a Turkish bath. Facial treatments as well as massage services are also available. San Antonio or Sant Josep de sa Talaia are 10 minutes’ drive of the hotel while Ibiza Airport is 12 km away.

name: Aparthotel Tropic Garden
address: Pare Vicent Costa, 10, Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Offering an outdoor swimming pool and a heated indoor pool, Aparthotel Tropic Garden is set next to the beach in Santa Eulària. It features free WiFi and a buffet-restaurant. Each well-equipped apartment has a balcony or terrace and a flat-screen TV. There is a sofa bed in the living area. A safe is available for an extra cost. Aparthotel Tropic Garden offers a lounge, lounge-bar and an poolside bar. Live shows are available in the hotel twice a week. Ibiza Town is 15 km away from the aparthotel. Private parking is available for an extra cost.

name: Invisa Hotel Es Pla - Adults Only
address: Avda. De Portmany, 7, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: This adults-only hotel is perfectly situated as you enter San Antonio, only a few metres from the sea and the bay of San Antonio. The complex offers you a location in tranquil surroundings, but at the same time closeness and easy access to the centre of town, where you can enjoy the shopping and nightlife. Rooms are equipped with a terrace, boasting views of the large gardens, swimming pool and sporting facilities, all of which guarantee a relaxing stay. WiFi is available for an extra charge. There is a weekly planned entertainment program for your enjoyment. The restaurant serves lunches and themed dinners, as well as a non-stop late breakfast from 08:00 until 12:00, including hot drinks and a varied menu for a complete breakfast. San Antonio is well-known for its entertainment offering, but a must is to watch the sunset from Café del Mar, near the hotel. You can also take advantage of the water sports or boat excursions that are provided in the bay.

name: Aparthotel Casita Blanca
address: Carrer Menéndez Pidal 14, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 59 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms with showers are provided. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks. Amenities Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a seasonal outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. Additional features at this aparthotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, a television in a common area, and tour/ticket assistance. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, and a safe deposit box at the front desk. Property Location A stay at Aparthotel Casita Blanca places you in the heart of Sant Antoni de Portmany, within a 10-minute walk of Church of San Antonio and Egg of Columbus. This aparthotel is 10.4 mi (16.7 km) from Port of Ibiza and 11.8 mi (19 km) from Bossa Beach. Dining You can enjoy a meal at Bar snack Casita Blanca serving the guests of Aparthotel Casita Blanca, or stop in at the snack bar/deli. Unwind at the end of the day with a drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. Continental breakfasts are available daily from 8:30 AM to 11:00 AM for a fee. Renovations The property is closed between October 31 and April 30. name: Tui Magic Life Cala Pada
address: Carrer de Cèsar Puget Riquer, 25, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: No description found

name: Hotel Lux isla
address: Josep Pla, 1, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Set in the picturesque bay of Talamanca, the Hotel Luxisla is 100 metres from the beach. All spacious rooms feature air conditioning and satellite TV. Most rooms also have a balcony. All rooms have a private bathroom with hairdryer, slippers and free toiletries. A complimentary bottle of water per guest is available upon arrival. Guests can enjoy a light meal in the bar-cafeteria at Lux Isla or relax in the gardens. A la carte breakfast is served from 7 am. The 24-hour reception can provide information on the surrounding area. Ibiza Town is just 1.5 km away with its marina, and many bars and restaurants. There is a regular ferry-ride over from Talamanca as well as a regular bus service.

name: Apartaments B-Llobet Sun & Confort
address: Pedro Matutes Noguera 20, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Featuring free WiFi and air conditioning, Apartaments B-Llobet is located in Ibiza Town, 1.9 km from Ibiza Port. Dalt Vila is 2.1 km from the property. The accommodation is equipped with balcony, a dining area and seating area with a flat-screen TV. A refrigerator and coffee machine are also provided. There is an en-suite bathroom with a bath or shower and bidet in every unit, along with free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are offered. Apartaments B-Llobet offers access to an outdoor pool and to the gym in Llobet Apartments across the road. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant with a terrace. Marina Botafoch is 2.4 km from Apartaments B-Llobet, while Pacha is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Aeropuerto de Ibiza Airport, 5 km from the property.

name: ME Ibiza
address: Urbanización S'Argamassa, 153, Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Situated right in front of the beach and offering multiple swimming pools, a spa with contemporary beauty treatments, and beautiful ocean views, ME Ibiza hotel is located in S'Argamassa. Free Wi-Fi is available. This stylish and elegant hotel offers a variety of room types, including ground floor suites with direct pool access, sun loungers, private gardens and other exclusive benefits. Some suites have wonderful views of the sea. A free bottle of water is provided in all rooms. All rooms provide Smart TV with Chromecast. The Rooftop offers dazzling views, an infinity-style pool and Balinese beds, available only for adults. The ground floor presents an upbeat environment with daily DJs, Balinese beds and a poolside menu. Thai Room Spa Wellness offers Thai treatments. RADIO Rooftop bar offers Mediterranean cuisine and cocktails, with sea views while at Bianco Mare Restaurant guests can enjoy authentic Italian cuisine from organic ingredients and Origens Restaurant combines characterful Ibizan bohemian style with imaginative interpretations of classic Mediterranean dishes. Fresh ingredients and local specialities for lunch and dinner. The property offers a fitness area and free private parking. Complimentary yoga sessions are offered daily, on request and subject to availability. There is a Kids' Club. Nikki Beach Ibiza is located beside the hotel. Es Cana tourist resort is just 1.5 km away, and Ibiza town is 12 km from the property. Ibiza Airport is a 35-minute drive from the hotel. You can also hire a private boat to the beautiful neighbouring island of Formentera, on request and subject to availability. The hotel offers free valet parking.

name: Hotel Vibra Isola - Adults only
address: Arguelades, 7, 07817 Platja d'en Bossa
description: Hotel Vibra Isola - Adults only is 500 metres from the beach in Playa d’En Bossa, just 3 km from Ibiza Town. It has an outdoor swimming pool. All rooms at La Noria are air-conditioned and come with a private balcony and en suite bathroom. There is also satellite TV in each room. WiFi is available for free in the rooms. The hotel has gardens, a sun terrace with loungers and a poolside bar, where WiFi is available for an extra cost. The Discobus, which takes guests to clubs such as Privilege, Pacha and Amnesia, stops just round the corner from Hotel Vibra Isola - Adults only. Bora Bora Beach is 500 metres away from the hotel, and Ibiza-San José Airport is just 2 km away. This is a seasonal hotel, open from May to October.

name: Hotel Mongibello Ibiza
address: Carrer Los Rosales, 53, Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: This luxurious hotel is located in Santa Eularia des Riu, on the west coast of Ibiza. In front of the sea with direct access to the beach, Hotel Mongibello Ibiza has a large swimming pool. Guests can chill out on the sun beds and in the large sun terrace with plenty of loungers. All of the air-conditioned rooms in Hotel Mongibello Ibiza have a private terrace. They also have a 55-inch flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and a laptop-sized safe. We offer free private parking for customers who book Suite Sea View or Suite Sea View Terrace. The hotel offers 2 different restaurants.

name: Sol Bahia Ibiza Suites
address: Ctra.Cala Grasio, 23, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Sol Bahía Ibiza Suites is set overlooking the Mediterranean Sea and offers a pool. Guests can enjoy views of San Antonio's famous sunsets. Wi-Fi is available for free in the hotel's bar and on the terrace. There is also a room with satellite TV where you can watch live sports and films. The centre of San Antonio is only a short stroll from the hotel. It has numerous bars, restaurants and a very lively nightlife.

name: Aguamadera
address:
9.1
Wonderful
19 reviews
description: With mountain views, Aguamadera is located in Santa Eularia des Riu and has a restaurant, full-day security, bar, garden, sun terrace and outdoor fireplace. The farm stay features both WiFi and private parking free of charge. There is a private bathroom with shower in every unit, along with bathrobes, a hair dryer and free toiletries. At Aguamadera guests are welcome to take advantage of spa facilities, wellness packages and beauty services. A car rental service is available at the accommodation. Marina Botafoch is 11 km from Aguamadera, while Ibiza Port is 12 km away. The nearest airport is Ibiza, 17 km from the farm stay, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Grupotel Santa Eulària & Spa - Adults Only
address: C/ Pare Vicent Costa, 16, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Set metres from the sea and overlooking Santa Eulária Bay, Grupotel Santa Eulária & Spa features a large lagoon-style swimming pool and free spa. The rooms have spacious balconies. All accommodation at the Grupotel Santa Eulária & Spa is brightly decorated and spacious. Each air-conditioned room features satellite TV and a minibar. The hotel is set 800 metres from Santa Eulária’s main beach and the resort centre can be reached in 10 minutes, by foot. Ibiza Town is around 12 km away. The on-site spa features an indoor swimming pool, sauna, ice fountain and Turkish baths. There is also a fitness centre. Hotel entertainment includes shows, live music and dancing. Hot and cold buffets and show cooking are available in the restaurant, and there is also a snack bar service on the terrace.

name: Cubanito Ibiza
address: 8 Carretera de Cala Gracio, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Cubanito Ibiza Suites offers an outdoor pool and free WiFi in San Antonio, 400 metres from Cala Gració. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Featuring Cuban-style architecture, the property offers rooms with Smeg fridges and Marshall speakers. Guests can enjoy sunset views from the rooftop terrace. La Torre Ibiza Bar is 2.5 km from Cubanito Ibiza Suites and a 25-minute drive will take you to Ibiza Airport.

name: Hotel Vibra s'Estanyol
address: C/ Cala de Bou, 28, 07820 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Located on s'Estanyol beach, Hotel Vibra s'Estanyol features an outdoor pool overlooking the bay, and a restaurant. Shops can be found in the San Antonio de Portmany centre, 2 km away. All air-conditioned rooms at s'Estanyol feature a balcony and some boast ocean views. Equipped with a plasma TV and a bathroom, they offer modern timber furnishings and a floor-to-ceiling window. Free WiFi is available. Guests can make full use of the fitness centre. Tours and day trips can be arranged through the on-site 24-hour reception front desk. The nearest bus stop is ideally situated just 300 metres from the hotel. The Ibiza Airport is less than 20 km away, and San Antonio de Portmany Port is a 9-minute drive away.

name: Insotel Fenicia Prestige Suites & Spa
address: Calle Narcisos, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Insotel Fenicia Prestige Suites & Spa is situated on the seafront next to the Santa Eulalia River. The hotel provides free access to the fitness centre and offers many treatments in the Prestige Spa at an extra charge. Ibiza Airport is 21 km away. All spacious rooms have a balcony and flat-screen TV. The bathroom is complete with a separate bath and hydromassage shower. Guests are also provided with a bathrobe and slippers. Indoor and outdoor pool, a herbal steam room and an ice fountain are some of the spa facilities available at an extra charge. Foot baths and a variety of massages are also on offer. There are 4 restaurants offering a choice of Mediterranean, International and Asian cuisine. Insotel Fenicia Prestige Suites & Spa also has several bars serving snacks, cocktails and ice cream. At the Insotel Fenicia Prestige Suites & Spa reservations can be made for activities, such as yacht hire. There are golf courses within 6 km of the hotel.

name: Hotel Tropical
address: C/ Cervantes, 28, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Rooms Stay in one of 142 guestrooms featuring LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and electric kettles. Amenities Don't miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including an outdoor pool, a fitness center, and bicycles to rent. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and an arcade/game room. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a computer station, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Property Location With a stay at Hotel Tropical in Sant Antoni de Portmany, you'll be 0.5 mi (0.8 km) from San Antonio Sunset Strip and 8.6 mi (13.8 km) from Es Vedrà. This hotel is 9.3 mi (14.9 km) from Sa Talaiassa and 10.5 mi (16.9 km) from Port of Ibiza. Dining You can enjoy a meal at Free Buffet Restaurant serving the guests of Hotel Tropical, or stop in at the snack bar/deli. Unwind at the end of the day with a drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 8:00 AM to 11:00 AM for a fee. name: Hostal Mar y Huerta
address: Avenida Es Canar, 118, 07849 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Enjoy an authentic Balearic break with a stay at this welcoming, small hotel, set just off the clean, golden sands of Es Canar’s beach on Ibiza’s east coast. Relax at the family-friendly Mar y Huerta with an afternoon spent around the outdoor swimming pool. Here you will find free sun loungers, allowing you to soak up the Mediterranean sunshine in comfort. As you unwind, children can enjoy themselves in the playground or on the pool table. There is also a snack bar, offers refreshing drinks and light snacks for the terrace, as well as a buffet restaurant open for breakfast and dinner.

name: Aguas de Ibiza Lifestyle & Spa
address: Salvador Camacho, 14, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: The new Aguas de Ibiza Lifestyle and Spa Hotel is the new concept of 5* luxury hotels with 112 rooms designed and managed by the Torres family as an expression of their worship of Ibiza. It is located in Santa Eulalia del R?o a few distance of Ibiza, beside the new congress palace. The hotel has modern facilities for any event, a restaurant with traditional cuisine, a chill out area, Air Ibiza and a bar.priceline.com

name: Hotel Vibra District - Adults Only
address: Avda. Portmany No. 1, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Ideal for a fun-filled beach holiday on Ibiza, the Hotel Vibra District overlooks its own sun terrace and spacious outdoor swimming pool. The beach is just 150 metres away. Free WiFi is available in rooms. Relax in the warm, Mediterranean sunshine on a sun lounger around the pool of the Hotel Vibra District. You can also choose to spend your day on the golden sands of the nearby beach, set on the beautiful San Antonio Bay. Start the day with the hotel’s buffet breakfast. A snack bar and cafe are open throughout the day, and the restaurant serves a delicious buffet selection in the evening. Just a few minutes’ walk from the Hotel Vibra District you will find a wide range of shops and bars. San Antonio’s famous nightlife is also within 300 metres, including the legendary Cafe del Mar, Mambo, Es Paradis and Eden.

name: Catalonia Ses Estaques - Adults Only
address: Cala Ses Estaques, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Catalonia Ses Estaques is located on the Ibizan coast, just outside Santa Eulalia del Rio. This elegant, adults-only hotel offers an outdoor pool and 2 hot tubs. Rooms at Ses Estaques are air-conditioned and spacious. They all have satellite TV, a minibar and a safe. Rooms also have a private bathroom. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Hotel Ses Estaques has attractive gardens and sun terraces. It offers views of Santa Eulalia town centre and the marina. The Ses Estaques has an à la carte restaurant next to the sea, serving classic Ibizan and Mediterranean dishes. The hotel has a poolside snack bar. Live music and animation in English are available on the terrace. The hotel has a 24-hour reception, with currency exchange and car rental services. There is free public parking on site.

name: Hostal La Cigüeña
address: S'Arenal Petit 36, 07810 Sant Joan de Labritja, Ibiza Island
description: Set on the beachfront in Portinatx, Hostal La Cigüeña features an outdoor pool, gym, and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. Recently renovated, the bright rooms come with a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. They include a fridge, kettle and safety deposit box. Set in a bright dining room with a covered terrace, La Cigüeña’s restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and dinner. There is an á la carte menu at lunch time, and a snack bar open all day. At the beach you can go kayaking and water skiing. There is also a diving school nearby, and many hiking routes and beaches in the area. Buses to Ibiza Town and Santa Eulalia leave from a bus stop 250 metres away. Ibiza Airport can be reached in a 40-minute drive.

name: Agroturismo Can Gall
address: Ctra. San Juan, km 17.2, 07810 Sant Joan de Labritja, Ibiza Island
description: No description found

name: Hotel Boutique & Spa Las Mimosas Ibiza
address: Carrer de Burgos 29, Es Serral, 07829 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Set in a residential area, this sophisticated boutique hotel with views of the Balearic Sea is a 9-minute walk from Pouet Beach and 18 km from Ibiza Airport. Featuring stylish modern furnishings, the airy suites have private balconies or terraces, pull-out sofas and free Wi-Fi, as well as flat-screen TVs and minifridges. Some come with sea views. Upgraded suites add separate living areas. Breakfast and parking are complimentary. Amenities include a bar/restaurant, a spa area and an outdoor pool.WebBeds

name: azuLine Hotel Bergantin
address: C/Albacete 5-7, 07839 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: This establishment is located in Bahía de San Antonio de Ibiza, one of the most important tourist areas of the island, This informal hotel is a 2 minute-walk from the closest beach along the Mediterranean Sea and 5 km from the Aquarium Cap Blanc. It's 19 km from the Ibiza Airport. All air-conditioned rooms at azuLine Hotel Bergantin have a furnished balcony, some with sea views. Each room includes satellite TV, a safe, telephone and a private bathroom including toiletries.The hotel has a 24-hour reception desk and offers a car rental and ticket service. Sant Antoni de Portmany Ferry Terminal with crossings to Denia is just 1.6 mi away and Breakfast is included. All meals are served buffet-style with live cooking stations in the main restaurant, Playa Sa Flama. There is also an on-site pub and a snack bar. The hotel offers a family/activity swimming pool and an Adults Only pool. There is also a kids' pool with a pirate ship, as well as a mini club (ages 4-12) and a playground to keep the little ones happy. Other facilities include tennis, mini golf, volleyball, games room, gym, sauna, hot tub and a daily entertainment programme of activities and professional shows. The beach is just a short walk from the hotel, and there is a bus stop close by that allows you to explore the rest of the island as much as you like.FarePortal

name: Iberostar Santa Eulalia - Adults Only
address: Calle Mestral, 42, 07849 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Situated in Santa Eulália del Río, Iberostar Selection Santa Eulalia Ibiza is just 20 metres from S’Argamassa Beach. This hotel is for adults only and offers an outdoor pool and a terrace with sun loungers. The rooms feature air conditioning, satellite TV and a private bathroom. All rooms have a private balcony or terrace and most have views of the sea, outdoor pool or gardens. Es Vedra terrace bar offers daily shows, music and entertainment in the evening. The centre of Santa Eulália del Río is less than 10 minutes’ drive from the hotel. Es Canar is 1 km away and Ibiza Old Town is 15 km away.

name: Aparthotel Duquesa Playa
address: Calle San Lorenzo, 16-18, Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Situated 300 metres from Ibiza’s Santa Eulalia Beach, Duquesa Playa has a roof terrace with swimming pool, snack bar and panoramic views. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. Each functional Duquesa Playa apartment features a balcony. Apartments include air conditioning, heating, and a bright living-dining area with a flat-screen TV and a sofa. The kitchen includes a microwave, fridge and a toaster. You can choose from Spanish and international dishes in the Duquesa Playa’s café-restaurant. There are also plenty of bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walk of the apartments. Santa Eulalia Marina is only 150 metres from the apartments. The popular Hippy Market in Es Canar is less than 5 km away, while Ibiza Town is within 14 km.

name: Ushuaia Ibiza Beach Hotel - Adults Only
address: Ctra. Playa den Bossa 10, 07817 Sant Jordi de ses Salines, Ibiza Island
description: Set on Playa d’en Bossa Beach, the adults-only Ushuaia Ibiza Beach Hotel features a spa and 3 outdoor pools with large sun beds. Guests enjoy free entrance to live DJ performances hosted by the hotel. The minimalist rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a 42-inch plasma TV and iPod docking station. They also feature a furnished terrace. The Ushuaia Ibiza Beach Hotel is made up of 2 separate buildings. The Ushuaia Club houses the bedrooms and hosts the hotel's famous parties. The exclusive Ushuaia Tower offers 24-hour room service, an outdoor pool, Balinese beds and a poolside cocktail bar. The hotel offers the Minami Japanese fusion restaurant with a Zen garden, as well as a Beach Club restaurant with Mediterranean cuisine. The property's Montauk Steak House restaurant specialises in steaks and other grilled meats. The hotel is 2 km from Ibiza Airport and 3 km from Ibiza Old Town. It is located directly opposite Hi Ibiza. Check the hotel's app for available services.

name: azuLine Hotel Pacific
address: C/ Londres 2, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Enjoy the vibrant atmosphere and warm sunshine of Ibiza with a stay at this sunny holiday hotel, set just off a beautiful beach and with its own unique outdoor pool. Spend your day on the magnificent beaches of San Antonio Bay, just 200 metres from the Pacific. The outdoor pool features loungers and a poolside bar. An amusement arcade, table tennis and pool table are also available to entertain the younger guests. Head to the nearby jetty to take a boat trip around the local coastline. Then, in the evenings, take the 200-metre journey into San Antonio town centre to enjoy its world-famous nightlife, shops and restaurants.

name: Leonardo Royal Hotel Ibiza Santa Eulalia
address: Calle Pou Roig, nº 1, 07849 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Located on Es Caná beachfront, Leonardo Royal Hotel Ibiza Santa Eulalia features a shared terrace, swimming pools, a solarium and rooms with balconies. The air-conditioned rooms come with a wardrobe and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Daytime and evening entertainment for both adults and children are offered on site. Surrounded by pine groves and the sea, the area is popular for water sports. Ibiza Town is 21 km away and a 30-minute drive will take you to Ibiza Airport.

name: Coral Star Hotel
address: Es Calo, 87, Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: This charming hotel offers a stunning location only approximately 300 metres from the beach. A wide selection of shopping and entertainment venues are all located in the neighbourhood. The resort centre of San Antonio is 4 km from the hotel. The nearest fine sandy beach of Port des Torrent is 1 km away, while Ibiza's airport is roughly 30 km from the hotel. This hotel is popular with both families and couples. The air-conditioned hotel includes a bar and a cosy café. The rooms are modern and tastefully decorated. They comprise of their own bathroom with a hairdryer, a comfortable double bed and a balcony where guests are able to enjoy fantastic views. There are two swimming pools with separate children's pools in the grounds as well as a poolside snack bar and a sun terrace with sun loungers and parasols.FarePortal

name: Bless Hotel Ibiza, a member of The Leading Hotels of the World
address: Cala Nova - Es Canar, 07849 Es Canar, Ibiza Island
description: Overlooking the Mediterranean Sea and the island of Tagomago, Bless Hotel Ibiza is located in a quiet part of eastern Ibiza. It features an outdoor infinity pool and direct beach access. All air-conditioned rooms come with a private furnished terrace or balcony, satellite TV and an iPod docking station. There is also a fan, safe and desk. The private bathroom has a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. The hotel has a bar and restaurant and 24-hour reception. The Micheline star restaurant Etxeko at the accommodation is run by the 12 Michelin-starred chef Martin Berasategui, and serve special menu. Other facilities available at the property are a gym, spa and meeting rooms. In the nearby resort of Es Canar is one of the island’s most famous hippy markets. The town of Santa Eulalia is only 5 km away.

name: Hotel Vibra Marco Polo I - Adults only
address: Avenida de Portmany, Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Just 100 metres from Ibiza’s San Antonio Beach, Hotel Vibra Marco Polo I - Adults only offers an outdoor swimming pool and a sun terrace. Each air-conditioned room has a balcony. Free WiFi is available. Rooms at the Playasol Marco Polo I are simple and functional, with tiled floors and private bathrooms. They all include satellite TV and a fridge. The Marco Polo’s restaurant offers international buffet meals, and there is a snack bar next to the pool. The hotel has a 24-hour reception with safety deposit box and a tourist information desk. Situated near the Eden and Es Paradis nightclubs, the Marco Polo Hotel is 200 metres from San Antonio centre. Within a 15-minute walk, the famous Café del Mar and Bar Mambo are ideal places to watch the sunset.

name: Grupotel Imperio Playa
address: Cala San Vicente, 07811 Sant Joan de Labritja, Ibiza Island
description: Facing the beachfront, Grupotel Imperio Playa offers 4-star accommodation in Sant Joan de Labritja and has an outdoor swimming pool, terrace and restaurant. Offering a bar, the property is located within 70 metres of Cala San Vincente Beach. The accommodation offers a concierge service, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a bath. All guest rooms feature a wardrobe. Guests at Grupotel Imperio Playa can enjoy a continental breakfast. Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area. Cala de S'Aigua Dolca Beach is 2.3 km from the accommodation, while Marina Botafoch is 28 km from the property. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 33 km from Grupotel Imperio Playa.

name: Aparthotel Puerto Cala Vadella
address: Cala Vadella, 07830 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: No description found

name: Hotel Vibra San Remo
address: C/ Cala de Bou, 32, 07829 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Offering an outdoor swimming pool, Hotel San Remo is next to S'Éstanyol Beach. All the modern rooms feature air conditioning, free WiFi and a private terrace overlooking the sea or island. Hotel San Remo offers an entertainment programme, with organised daily performances twice a week. Children can also have fun in their own pool and play area. The hotel has a buffet restaurant, as well as a pool-side bar. There is a 24-hour reception and wired internet is available in public areas, for an extra cost. Near the San Remo you will find plenty of opportunities to practise water sports as well as a variety of bars and restaurant.

name: Tropicana Ibiza Suites - Adults Only
address: Deessa Tanit, nº 10-12, 07817 Sant Jordi de ses Salines, Ibiza Island
description: Featuring an outdoor pool and sun terrace, Tropicana Ibiza Suites - Adults Only is located in Playa d’en Bossa, 100 metres from the nearest beach. Playa d'en Bossa Town Centre is 300 metres away. All suites are air-conditioned and have a full kitchenette with a Smeg minibar. They also feature a 32-inch flat-screen TV with satellite channels and USB connection. Each suite provides Bluetooth speakers. The private bathroom includes a shower and hairdryer. Free WiFi is available throughout. Guests have access to free luggage storage and a sun terrace, complete with beds and free pool towels. Guests at Tropicana also have free access to the beachfront swimming pool at the Hotel Dorado Ibiza, located 100 metres away. Other facilities at the property include a 24-hour lobby bar and terrace, and 24-hour front desk. You can find several restaurants and bars in the surrounding area, including the famous Hi and Ushuaia nightclubs. The beach is only 100 metres from the property.

name: Boutique Hostal La Curandera de Salinas
address: Carretera Sa Canal de Ses Salines, 07817 Sant Jordi de ses Salines, Ibiza Island
description: Boutique Hostal La Curandera de Salinas features a garden, a shared lounge and a sun terrace with swimming pool and continental breakfast in Ibiza Town. Among the various facilities are a bar, water sports facilities, as well as a tennis court. The accommodation provides evening entertainment and a concierge service. At the hotel you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean, Spanish and local cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and halal options can also be requested. Boutique Hostal La Curandera de Salinas offers a children's playground. Activities such as hiking, windsurfing, diving can be enjoyed in the surroundings, and guests can relax along the beachfront. Speaking German, English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock. Las Salinas Beach is 400 metres from the accommodation, while Es Cavallet Beach is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 5 km from Boutique Hostal La Curandera de Salinas.

name: Invisa Hotel Club Cala Verde
address: Playa Des Figueral, 07850 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: This new holiday resort complex is set just off Es Figueral beach, boasting fantastic views of the bay. It lies 25 km from Ibiza City. Take in the magnificent sea views from the hotel’s sun terrace, which surrounds the 2 outdoor swimming pools. Enjoy an active session playing tennis, 5-a-side football or volleyball before relaxing in front of the live entertainment with a meal from the hotel’s Mediterranean buffet restaurant.

name: Hotel Florencio Ibiza
address: Carrer Soledat, 38, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Most rooms at Hotel Florencio Ibiza feature a private balcony, and all have air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. The guest house has its own swimming pool, sun terrace and 24-hour reception. Florencio is located a 10-minute walk from San Antoni de Portmany’s lively West End, full of bars and restaurants. The Café del Mar is 600 metres away, while the port is within 500 metres. Mediterranean cuisine and English specials are served at Hotel Florencio Ibiza’s restaurant, open from 08:00 until 01:00. A bar service is also available. The Florencio guest house can arrange bicycle and car rental at reception. The front desk can also offer information about scuba diving and trekking excursions in Ibiza.

name: Suite Hotel S'Argamassa Palace
address: Avinguda De S'Argamassa, 82, Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Built around an inviting outdoor swimming pool, this suite hotel offers spectacular views over the beach and the Mediterranean Sea beyond – great for a peaceful break on picturesque Ibiza. It offers free Wi-Fi. The S’Argamassa Palace is surrounded by tranquil pine forests on the island’s east coast. It looks out over the golden sands of Cala Pada beach. Take a swim in the beach's clear waters or in the property’s central swimming pool, designed for both adults and children. The hotel features a gym and a hot tub. Beauty treatments are available. Finish off the day by choosing from the varied cuisine served at the hotel restaurant. This charming venue serves dishes ranging from innovative creations to traditional Spanish dishes, all out on the comfortable terrace. The S’Argamassa Palace is just 3 minutes from the Palacio de Congresos de Santa Eulalia.

name: azuLine Hotel Galfi
address: Avenida Doctor Fleming, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 54 individually decorated guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms with bathtubs or showers are provided. Amenities Don't miss out on recreational opportunities including an outdoor pool and a fitness center. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a fireplace in the lobby. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge) that operates within 50 meters. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free self parking is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at Hotel Galfi in Sant Antoni de Portmany, you'll be by the sea, just a 3-minute walk from Air Zone Ibiza and 5 minutes by foot from Platja de S'Arenal. This hotel is 10.1 mi (16.2 km) from Port of Ibiza and 11.5 mi (18.5 km) from Bossa Beach. Dining You can enjoy a meal at the restaurant serving the guests of Hotel Galfi, or stop in at the snack bar/deli. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary continental breakfast is served daily from 8:00 AM to 11:00 AM. name: Nobu Hotel Ibiza Bay
address: Cami Ses Feixes 52, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Seafront on Ibiza’s Talamanca Beach, Nobu Hotel Ibiza Bay offers spa access, two pools, a kid’s club and rooftop terrace suites. Ibiza Town is 3 km away. Each room is decorated with luxurious details and equipped with free WiFi. All offer marble bathrooms with rainfall showers, floor to ceiling windows and open terraces with sea or garden views. The suites are spacious and come with a plush lounge area and separate dressing room. Some include a kitchenette and private plunge pool. The resort has four restaurants and bars, offering a variety of options for all tastes. Bay Café serves gluten-free dishes and the Nobu restaurant serves Japanese-Nikkei fusion cuisine. There is also a beachfront chiringuito-style restaurant, which serves fresh sea food. Ibiza Airport is 15 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hotel Puchet
address: Avenue Doctor Fleming, 51, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Hotel Puchet is in a quiet area of Sant Antoni de Portmany, 600 metres from Es Pouet Beach. It offers free WiFi and a large outdoor swimming pool open from May to October. All rooms at the Hotel Puchet have a private balcony and satellite TV. The Puchet's air-conditioned café-restaurant serves international food. Buffet meal is available. Other facilities at Hotel Puchet include a poolside terrace. There is also an onsite supermarket and TV room.

name: Hotel Rural Ca's Pla
address: Venda Del Rubio, 59, 07819 Sant Miquel de Balansat, Ibiza Island
description: Offering luxurious rooms and a seasonal outdoor pool, Hotel Rural Cas Pla is surrounded by forest, 5 minutes’ drive from the beaches at Port de Sant Miquel. It offers sea views from its attractive gardens. Each air-conditioned room at the Cas Pla has beautiful décor with tiled floors and wooden furnishings. All rooms have ceiling fans, a flat-screen TV and a minibar. The Hotel Rural has a charming terrace with sofas overlooking the gardens. There is also a bar and a relaxing lounge area. Free Wi-Fi is available here. Set in the village of San Miquel de Balansat, the Cas Pla is a 30-minute drive from Ibiza Town and the island’s airport. Santa Eulària des Riu is 17 km away.

name: Hotel Vibra Marco Polo II - Adults only
address: Avenida de Portmany 10, 07800 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Hotel Vibra Marco Polo II - Adults only is located 100 metres from the beach in central San Antonio. It offers an outdoor freshwater pool and rooms with a private balcony, free WiFi and satellite TV. There are pool and table tennis tables at the hotel. Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour front desk can help you to book tickets for club nights, guided tours and excursions. You can also hire a car. The Hotel Vibra Marco Polo II - Adults only has a buffet restaurant where breakfast is served. There is also a poolside snack bar where you can get a snack or a drink.

name: Agroturismo Can Toni Xumeu - Adults Only
address:
9.6
Wonderful
126 reviews
description: Set in Cala Llonga, Agroturismo Can Toni Xumeu offers accommodation with flat-screen TV, as well as a garden. A microwave is also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. A continental breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the farm stay you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine. Agroturismo Can Toni Xumeu offers an outdoor pool. A car rental service is available at this property.

name: Hotel Vibra Cala Tarida
address: Calle Placa Del Mar, 07829 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: The Hotel Vibra Cala Tarida-3SUP is just 100 metres from the beach in western Ibiza. It has 3 swimming pools. The rooms in the Hotel Vibra Cala Tarida-3SUP have air conditioning and satellite TV. They also have balconies; some have sea views. WiFi is available for free in the rooms. There are separate swimming pools for adults and children, as well as a relaxation pool. Sun terraces provide loungers and parasols, while the large gardens are peaceful and shady. There is a gym and public parking. The Hotel Vibra Cala Tarida-3SUP has daily entertainment day and night, plus 3 shows weekly. Reception is open 24 hours a day, and can organise motorcycle, bicycle and car rental. There is also a restaurant, and a snack bar. Ibiza Airport is about 20 km away. A bus stopping outside the hotel takes you to other local beaches.

name: Agroturismo Can Marquet
address: Carretera de San Lorenzo, km. 1 Santa Gertrudis de Fruitera, 07814 Santa Gertrudis de Fruitera, Ibiza Island
description: No description found

name: Ibiza Rocks Hotel - Adults Only
address: Carrer Cervantes, 27, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Located in San Antonio centre, Ibiza Rocks Hotel - Adults Only is set 10 minutes' walk from Sant Antoni Beach, and 5 minutes from the Sunset Strip and the West End. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. It offers rooms with a balcony, flat-screen TV, and in-room fridge. The bathroom comes with free toiletries and a shower. The hotel has 2 pools and an Ibiza Rocks merchandise shop. Hosting Pool Parties every day, general admission tickets to all the events happening during your stay are included in the price of your room. The hotel also offers multiple bars and restaurants, as well as a supermarket. There are several taxi and bus stops nearby that can take you to the main points of the city. Staff at the Host Team can provide information about what to see and do in Ibiza. Important Note: The Ibiza Rocks Venue will not be open every day between 30th March & 25th April 2023 (and our Poolside Sessions events will be advertised on our website to detail the days the venue will be open) and the Ibiza Rocks Venue is closed to hotel guests for a private event on Friday 5th May 2023.

name: Om Hotels
address: Disseminat sa Caleta, 07830 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Set in Sant Francesc de s'Estany, 70 metres from Es Codolar Beach, OM Hotels offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a shared lounge and a bar. The property is situated 1.2 km from Sa Caleta Beach, 1.5 km from Es Bol Nou Beach and 11 km from Ibiza Port. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, a shuttle service, a concierge service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel, the rooms have a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hairdryer, all guest rooms at OM Hotels have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms also offer a terrace. At the accommodation all rooms include bed linen and towels. An Italian breakfast is available every morning at OM Hotels. Marina Botafoch is 12 km from the hotel, while Aguamar Water Park is 6.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 2 km from OM Hotels.

name: Cas Gasi
address: Camino Viejo De Sant Mateu, Santa Gertrudis de Fruitera, Ibiza Island
description: Cas Gasi is a luxury hotel located in the countryside, just 15 minutes from the main beaches and attractions of Ibiza. It features two outdoor swimming pools, the bigger quiet one for adults, the other one for children, and beautiful gardens. The rural house reflects traditional Ibizan architecture with its large porches and terraces. The interior décor features antiques, elegant furniture and rustic details. All rooms at Hotel Cas Gasi have a view and are equipped with a private bathroom as well as free Wi-Fi. Cas Gasi's restaurant features fresh, seasonal Mediterranean cuisine made with vegetables from its organic garden, local meat and seafood, and an international wine list. Room Service is offered until 23:00 Guests are welcome to enjoy massages and beauty treatments at the spa as well as personal training and yoga. Bikes, electric bikes and an electric car are available for hire. The property's concierge service can book restaurants and clubs, excursions, private yoga and Pilates classes, boat hire, childcare and more.

name: Hostal Ferrer
address: Obispo Torres, 5, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: No description found

name: Azuline Hoteles Mar Amantis & Mar Amantis II
address: Crta Port D'es Torrent, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Situated in San Antonio bay, on the west of the island of Ibiza, azuline Hotel Mar Amantis is ideally equipped for family holidays in the Balearic sunshine. Mar Amantis comes with outdoor swimming pools, for both adults and children. The complex is composed of 2 buildings, one of which is located on the seafront and the other just opposite. After breakfast in the morning, you can head down to the beach and relax on the fine sands and swim in the Mediterranean Sea. A transfer service is available during high season months. Get more active by going for a session at the on-site gym, or playing volley ball with friends or the family. Grab a snack in the bar at any time of the day.

name: Marina Palace by Intercorp Hotel Group
address: Caló 104, 07829 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Located on the seafront of San Antonio Bay, Can Salia offers a range of facilities and apartments, some of them with beautiful sea views. This hotel features accommodation with balconies. Each apartment at Can Salia has a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, cooker and fridge. A cleaning service is also provided everyday. The Can Salia complex features two outdoor swimming pools and Gym. Fishing and scuba diving are also available on site. The Roof Top Swimming Pool is Only Adults (People under 16 years old are not permitted in this area. Within 500 metres of Can Salia guests can find many restaurants, bars and shops. The complex also has its own restaurant called Taste of Salia. The restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner and offers views of the Mediterranean Sea. Buffet breakfast is served in Taste of Salia restaurant by the sea. The apartments are 900 metres from Port des Torrent and Des Pinet Beaches and a 20 minute drive from San José Airport. Ibiza Town is less than 20 km from Can Salia.

name: Hostal Marino
address: Carrer de la Mar 34, Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: This guesthouse lies just a short walk from 4 beaches in the charming-yet-exciting resort of San Antonio – one of the most popular spots on the island of Ibiza. The location of the Hostal Marino in central San Antonio makes it ideal for a peaceful break on the golden sands of this beautiful Balearic Island. You can also take advantage of the warm sunshine by sunbathing on the terrace. Enjoy drinks and typical tapas at the Bar Marino cafe-restaurant, open for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Then head out to enjoy the varied local shopping or the legendary nightlife found nearby. The Marino is surrounded by the resort’s pedestrian centre, full of shops and the historic church and fort. The nearest beach, Caló Des Moro, is just a 5-minute walk away, where you will also find a fun aquarium. Explore the whole island from the new bus station, a short distance away.

name: Can Jaume by Ocean Drive
address: Calle Torrente, 07819 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 12 guestrooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and complimentary bottled water, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Take advantage of recreation opportunities including an outdoor pool and bicycles to rent. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge). Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at Can Jaume by Ocean Drive in Santa Eulalia del Rio, you'll be within a 10-minute drive of Port of Ibiza and Bossa Beach. This 4-star hotel is 2.2 mi (3.5 km) from Dalt Vila and 2.9 mi (4.7 km) from Talamanca Beach. Dining Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's coffee shop/cafe, or stay in and take advantage of the room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the local government and will be collected at the property. The tax is reduced by 50% after the 8th night of stay and children under 16 years of age are exempt. Other exemptions and reductions may apply. For more details, please contact the property using the information on the reservation confirmation received after booking. name: Agroturismo Sa Vinya d'en Palerm
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 5 guestrooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have jetted bathtubs and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include safes and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. Additional features at this farm stay include complimentary wireless Internet access, a communal living room, and tour/ticket assistance. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite. Property Location Located in Sant Joan de Labritja, Agroturismo Sa Vinya d'en Palerm is within a 15-minute drive of Benirras Beach and Cala Xarraca Beach. This farm stay is 9.2 mi (14.8 km) from Marina Botafoch and 9.6 mi (15.5 km) from Talamanca Beach. Dining Wrap up your day with a drink at the poolside bar. Renovations The property is closed during January, February, March, November, and December. name: The Beach Star Ibiza - Adults Only
address: La Coruña, 2-4, Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 74 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and stovetops. Rooms have private balconies. 32-inch plasma televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include safes and microwaves, and housekeeping is provided on a limited basis. Amenities Take advantage of recreation opportunities including a fitness center and a seasonal outdoor pool. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in a common area. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. Property Location With a stay at The Beach Star Ibiza Aparthotel - Adults Only in Sant Josep de sa Talaia (San Antonio Bay), you'll be steps from Cala de Bou Beach and Playa Bella. This 4-star hotel is 12 mi (19.3 km) from Port of Ibiza and 11.7 mi (18.8 km) from Dalt Vila. Dining Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's coffee shop/cafe. Unwind at the end of the day with a drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. Continental breakfasts are available daily from 8:30 AM to noon for a fee. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the local government and will be collected at the property. The tax is reduced by 50% after the 8th night of stay and children under 16 years of age are exempt. Other exemptions and reductions may apply. For more details, please contact the property using the information on the reservation confirmation received after booking. name: El Somni Ibiza Dream Hotel by Grupotel
address: Cala San Vicente, 7811, Cala San Vicente, 07811 Sant Joan de Labritja, Ibiza Island
description: Look out over the golden sands and clear waters of San Vicente Beach from this hotel. It is surrounded by some of the natural scenery on the island of Ibiza. At El Somni Ibiza Dream Hotel by Grupotel you can enjoy a game of tennis on the hotel’s own courts before a refreshing dip in the outdoor swimming pool. The hotel offers la carte restaurant with sea view and the evening’s entertainment of shows, live music and dancing. The hotel has a Spa & Wellness area with indoor pool with jets, sauna, ice fountain and massage cabin.

name: The Purple Hotel by Ibiza Feeling - Adults only
address: Carrer D'Antoni Riquer, 23, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: The Purple Hotel - Gay Super Friendly boasts an outdoor pool and sun terrace in Sant Antoni De Portmany. Cafe del Mar, Mambo, Savannah and Coastline Cafe are 7 minutes' walk away. Painted in purple, the air-conditioned bedrooms include a flat-screen TV and free WiFi and a bathroom. Guests have access to a lounge and bar. The hotel also features a restaurant. The Purple Hotel - Gay Super Friendly is within walking distance of the harbour with its seafront promenade, only 400 metres away, and the West End with all its shops and nightlife.

name: Agroturismo Xarc
address: Can Cosmi, Es Nuvells, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: No description found

name: Hostal Horizonte
address: Progreso 62B, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Hostal Horizonte is a family-run guesthouse situated 600 metres from Sant Antoni Beach. It has a swimming pool, terrace and all of its rooms have private balconies and free WiFi. All rooms at Hostal Horizonte are air-conditioned and have private bathrooms and TV. Safes are available on request. Horizonte has a 24-hour reception, tour desk and an internet point. There is a microwave available for guest use. Hairdryers, an iron and ironing board can be requested at reception for a small deposit. Hostal Horizonte is 5 minute's walk from the bus station and 10 minutes' walk from Café del Mar. Sant Antoni port is just 500 metres away. From there you can get a ferry to Denia on mainland Spain. Ibiza Airport is about 15 km away.

name: Agroturismo Can Pardal
address: Carrer De Missa 3, 07815 Sant Miquel de Balansat, Ibiza Island
description: The attractive Can Pardal is located in Sant Miquel de Balansat in Ibiza. This restored 15th-century country house offers a garden, outdoor pool and stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi. The air-conditioned rooms at Agroturismo Can Pardal feature traditional Balearic décor, with tiled floors, white walls and wooden beams. Each one has flat-screen satellite TV and an iPod docking station. A pillow menu is available. The hotel’s restaurant serves a set menu on request. Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do in Ibiza. Massage, bicycle and car rental services are also available. You can drive to Ibiza’s north coast in just 7 minutes. Ibiza Town is a 20-minute drive from Can Pardal, and Ibiza-San José Airport is around 30 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hotel Brisa
address: Carrer De Valencia, 15, Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: The adults-only Hotel Brisa - Adults only is located in San Antonio, Ibiza, just 400 metres from the beach. It has a swimming pool, and is 5 minutes’ walk from Café del Mar. The rooms in the Brisa Hotel are simple and spacious, and most have balconies. All have air-conditioning and a TV. WiFi is available for a supplement in rooms and free of charge in public areas. Next to the pool is a large sun-bathing terrace with loungers, as well as a snack bar. The Hotel Brisa - Adults only also has a lounge with satellite TV, billiards and table tennis. The centre of Sant Antoni, with its shops, is just 5 minutes’ walk away. Other nearby sunset bars include Mambo.

name: AluaSoul Ibiza - Adults only
address: Playa Es Canar, 07849 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: AluaSoul Ibiza - Adults only is a 4-star hotel featuring a wellness centre, a fitness area, swimming pool and Balinese beds located in Santa Eularia des Riu. Las Dalias Hippy Market is 3.5 km away. Each modern room here will provide you with air conditioning, a balcony and satellite channels. Featuring a bath or shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer. A free safe is also available. There is an a la carte restaurant and a buffet-style restaurant, two bars and a show cooking. Other facilities offered at the property include entertainment staff and a tour desk. The hotel is 3.3 km from Ibiza Conference Centre and 1.2 km from Nikki Beach Ibiza. Aeropuerto de Ibiza Airport is 23 km away.

name: Apartamentos Formentera II - Adults only
address: C Santa Rosalia 33, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Located in Sant Antoni de Portmany, Apartamentos Formentera 2 is within a 30-minute drive of Ibiza Airport and offers an outdoor pool and a rooftop terrace. It also features a kids pool, a sun deck and a 24-hour reception. There are a variety of facilities available to guests of the property, including bicycle rental, concierge and car hire. In addition, the multilingual staff are available to offer assistance. Apartamentos Formentera 2 has 16 apartments, all of which are filled with a range of amenities to ensure an enjoyable stay. Sant Antoni de Portmany's well-known attractions are within close proximity to Apartamentos Formentera 2, with Cafe del Mar only a short stroll away. Cala Gracio is within walking distance of the property, and local travel information can be found at the tour desk.HotelsCombined

name: Boutique hotel Ibizazen
address: Carretera Cala Llonga, km 12. Pol. 17, nr. 20, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Set on a refurbished 18th-century farmhouse, Ibizazen offers an outdoor swimming pool and air-conditioned rooms with garden or pool views. A free private parking is available on site. Decorated with unique items, rooms at Ibizazen feature a flat-screen satellite TV, a Nespresso Coffee Machine and a free safe. The bathroom is integrated in the room by a glass partition, and has a bathrobe, slippers and a rain shower or bathtub. Some rooms have a private terrace. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the hotel and you can enjoy a drink at the bar in the garden. Several seafood restaurants can be found in a short walk. Ibizazen is 5 minutes’ drive from Santa Eulàlia and only 200 metres from its famous yacht harbour. Ibiza Airport is 20 km away and you can drive to Ibiza Harbour connected to Formentera in 20 minutes from the hotel. Free Wi-Fi is provided.

name: Azuline Hotel Llevant
address: C/ Ramon y Cajal, 5, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Offering an outdoor swimming pool and sun terrace, azuLine Hotel Llevant is set 200 metres from San Antonio Beach. Each air-conditioned modern room has a private bathroom including a bath tub. A safe is available in the room for an extra cost. Some rooms have a balcony. Reception is open 24 hours a day and staff can organize currency exchange for guests. There is also an on-site café bar with a terrace. Cala Gració Cove is a 5-minute drive from the hotel, while Cala Conta Cove is 9 km away. You can watch Ibiza’s famous sun rises at Café del Mar, a 10-minute walk from azuLine Hotel Llevant. Diving, windsurfing and beach volleyball are popular at the nearby beaches. San Antonio Bus Station is 100 metres from the property, offering buses to Ibiza Airport, 20 km away.

name: Aparthotel Vibra Sanan - Adults only
address: C/ Balançat, 13, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Aparthotel Vibra Sanan is located just 300 metres from the beach in Ibiza’s San Antonio and features an outdoor pool with a sun terrace. Accommodations at Aparthotel Vibra Sanan come with air conditioning, satellite TV, a refrigerator, a complete bathroom and a balcony. Studios include kitchenette, microwave and kettle. Free WiFi is available in the hotel. The famous Café del Mar is just 100 metres from the hotel. Bar Mambo is also just 5 minutes’ walk from Aparthotel Vibra Sanan, with spectacular views of San Antonio's famous sunsets. Es Caló des Moro Beach is 1 km away and Ibiza Town Centre is 14 km from the aparthotel.

name: Hostal Adelino
address: Alicante, 16, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Hostal Adelino is located 500 metres from San Antonio's central bus station, in Ibiza. It offers 24-hour reception, free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool with a sun terrace and bar. Each air-conditioned room at Hostal Adelino comes with a TV, safe and minibar. All have a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Many also have their own balcony. Adelino’s café-bar opens from 08:00 until late. Here guests can enjoy a wide range of light meals, ice creams and cocktails. A snooker table, TV and a free internet point can be found in Adelino’s lounge. Staff at the guest house’s 24-hour front desk can book tickets for nightclubs and ferries. The property can also arrange bicycle and car hire, as well as horse riding lessons and routes. Eden Nightclub is 900 metres from the Adelino, and Es Paradis is 10 minutes’ walk away.

name: Aparthotel Vibra del Mar - Adults only
address: C/ Del Mar 1, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Centrally located in San Antonio and just metres from the sea, these bright studios have views of the Mediterranean or the hotel swimming pool and sun terrace. The air-conditioned Aparthotel Vibra del Mar - Adults only studios include satellite TV, a kitchenette with mini-fridge and private bathroom. Free WiFi is also available. You can hire a scooter from Aparthotel Vibra del Mar - Adults only's reception and explore the island. The Port is 1 minutes’ walk away and golden San Antonio Beach can be reached by foot in less than 5 minutes. The West End area has a huge selection of bars and restaurants. The famous Café del Mar nightclub is just 250 metres away from Aparthotel Vibra del Mar - Adults only.

name: Cala San Miguel Hotel - Adults Only
address: Puerto San Miguel 26, 07815 Port de Sant Miquel, Ibiza Island
description: Located in Port de Sant Miquel, Cala San Miguel Hotel - Adults Only provides 5-star accommodation, as well as an outdoor pool. It has a fitness center, as well as a 24-hour reception, free bicycle rental and a currency exchange. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or have a drink at the bar. In addition, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide assistance. The cosy rooms at Cala San Miguel Hotel - Adults Only are air-conditioned and offer a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and a desk. They are also fitted with a telephone and a hair dryer. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient place to enjoy a meal. A selection of eating options are also found in the area. Ibiza Airport is a 35-minute drive from the hotel. Those wanting to explore the region are able to visit Santa Eularia des Riu, situated an easy drive from the property.HotelsCombined

name: Hotel La Torre del Canonigo - Small Luxury Hotels
address: C/ Joan Roman 1, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Located on Ibiza Town’s Dalt Vila Hill, this property offers fantastic views of the sea, port and town. It offers late breakfast and air-conditioned rooms. The hotel consists of three different buildings connected by a terrace with a solarium. La Torre del Canónigo is built on the grounds of the city’s Roman acropolis within a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The hotel rooms feature terracotta floors and traditional Balearic décor. Each one has its own décor and includes a satellite TV, free minibar, safe and free WiFi. The hotel has a bar and a roof terrace where you can enjoy your drink. Staff at reception can help booking restaurants, car hire and tickets to other events. The hotel is within 5 minutes’ walk of the town centre with its shops, bars and restaurants. The hotel is within 15 minutes’ drive of the nearest beaches and Ibiza-San José Airport. The hotel provides an airport shuttle service on request.

name: azuLine Hotel Mediterraneo
address: C/ Pintor Vizcai, 1, Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Set 350 metres from the beach in Santa Eulàlia des Ríu, Hotel Mediterráneo features an outdoor swimming pool and rooms with balconies. It is 5 minutes’ walk from the town’s cafés, bars and restaurants. Each simply decorated room at Hotel Mediterráneo has bright décor. There is a private bathroom and some rooms overlook the pool. A safety deposit box is available at an extra cost. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast in the Mediterráneo’s dining room. Es Canar is just 5 km away and Ibiza Town and the island’s airport can be reached in 20 minutes by car. The bus station is 50 metres away.

name: Hotel Galera
address: Cami General, 3, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Stop at Hotel Residencia Galera to discover the wonders of Ibiza. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. To be found at the hotel are 24-hour front desk, Wi-Fi in public areas, tours, elevator, poolside bar. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like air conditioning, heating, desk, balcony/terrace, telephone. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Ibiza, Hotel Residencia Galera will make you feel instantly at home.Agoda

name: Aparthotel Vibra Monterrey
address: Carrer De Sabadell, 10, Cala D'en Bou, 00199 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Hotel Apartamentos Vibra Monterrey is situated just 450 metres from Punta Pinet Beach, in Ibiza’s San Antonio Bay. It has an outdoor pool with a tennis court and a 24-hour reception. The Monterrey offers air-conditioned studios and apartments, all with satellite TV, a kitchenette and a private bathroom. They all have a balcony, some with views over the sea. Free WiFi is available. You can relax on a free sun lounger on the Hotel Monterrey’s poolside terrace. There is a snack bar. Staff at Hotel Apartamentos Vibra Monterrey can organise car or bicycle rental to explore the area. The centre of San Antonio is only 2 km away, while the Amnesia and Privilege nightclubs are within 8 km.

name: Aparhotel Vibra Central City - Adults Only
address: Calle San Antonio, 29, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Located in the centre of Sant Antoni and within 5 minutes’ walk of Café Mambo and Café del Mar, Apartamentos Central City features a seasonal outdoor pool. This adults only property offers bright, air-conditioned studios. Each studio at Apartamentos Central City has 2 single beds and a TV. The kitchenette comes with a mini-fridge. Some studios come with a balcony. Free WiFi is available. The complex is within 10 minutes’ walk of a range of cafés, bars and restaurants. Savannah Beach Club is 400 metres away. The nearest beach is approximately 500 metres from the apartments. Sant Antoni’s port is just 5 minutes’ walk from the Central City and ferries to mainland Spain leave from here.

name: Can Quince de Balafia - Turismo de Interior
address: Can Furnas de Balafia 15, 07812 Sant Joan de Labritja, Ibiza Island
description: Offering private terraces and beautifull flowery garden with heated pool, Can Quince is located in a fortified hamlet, in Sant LlorenÃ§ de Balafia. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. Each room includes air conditioning. The private bathroom has a shower or bath, hairdryer, bathrobe and free toiletries. Laundry service can be organized upon request. The beach of Benniras is within 6 km of Can Quince. Ibiza City is 15 km from the property and Sant Anotni de Portmany is 35 minutesâ drive away.

name: Hostal Tarba
address: Calle Ramón y Cajal 24, Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: This family-run hotel is located in San Antonio town, next to the harbour with excellent access to the nearby beaches. Hotel Tarba has a young and relaxed atmosphere. It features a cafeteria, swimming pool and gardens. It is close to San Antonio's shopping and nightlife. Hostal Tarba has a garage for guests traveling with bikes. Tools are also available. The guest house is also close to the bus station.

name: Axelbeach Ibiza Spa & Beach Club - Adults Only
address: Calle Cala de Bou 46., 07800 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Set on the beachfront at San Antonio Beach, AxelBeach Ibiza is an adults only hotel featuring 2 outdoor pools, a free spa and a gym with sea views. The modern, air-conditioned suites and apartments come with a sofa bed and a kitchen with a fridge, microwave and a Bosch coffee machine. All have a balcony or terrace with sea views, as well as free WiFi. The private bathroom includes free toiletries, hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers. The spa includes a hot tub, hammam and sauna. A massage service is also available for an extra charge. There is a restaurant and café with a chill out terrace and a poolside bar. The complex also has direct beach access and a beach club with a restaurant and bar service, and sun beds for rent. An airport shuttle service is available for an extra charge. There is 24-hour reception and a laundry service is available. Ibiza Airport is 23 minutes' drive away and Ses Salines Beach is 27 km from AxelBeach Ibiza - Adults Only. There is parking onsite at a cost.

name: Valley Club Ibiza - Boutique Agroturismo
address:
8.9
