description: Ca Sa Vilda Marge is set in large grounds with gardens, orchards and vegetable gardens, located 5 minutes' drive from Portinatx. Ca Sa Vilda Marge features an outdoor pool with sun beds. The beautifully decorated rooms at Ca Sa Vilda Marge feature free WiFi, flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom. Most of the rooms also have a private terrace. Guests can enjoy drinks and snacks at the chillout area beside the pool. The area around the house is great for hiking. Ibiza Town is around 20 minutes’ drive from the property. You can drive to Sant Antoni and Ibiza Airport in around 30 minutes.

name: Hostal Los Pinos
address: Calle Pou Den Cardona 27, 07849 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Located in Santa Eularia des Riu, Hostal Los Pinos is a perfect starting point from which to explore Ibiza. Featuring a satisfying list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Hostal Los Pinos. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with flat screen television, linens, towels, closet, fan. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Friendly staff, great facilities, and close proximity to all that Ibiza has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Hostal Los Pinos.Agoda

name: Invisa Hotel Club Cala Blanca
address: Platja d' Es Figueral, Sant Carles de Peralta, Ibiza Island
description: This hotel is situated in the residential area of Playa d’Es Figueral, 10 km from Santa Eulalia del Río and in complete harmony with the landscape and the surrounding beach. A full late breakfast is served at the Marina Restaurant. Guests can also enjoy a bar as well as other on site facilities such as a fitness centre and a sun terrace. These spaces are ideal for family tourism. You can enjoy the magnificent beach here, the swimming pools and themed dinners. The little ones can enjoy their own swimming pool and other recreational activities.

name: Aparhotel Vibra Club Maritim
address: Carrer De Madrid, 16, 07830 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Featuring an outdoor swimming pool, Club Marítim is located in a quiet residential area, just 4 km from the centre of Sant Antoni de Portmany. The beach is a 10-minute walk away. Club Marítim offers spacious and bright apartments and studios, all with free WiFi, satellite TV and a private bathroom. The apartments feature a large living room with a fully equipped kitchenette and dining area. Guests can enjoy a continental breakfast at Club Marítim's restaurant, and there are many bars, restaurants and cafés in the Sant Antoni Bay area. Club Marítim has a tennis court. A bus stops 300 metres away and will take you to the centre of Sant Antoni. An on-site car rental service is also available. Ibiza can be reached in about 30 minutes by car.

name: Ocean Drive Talamanca
address: Carrer de Jesús, 28, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Ocean Drive Talamanca is just 50 metres from Talamanca Beach and offers sea views. It features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, and rooms with balconies and free WiFi. Set in a fine location in Ibiza, the hotel offers a concept that aims to personalize the guest experience with a variety of services. The property offers simple, bright décor. Each of its air-conditioned rooms has satellite TV. Guests benefit from 2 free bottles of water upon arrival. The Ocean Drive Talamanca buffet restaurant serves breakfast buffet and overlooks Talamanca Bay. You can get lunch at the hotel's snack bar. There is a direct bus to nearby Ibiza Town, which stops 25 metres from the hotel. Nightclubs including Pacha and Space are a 15-minute drive away. Ferries to the other Balearic islands and mainland Spain leave from the city’s port, 2 km away. Seasonal hotel open from May until October.

name: Nereida Aparthotel
address: Carrer De Madrid, 10, 07829 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: This aparthotel is located on the seafront in the beautiful rocky coast of Southern Ibiza, only 300 metres from a sandy beach and in a quiet place near a leisure and entertainment zone. It offers spacious studios and apartments with a large range of excellent facilities such as a balcony, kitchen and private bathroom. The aparthotel has a chill-out terrace from which guests can enjoy the spectacular sunsets of this Balearic Island or have a swim at the pool, while listening to DJ music. The aparthotel also has a buffet restaurant serving a wide variety of national and international dishes.FarePortal

name: Typic Marina Playa - Adults Only
address: Carrer Del Sol Sortint, Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Set on Es Pueto Beach and offering panoramic views of the Mediterranean Sea, Marina Playa features an outdoor pool and a sun terrace with Balinese beds and sun loungers. The air-conditioned modern rooms feature stylish, Mediterranean décor. There is a living room with a sofa bed and a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and a kitchenette. Free Wi-Fi is included. Apartments also feature a furnished balcony or terrace. The Marina Playa has a rooftop bar, Aperture, where guests can enjoy snacks, cocktails and sea views. The complex also features a sports bar, Toro, offering a wide range of beers and sandwiches. A continental breakfast is served every morning. There is a 24-hour reception and staff can help with tourist information, tickets and excursions. They can also arrange car hire, boat hire, and other activities such as water sports. The town centre is 10 minutes' walk down the seafront promenade, and there is a bus stop just meters away, offering easy access to all parts of Ibiza. Hotel Apartamentos Marina Playa is 23 km away from Ibiza Airport, and a transfer service is available to and from the airport.

name: azuLine Hotel S'Anfora & Fleming
address: Avda Doctor Fleming 55 Apdo Correos 932 San Antonio de Portmany, Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Located in Sant Antoni de Portmany, this welcoming residence lets you experience it all. Air Zone Ibiza is an easy 6-minute walk away and Platja de S'Arenal is also a quick 9-minute walk away. Spend a day at the nearby beach, relax by the outdoor pool (enjoy the sun loungers!), or sip a drink at the poolside bar of this residence, which also features a balcony. As for the great indoors, you can come inside and enjoy the free WiFi and TV. This vacation rental features luggage storage, air conditioning, a desk, and blackout drapes/curtains. And you can even travel light because you'll have access to laundry facilities.Expedia

name: Agroturisme Can Planells
address: Venda de Rubio, 2, 07815 Sant Miquel de Balansat, Ibiza Island
description: No description found

name: Agroturismo Can Cosmi Prats
address: Camino Viejo de San Mate, Polígono 27, 07814 Santa Gertrudis de Fruitera, Ibiza Island
description: Featuring free WiFi and an outdoor pool, Agroturismo Can Cosmi Prats offers accommodation in Santa Gertrudis de Fruitera, 9 km from Ibiza Town. The farm stay has a terrace and sun terrace, and guests can enjoy a drink at the snack bar. Free private parking is available on site. The rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. Extras include free toiletries and a hair dryer. Bike hire and car hire are available at this farm stay and the area is popular for cycling. San Antonio is 9 km from Agroturismo Can Cosmi Prats, while Playa d'en Bossa is 11 km from the property. Aeropuerto de Ibiza Airport is 13 km away.

name: Trs Ibiza Hotel
address: Carretera Cala Gracio (Cami Del Portixol 1) Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: TRS Ibiza Hotel -All Inclusive Adults Only Hotel, a luxury hotel with direct access to the beach, is located in the San Antonio area next to Cala Gració and Cala Gracioneta, two beautiful coves with crystal clear waters surrounded by Mediterranean vegetation. This environment of great beauty is perfect for you to enjoy exclusive vacations as a couple or with friends that include premium services, an exquisite gastronomic offer of its 3 a la carte restaurants, 24-hour butler service and the Infinite Indulgence experience, the All Inclusive that goes further beyond excellence. The Signature Level rooms includes services, amenities, exclusive drinks, minibar. Access to the Gravity Sky Lounge with Infinity pool, access to exclusive sun lounger area by the Io pool. Access to the Zentropia Spa to enjoy water circuit. Selected events at Ushuaia, Hard Rock and Hi club. Dine out, that include exclusive menus in a selection of Ibiza´s restaurants. TRS Ibiza offers you rooms and suites with hydromassage bathtubs, treatments and massages from Zentropia Palladium Spa & Wellness, three restaurants and four bars, three swimming pools and a complete menu of activities like yoga, Pilates and live music.

name: Aparthotel Vibra Bay
address: Carrer Vedranell, 6, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Offering an outdoor pool and a gym, this hotel is only 3 minutes’ walk from the beach. Aparthotel Vibra Bay features a large sports court. La Sirena has a pool-side bar and a restaurant. There is also a lounge and a games room with a billiard table. The pool area has a sun terrace with free hammocks. The air-conditioned rooms come with free WiFi, a satellite TV and a kitchenette. They have a private bathroom and some of them offer views of the pool. Water sports and other activities can be practised in Es Puet Beach, which is a few metres away from Aparthotel Vibra Bay. Located in San Antonio Bay, the town centre is 600 metres away, while the harbour is less than 1 km away. Ibiza Airport is a 23-minute drive.

name: Hostal La Torre
address: Cap Negret no 25, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Located in San Antonio in the Ibiza Region, 15 km from Ibiza Town, Hostal La Torre Ibiza Cap Negret features a terrace and views of the sea. The guest house has a sun terrace and views of the garden, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property and free private parking is available on site. Every room is equipped with a flat-screen TV. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. Extras include free toiletries and a hair dryer. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. The guest house also offers bike hire and car hire. Café Mambo is 2.2km from Hostal La Torre Ibiza Cap Negret, while Sant Josep de Sa Talaia is 9 km away. The nearest airport is Aeropuerto de Ibiza Airport, 15 km from Hostal La Torre Ibiza Cap Negret.

name: Migjorn Ibiza Suites & Spa
address: Begonias, 12-18, 07817 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Migjorn Ibiza Suites & Spa is a luxury apartment complex, located 150 metres from Playa d’en Bossa beach. It has outdoor pools, free WiFi, 24-hour reception and free public parking nearby. The complex offers modern apartments with stylish décor. Each air-conditioned apartment at Migjorn Ibiza has a kitchenette and a spacious living area with satellite TV. Set in attractive gardens, the Migjorn Ibiza Suites & Spa is designed in traditional Ibizan style. It has a business centre, a spa, a gym and a hot tub which can be used for a surcharge. There are 4 swimming pools, including 2 for children, and a pool bar. There is also a children's playground and a gastronomic restaurant. The complex is located in the heart of lively Playa d’en Bossa. Ibiza’s largest water park is nearby. There is also good access to the airport and to Ibiza Town, where you can find Pacha and Hi Nightclubs.

name: Hotel Vibra Riviera
address: Carrer Des Caló, 49, 07829 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Hotel Vibra Riviera overlooks San Antonio Bay offering lovely sea views and is situated in a buzzing resort, just steps from the beach. All rooms have free WiFi. The complex boasts a sun terrace, 3 pools, a buffet restaurant, gardened areas and a terrace bar. The resort has a relaxed friendly atmosphere; just metres away you will find the beautiful Punta Xinxó Beach. Many of the bars and cafés have enticing outdoor terraces and there is an array of family activities on offer in the area, such as parasailing, scuba diving, banana boating and crazy golf. The complex offers 2 nightly shows per week. San Antonio town centre is a short drive away but the immediate surroundings have a good selection of boutiques, bars and restaurants. It is easy to get around, there is a regular bus service and ferries depart from the beach. The property offers free private parking (Subject to Availability).

name: Hostal Mallorca
address: C/Bartolomé Vicente Ramón,19, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 37 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have bathtubs or showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and blackout drapes/curtains, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include multilingual staff, luggage storage, and a safe deposit box at the front desk. Property Location With a stay at Hostal Mallorca in Sant Antoni de Portmany, you'll be near the beach, just a 5-minute walk from Church of San Antonio and 7 minutes by foot from San Antonio Marina Port. This hostal is 10.6 mi (17 km) from Port of Ibiza and 12 mi (19.3 km) from Bossa Beach. Dining Satisfy your appetite at the hostal's coffee shop, which features a bar/lounge. Dining is also available at the coffee shop/cafe. Continental breakfasts are available daily from 8:30 AM to 12:30 PM for a fee. name: Insotel Tarida Beach Sensatori Resort
address: C/ La Morena, 07830 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: The peaceful bay of Cala Tarida and the beautiful beach are situated just a short walk from this resort for families and adults. A range of beach clubs, restaurants, a shopping centre and links to the public transport network are located in the hotel's immediate vicinity. San José is around 6 km away and San Antonio is some 10 km from the establishment. Apart from the main buffet restaurant, there are five inviting à la carte restaurants with highchairs. The resort has two swimming pool areas, one of them only for adults with hot tubs, waterloungers and bali beds. Guests may choose to relax with a massage treatment at the on-site spa while children can have fun at the splash park. There is also a number of sport facilities and a gym and dance studio for the more active ones at The Retreat, which is situated 500m from reception, a 5 minute walk or by shuttle.FarePortal

name: FERGUS Style Bahamas
address: Playa d'En Bossa, 07817 Sant Jordi de ses Salines, Ibiza Island
description: FERGUS Style Bahamas is located on Playa D’en Bossa Beach, Ibiza. It offers an outdoor pool and air-conditioned rooms with a balcony and sea, pool or garden views. Bright rooms have a seating area, a minibar, and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. The FERGUS Style Bahamas offers 2 restaurants, one of them with pool views. The main restaurant has an open kitchen. There is a snack bar, lobby bar and a poolside bar with a terrace from which guests can watch night-time entertainment shows. Two of Ibiza's most famous nightclubs, Hi and Bora Bora, are located just a few metres away. Tickets for night clubs and excursions can be arranged at the 24-hour reception. Ibiza Town and Airport are a 5-minute drive away.

name: Buenavista & Suites
address: Avenida Padre Guasch, 9, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Offering stunning sea views and surrounded by beautiful gardens, Buenavista & Suites is located in Santa Eulàlia des Riu. It features an outdoor pool and a sun terrace with comfortable hammocks. Rooms are distributed over 2 buildings. Each room has been carefully decorated and offers a private bathroom and free Wi-Fi. Some rooms feature colonial-style furniture, beamed ceilings as well as garden or pool views. This family-run hotel has a bar and a restaurant, which specialises in a variety of fish and rice dishes. There is also a chill-out area where guests can relax while having a drink. Numerous bars and restaurants can be found in Santa Eulàlia des Riu. The harbour is only 10 minutes’ walk away from Buenavista. Here you can take a ferry to Formentera Island. Ibiza city centre, Ibiza Airport and Sant Antoni de Portmany can be reached in less than 25 minutes’ drive away.

name: Outsite Ibiza
address: Avenida Punta Arabi, 146, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Set in Es Canar, Outsite Ibiza - is 2 minutes’ walk from the beach. It offers air-conditioned rooms, shared kitchenette, living room and workspace, and free WiFi throughout. Rooms come with a private bathroom and flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a private balcony or terrace and sea views. The famous Es Canar hippy market is held every Wednesday in summer. Beautiful unspoiled beaches, such as Cala Nova or Cala Marina can easily be reached on foot. Ibiza city centre is only 20 km away.

name: Hotel Marfil
address: Carrer de Ramon i Cajal, 34, Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: This small hotel is situated in the town centre, not far from the beach, promenade and leisure port, where you can find a variety of excellent restaurants, shops, supermarkets and leisure activities to enjoy. Because we know that you need to sleep in on holiday too, enjoy an assorted buffet breakfast service up to 12 midday. In addition you can make use of our neighbour swimming pool, situated just 50 metres away. The property has its own yacht, and can arrange trips to the cliffs on the north of the island, as well as to Es Vedrá.

name: THB Los Molinos Adults Only
address: C/ Ramon Muntaner, 60, Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: THB Los Molinos is located on the beachfront in Ibiza. It has a sauna, fitness centre and hot tub, and offers air-conditioned rooms with a balcony, satellite TV and minibar. THB Los Molinos is an adults-only hotel including an à la carte restaurant, bar, garden area and a terrace. A 24-hour reception is also available. There are Balinese beds and a bar next to the pool and a spa with free access. All of the rooms and public areas at THB Los Molinos are covered by free WiFi access. There is also a business centre with wired internet. The property also offers banquet facilities. THB Los Molinos is a 5-minute walk from Ibiza Old Town, known as Dalt Vila. Ibiza Cathedral is only 900 metres away, while the Pacha Nightclub is 1.9 km away.

name: 7Pines Resort Ibiza
address: Calle Puig Delfin, 07830 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Situated in Sant Josep de sa Talaia in the Ibiza Region, 18 km from Ibiza Town, 7Pines Resort Ibiza, part of Destination by Hyatt is surrounded by pine trees and boasts views of Es Vedrà Island, has three pools in total including one outdoor pool in our public area of the spa centre. Each Suite at this resort is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a seating area for your convenience. All suites feature a terrace or balcony, and some have a private pool. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. We are provided by three restaurants and three bars: - The View, awarded by 1 Sol by 2023 Repsol Guide and included in the 2023 MICHELIN Guide (Spain & Portugal) offers a fine dining experience with an elevated and sublime tasting menu with a Nordic twist. - Cone club offer dazzling evening during the most popular sunset in Ibiza where guests can drinks exquisite cocktails accompained by nice tapas and a comfort food menu - Pershing Yacht Terrace is the place where modern Asian cuisine meets signature drinks in a sophisticated atmosphere and exceptional setting with infinite views to the Mediterranean Sea. The resort has a 1.500 m2 area with two saunas, a steam bath, showers and waterbeds. The Laguna area is a place where families enjoy in a fantastic pool adapted to kids next to a food truck and our sustainable Kids Club concept, KIO. This resort offers water sports facilities for an extra charge, and bike hire is available. San Antonio is 7 km from 7Pines Resort Ibiza, part of Destination by Hyatt, while Playa d'en Bossa is 17 km away. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 22 km from the property.

name: Destino Pacha Ibiza - Entrance to Pacha Club Included
address: Cap Martinet s/n, 07819 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Set around an outdoor pool, and offering panoramic views of the Mediterranean Sea, Destino Pacha Ibiza is set on the hillside in Cap Martinet. Talamanca Beach is a 5-minute walk away. Air-conditioned rooms feature a stylish, white décor and large windows. Each one includes free Wi-Fi, a TV, safe, minibar and a private bathroom. Destino Pacha Ibiza's restaurant offers fusion cuisine, with Japanese, Mediterranean and Central American influences. It uses fresh, local products. The pool is surrounded by palm trees and hammocks, and poolside massages are available. There is also a large hot tub and hot yoga classes. Pacha Ibiza Club is a 20-minute walk from the resort, while Ibiza city centre is around 3.5 km away. Ibiza Port can be reached in a 10-minute drive, and boats to Formentera, Mallorca and Valencia leave from here.

name: Hotel Garbi Ibiza & Spa
address: C./ de Murtra Nº 5 Ap.Co. 128, 07830 Sant Jordi de ses Salines, Ibiza Island
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 298 air-conditioned rooms featuring LED televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and blackout drapes/curtains. Amenities Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool, an indoor pool, and a spa tub. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and shopping on site. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a business center, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Free self parking is available onsite. Property Location When you stay at Hotel Garbi Ibiza & Spa in Sant Josep de sa Talaia, you'll be on the beach, a 1-minute drive from Bossa Beach and 6 minutes from Port of Ibiza. This 4-star hotel is 2.6 mi (4.2 km) from Dalt Vila and 4.2 mi (6.8 km) from Talamanca Beach. Dining Satisfy your appetite for dinner at the hotel's restaurant, Comedor, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Need to unwind? Take a break at the bar/lounge, the beach bar, or the poolside bar for a tasty beverage. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 8:00 AM to 11:00 AM. name: Apartamentos Cala Llonga Playa Ibiza
address: C/Monterrosa ., 07849 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: With a stay at Apartamentos Cala LLonga Playa Ibiza in Santa Eulalia del Rio, you'll be 3.9 mi (6.3 km) from Marina Santa Eulalia and 6.4 mi (10.3 km) from Talamanca Beach. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Hotel Ses Savines
address: Avinguda Del Doctor Fleming, 22, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: This beach hotel is located directly beside the sea, within a few paces of the nearest inviting sandy beach. Public transport departs from stops that lie just a stone's throw from the hotel and scores of shopping facilities, countless restaurants, bars, nightclubs and additional entertainment venues are to be found in the surrounding area (350 m away). The town centre can be reached within 30 minutes on foot. Built in 1936 and renovated in 1999, the hotel comprises a total of 155 rooms spread over 5 floors of which 54 are doubles. Facilities include a lobby with a 24-hour reception desk, a safe, a currency exchange facility, a lift and a café. There is also a bar, a games room, a TV room and an air-conditioned à la carte restaurant with non-smoking area and highchairs for infants on offer to guests. Furthermore, the hotel has its own car park and a garage. The welcoming rooms all come with tiled en suite bathrooms, a direct dial telephone and a safe. Guests may make use of the hotel's indoor swimming pool, freshwater pool, snack bar, sun loungers, parasols, sauna and solarium. Sports enthusiasts have the opportunity to make use of the hotel's tennis courts, play table tennis, squash, billiards or snooker, and minigolf as well as to work out in the hotel gym. A seasonal entertainment programme for adults rounds off the hotel's offerings. A fine buffet is available in the mornings and evenings;Viajes Exito Hotels

name: Hostal Parque Ibiza
address: Plaza de Parque, 4, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Set in Ibiza Town’s charming historic quarter, Hostal Parque Ibiza offers rooms with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs. It is 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza de la Font and the town’s port. Each stylish, air-conditioned room at Hotel Parque has wooden flooring. Guests have access to shared or private bathroom facilities. Guests can enjoy breakfast in the dining room, or on the attractive terrace. There is also a cocktail bar, open during the summer. The surrounding old town has many cafes, bars and restaurants. The Dalt Vila’s cobbled streets and cathedral can be reached in 5 minutes by foot.

name: Hacienda Encanto del Rio
address: Caractera PM810/ KM 16, 07850 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Set in a pine forest, overlooking the Mediterranean Sea, Hacienda Encanto del Rio offers tranquil accommodation in north-eastern Ibiza. Featuring an outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi zone, it is 1 km from Aguas Blancas Beach. Air-conditioned studios and suites have a furnished terrace. There is a living room with a fireplace, safe and satellite TV. The kitchenette includes a fridge, stove and coffee maker. The complex has a snack bar and restaurant, which offers set menu and à la carte options. Room service is available, and packed lunches and special diet menus can be requested. Free parking is offered and there is a laundry service. You can hire a car or bicycle from the tour desk. Ibiza Town is a 30-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Abrat
address: Carretera de Cala Gració 5, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Facing the beachfront, Hotel Abrat offers 3-star accommodation in San Antonio and has a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre and garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a shared lounge and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking is available on site. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a bath. The rooms have a wardrobe. Hotel Abrat offers a terrace. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Hotel Abrat include Calo des Moro Beach, Cala Gracio Beach and Cala Gracioneta Beach. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 18 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Ibiza Playa
address: Carrer de Tarragona, 3, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Location This hotel is situated directly beside the beautiful beach of Figueretas. Guests are able to make use of the regular bus links to Ibiza Town and Playa d'en Bossa, both are only a 20-minute walk from the hotel. Facilities The establishment comprises a total of 157 accommodation units. Guests of the establishment are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. The upper floors are easily accessible using the lift. Services such as a safe and currency exchange facilities make for a comfortable stay. Internet access (for a fee) and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant, a dining area, a breakfast room, a café and a bar. Children can have fun playing in the garden. Additional features of the establishment include a TV room and a playroom. Guests arriving by car can park their vehicles in the garage (for a fee) or car park. Guests can also use the bicycle storage facilities. Additional services include medical assistance, room service and a laundry. Active guests can make use of the bicycle hire service to explore the surrounding area (for a fee). Rooms All accommodation units feature air conditioning, central heating, a fan and a bathroom. A balcony or terrace is also included as standard. Many of the rooms also offer a sea view, adding to the ambience. Each accommodation unit features separate bedrooms, a double bed, a king-size bed or a sofa-bed. Cots are available for children. A safe is also available. The kitchenette features a fridge. Other features include a telephone, a TV and wireless internet access. In the bathrooms, guests will find a shower, a bathtub and a hairdryer. Sports/Entertainment The establishment offers a children's pool. A terrace, sun loungers and parasols are available. There is also a poolside snack bar. Watersports offered include diving, or jet skiing for a fee. The establishment offers numerous indoor sporting opportunities, with activities such as a gym, table tennis, squash and gymnastics, as well as pool/billiards for a fee. A wellness area with a spa (no extra charge) is available. An entertainment programme and a disco complete the range of options available. Meals Various meals and board options are bookable. Guests can choose from breakfast, dinner, B & B and half board. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the establishment: American Express, VISA, Diners Club and MasterCard.WebBeds

name: Hotel Flamingo
address: Carrer Font d'Atzaró 25, 07849 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Located 800 metres from Es Caná Beach, Hotel Flamingo offers 1-star accommodation in Es Cana and features a garden, a terrace and a bar. The property is around 20 km from Marina Botafoch, 21 km from Ibiza Port and 4.9 km from Ibiza Conference Centre. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available. At the hotel, all rooms have a balcony. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at Hotel Flamingo also offer free WiFi, while some rooms are equipped with a mountain view. At the accommodation each room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Guests at Hotel Flamingo can enjoy an à la carte breakfast. At the hotel you will find a restaurant serving Japanese, Mediterranean and Asian cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. Popular points of interest near Hotel Flamingo include Cala Martina Beach, S'Argamassa Beach and Cala Pada Beach. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 26 km from the accommodation.

name: Hostal Restaurante Pou des Lleó
address: Pou Des Lleó, Sn, 07850 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Offering an outdoor pool, Hostal Restaurante Pou des Lleó guest house is located in a protected natural area in Sant Carles de Peralta. The sea is 3 minutes’ walk away. Each room here has a flat-screen satellite TV, a balcony, a wardrobe, a desk and a small fridge. The private bathrooms come with a bath or shower. Bed linen and towels are provided and there is free WiFi. At Hostal Restaurante Pou des Lleó you will find a garden, a terrace and a bar and a restaurant serving local traditional cuisine. The property is well situated for outdoor activities such as hiking and cycling. Bikes are available for rent on site. Ibiza Town is 28 km away and a 15-minute drive will take you to Santa Eulària des Riu.

name: Hostal Anibal
address: C/ Miguel Angel, 4, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: This hostel is located 3 km east of San Antonio Marina, just 200 m from the local shops, bars, and restaurants and 700 m from the beach. It is an ideal base from which to explore Ibiza and lies just 800 m from the nearest nightspots, 900 m from the centre of San Antonio, 1.3 km from San Antonio bus station and 18 km from Ibiza town. Ibiza Airport is just 25 km away. Facilities The establishment comprises a total of 67 accommodation units. A lobby and a reception are available to guests. Services such as a safe and currency exchange facilities make for a comfortable stay. Internet access and wireless internet access (for a fee) are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a dining area, a breakfast room, a café and a bar. Additional features of the establishment include a TV room and a playroom. Guests arriving in their own vehicles can park in the car park. Other services include multilingual staff. Rooms All accommodation units feature air conditioning, a fan and a bathroom. A balcony or terrace is also included as standard. Among the features available to guests is a safe. In the bathrooms, guests will find a shower and a bathtub. Sports/Entertainment The establishment offers a selection of sport and leisure opportunities. The establishment features an outdoor pool and a children's pool. A terrace, a sun terrace, sun loungers and parasols are available. Various refreshing drinks are available from the poolside bar. Leisure options available to guests include pool/billiards (for a fee). A wellness area with a solarium is available. Meals Breakfast is bookable as a board option. Payment VISA is accepted as payment at the establishment.WebBeds

name: Ryans Lolas - Adults Only
address: 14 Carrer de Cantàbria, 07829 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Located in San Antonio Bay, Ryans Lolas - Adults Only provides a restaurant, sea views and free WiFi, 500 metres from Cala Pinet Beach and less than 1 km from Es Pouet Beach. Fitted with a terrace, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. There is also a kitchen in some of the units equipped with an oven. A buffet breakfast is available daily at the aparthotel. Ryans Lolas - Adults Only offers 4-star accommodation with a beauty services and seasonal outdoor pool. A an indoor play area is also available for guests at the accommodation. Playa de Pinet is less than 1 km from Ryans Lolas - Adults Only, while Marina Botafoch is 17 km away. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 15 km from the aparthotel.

name: Hotel Sa Clau by Mambo
address: Carrer Progreso 1, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Hotel Sa Clau by Mambo is set in San Antonio, a 4-minute walk from Es Paradis Ibiza. 600 metres from Café Mambo, the property is also 300 metres away from San Antonio Bus Station. The property provides a shared lounge. All guest rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. Every room has a private bathroom, while certain rooms are fitted with a balcony. All units at the hotel have air conditioning and a wardrobe. Around the clock assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak Catalan, German, English and Spanish. Eden Ibiza is a 5-minute walk from Hotel Sa Clau by Mambo. Ibiza Airport is 13 km from the property.

name: Hotel Rural & Spa Can Curreu
address: Ctra Sant Carles Km 12, 07850 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Located in the village of San Carlos, this luxurious 5-star hotel and spa resort includes an indoor and outdoor swimming pool, a gym and equestrian centre. It includes free Wi-Fi. The air-conditioned rooms at Can Curreu are spacious with soft lighting and pastel décor. All rooms feature a flat-screen TV, a balcony with pleasant views and a private bathroom with hairdryer and free toiletries. The suites also have a kitchenette and large lounge area with sofa. Can Curreu’s modern restaurant serves breakfast, as well as traditional cuisine from Ibiza. The hotel has a bar, and room service is also available. The resort has a spa and wellness centre with hot tub, Turkish baths and massage treatments. It is located 200 metres from Dalias Market and there are 10 different beaches within a 10-minute drive. You can drive to Ibiza Airport in around 15 minutes.

name: Invisa Hotel Ereso
address: Playa De Es Cana 07 840 Santa Eulalia Del Rio Ibiza, Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Location This hotel lies in the outskirts of Es Caná, only around 200 m from the beach. Ibiza Town is around 20 km. Scores of shops, restaurants, bars, pubs and excellent public transport links are situated in the hotel's immediate vicinity. Facilities The hotel features 240 accommodation units. Guests of the hotel are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. A lift provides easy access to the upper floors. Amenities include a safe and currency exchange facilities. Internet access is available in public areas. Gastronomic options offered by the hotel include a restaurant, a café and a bar. Children can have fun playing in the garden. Additional features of the hotel include a TV room and a playroom. Facilities include medical assistance. A bicycle hire service gives guests the opportunity to explore the surrounding area independently. Rooms All rooms feature air conditioning, central heating and a bathroom. A balcony or terrace is also included as standard. All accommodation units offer a safe, a telephone and a TV. Each accommodation unit includes a bathroom with a shower. Sports/Entertainment The hotel features an outdoor pool and a children's pool. Sun loungers and parasols are also available. The poolside bar serves a selection of refreshing drinks. The hotel offers an extensive outdoor sport and leisure programme, with tennis, volleyball, handball, golf and archery. Those who enjoy watersports can have fun with aqua aerobics and aquafit. Table tennis and pool/billiards are some of the sports and leisure options available at the hotel. Entertainment options and leisure facilities include an entertainment programme and an entertainment programme for adults. Meals The hotel offers the following bookable meals and board options: breakfast, lunch and dinner. Payment All major credit cards, including American Express, VISA and MasterCard, are accepted for payment.WebBeds

name: Hostal Residencia Nicolau
address: Valencia, 9, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: This simple, comfortable guest house is located 5 minutes’ walk from Caló d’es Moro Beach. It offers air-conditioned rooms, some with a balcony, and 24-hour reception, 700 metres from San Antonio Harbour. Rooms at Hostal Residencia Nicolau feature functional decor and tiled floors. All have a plasma TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Nicolau has an air-conditioned bar serving daily drinks and snacks, it also has a billiards table. The town’s Sunset Strip is just 5 minutes’ walk away. Tourist information is offered and Cala Gració and Cala Gracioneta coves are within 15 minutes’ walk. The famous Café del Mar, Café Mambo and Es paradis discos are 10 minutes’ walk away. Hostal Residencia Nicolau is 20 km from Ibiza Airport. You can reach Ibiza Town by car in 25 minutes.

name: Hostal Talamanca
address: Playa Talamanca, Apartado 103, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Overlooking the magnificent Talamanca Beach and the clear waters of the Mediterranean Sea, enjoy excellent varied dining at this well-equipped guest house. Free WiFi and free parking are available. Conveniently set close to the lively Botafoch and Ibiza Nueva marinas, the Hostal Talamanca offers a peaceful refuge by the Ibiza beach. Relax in the comfortable, air-conditioned rooms, surrounded by a fantastic natural environment, away from the crowds. After soaking up the sun and atmosphere at the beach, take the regular ferry service or enjoy a stroll down to Ibiza's city centre. You can also enjoy water sports such as sailing and waterskiing - the Hostal Talamanca's tour desk can help you plan your stay. At meal times, choose from the Talamanca's superb facilities. Enjoy paellas and fresh local fish, on the outdoor terrace. There is also a fresh sardine barbecue twice a week, and a snack bar open all day.

name: Arenal
address: Avinguda Del Doctor Fleming, 16, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Hotel Arenal is conveniently located in the popular Sant Antoni de Portmany area. Featuring a satisfying list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Hotel Arenal. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like fan, air conditioning, heating, wake-up service, desk. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Discover all Ibiza has to offer by making Hotel Arenal your base.Agoda

name: Can Jaume Private Villas by Ocean Drive
address: Puig de'n Valls, 07819 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Set in Ibiza Town, 1.9 km from Marina Botafoch, Can Jaume Private Villas by Ocean Drive offers accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a garden. Located around 7.3 km from Aguamar Water Park, the hotel with free WiFi is also 15 km away from San Antonio Bus Station. The property features a hot tub, restaurant and shared lounge, and Ibiza Port is 3.7 km away. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. The units feature a wardrobe. Guests at Can Jaume Private Villas by Ocean Drive can enjoy a continental breakfast. San Antonio Port is 15 km from the accommodation, while Ibiza Conference Centre is 16 km away. The nearest airport is Ibiza, 8 km from Can Jaume Private Villas by Ocean Drive, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Club Can Jordi
address: Sa Barca Rompuda, 07850 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Featuring a seasonal outdoor pool and rooms with balconies, Hotel Club Can Jordi is set in gardens. It is situated in Cala Llenya, 900 metres from the beach and a 15-minute drive from Santa Eulària des Riu. This charming hotel offers views of the surrounding hills. Each of its simply decorated rooms has a private bathroom. Spanish cuisine is served in the Jordi’s buffet restaurant. Guests can dine on the terrace overlooking the gardens. The hotel can arrange bicycle hire and provide information on nearby walking routes. Cala Mastella Beach is just 1.5 km from the Can Jordi, while Ibiza Town and its airport can be reached in 30 minutes by car.

name: Hostal Cala Boix
address: Cala Boix Bajos 22, 07850 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Offering charming rooms with Mediterranean Sea views, Hostal Cala Boix has a peaceful setting 50 metres from Cala Boix’s beaches. It offers a restaurant and a terrace offering views of the surrounding countryside. Guests can use recreational areas located 400 metres from the property and set among lovely, green gardens, overlooking the sea. Each bright, spacious room at Hostal Cala Boix has light, attractive décor with wooden finishes. Some overlook Cala Boix and the property’s gardens and feature a balcony. All have air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. You can enjoy traditional Ibizan cuisine in the Boix’s restaurant, which specialises in fish dishes and also offers vegetarian options. San Carlos is just 10 minutes’ drive from the guest house, while Santa Eulària des Riu is 12 km away. You can reach Ibiza Town in 40 minutes by car.

name: La Pandilla Ibiza
address: Carrer de Formentera 2-4, 07817 Sant Francesc de s'Estany
description: Set in Sant Francesc de s'Estany, 1.6 km from Es Cavallet Beach, La Pandilla Ibiza offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. 1.8 km from Las Salinas Beach and 2.8 km from Es Codolar Beach, the property provides a terrace and a bar. The accommodation features entertainment staff and free WiFi. At the hostel, every room includes a wardrobe. At La Pandilla Ibiza the rooms come with air conditioning and a private bathroom. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast is available every morning at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. You can play table tennis at La Pandilla Ibiza, and the area is popular for fishing and snorkelling. Ibiza Port is 10 km from the hostel, while Marina Botafoch is 11 km from the property. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 3 km from La Pandilla Ibiza.

name: rural property ideal for couples who enjoy the natural surroundings and tranquility.
address: Forada 13174, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: FINCA located in the interior of the island in San Rafael 12 km from Ibiza and 6 km from San Antonio surrounded by vineyards, fruit trees, organic farming, and small mountain pine makes the perfect place ideal for a relaxing and peaceful holiday. Rent for full double rooms with bath and terrace besides the many others that are in gardens and pool area, The house has 6 double bedrooms independent (bed linen and towels), large kitchen (dishwasher, refrigerator, cooking utensils etc) living room, barbecue, pool, gardens and terraces. There is free wiffi and tv. The house is located in a place easily accessible and close to anywhere else. At 800 meters there CanTixedo coffee bar where summer evenings you can enjoy live music while their delicious tapas and snacks are eaten.VRBO

name: All-Inclusive Life Premium Room; Double Whirlpool Tub with Sea View, and Balcony
address: Avda. Pedro Matutes Noguera, Playa, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: No description found

name: Can Gat
address: Carretera San Carlos, 07840 Sant Carles de Peralta, Ibiza Island
description: Casa Rural Can Gat features a swimming pool and outdoor tennis courts, as well as rooms with direct pool access. It also provides highchairs, a children's play area and luggage storage. There are a variety of facilities available to guests of the property, such as a safe, laundry facilities and a table tennis table. Pets are also welcome. Rooms at Casa Rural Can Gat include a power shower, a coffee maker and a complimentary fruit bowl. They are air conditioned and offer a private balcony, a mini bar and an iPod docking station. The property is under a 35-minute drive from Ibiza Airport. Ibiza Town and Es Canar are located a short drive away.Revato

name: Hotel Las Arenas
address: C/ Tit Livi, 14, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set overlooking the sea, this hotel is only a short walk away from Ca’n Pastilla beach. It is only 100 metres from the bus stop that takes you to Palma city centre. Palma Airport is 5 minutes' drive away. Hotel Las Arenas features an outdoor swimming pool and a terrace bar with sea views. There is also a buffet restaurant, and a lounge bar with music and shows. Las Arenas hotel is the ideal place to enjoy a holiday on the beach and in the Majorcan sunshine. From here you can also easily get to a variety of shops, and bars. Alternatively, the centre of Palma de Mallorca, the capital of the island is just a short bus ride away. There you can find numerous excellent bars, and a lively nightlife.

name: Hipotels Playa De Palma Palace
address: 7600 Avd. Fra Joan Llabres Playa De Palma, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in Playa de Palma, Hipotels Playa de Palma Palace & Spa features a garden, a terrace, an outdoor pool and a spa centre. There is free WiFi throughout. All rooms are spacious and have a balcony, a flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Some feature a seating area and views of the sea or the pool. The spa offers a range of beauty treatments, a hamman and a sauna for an extra cost. There is also a free hot tub and a fitness centre. Bike hire is available at this hotel and the area is popular for cycling. The hotel also offers car hire. Palma Aquarium is 2.6 km from Hipotels Playa de Palma Palace & Spa, while Playa de Palma Beach is 1 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 4 km from the property. Private parking is available on site.

name: Hipotels Gran Playa de Palma
address: Avenida Fra Joan Llabrés, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set in Playa de Palma, Hipotels Gran Playa de Palma boasts a seasonal outdoor pool and views of the sea. This modern hotel is 2 km from Aqualand El Arenal. Free WiFi is offered throughout. Featuring plenty of natural light, each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV and a bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms have a seating area. Hipotels Gran Playa de Palma has a restaurant where guests can enjoy a meal. The hotel also offers 24-hour front desk service. The area is an ideal destination for cycling lovers and the hotel has bicycles for rent. Car hire is available as well. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 8 km from the hotel.

name: THB Niagara
address: Padre Bartolome Salva, 5, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: THB Niagara features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Playa de Palma. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Guests can make use of a bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At THB Niagara every room comes with bed linen and towels. You can play table tennis at the accommodation, and car hire is available. Playa de Palma Beach is 200 metres from THB Niagara, while Calo de Sant Antoni Beach is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 6 km from the hotel.

name: BQ Belvedere Hotel
address: Mitja Lluna, 4, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set just 850 metres from Cala Mayor, BQ Belvedere Hotel offers a free shuttle service to Palmanova Beach and free parking. It features a large lagoon pool and 2 hot tubs. All of the rooms at BQ Belvedere Hotel come with a private balcony. They all have air conditioning, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi access. A regular entertainment programme is provided for children, including activities in the kids’ pool and live shows. A mini club is also available. All-inclusive accommodation is offered at a good price at the hotel. The Belvedere has a large garden area and sun terrace with snack-bar service, as well as a buffet restaurant. There is also a private bicycle parking. BQ Belvedere Hotel is 4 km from central Palma de Mallorca and less than 15 km from Son Sant Joan Airport. The shops of Cala Mayor are only 500 metres away.

name: Palau Sa Font
address: Carrer Apuntadors, 38, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The boutique hotel Palau Sa Font is a beautifully renovated 16th-century palace set in the historic centre of Palma, near the Cathedral and the beach. It features comfortable rooms with free Wi-Fi and distinctive art displayed on each of the room doors. Located a walking distance from the city's cultural sights, the port and the shopping district of Paseo Borne and Jaume III, the hotel is only 5 to 10 minutes' walk from the trendy area of Santa Catalina. All rooms at the Palau Sa Font are elegant and well-equipped. There is air conditioning, cable TV and a minibar. Bathrooms include a hairdryer. The hotel's lookout tower offers panoramic views of the cathedral and the old city. There is also a terrace with a small swimming pool. Guests can also use a shared computer with internet access. The property serves a delicious breakfast with a unique Mallorcan touch. There is also a bar open all day. This pet-friendly and smoke-free hotel combines practical facilities with attractive architecture. Bicycle and car rental are available on site.

name: Bo Hotel Palma
address: Carrer Jaume Ferrer 2, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Offering a sun terrace and hot tub, BO Hotel Palma is located in Palma de Mallorca in the Majorca Region. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Enjoy a cup of coffee while looking out at the sea or city. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom. Extras include bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. Superior rooms have a spa bath. The hotel features free WiFi throughout the property. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. The hotel offers a continental breakfast. The area is popular for golfing and cycling. The hotel also offers bike hire. Palma Yacht Club is 500 metres from BO Hotel Palma, while Palma Port is 500 metres away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 8 km from the property.

name: Universal Hotel Neptuno - Adults Only
address: Calle Llaut 34, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This hotel enjoys a fantastic position right on the beachfront at Majorca’s Playa de Palma. Its 2 outdoor pools overlook the glistening Mediterranean Sea. At the Neptuno you can work up a sweat in the sauna or gym before cooling off in the outdoor hot tub or swimming pool. There is also an indoor heated pool open in April and October for the guests. You can also choose to simply relax on a sun lounger on the terrace. In the evening, try a delicious meal in the cafe-restaurant before enjoying a refreshing drink in the lounge bar. Majorca’s nearby capital of Palma is an ideal daytrip from this hotel. This historic city is known as one of the most picturesque in Spain. It 1 outdoor pool overlooks the glistening Mediterranean Sea. This seasonal hotel is open between February and November.

name: Hotel Playa Golf
address: Carretera Del Arenal 45, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hotel Playa Golf is located on Playa de Palma Beach, 10 minutes’ drive outside Palma. It offers an outdoor pool, spa, fitness centre and air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony. Rooms at the Playa Golf are bright and feature simple, comfortable décor. They are equipped with satellite TV and the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer. The hotel has a buffet restaurant as well as two bar-restaurants. There are also 3 bars with a terrace, including one with a Balinese theme. Other services at the property include bicycle parking for an additional cost. Leisure facilities at the Playa Golf Hotel include tennis courts. There is also a car rental service and staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about Mallorca. Puntiró and Marriot’s Son Antem Golf Courses are both around 20 minutes’ drive from the hotel. You can drive to Palma Airport in just 10 minutes.

name: Hotel Timor
address: Calle Montemar, 12, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hotel Timor is a 4-star hotel located 150 metres from the beach in Playa de Palma. It offers a wide range of leisure facilities including outdoor and indoor swimming pools. Air-conditioned rooms at the Timor hotel feature a private terrace, some of them with spectacular views of Palma de Mallorca Bay. They come with a flat-screen satellite TV and a bathroom with hairdryer. There is also a mini fridge and free Wi-Fi. The area around the outdoor swimming pool has a snack bar, hammocks and loungers, while the indoor swimming pool features a sauna, a hot tub and a gym. Other facilities at Hotel Timor include a buffet restaurant, a paddle court and a games room. There is a discotheque and a daily entertainment programme. Guests practicing bicycle touring can store their bikes in the special garage. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 15 minutes’ drive away.

name: Bq Aguamarina Boutique Hotel
address: Carrer de Sant Antoni de la Platja, 41, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: BQ Aguamarina Boutique Hotel is in Can Pastilla, overlooking Cala Estancia Beach. It offers air-conditioned rooms with a welcome gift and private balconies, most with sea views. Free WiFi is available. This charming boutique hotel is close to Palma de Mallorca Airport. It is 12 km to the centre of Palma and there are regular buses from near the hotel. BQ Aguamarina Boutique Hotel has a bar and a buffet restaurant. Guests are also welcome to enjoy a rooftop pool and bar, at BQ Lounge. The hotel has a 24-hour front desk. Bicycle rental and luggage storage are offered. For reservations of more than 5 rooms, special conditions will apply; The establishment may contact the client to request a prepayment. The establishment may cancel a group reservation if it is suspected of being fraudulent.

name: THB El Cid
address: Calle Vaixell 2, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This recently refurbished holiday resort has a fantastic seafront location in a beautiful Mediterranean setting, conveniently positioned just a short drive from the airport. It has free Wi-Fi. THB El Cid - Adults Only, with its peaceful, seaside location, offers well-appointed accommodation, sea views and great facilities and offers a great base while you enjoy all Majorca has to offer. You will never be short of things to do at this complex that features 3 swimming pools (one heated), gardens, a tennis court, a bicycle garage and table-tennis. Guests will also find a sauna, steam bath and a gym. Seasonal hotel: open from February to October.

name: Concepció by Nobis, Palma, a Member by Design Hotels
address: Carrer De La Concepció 34, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Concepcio by Nobis, Palma, a Member of Design Hotels has a fitness centre, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Palma de Mallorca. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 400 metres from the city centre and 1.8 km from Playa Ca'n Pere Antoni. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. Concepcio by Nobis, Palma, a Member of Design Hotels offers a sauna. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Palma Yacht Club, Palma Port and Passeig del Born Avenue. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 9 km from Concepcio by Nobis, Palma, a Member of Design Hotels.

name: Antigua Palma Casa Noble
address: Calle Del Sol 1, 07001 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Well located in the Old Town of Palma de Mallorca, Hotel Antigua Palma - Casa Noble provides air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool, hammam and a 24-hour front desk. Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. At Hotel Antigua Palma - Casa Noble each room has a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. A buffet breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Guests can enjoy the spa and wellness centre, take a dip into the indoor pool, organise trips at the tour desk, or rent a car to explore the surroundings. Popular points of interest near Hotel Antigua Palma - Casa Noble include Plaza Mayor, Palma Cathedral and Palma Convention Centre. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 9 km from the hotel.

name: Copaiba by Honne Hotels
address: Carrer de Villagarcía de Arosa, 24, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Copaiba by Honne Hotels features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a shared lounge and terrace in Playa de Palma. With a restaurant, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Guests can make use of a bar. All units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Copaiba by Honne Hotels provides certain units with pool views, and rooms have a balcony. At the accommodation every room has bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available daily, and includes buffet, vegetarian and gluten-free options. Languages spoken at the reception include German, English and Spanish. Playa de Palma Beach is 500 metres from Copaiba by Honne Hotels, while Can Pastilla Beach is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 4 km from the hotel.

name: Mhouse Boutique Hotel Palma
address: Carrer De Can Maçanet, 1 A, 07003 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This central boutique hotel is 100 metres from Palma de Mallorca's Plaza de España and Sóller Train Station. Rooms come equipped with free internet, rainfall showers and Smart TV with satellite channels. MHOUSE Boutique Hotel Palma is set around a charming indoor courtyard, where meals and cocktails are served in summer. This hotel is open throughout the year. Elegant rooms at the MHOUSE Boutique Hotel Palma feature air conditioning, a minibar, Marshall Bluetooth speakers and a free laptop safe and coffee machine. Some overlook the courtyard, and others have city views. The hotel's restaurant offers creative Mediterranean dishes. There is a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. Private parking is available for an extra charge. Palma Cathedral and the city's old town are 900 metres away. Access to public transport is available nearby.

name: Brondo Architect Hotel
address: Carrer Can Brondo, 4, 07001 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This hotel is located in central Palma’s charming Old Town, just 10 minutes’ walk from the Cathedral. The Architect Hotel combines Mallorcan architecture with Bohemian design. The hotel consists of 2 buildings, one of them with a lift. Some suites at Brondo Architect Hotel feature themed décor, with wooden floors and natural light. Each one comes with free WiFi, flat-screen satellite TV, and a bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries. Suites and some of the Premium Rooms have a private terrace. Brondo Architect Hotel has a fitness centre which offers personalised training and relaxation programmes. It also has a roof terrace with sofas where you can relax in the sun. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about Mallorca. They also provide booking a table at a restaurant, tickets to live shows and other events. The emblematic Bar Bosch is just 50 metres from Brondo Architect Hotel. Palma Airport is just 12 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hotel Cabot Playa Grande - Adults Only
address: Carrer Aguamarina 8, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hotel situated in a pedestrian street that gives access to Playa de Palma beach, only 20 metres away. Excellent connection by bus with the capital Palma. The hotel is 4 km from the airport. The fifty four rooms are distributed of five floors, and the majority have a terrace. Facilities also include an air conditioned dining room and a lounge-bar with terrace. This is ideal accommodation to enjoy a holiday in the sun with the beach at close hand, and good transport connections with Palma, mean you can easily visit other towns on the island. The hotel also has a car hire service.

name: Melia South Beach
address: Avenida Notario Alemany, Nº 1, Calvià Beach Resort, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set on the beachfront at Calvia Beach, Meliá South Beach features 4 seasonal outdoor pools and stylish rooms with free WiFi. The hotel offers an a la càrte restaurant,The Cape Nao Beach Club. Each spacious room at Meliá South Beach has bright, contemporary décor. There is air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a minibar. The private bathroom includes free organic toiletries, plus bathrobe and slippers. Meliá South Beach's poolside bar offers Spanish tapas, fresh seafood and other light dishes. Restaurants, bars and cafés can also be found by the seafront. It is located next to Nikki Beach Club & Restaurant, The hotel Yhi Spa features unique beauty treatments and massage services and a fitness room. Free yoga and pilates classes are also included. One of the pools is adults-only, where you can find Balinese beds to relax on, another one is only for the level guests and the other pool is for children. Room service is available 24 hours. The centre of Palma is 15 km from the Meliá South Beach, while the city’s airport can be reached in 20 minutes by car. The hotel also offers a private jet service. You can drive to both Puerto Portals and Puerto Adriano within 15 minutes.

name: Summum Prime Boutique Hotel
address: Calle Concepcion 26, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set in Palma de Mallorca's Old Town, 0.5 km from Passeig del Born, Summum Prime Boutique Hotel features a sun terrace with a small pool and a spa centre. Palma Cathedral is 0.7 from the property, while Ca'n Pere Antoni Beach is 2,6 km away. Set within the 15th-century Ca'n Berga-Ladaria Palace, Summum Prime Boutique Hotel offers rooms with flat-screen satellite TV. Each room has a private bathroom with bathrobes and slippers. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property and guests can enjoy the on-site bar. The hotel also offers bike hire. Palma Yacht Club is 900 metres from Summum Prime Boutique Hotel, while Cala Major Beach is 4.1 km away. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 8 km from the property.

name: Puro Grand Hotel
address: Carrer Del Forn de la Gl Ria 5, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Conveniently situated in Palma de Mallorca, Puro Grand Hotel provides air-conditioned rooms, a garden and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can make use of a bar. At the hotel, each room is equipped with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The rooms have a safety deposit box, while some rooms are equipped with a terrace. Guest rooms will provide guests with a minibar. Guests at Puro Grand Hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Playa Ca'n Pere Antoni, Palma Yacht Club and Palma Port. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca, 8 km from Puro Grand Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Be Live Experience Costa Palma
address: Calle Guillen Díaz Playa, 2, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set on Cala Major Beach, Hotel Be Live Experience Costa Palma is a hotel with attractive rooms with balconies. It features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool. Hotel Be Live Experience Costa Palma's air-conditioned rooms have modern décor and flat-screen TV. A minibar is available at an extra charge. Guests can enjoy a range of Mediterranean cuisine in the buffet restaurant, which offers live show cooking. There is also a bar. Guests will also find eating options at the complex's Plaza area, including The Bakery, Sports Bar and Burger & Pizzeria. The Hotel Be Live Experience Costa Palma is within 200 metres of San Augustí Marina. The centre of Palma is 6 km away and you can drive to Palma Airport in 20 minutes.

name: Helios Mallorca Hotel & Apartments
address: Carrer de la Carabela, 7, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set within gardens, Helios Mallorca is located just off Palma Beach and offers rooms with air conditioning and a balcony. The outdoor pool is surrounded by a sun terrace. Hotel Helios Mallorca includes an indoor swimming pool. Mini golf and table tennis facilities are also available, and the hotel provides entertainment every day. This charming hotel is well equipped to welcome cycling lovers. It offers a large garage for bicycles as well as an area to clean them. The buffet restaurant includes live cooking and serves a choice of regional and international dishes. During summer months, guests can enjoy drinks and snacks on the outdoor terrace. Helios Hotel Mallorca sits next to Palma Aquarium. Buses leave from outside the hotel, with routes to Palma City Centre and Palma de Mallorca Airport.

name: Hotel Pabisa Sofia
address: C/ San Ramon Nonato, 23, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in Playa de Palma, 2 km of Palma Aquarium, Pabisa Sofia provides a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. At the hotel, each air-conditioned room is fitted with a desk and private bathroom. Rooms offer sea, mountain or pool views, subject to availability. Pabisa Sofia 3* Sup offers several packages that include access to discos, aquariums, waterparks and golf courses. The area is popular for cycling and the hotel offers special services for cyclists, including bike storage. A 20-minute bus ride will take you to Palma centre. Playa de Palma Beach is 400 metres from Pabisa Sofia. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 3 km from the property.

name: Meliá Calviá Beach
address: Calle Violeta 1, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Offering impressive sea views from its setting, the stylish beachfront hotel Meliá Calviá Beach features 3 outdoor swimming pools, 1 heated indoor pool and direct access to the beach. Each of its air-conditioned rooms has a balcony. Rooms are decorated in an elegant, contemporary style. All accommodation offers satellite TV and a minibar. Rooms overlook the sea, gardens or pool area. The hotel features spacious terraces with sea and pool view, as well as 2 restaurants - a la carte and buffet style - offering international cuisine. There is also a pool bar and a lounge bar with a wide range of snacks and drinks. Set in attractive gardens, Meliá Calviá Beach has a large sun terrace with loungers. The hotel offers a lagoon-style pool, one pool for kids, one exclusive pool for the Level Clients and one indoor pool. There is a daily entertainment programme for adults and children, and guests can also relax at the YHI Spa. Meliá Calviá Beach also offers guests special rates for Katmandu Park. The hotel also offers The Level personalized service in some of the hotel’s rooms. This service includes, among others, private reception space, express check-in and check-out, access to a private pool, free usage of superior amenities, pillow menu and a la carte breakfast service in the room. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from the centre of Magalluf and there is a selection of golf courses within 5 km of the hotel. Palma and its airport can be reached in 25 minutes, by car.

name: Ur Palacio Avenida - Adults Only
address: C/ Del Marquès de la Fontsanta, 2, 07005 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Palacio Avenida occupies a famous cinema, built in 1942. It offers meeting rooms and stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi, flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom. Palacio Avenida is in Palma's main business area, and just 300 metres from the city's main shopping and commercial area. The Cathedral and Parc de la Mar are 10 minutes’ walk away. The rooms at the Palacio Avenida were designed by Bruno Borrione, from the Philippe Starck studio. Satellite channels are available in all rooms. Soller Train Station and Palma’s Central Bus Station are within 100 metres, as is the Parc de les Estacions. You can drive to Palma Airport in 10 minutes.

name: Hotel Negresco - Adults Only
address: Neopatria, 2, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Situated on the seafront in Playa de Palma, Negresco has an outdoor pool. All of the air-conditioned rooms offer full or side sea views. The airport is just 5 km away. The rooms have satellite TV, private balconies and double-glazing. Free WiFi is available in public areas. Negresco has a bar and a restaurant serving buffet breakfast and dinner. There is a large terrace by the pool where you can enjoy a drink. The terrace also has free loungers. On-site parking and spa are available at an extra cost. The Negresco can also arrange car hire.

name: Hotel Mirador
address: Paseo Maritimo 10, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The Hotel Mirador offers wonderful views across Palma Harbour, towards Palma Cathedral. It has a spa, and air-conditioned rooms with large windows, satellite TV and free WiFi. All of the spacious, soundproofed rooms have telephones, safes and a small fridge. They have white walls, and most have balconies. Rooms include free access to the spa including a heated whirlpool, sauna and Turkish baths. The Hotel Mirador offers car hire. The hotel’s buffet restaurant offers a breakfast. The historic centre of Palma de Mallorca, including the Cathedral, is about 1.5 km away. There is a regular bus service to the airport leaving from outside the hotel.

name: Hotel Basilica
address: Carrer de Can Troncoso 3, 07001 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Situated conveniently in Palma de Mallorca, Hotel Basilica offers air-conditioned rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. Private parking can be arranged and subject to reservation. At the hotel, rooms include a wardrobe. At Hotel Basilica all rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. The accommodation offers a continental or buffet breakfast. Hotel Basilica offers a sun terrace. Es Molinar Beach is 1.9 km from the hotel, while Palma Yacht Club is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca, 9 km from Hotel Basilica, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel San Lorenzo - Adults Only
address: C/San Lorenzo 14, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This boutique hotel is set in a traditional Majorcan manor house with an outdoor swimming pool. It features spacious and uniquely decorated rooms. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. Hotel San Lorenzo has an elegant Art Deco bar where guests can enjoy a drink. Smoking is only permitted in the hotel’s garden. Situated in the centre of Palma in the old Sant Pere district, San Lorenzo is a 5-minute walk from the elegant Jaume III Avenue. The property is also just a few minutes’ walk from Sa Llonja with many bars and restaurants.

name: Hm Dunas Blancas
address: Calle Trasimeno 12, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: HM Dunas Blancas Hotel is 50 metres from Mallorca’s Playa de Palma Beach. It offers 2 seasonal outdoor pools, and is 100 metres from bus stops for Palma Airport and centre. Air-conditioned rooms at the HM Dunas Blancas have a private balcony. They are also heated and come with satellite TV and a private bathroom. You can hire the safe. The hotel’s buffet restaurant features show cooking. There is also a poolside café-bar and packed lunches can be requested. You can play table tennis and darts in the games room, and there is a lounge with satellite TV. There is a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. Palma city centre is a 15-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Calatrava
address: Plaza Llorenc Villalonga 8, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located next to Palma’s Parque del Mar and the old city walls, Hotel Calatrava features a free spa and stylish rooms. Set in the old town, it serves breakfast on its terrace, offering views of the Mediterranean Sea. Each spacious room at Hotel Calatrava features chic, modern décor. All rooms have free Wi-Fi, a minibar, air conditioning, a Smart flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with bathrobes, slippers, free toiletries, a hairdryer with diffuser and a hairstraightener. They offer lovely views of Palma's old town, the bay or Parque del Mar. The hotel's Calatrava Gastro-Gourmet offers a variety of seasonal and traditional Mallorcan products. You can enjoy drinks, homemade pastries and snacks in the interior lounge or in the terrace. The free spa, for private use, features a Finnish sauna, a hot tub, treatment cabins and sensation showers with aromatherapy. Pilates and yoga classes are also available under request. Palma Cathedral and Almudaina Palace are within 350 metres of the Calatrava. Palma’s marina and seafront promenade can be reached in 15 minutes by foot.

name: Hotel Saratoga
address: Paseo De Mallorca, 6, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in the centre of Palma de Mallorca, the luxurious Saratoga hotel has a rooftop pool with beautiful city views. It has been renewed and it features free Wi-Fi throughout. The hotel is located 5 minutes’ walk from the Contemporary Art Museum, the port and Palma Cathedral. It is also just 60 metres from the exclusive Jaime III shopping avenue. The spacious and elegant rooms at the Saratoga have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and air conditioning in summer and heating in winter. Most rooms have a private balcony. Enjoy the swimming pool located on the rooftop with an amazing view to the port of Palma and the Bellver Castle or have a quiet time on the two other pool areas, which are available on the ground floor even in Winter since there is a heated one. In the same area you can find the fitness room and the Spa, where you can relax while having a massage*. Spa threatments under availability and additional cost*. Bringing a car shouldn't be a problem since there is a private underground parking at the property, there is an additional cost for using it and It is subject to availability and request.

name: Nou Baleares
address: Plaza de las Columnas, 07006 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Nou Baleares has a restaurant, outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and bar in Palma de Mallorca. All rooms boast a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk. The rooms at the hotel have air conditioning. Guests at Nou Baleares can enjoy a continental breakfast. The accommodation offers a terrace. Palma Yacht Club is 3.2 km from Nou Baleares, while Palma Port is 3.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 9 km from the hotel.

name: Hm Balanguera Beach- Adults Only
address: Calle Marbella, 35, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: HM Balanguera Beach is situated metres from popular Palma Beach and within 5 km of Aeropuerto de Palma. The hotel is a convenient base from which to enjoy Majorca's great climate. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. All the rooms are en suite and many have their own balcony. Although the beach is just steps away, the complex also has a swimming pool with a bar service. Breakfast, lunch and dinner is served as a buffet, and the dining room is non-smoking. Palma Beach offers an enjoyable base for a holiday given the range of activities on offers from water sports to a walk along the seafront promenade. Palma city is approximately 20 minutes' drive away.

name: Palma Suites
address: Plaça Mercadal, 8, 07002 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set in Palma’s old town, Palma Suites offers modern, air-conditioned suites with a fully equipped kitchen and free WiFi. It features a roof terrace and a gym. Featuring Nordic-style dècor, each suite is equipped with a kitchen with a microwave and dishwasher, a lounge-dining area with sofas, flat-screen satellite TV and a safe. They feature heated flooring and individually controlled heating. Different cleaning services are provided according to the length of stay. There is a café-bar on site and breakfast is offered upon request. Many dining options, bars and shops can be found in the area surrounding Palma Suites. Club Náutico is 15 minutes’ walk from the suites. Palma Beach is 2 km away and Palma Airport is 9 km from Palma Suites. Public parking is available 150 metres away and for an extra cost.

name: Hesperia Ciudad de Mallorca
address: Francisco Vidal Sureda, 24, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set in attractive gardens in the residential area of La Bonanova, Hesperia Ciudad de Mallorca features an outdoor seasonal swimming pool with sun loungers.
