name: Hostal Lido
address: 16 Carrer Germà Bianor, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hostal Lido is just 50 metres from S’Arenal’s Playa de Palma Beach, 10 minutes’ drive from Palma Airport. It offers an Oriental-style tea room and rooms with a private balcony. The rooms at the Lido feature tiled floors and simple décor. Each one comes with a private bathroom and a safe. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Mallorca. Internet access is also available in the lobby area. Maioris and Son Gual Golf Clubs are both around 15 minutes’ drive from the Lido. It is 50 metres from a bus stop which offers connections to the airport and the centre of Palma.

name: Hotel Eden Soller
address: Es Traves, 26, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This seafront hotel with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms. The Sóller tramway to Sóller and Palma stops just outside the hotel. Hotel Eden’s rooms feature tiled flooring, air conditioning and heating. All have satellite TV and a private bathroom with bath, toiletries and a hairdryer. WiFi is free throughout the hotel. All rooms include an empty fridge free of charge. Hotel Eden’s restaurant serves a buffet breakfast, lunch and dinner. There is also a lounge-bar and a garden-terrace with views of the bay. Staff are happy to provide information about nearby activities, including water sports, hiking or boat excursions. Car and bicycle rental are also available. Palma de Mallorca is about 30 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hotel Raxa
address: Garza, 14, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Situated just 100 metres from Palma Beach, Hotel Raxa offers rooms with a balcony and a TV. It features a seasonal outdoor pool, surrounded by a sun terrace and loungers. A buffet breakfast is served at Hotel Raxa, and the restaurant offers Spanish and international cuisine. Guests can have breakfast by the pool, lunch is also available. Hotel Raxa includes a garden area. There are also table tennis facilities and a pool table. The seafront promenade in Sometimes is just a 2-minute walk from the hotel, Palma de Mallorca Airport is 1 km away.

name: The Boc Hostels City - Albergue Juvenil
address: Carrer de Son Pontivic 16, 07006 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The Boc Hostels - City Albergue Juvenil has a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a shared lounge and terrace in Palma de Mallorca. Boasting a bar, the hostel is close to several noted attractions, around 1.4 km from Playa Ca'n Pere Antoni, 2 km from Es Molinar Beach and 1.3 km from Palma Intermodal Station. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a shuttle service, a shared kitchen and free WiFi throughout the property. All guest rooms at the hostel feature air conditioning and a wardrobe. Popular points of interest near The Boc Hostels - City Albergue Juvenil include Passeig del Born Avenue, Palma Convention Centre and Plaza Mayor. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 7 km from the accommodation.

name: Agroturismo Finca Son Amora
address: Avenida Del Cid km 1'2, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Situated in Palma de Mallorca, 11 km from Palma Yacht Club, Agroturismo Finca Son Amora features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a children's playground. Each room comes with a patio with pool views and free WiFi. At the inn the rooms come with air conditioning, a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a terrace with a mountain view. A continental breakfast is available each morning at Agroturismo Finca Son Amora. Palma Port is 12 km from the accommodation, while Son Vida Golf is 16 km from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 4 km from Agroturismo Finca Son Amora.

name: We Hostel Palma - Albergue Juvenil
address: Carrer Germans Schembri, 1, 07014 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Boasting a terrace, a bar as well as on-site dining, We Hostel Palma Albergue Juvenil is a youth hostel situated in Palma de Mallorca, a 15-minute walk from Palma Yacht Club. 2 km from Cala Major Beach, the property is also 2.1 km away from Palma Port. The property is non-smoking throughout. At the hostel, the rooms include a wardrobe. The property provides coffee machine and a kitchenette with a microwave. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the property. Speaking English and Spanish, staff are ready to help around the clock at the reception. Lío Mallorca is 22 metres from We Hostel Palma. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 9 km from the property.

name: Zel Mallorca
address: Carrer Duc Estremera, 16, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located on Majorca's south coast, in the Palmanova beach area, Zel Mallorca exudes Mediterranean charm and essence. The unique entrance is a distinctive feature: its courtyard welcomes you in a cozy atmosphere. The rooms are designed in a locally inspired style and offer stunning sea views. Its swimming pools offer sea views, one of them has direct access to the beach. The hotel encourages a healthy, active and relaxed lifestyle and features a fully equipped gym. To maximize your wellbeing there is a spa and a full activities programme, which includes yoga retreats and fitness. A wide range of sports activities are also available, such as tennis, golf, scuba diving, etc. Reconnect with your inner self at Zel Mallorca, your Mediterranean home

name: Aubamar Suites & Spa
address: Calle Misión de San Diego 17, 07600 Llucmajor, Mallorca
description: Aubamar Suites & Spa features a restaurant, outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and bar in Playa de Palma. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. At the hotel each room comes with air conditioning, a desk, a balcony with pool view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. The rooms are fitted with a safety deposit box and certain rooms include sea views. Guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a coffee machine. Guests at Aubamar Suites & Spa can enjoy a continental or a buffet breakfast. Guests can relax in the spa and wellness centre, including a sauna, and a hot tub, or in the garden. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Playa de Palma Beach, and Calo de Sant Antoni Beach. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 4 km from Aubamar Suites & Spa.

name: Hostal Villa Maruja
address: Carretera Militar 249, 07600 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Family managed establishment with excellent quality-price. Located in El Arenal, just a 3-minute walk from Playa de Palma Beach, and surrounded by bars, restaurants, pubs, and nightclubs, Hostal Villa Maruja offers a tourist information desk, and free luggage storage. Free private parking is available for bikes. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. All bright rooms at the Villa Maruja Hostal have a flat-screen TV, air conditioning, ceiling fan, and heating. Most of them feature a balcony or a terrace. The bathroom comes with a hairdryer. Next to the reception, the bar-cafeteria with lounge and terrace where you can enjoy a continental breakfast, drinks and snacks. Hostal Villa Maruja is 7.7 km from Son Sant Joan Airport and 10 km from the city of Palma de Mallorca. The nearest bus stop is 50 metres from the property and it allows quick and convenient access to the airport and to the city centre. Club Nàutic S'Arenal is 1.7 km away. Aqualand is 3.2 km from Hostal Villa Maruja, while Palma Aquarium is 5.4 km from the property.

name: Mix Peru Playa
address: Carrer de la Mar d'Aral, 12, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hotel Mix Peru Playa is 5 minutes’ walk from Playa de Palma Beach and a 10-minute drive from Palma town centre. It offers a 24-hour bar and rooms with a private balcony. The rooms at the Mix Peru Playa feature tiled floors and simple décor. Each one comes with a private balcony and a safe. The hotel serves a daily buffet breakfast and there is a variety of restaurants within a 5-minute walk. Riu Center Shopping Centre is also 5 minutes’ walk away from the Mix Peru Playa Hotel. Megapark Nightclub is 15 minutes’ walk away from the Mix Peru Playa. You can drive to Palma Airport in around 10 minutes.

name: Azuline Hotel Bahamas y Bahamas II
address: Avenida De Europa, 07600 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: AzuLine Hotel Bahamas is 8 minutes’ walk from the beach in S’Arenal, just 10 minutes’ drive from Palma Airport. It offers an outdoor pool, hot tub and air-conditioned rooms with a balcony. A free daily shuttle service to Arenal Beach is offered. All rooms at the azuLine Hotel Bahamas have satellite TV and most rooms have views of the sea, swimming pool or pine forest. The hotel offers a varied entertainment programme for adults and children. There is also a games room with a pool table and arcade games. The buffet restaurant at azuLine Hotel Bahamas serves international food, and there are 2 bars. There is a variety of restaurants and bars on the seafront promenade, located under 10 minutes’ walk away. For cyclists, the property offers a bicycle workshop and washing station, bicycle storage and advice on cycling routes.

name: Hsm Son Veri
address: Av. Europa 3, 07600 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Located just 5 minutes’ walk from Arenal Beach, the modern HSM Son Veri features an outdoor pool, poolside bar and sun terrace with views of Palma Bay. Air-conditioned rooms include a balcony and free WiFi. Decorated in a modern, minimalist style, each one also comes with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. HSM Son Veri offers a buffet restaurant with a wide variety of dishes. It has thematic buffets several times a week, and also show cooking. Aquacity Water Park is just 10 minutes’ walk from the property. Club Nautico S´Arenal Yacht Club can be reached in a 5-minute walk. Palma is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Don Miguel Playa
address: Mar Del Japón 2, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hotel Don Miguel is located 650 metres from the beach in the Las Maravillas area of Palma. It offers an outdoor pool, sports area and air-conditioned rooms with a balcony. The sports area at the Don Miguel features 3 tennis courts, a football pitch and a mini golf course. There is also a fitness centre, as well as table tennis and pool tables. The hotel’s restaurant serves international food. There is also a bar where you can get a snack or a drink. The rooms at Don Miguel have tiled floors and typical beach-style décor. Each one has satellite TV and a private bathroom. Palma Airport is just 5 km from the Hotel Don Miguel. Son Gual Golf Course is around 10 minutes’ drive away.

name: Palacio Can Marqués
address: Calle Apuntadores,15, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located 5 minutes walk from the port of Palma, is the Palacio Can Marqués de Palma de Mallorca, which is an architectural jewel from the 18th century located in the Lonja neighborhood in the old town. It stands out for its spectacular garden and its inverted imperial staircase. This place offers a gym and a garden. The property has a restaurant, a terrace and a bar. Set in the Old Town district, the hotel is within a 6-minute walk of Palma Yacht Club. At the hotel, each room has a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Some rooms include a kitchenette with a fridge. Guests at Palacio Can Marqués can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Around the clock assistance is available at the reception. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Passeig del Born Avenue, Palma Cathedral and Plaza Mayor. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 8 km from the property.

name: Hotel Marina Playa De Palma
address: Tokio, 2, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located on the beachfront and just 500 metres from El Arenal Marina, Hotel Marina Playa De Palma features an outdoor pool and sun terrace with sun loungers. Free Wi-Fi is available in all areas and rooms. Each room is air-conditioned and offers 2 single beds and a private bathroom with a shower. It also includes a TV and desk. All rooms have an individual terrace. There are various seafront bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walk of the property. Palma Aquarium is 3 km away. Palma Airport can be reached within a 15-minute drive by car.

name: Hotel Arcadia
address: Calle Cannes 23, 07600 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: With a stay at Hotel Arcadia in Palma de Mallorca, you'll be 4 mi (6.5 km) from Aqualand El Arenal and 8.5 mi (13.6 km) from Paseo Maritime. Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk.Hotels.com

name: The Boc Hostels Palma - Albergue Juvenil
address: C/ de l'Arxiduc Lluís Salvador 46, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Ideal for groups of friends, international travelers, backpackers, or athletes; they are children and young people up to 30 years old, or older than this age who have the hostel card of the Spanish Network of Hostels (REA) or any other type of accreditation that is recognized as valid. Get to know our educational project: Promote cultural exchange between young people from different countries, favoring integration between them through from the programs of cultural and sports activities that the hostel puts at the service of the guests. Our hostel works in collaboration with various exchange organizations, including CIEE (Council for Educational Exchanges Abroad) to facilitate accommodation for groups of young people foreigners who come to learn Spanish for long-term stays. We intend to create a pleasant atmosphere of coexistence during the stay of our guests promoting tolerance and respect. Raise awareness and promote customs and values that promote responsible habits for the care of the environment environment to the staff and our guests by recycling the waste generated by the Hostel as much as possible (Paper-cardboard, packaging, glass.) Ensure that the Shelter is a good example of "Good Practices" in waste management. Balearic Shelter Facilities License Registration number: XIJB/013. What are you waiting for? Come meet us! Located 4-minute walking from Palma Train and Bus stations, The Boc Palma is a youth hostel offering private rooms and rooms to share between 2, 4, or 6 people. It also offers its guests access to the shared terraces and rooftops. There is free WiFi throughout the facilities. There is a game room and a seating area. Guests have access to 2 shared kitchens and shared bathrooms. Rooms have individual bed-site lights, plugs, and a locker. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Cala Major Beach is a 15-minute drive from The Boc Palma and Son Sant Joan Airport is 11 km away.

name: Mll Sahara Nubia Gobi Bay Hotel
address: Carrer De Bartomeu Calafell, 23, 07600 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Located at the end of the renowned tourist resort El Arenal, this popular hotel is just a few steps away from the seemingly endless fine sandy beach of the renowned Playa de Palma. A plethora of bars, pubs, restaurants, shops and entertainment venues are in the surrounding area; the famous epicentre around the Balneario 6 is within walking distance. The renovated hotel complex consists of three buildings, which are between 30 and 70 m away from the Palma Bay Club, the main hotel features all of the services and amenities guests may use. These features include a lovely pool landscape, various bars and culinary options as well as several sports facilities on 23,300 m2.Each functional accommodation at the property is equipped in modern amenities, such as satellite TV, air conditioning and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. This hotel is a perfect place for young people and groups of friends looking for a fun-filled holiday under the sun.FarePortal

name: Hotel Selva Arenal
address: Carrer Girona 17, 07600 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Hotel Selva Arenal features a garden, a shared lounge and a sun terrace with swimming pool and continental breakfast in El Arenal. Featuring a bar, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 1.1 km from Calo de Sant Antoni Beach, 1.3 km from Sa Cova Baixa Beach and 1.4 km from Playa de Palma Beach. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar. At the hotel, the rooms include a desk. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, all units at Hotel Selva Arenal have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms have a patio. At the accommodation every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock. Playa Cala Blava is 2.6 km from Hotel Selva Arenal, while Sa Pesquera Plana is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 9 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Manaus
address: Carrer De Josep Maria Quadrado, 7, 07600 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: A few minutes walk to Majorcas Palma Beach and in a quiet area surrounded by woods, this hotel has a charming bar and restaurant to relax in as well as an outdoor pool. Enjoy a quiet read in the inviting lounge. Grab a snack from the cafe and enjoy wholesome meals in the Manaus's restaurant. During the summer months, sit back and watch the show-cooking. Spend afternoons soaking up the sunshine by the Manaus's pool and hot tub. Make the pleasant, 600-m stroll down to Palma Beach where you can have a refreshing dip in the Mediterranean and lie back on the sandy shores.

name: The Hype Beachhouse
address: Carrer de la Grua 2, 07608 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located 100 metres from Playa de Palma Beach, The Hype Beachhouse offers a rooftop pool, and air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. The units come with tiled floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The restaurant at the aparthotel serves Italian cuisine. If you would like to discover the area, cycling is possible in the surroundings. Can Pastilla Beach is less than 1 km from The Hype Beachhouse, while Cala Estancia Beach is 1.7 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 2 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Gracia
address: Berga 12, El Arenal, Llucmajor, Mallorca
description: Hotel Gracia is just 80 metres from the beach in Mallorca’s S’Arenal resort. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with a balcony, most of them with sea views. The hotel’s buffet restaurant serves Mediterranean food. There is also a bar-café selling snacks and drinks throughout the day. The Gracia has a TV lounge with sofas and satellite TV. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Mallorca Airport is just 10 minutes’ drive from the Gracia. You can drive to Palma town centre in around 15 minutes.

name: Hotel Kilimanjaro
address: Gran i General Consell, 47, 07600 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: This hotel is located close to the town centre, near the new commercial centre Arenal Park, where guests will discover countless shopping and entertainment facilities. The fine sand beach lies just 300 m away. Built in 1968, this beach hotel offers a foyer, a safe and TV room. Dining options include an air-conditioned restaurant with non-smoking area as well as a cosy bar. The simple rooms all come with an en-suite bathroom, a direct dial telephone and a safe. The hotel's outdoor complex comprises a swimming pool with separate children's pool as well as a sun terrace and a snack bar. 4 tennis and squash courts are to be found just 400 m from the hotel and other leisure activities such as horse riding, cycling, minigolf and various other water sports are on offer at local providers. There is a golf course some 6 km from the hotel.FarePortal

name: Bluesea Mediodia
address: San Cristobal,13, Llucmajor, Mallorca
description: Hotel Mediodia is located in the centre of El Arenal, 80 metres from the beach. It offers an outdoor swimming pool, a children's pool, free WiFi throughout and rooms with satellite TV. All rooms have air conditioning and private bathroom with a hairdryer. The Mediodia’s buffet restaurant serves breakfast and international cuisine for dinner. There is also a lounge-bar, and a TV and games room. The lively centre of El Arenal has many shops, bars and restaurants, and is just 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel. The town’s marina is less than 100 metres away, while Palma and its airport are 15 minutes’ drive from the Mediodia.

name: Hotel Cassandra
address: Avinguda Europa 6, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Property Location With a stay at Hotel Santa Monica in Playa de Palma (El Arenal), you'll be minutes from Aqualand and close to Port of El Arenal. This hotel is within close proximity of El Arenal Beach and Palma Aquarium.Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 204 guestrooms featuring minibars. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones and safes.Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities Enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace.Dining Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Santa Monica.Business, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, laundry facilities, and a safe deposit box at the front desk.WebBeds

name: Hotel Ipanema Beach
address: Antonio M. Alcover 11, S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Surrounded by the lush and verdant Son Veri Forest, this magnificent hotel offers quality accommodation in a beach resort of El Arenal. Situated within 16.5 kilometres to Palma city centre, the establishment is a perfect base for fun-filled holiday. It is also within walking distance to beautiful and seemingly endless sandy beach as well as close to vibrant nightlife, dining options and entertainment venues. Visitors will be enchanted by beautiful modern design and warm hospitality. The guestrooms are tastefully appointed, offering a peaceful shelter in which to totally relax after a long day of touring into the island. The hotel restaurant invites visitors to start their day with delicious and varied buffet-style breakfast and dine on local and international dishes. Patrons may have a cup of coffee or a selection of beverage at the cosy bar while the large outdoor swimming pool is a perfect option to freshen up on warm days.FarePortal

name: Ipanema Park
address: Calle Antonio Maria Alcover, 11, 07600 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Located in the quiet area of Son Veri El Arenal, the hotel is just 15-minute drive from the airport. Guests can explore the nearby points of interest, and most importantly, the fantastic beach with white sand and clear blue waters, they are located within a walking distance. Rooms at this hotel are bright and spacious, well-equipped with TV, air conditioning and a bathroom with hair dryer. After a light breakfast and a cup of coffee or tea, guests can opt to spend the day by the large outdoor pool of the complex, where to swim and lounge under the sun with a refreshing drink from the snack bar in hand. For the perfect ending of a perfect day, the on-site restaurant serves a variety of local and international dishes in a spacious and elegant setting.Viajes Exito Hotels

name: Beetroot
address: 9 Avinguda Europa, 07600 Llucmajor, Mallorca
description: Set in Llucmajor, less than 1 km from Calo de Sant Antoni Beach, Beetroot offers air-conditioned rooms and a terrace. Located around 1.2 km from Sa Cova Baixa Beach, the hotel with free WiFi is also 1.2 km away from Playa de Palma Beach. Palma Yacht Club is 17 km away and Palma Port is 17 km from the hotel. At the hotel, all rooms come with a balcony. The units at Beetroot come with a private bathroom equipped with a bath. Son Vida Golf is 23 km from the accommodation, while Golf Santa Ponsa is 35 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 9 km from Beetroot.

name: Js Palma Stay Adults Only
address: C/ Pins, 26, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Js Palma Stay Adults Only is just 80 metres from Mallorca’s C’an Pastilla Beach. The complex features 1 outdoor pools, 1 indoor pool, a sun terrace, gym, and a spa with a sauna. All air-conditioned rooms at the Js Palma Stay feature a private balcony or terrace. There is a private bathroom with shower. Towels and bed linen are included. The hotel’s buffet restaurant offers a variety of Spanish and European dishes. There is a bar and entertainment is provided, with evening shows several times a week. A laundry service is available.There is a 24-hour front desk. There are many shops, restaurants and bars in the surrounding streets. Palma de Mallorca is 8 km away.

name: Hotel Palladium
address: Paseo Mallorca, 40, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located just off Palma’s Avenida Jaime III shopping street, Hotel Palladium offers modern, air-conditioned rooms with city views and free WiFi. All rooms have satellite TV, and some have private balconies. The hotel features a striking, glass-fronted façade looking onto Paseo de Mallorca. There is a bar serving drinks until 22.00. Free indoor bike parking, equipped with security video cameras, is available for customers’ exclusive use. The Palladium is just 5 minutes’ walk from Palma’s contemporary arts centre, and 800 metres from the Cathedral. A bus service to the airport passes just outside the property. The commercial centre of the city is approximately 500 metres away, and here you can find a range of restaurants. Santa Catalina and La Lonja districts are also nearby. The nearest beach is a 5-minute drive away.

name: Bq Augusta Hotel
address: C/ Corb Marí, 22, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The BQ Augusta Hotel complex in La Bonanova is just 10 minutes’ drive from the centre of Palma de Mallorca and offers rooms, studios and apartments. It features an outdoor swimming pool with a sun terrace. All the spacious rooms at the BQ Augusta Hotel come with satellite TV. Some of the rooms feature views over the city of Palma from the balcony and the studios and apartments come with kitchenettes. Free WiFi is available. The BQ Augusta Hotel serves an extensive buffet breakfast. There is also a cafeteria for light meals and a bar where guests can relax. Friendly staff are happy to suggest nearby restaurants. Palma Port is just 300 metres away, while Bellver Park is about 500 metres away. The historic part of Palma is about 5 minutes’ drive away. There is on-site parking, subject to availability.

name: Melia Palma Bay
address: Calle Felicia Fuster 4, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Featuring a roof-top terrace with sea views and an outdoor pool, Melia Palma Bay offers accommodation next to Palma Convention Centre. Ca'n Pere Antoni Beach is 350 metres away. Rooms are bright and feature Scandinavian-style dècor. All have satellite TV and a bathroom with free toiletries and hairdryer. There is also a fitness centre at the property. Parking is available on site for an extra charge. Palma Yacht Club is 2.1 km from Melia Palma Bay, while Cala Major Beach is 5 km away. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 6 km from the property.

name: Isla Mallorca & Spa
address: Pilar Juncosa, 7, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Isla Mallorca & Spa is located in a quiet area of Palma de Mallorca. It offers an outdoor swimming pool, spa and chic rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. The hotel’s wellness spa has a sauna, Hammam and steam bath, and massages and other treatments are available. Use of the spa comes at an additional cost. The hotel also has a gym. The hotel's restaurant, Tragaluz, offers a range of Mallorcan, Spanish and international dishes. It has a terrace and large windows with views of the garden. The hotel is set in the residential area of Son Armadams, between the Pueblo Español and Bellver Castle. The seaside promenade is just 5 minutes’ walk away. Free parking is available in the streets near the hotel. The hotel reception offers car and bicycle rental service.

name: Hotel Seasun Aniram
address: Carrer De L'Albatros 11, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Featuring a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, bar and views of sea, Hotel Seasun Aniram is set in Playa de Palma. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is situated 500 metres from Palma Aquarium. The units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. At Hotel Seasun Aniram every room includes air conditioning and a private bathroom. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Hotel Seasun Aniram offers a sun terrace. Playa de Palma Beach is 1.5 km from the hotel. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 4.2 km from Hotel Seasun Aniram.

name: Hotel Costa Azul
address: Avenida Gabriel Roca, 7, 07014 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Stunning views of Palma Harbour can be enjoyed from the small pool on the third floor of Hotel Costa Azul. Free Wi-Fi, LED satellite TV and fridge are included in the bright, air-conditioned rooms. The hotel boasts a fully equipped gym with views of Palma Bay. The swimming pool is covered in winter, and you can also relax in the hotel’s sauna. The hotel’s modern café and terrace offer panoramic sea views. The restaurant is open for breakfast and dinner. Rooms at Costa Azul are modern and tastefully decorated. They come with a private bathroom, a desk and safe. Rooms with sea views can be booked. Set in front of Palma’s marina, Hotel Costa Azul is 9 km from Palma Airport. Direct buses to the airport and city centre stop right outside the hotel. Please note that the hotel does not offer airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel El Llorenç Parc de la Mar - Adults Only
address: Plaça de Llorenç Villalonga 4, 07001 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: El Llorenc Parc de la Mar - Adults Only (+16) is located in the centre of Palma de Mallorca, an 11-minute walk of Palma Port. Guests have free access to the fitness centre and to the spa, which includes a swimming pool, hot tub, hammam, showers, and sauna. The hotel also features a rooftop terrace with a 40 m² swimming pool that offers views of Palma bay. At the hotel, every room has a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Every room is equipped with air conditioning, and some rooms at El Llorenc have a balcony. An à la carte breakfast is served every morning. Guests can enjoy food cooked by Santi Taura at DINS restaurant. There is also a bar. Speaking Catalan, German and English, staff at the reception can help you plan your stay. Palma Yacht Club is a 14-minute walk from the accommodation. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 7 km away. This is a non- smoking hotel

name: Eix Alcudia Hotel +18
address: Teodoro Canet, 43, 07400 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: This traditional Mallorcan-style building consists of 4 floors set around an outdoor swimming pool and patio, surrounded by palm trees. The heated, air-conditioned rooms come with work desk and satellite TV. Hotel Eix Alcudia - Adults Only lies within 150 metres from the beach in Puerto de Alcúdia, in northern Mallorca. The Medieval town of Alcudia is less than 1 km away. Double rooms at the hotel offer a private terrace, some with pool views. All rooms are en suite, with amenities. Guests can enjoy meals at the hotel's restaurant. Other facilities at Hotel Eix Alcudia include showers on the ground floor for late departures. Secure bicycle storage and free outdoor parking are also available.

name: Bordoy Alcudia Port Suites
address: Calle Coral, 4, 07410 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Just 1 km from Alcudia’s historic centre, Bordoy Alcudia Port Suites boutique hotel has Wi-Fi access, a swimming pool and free spa access. Rooms and suites features Nordic-style dècor and come with air conditioning, wardrobe and a private bathroom with free toiletries and pool towels. Some feature a seating area and a hot tub. Bordoy Alcudia Port Suites has a terrace with loungers for sunbathing. The spa includes a sauna, hamman and hot tub. The à la carte restaurant offers international and vegetarian dishes and has outdoor seating. Bordoy Alcudia Port Suites is set a short distance from the harbour. Just 2 km away you will find a shopping centre and an ancient Roman amphitheatre.

name: Puig de Ros d'Alt
address: Camino Sa Torre, s/n, 07620 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: No description found

name: Hoposa Costa D'or - Adults Only
address: Lluch-Alcari, 07179 Deia, Mallorca
description: Set in pine forest and overlooking the Mediterranean Sea, this adults-only hotel is located near the small town of Deia. Costa D'or hotel is designed to blend in with the surrounding landscape. Stroll through the tranquil forest surrounding the property or down to the beautiful, secluded cove that is only a short walk away. You can also relax by the pool and take a dip to cool down on a hot summer's day. The beautiful mountain town of Valldemossa is a short drive from the hotel and is a must see in this region of Majorca. The hotel is also well-situated so you can easily get to the capital of the island Palma de Mallorca, and its airport.

name: Hilton Mallorca Galatzo
address: Carretera Palma-Andratx, Km 20, 07160 Peguera, Mallorca
description: Hilton Mallorca Galatzo is a tourist destination that prioritizes the well-being of its guests from arrival to departure. A restorative retreat where you can enjoy the Mediterranean climate and lifestyle during your stay on the island, whether it is a leisure or business trip. In the heart of nature, 20 minutes from Palma de Mallorca and 10 minutes from the marinas of Andratx and Puerto Portals, its 54,000 square meters of gardens promise guests relaxation and direct contact with the sea thanks to memorable views and the nearby beach of Paguera.Hilton

name: Hotel Seramar Comodoro Playa
address: Carrer Cala Blanca, 9, 07181 Palma Nova, Mallorca
description: Seramar Hotel Comodoro Playa is located on Son Matias Beach in Palma Nova, 15 minutes’ drive from Palma. It offers an outdoor pool, and rooms with private balconies and sea views. The air-conditioned rooms at the Seramar Hotel Comodoro Playa feature parquet floors and modern décor, a private bathroom and satellite TV. Seramar Hotel Comodoro Playa features a table tennis table and a 24-hour reception. Wi-Fi is available and free throughout the hotel. The hotel’s large restaurant serves international food. There is also a bar where you can get a snack or a drink. The lively resort of Magaluf is 1' minutes’ walk away. You can drive to Palma Airport in around 20 minutes.

name: Hotel Son Caliu Spa Oasis
address: Avenida De Son Caliu 8, 07181 Palma Nova, Mallorca
description: Son Caliu Hotel Spa Oasis is conveniently located in the popular Calvia area. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, postal service, 24-hour front desk are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as television LCD/plasma screen, additional bathroom, additional toilet, private pool, internet access wireless (complimentary). To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as yoga room, hot tub, fitness center, sauna, golf course (on site). No matter what your reasons are for visiting Majorca, Son Caliu Hotel Spa Oasis will make you feel instantly at home.priceline.com

name: Zoetry Mallorca Wellness & Spa
address: Camí De Sa Torre 8,7, 07609 Llucmajor, Mallorca
description: Located in the countryside in southeast Mallorca, this impressive 14th-century country house has 3 restaurants, 3 bars, 2 swimming pools, and a spa centre. It offers large rooms with a flat-screen TV and Wi-Fi access. One out of the three restaurants, is runned by michelin star chef Andreu Genestra. The property has two accommodation areas, Tramuntana and Ponent, featuring luxurious rooms and suites, as well as historic buildings such as the windmill, dating back to the fifteenth century, and the neo-Gothic chapel "La Gran Cristiana". The air-conditioned rooms at Zoetry Mallorca Wellnes & Spa Mallorca feature smart, modern décor. They are equipped with a kettle and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Zoetry Mallorca also offers yoga retreats, tennis courts, a football pitch and a running track. Zoetry Mallorca Wellnes & Spa is just 10 minute’ drive from the beautiful beaches of south Mallorca. Palma Airport is 22 km away. Endless-Privileges®Inclusions: such as early check in and late check out (subject to availability), mini bar daily replenished, personalised concierge services, gourmet à la carte dining options with an assortment of organic food and beverage selections, room service offered 24-hours with a selection of dishes, wines and beverages

name: Santa Ponsa Pins
address: Avinguda Del Rei Jaume I 115, Santa Ponsa, Mallorca
description: This Mediterranean-style hotel is set just 300 metres from the beach. It offers an outdoor swimming pool with sun terrace and comfortable rooms with a private terrace. The air-conditioned rooms at Santa Ponsa Pins feature functional décor. Each includes a rental safe, plasma satellite TV, a telephone and private bathroom with hairdryer. Breakfast is served in the hotel’s buffet restaurant and there is a cafeteria. Guests can relax in the TV and reading lounge, play pool and get tourist information from the 24-hour reception. Santa Ponsa Pins features, a meetings room and a bicycle garage. Santa Ponsa Pins is 5 minutes’ drive from Santa Ponsa Marina. There are numerous bars, restaurants and shops nearby and 3 golf courses within 10 minutes’ drive. The hotel is 6 km from lively Magaluf and Palma Nova and 18 km from Palma and its airport.

name: SENTIDO Diamant Hotel
address: Los Romeros, 10, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: Set next to Majorca’s picturesque Cala Agulla beach and surrounded by lush gardens, this family hotel provides facilities for a relaxing yet active holiday under the sun. Hotel Diamant has outdoor pools with sundecks, as well as an indoor pool. There is a gym and a sauna. Massage services are available for an extra charge. The air-conditioned rooms at the Diamant feature Mallorcan-style décor. Each one comes with a TV, a private bathroom and a balcony. Free Wi-Fi access is provided in the rooms. The hotel’s snack bar serves buffet meals of national and international dishes. There is also a bar where you can enjoy a drink in the sun. The hotel is in a large complex, sharing its facilities with the Aparthotel Diamant.

name: Monsuau Cala D'Or Hotel 4 Sup - Adults Only
address: Avenida Cala D'Or, 2, 07669 Cala d'Or, Mallorca
description: Sunprime Monsuau Hotel is located around 200 metres from the beach in Cala d’Or, on Mallorca’s south-eastern coast. The hotel has 2 swimming pools, a restaurant and sun terrace. There is a rooftop bar (open from June to September) and wellness center and spa. Standard rooms at the Sunprime Monsuau Hotel feature air conditioning, flat-screen cable TV, high-speed WiFi, safety deposit box, mini-fridge, kettle, iron & ironing board (on request), bathroom with shower and hairdryer, and balcony or terrace. Sunprime Monsuau Hotel offers a buffet breakfast and has an on-site bar. Other facilities include a 24-hour reception and a tour desk, a sky lounge and pool bar, fitness centre, aerobics, laundry service and a mini-market. There is occasional evening entertainment. Activities on offer in Cala d’Or include water-sports, tennis and golf. Guests can easily access the beaches of Cala Llonga and Cala Gran. Sunprime Monsuau is around an hour's drive from Palma and its airport. At 8 Km are Cala Mondrago Natural Park.

name: Son Julia Country House Hotel
address: Crta. De S'Arenal a Llucmajor, 07620 Llucmajor, Mallorca
description: A historic 15th-century mansion, beautifully restored into a splendid luxury rural establishment, situated close to Palma de Mallorca and the Mediterranean Sea, and with state-of-the-art facilities and an indoor heated pool. In a truly remarkable location overlooking the surrounding countryside we offer spacious rooms and impressive suites, where original features have been kept wherever possible. Air-conditioned room include a flat-screen TV, and minibar. Their private bathrooms come with free toiletries, slippers and bathrobes. Find peace and tranquility in the lovely garden where children can play and you can relax in the Majorcan sunshine. Son Julia Country House & Spa Mallorca features gym, tennis court and spa, as well as 2 swimming pools. There are several golf courses nearby and the property arranges cycle tours of the island. The Sa Magrana Restaurant & Terrace offers creative Mediterranean dishes made using fresh produce and the wine list includes includes its own wine, son Julia. The restaurant features a sandstone arched roof and a terrace overlooking the estate´s vineyards. In the summer, there is live music on Thursdays.

name: Cooks Club Calvia Beach - Adults Only
address: C/Alta Esquina - C/Pineda, Urb Torrenova,Magalluf, 07181 Calvià, Mallorca
description: Situated between Palma Nova and Magaluf, the Hotel Cooks Club Calvia Beach - Adults Only +21 years offer sea views. Open to adults only from 21 years old, it has a swimming pool and the beach is just 400 metres away. The rooms at the Hotel Cooks Club Calvia Beach - Adults Only +21 have air conditioning and satellite TV. They also have balconies. Breakfast is provided during your stay.

name: Lago Garden Apart-Suites & Spa Hotel
address: Buen Paseo s/n, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: Our stylishly decorated hotel is a quiet and welcoming haven, where you will find a perfect balance between sophistication and comfort. Lago Garden is a real oasis in Cala Ratjada, as it is surrounded by pleasant gardens which make a perfect setting for the tasteful reception area and terraces. Our hospitable staff are there to ensure all guests are pampered and well looked after.

name: Hipotels Bahia Cala Millor - Adults Only
address: Carrer Castell 3, 07560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Hipotels Bahia Cala Millor - Adults Only is set directly in front of Cala Millor Beach, in eastern Majorca. The complex has outdoor and indoor swimming pools and a lovely garden. This modern complex offers comfortable rooms. Featuring plenty of natural light, each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV and a bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms have a seating area. Free WiFi is offered throughout. Hipotels Bahia Cala Millor - Adults Only has a restaurant where guests can enjoy a meal. The hotel also offers 24-hour front desk service. The area is an ideal destination for beach and nature lovers as it is located next to the Natural Area Punta de n'Amer.

name: Hipotels Flamenco
address: Av. Sa Coma, 13, 07560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Situated right on the beach front, this modern, family-friendly hotel has superb facilities including a great outdoor pool and well-equipped fitness centre. Free Wi-Fi is provided. Located in the popular Cala Millor, enjoy wonderful sea views. Make the most of the Flamenco’s location by visiting the popular beach where you can swim in the mild waters and practise a number of water-sports. Enjoy hearty meals in the Flamenco restaurant. You can help yourself to a great variety of hot and cold dishes which include both international and regional cuisine. Then sit back and let yourself be entertained by the Flamenco team which put on varied live-music shows. There is plenty to keep you active while staying at the Flamenco. Other than a refreshing swim in the outdoor pool, you can enjoy a challenging workout in the gym or join the fun activities organised by the entertainment team. After all this, head to the sauna and hot tub for a genuine relax.

name: Hipotels Hipocampo Playa
address: Avd. Sa Coma, 45, 07560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Set on the beachfront in Cala Millor, this hotel is perfect for a break in the sunshine. Unwind with a drink on a sun lounger before diving into the swimming pool. The 4-star Hipocampo Playa has a wide range of facilities, making it the ideal setting for a family beach holiday on beautiful Majorca. Children are entertained by the hotel’s activity team or play in the swimming pool or playground. Meanwhile, you can head to the sauna or hot tub for some much-needed relaxation. Choose between the golden sands and clear Mediterranean waters of the beach, or the comfort of the hotel sun terrace and attractive gardens. Here you can lie back whilst enjoying refreshing drinks and snacks from the poolside bar. If you feel active during your stay you can make use of the on-site gym. You will also find a variety of water sports along the local coastline, as well as a number of golf courses in the stunning Majorcan countryside.

name: Hotel Astoria Playa - Adults Only
address: Carrer Astoria, 07400 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: The modern, adults-only Hotel Astoria Playa is located in heart of the popular resort of Alcúdia, just 150 metres from the beach. It has 2 outdoor swimming pools, including one with a chill-out zone, and free Wi-Fi. Set in 4000 m² of gardens, the hotel has spacious sun terraces featuring 3 outdoor hot tubs and a poolside snack bar. The restaurant offers show cooking. The Astoria Playa Hotel also provides a seasonal programme entertainment with Live Dj during the day and live music in the evening several times each week. Hotel Astoria Playa Adults Only is equipped to welcome athletes. It offers special menus as well as treatments and massages. There is a bicycle repair shop. There is an array of things to do in the surroundings of the Hotel Astoria Alcudia, such as a range of water sports, cycletourism, aerial sports and a golf course. The promenade is lined with bar, restaurants and shops. Pool towels can be requested with no extra cost.

name: Kyrat Amarac Suites
address: Vinya del Mar 1, 07560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Kyrat Amarac Suites features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Cala Millor. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Natural Park S'Albufera de Mallorca is 40 km from the hotel and Alcudia Old Town is 46 km away. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. Cala Millor Beach is 500 metres from Kyrat Amarac Suites, while Cala Bona Beach is 1.2 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 69 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Tora
address: Carrer De Galatzo, 3, Peguera, Mallorca
description: Enjoy recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool and bicycles to rent. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a television in a common area. Featured amenities include limo/town car service, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. name: Bellevue Belsana
address: Carrer de Churruca, 07670 Portocolom, Mallorca
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 76 guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have bathtubs or showers and hair dryers. This hotel is 14.4 mi (23.2 km) from Cala Llombards Beach and 6.8 mi (11 km) from Cala Domingo Beach. Dining Stop by the hotel's restaurant for lunch or dinner, or grab snacks at the coffee shop/cafe. Unwind at the end of the day with a drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. Check-Out Checkout is done at 11:00 AM Pets Pets not allowed Service animals are allowed Service animals are exempt from fees/restrictions General instructions No rollaway/extra beds available Property is cleaned with disinfectant Staff wears personal protective equipment Property follows regional sanitization guidelines Safe Tourism Certified (Spain) Property confirms they are implementing enhanced cleaning measures Bed sheets and towels are washed at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F Property confirms they are implementing guest safety measures Professional property host/managerViajes Exito Hotels

name: Paguera Treff Boutique Hotel
address: Bulevar de Paguera, n 31, 07160 Peguera, Mallorca
description: This pleasant hotel is located on Paguera’s seafront Boulevard in the centre of the resort. It offers air-conditioned rooms with a balcony, most with sea views and some has terrace, 20 metres from Palmyra Beach. The Paguera Treff’s spacious rooms feature Mediterranean-style decor and all come with satellite TV, a safe and a full private bathroom. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. The hotel serves a buffet breakfast and has a restaurant offering regional cuisine. Starters and desserts are served buffet-style, while main dishes are à la carte. There is also a bar area and terrace. You can hire a car or bicycle, or going snorkelling and diving at the beach. The Andratx Golf Resort is 10 minutes’ drive away and you can reach lively Magaluf by car in 12 minutes. Paguera Treff is located 20 minutes’ drive from Palma and its airport.

name: Hotel Illa d'Or & Illa d’Or Club Apartments
address: Passeig De Colon, 265, 07470 Port de Pollença, Mallorca
description: Hotel Illa d'Or & Illa d’Or Club Apartments is located on the beachfront of Puerto Pollensa. The hotel boasts an outdoor pool with sea views. The fully equipped apartments feature a balcony, while the rooms include air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a safe. The hotel offers a buffet breakfast and free in-room breakfast while at dinner guests can have a fine meal from the a là carte menu. We suggest correct and adequate dress in the dining room and trust that gentlemen will understand the request not to wear shorts or T-shirts at dinner. In the summer months it is possible to have breakfast on the terrace. The Sunset Bar serves snacks and cocktails. Hotel Illa d'Or & Illa d’Or Club Apartments has a spa where guests can enjoy facial and body treatments, massages, pedicures and manicures. The spa has an indoor pool, hot tub, sauna, a Turkish bath and much more.

name: Hotel Boutique Minister
address: Paseo La Playa 12, 07108 Port de Sóller, Mallorca
description: Set on Playa D'en Repic Beach in Port de Soller, Hotel Boutique Minister, a four-star superior hotel, offers a year-round outdoor heated pool, sun terrace and views of the sea. Guests have free spa access. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Certain rooms include a seating area for your convenience. Rooms come with a private bathroom fitted with a bath or shower. Extras include free toiletries and a hair dryer. Hotel Minister features free WiFi throughout the property. You will find a 24-hour front desk and gift shop at the property. The hotel also offers bike hire and car hire. You can engage in various activities, such as snorkeling and windsurfing. You will find the Sierra de Tramuntana Mountains, a UNESCO world heritage site beside the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 27 km from the property; and free private parking is provided.

name: Mar Hotels Alcanada
address: Plaça Pompeu Fabra 7, 07410 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Mar Hotels Alcanada has a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Port d'Alcudia. This 4-star hotel offers a concierge service, a tour desk and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 90 metres from Cala Poncet Beach. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Mar Hotels Alcanada all rooms include bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the 24-hour front desk. Platja d'Alcanada is 200 metres from Mar Hotels Alcanada, while Platja des Secs is 1.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 65 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Condesa
address: C/ Roselles, 4, 07410 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Hotel Condesa is a 4-star hotel situated right on the beach of Playa de Alcúdia. Large spaces and facilities, comfortable rooms and qualified staff will make your stay a perfect experience! The hotel is located in Alcúdia, the north of Mallorca, ideal place for active vacations thanks to the wide range of sports and leisure activities on offer. Some of the best golf courses are only 8 km from the hotel. Hotel Condesa has 466 rooms with modern, sophisticated design that fits perfectly for couples and families. All rooms are equipped with a complete bathroom, balcony, air conditioning and heating, TV, desk, minibar and safe. You can enjoy the most delicious cuisine with the wide range of dishes available in our various bars and restaurants. Don't miss to visit our Sky Bar (New opening 2021) to enjoy the magnificent views of the Mediterranean, the comfort and chill-out atmosphere. There are three outdoor swimming pools as well as a large solarium with panoramic views to the entire Playa of Alcudia and direct access to the beach. Would you like to have some relax? Our Finnish sauna is ideal for you! The hotel is also equipped with a gym for those who like to keep fit during their holidays.FarePortal

name: Agroturismo Son Siurana
address: Carretera de Palma a Alcúdia, Km.42,8, 07400 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Set in over 100 hectares of beautiful countryside, this charming farmhouse provides the perfect place to enjoy a peaceful break in rural Majorca. The Agroturismo Son Siurana is surrounded by its own picturesque estate of almond and fig trees. This idyllic setting is completed by the carefully preserved hotel building, originally dating from 1784. Inside the hotel you can relax amongst the luxury, antique-style furniture and charming period decor. More modern amenities include a huge outdoor swimming pool, from where you can enjoy amazing views across the open fields and hills.

name: Hotel Bella Playa & Spa
address: Av. Cala Agulla, 121, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: Just 250 metres off the fine, sandy Cala Agulla beach, this classic Majorcan hotel allows you to enjoy a range of relaxing and energetic outdoor activities under the Mediterranean sun. You can choose to spend the day sunbathing beside the hotel’s outdoor swimming pool or on the stunning beach nearby. For a more active day you can go on one of the guided walks organised by the hotel or play tennis on the hotel’s court. Seasonal Hotel opened from February to October

name: JS Sol de Alcudia
address: Avinguda Venecia, 3, 07408 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Located 450 metres from the beach in the picturesque Mallorcan resort of Port d’Alcudia, the JS Sol de Alcudia Hotel offers fantastic views over Lago Menor Lake and the mountains. Surrounded by shops and nightlife, the hotel has a large outdoor pool and children’s pool. Free sun loungers and parasols are available. The wooden terrace has a hot tub, sauna and pressure shower. JS Sol de Alcudia’s buffet restaurant offers regional and international cuisine. It features show cooking and a weekly themed dinner. There is also a poolside terrace bar with live music each night. The hotel has a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car or bicycle from the tour desk. Guests will be able to store bicycles at the lock-up garage, subject to availability, and use the repair shop with cleaning area for free. Free parking is available nearby and Aucanada Golf Club is 3 km away. Seasonal hotel: open from April to October.

name: Portals Hills Boutique Hotel
address: Calle Seguí 4, 07181 Calvià, Mallorca
description: Surrounded by gardens with an outdoor pool, Portals Hills Boutique Hotel is located a 15-minute walk from Portals Marina. This stylish hotel has an on-site restaurant, pool bar and night club. Offering impressive sea views and a private balcony, all spacious modern accommodation features chic décor, air conditioning and free WiFi. There is a seating area, iPod dock, flat-screen TV and minibar. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and bathrobes. Some suites have Fendi furniture, a roof terrace and private lift. At Portals Hills Boutique Hotel you will find a modern fitness centre, a wellness lounge, and a concierge service. Real Bendinat Golf Course is 3 km from the property and Palma de Mallorca Airport is 23 km away.

name: Plaza Santa Ponsa Boutique - Adults Only.
address: Plaza Santa Ponsa, 2, 07180 Santa Ponsa, Mallorca
description: Set on Plaza Santa Ponsa, Plaza Santa Ponsa Boutique Hotel is just 200 metres from the beach. It features a restaurant, and an outdoor swimming pool with a terrace and sun loungers. Rooms are decorated in a modern-style and open onto a balcony or terrace. All rooms have air conditioning, free WiFi, a flat-screen TV, a desk and a private bathroom. The restaurant offers a set lunch menu and show cooking. There is an spacious terrace where guests can enjoy a drink or a meal. Cubanito Cocktail Bar has a variety of drinks and features unique décor. Breakfast is served daily. There is a 24-hour reception and free WiFi in the lobby area. The staff can arrange a variety of excursion to those who are interested. A tennis club and 2 golf courses can be found within 6 km of the property. The centre of Santa Ponsa is a 5-minute walk away, while Palma and its airport are within 30 km of the property. Rental car is available at the hotel.

name: Hotel Club Cala Marsal
address: Playa Cala Marsal, s/n, 07670 Portocolom, Mallorca
description: Set just 200 metres from Mallorca's sunny white beaches, this hotel offers a variety of facilities for all the family, including an outdoor pool, free Wi-Fi, and excellent buffet dining. Admire the sea view from your private balcony at the Hotel Club Cala Marsal. Rooms are spacious and air-conditioned, with fully-equipped en suite bathrooms. Take a dip in the Club Cala Marsal's outdoor pool - there is also a pool for children - or head down to the sandy beaches to sunbathe. Explore the fine Mallorcan scenery on a rental bike, work out at the gym, or enjoy a game of tennis, table tennis or snooker back at the hotel. You can sip sangria at the pool bar, or sample Spanish beer at one of the 2 indoor bars. Make the most of a full entertainment programme from Monday to Saturday to keep your kids entertained. There is also a games room and playground.

name: Dreams Calvia Mallorca
address: Avenida Notario Alemany, 26-34, 07181 Calvià, Mallorca, Balears, Spain, 07181 Magaluf, Mallorca
description: Situated in Magaluf, 100 metres from Magaluf Beach, Dreams Calvia Mallorca offers accommodation with a garden, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, evening entertainment and a kids' club. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Dreams Calvia Mallorca rooms have bed linen and towels. Continental and vegetarian breakfast options are available each morning at the accommodation. At Dreams Calvia Mallorca you will find a restaurant serving American, Italian and Japanese cuisine. Vegetarian and gluten-free options can also be requested. The hotel offers a children's playground. Popular points of interest near Dreams Calvia Mallorca include Cala Vinyes Beach, Son Maties Beach and Western Water Park. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 24 km from the accommodation.

name: Ona Hotels Soller Bay - Adults Only
address: Carretera d'Es Faro, 5, 07108 Port de Sóller, Mallorca
description: Set on the seafront next to Platja d'en Repic Beach, Pure Salt Port de Sóller offers a seasonal outdoor pool. Each air-conditioned room has a TV and mountain or sea views. Pure Salt Port de Sóller is situated in a quiet area, 2 km from central Puerto de Soller. Trams to Soller stop within 300 metres, and restaurants and bars can be found near the hotel. The restaurant serves typical Mediterranean cuisine, including a salad buffet. The bar has a spacious open-air terrace with wonderful views of the bay. The hotel is for people over 14 years old.

name: Hoposa Hotel Daina
address: Carrer D'Atilio Boveri, 2, 07470 Port de Pollença, Mallorca
description: Set next to Albercutx Beach in Port de Pollença, Hoposa Daina- Adults Only has a large saltwater swimming pool with a terrace. Most rooms have a balcony with some offering sea views. The Daina’s bright, air-conditioned rooms include free Wi-Fi access and satellite TV. They all have a safe and a private bathroom. Guests can enjoy breakfast and dinner in Hotel Hoposa Daina- Adults Only’s restaurant, which features show cooking. The hotel also has a café-bar with an outdoor terrace area. In-room breakfast is available for free until December 2020 inclusive. Hotel Daina is next to Pollença harbour, in the pretty seaside town of Port de Pollença. Formentor’s sheltered beaches and the popular town of Alcúdia are both within a 20-minute drive. Parking can be found near the hotel, and car hire can be arranged at reception. The hotel has cycling facilities which include a bike garage, cleaning area and tools. They also offer information on bike tours.

name: Hotel Sabina Playa
address: Carrer Des Rafal, 4, 07560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Hotel Sabina Playa overlooks the seafront promenade in the area of Cala Millor, on Majorca’s east coast. It features spacious rooms with balconies and Mediterranean Sea views. Guests can enjoy the day on a sun lounger beside the outdoor swimming pool. During winter, it is possible take advantage of the indoor pool. The restaurant offers buffet meals during most of the year. There is also a bar with outside terrace overlooking the sea, making it the perfect spot to enjoy drinks after a busy day. The Sabina Playa is a short distance from the resort’s beaches and the commercial centre, full of shops, bars, restaurants and a vibrant nightlife. There is also a fishing port, making this an authentic Mediterranean setting. The beach coves Cala Millor and Cala Bona are about 400 metres away. The island capital of Palma is around 60 km away. There is a bus stop just a few metres from the hotel, providing easy access from and to the airport.

name: Mar Azul Pur Estil Hotel & Spa - Adults Only
address: Cala Guya, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: The beachfront Mar Azul looks out over its outdoor swimming pool to Majorca’s Cala Agulla beach beyond. The centre of the Cala Ratjada resort is only a 10-minute walk away. Take in the Mediterranean sunshine, sea views and welcoming family atmosphere around the hotel’s outdoor pool or take the short, 200-metre walk down to the tranquil Cala Agulla beach itself and bathe in its clear waters. You can also swim all year round thanks to the hotel’s indoor swimming pool.

name: Melia Cala d'Or Boutique Hotel
address: Carrer Portinatx, 16-18, Cala d'Or, 07660 Cala d'Or, Mallorca
description: Meliá Cala d'Or offers luxurious rooms with free WiFi throughout the hotel. Located in Cala d'Or, this property is just minutes from the center of Cala d'Or, Cala Gran and Cala Ferrera, You can have a meal at Restaurant Es Llaüt, Sa Pastera, or Salon Wistaria. There is an outdoor pool with a whirlpool and a children's pool surrounded by gardens. This elegant hotel has a central sun terrace and gardens. Rooms feature elegant Mediterranean design and include air condition and free WiFi. In addition, the junior suites have a kitchen and lounge. Es Llaüt is open for breakfast and evening for dinner with local and international cuisine. In Sa Pastera Bar, located poolside, you can enjoy all day drinks and snacks at noon. In addition, during the summer months, it is open at night so they can enjoy a wonderful dinner in a quiet and perfect environment. At the spa, you can enjoy the heated pool, spa bath, sauna, steam bath and bithermal shower and gym. We also have massages and beauty treatments. Room rates include free access to the spa and gym.

name: Bennoc Petit Hotel
address: Cami De Aguila, Km 3.7, 07620 Llucmajor, Mallorca
description: Featuring free Wi-Fi, Bennoc Petit Hotel - Only Adults is located 3.5 km from Llucmajor, in Mallorca. It features a shared swimming pool and on-site restaurant. S’Arenal Beach is a 15-minute drive away. This hotel offers heated double rooms with a private bathroom. All rooms have a minibar and flat-screen TV. Set in a XII century building, the property has a shared terrace and garden. The restaurant offers a buffet breakfast and dinner. Mayorca Golf Resort is 5 km from Bennoc Petit Hotel - Only Adults, and Palma de Mallorca Airport is a 15-minute drive away. Palma Port, with ferry services to Barcelona, Valencia, Ibiza and Menorca, is 30 km away.

name: L'Avenida
address: Gran Via, 9, 07100 Soller, Mallorca
description: This elegant property located 2 minutes’ walk from the main square in Sóller, is 7 minutes from Puerto de Sóller Beach by tram. It has an outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi. Set in a 100 year-old mansion house, L’Avenida offers chic, eclectic interiors. All air-conditioned rooms have a flat-screen TV, wooden floors and large, comfortable beds. Slippers are provided and most rooms have great mountain views. The Avenida’s seasonal pool has a sun terrace with sunbeds and bar service. L’Avenida Bistro serves al fresco lunches by the pool. The property also has a lounge bar. Guests can easily visit Palma de Mallorca by taking the traditional wooden tram which connects Palma with Puerto de Sóller. Car rental and airport shuttle services are available.

name: Hotel Girasol
address: Carrer Dofí 8, 07560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Located in the center of Cala Millor 100m from the beach, Hotel Girasol features accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool situated on the solarium terrace and a beach-bar. Among the various facilities are a shared lounge, a garden, a ping pong table as well as a tennis court and sauna. The accommodation offers evening entertainment and a 24-hour front desk. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a continental or a buffet breakfast. Car hire is available at the property. Cala Bona Beach is 1.3 km from Hotel Girasol, while Sa Coma Beach is 2.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca, 56 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Mar Hotels Paguera & Spa
address: Carrer Gavines, 19, 07160 Peguera, Mallorca
description: Mar Hotels Paguera & Spa, 200 metres from Mallorca’s Paguera Beach, offers indoor and outdoor pools and a spa. Santa Ponsa Golf Club is 5 km away. Surrounded by pine forest and mountains, the Mar Hotels Paguera & Spa is a 5-minute walk from Paguera’s lively main boulevard, with its bars, restaurants, shops and discos. The bright, air-conditioned rooms have a private balcony, as well as a TV and safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. Mar Hotels Paguera & Spa includes a sauna and hot tub, and a massage service is available. There is a TV lounge and a games room with table tennis and billiards. Entertainment is provided for children and adults. Mar Hotels Paguera & Spa has a buffet restaurant, as well as a bar and snack bar. The hotel has a 24-hour front desk, and offers bicycle rental and currency exchange.

name: Hostal Neptuno
address: Rosal, 2, 07160 Peguera, Mallorca
description: Founded in 1957, the Hostal Neptuno is located 50 metres from Palmira Beach and 20 metres from a bus stop. It has a swimming pool, air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. All of the rooms in the Neptuno guesthouse have heating, TV and private bathrooms with shower. Neptuno offers bicycle and car hire. There is also a 24-hour front desk and terrace. The restaurant offers a range of local and Spanish dishes. There is also a bar with a billiards table. There is a golf course, tennis courts and diving school nearby. The Neptuno is also well located for Mallorca’s interior, which is popular with hikers.

name: Cala Millor Garden Hotel - Adults Only
address: Avinguda Cristofol Colom, 71, 07560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Situated close to the beautiful Cala Millor Beach, Cala Millor Garden Hotel - Adults Only is designed exclusively for adults. It offers several swimming pools, live music and a relaxed atmosphere. The air-conditioned rooms in the modern Cala Millor Garden Hotel - Adults Only offer free WiFi, satellite TV and minibar. Safes are available to rent. There are several outdoor swimming pools, an indoor and outdoor hot tub, and a heated indoor swimming pool in winter months. The heated pool and one of the other pools are accessible to guests with reduced mobility. The hotel has a sauna and offers a wide range of massages. There are also multi-sports courts, a tennis court, gym and air rifle range, as well as putting green. During the day there are fitness activities such as dance classes, tai-chi and bike trips. At night, there are live shows. Cala Millor Garden Hotel - Adults Only has an air-conditioned restaurant serving dishes such as fish or steak, as well as gourmet desserts. It features show cooking and caters for celiacs. There is also a snack bar with a large terrace and a poolside bar-restaurant. Local attractions include the Punta de n'Amer country estate, the Hams Caves, some of Mallorca's most attractive coves. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Aparthotel Tropicana
address: Calle Flor, Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Tropicana Hotel features a garden, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Cala Millor. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, evening entertainment and a kids' club. All guest rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bath or shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Tropicana Hotel the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, continental or vegetarian options. The accommodation offers a children's playground. You can play table tennis at Tropicana Hotel, and bike hire and car hire are available. Cala Millor Beach is 1.1 km from the hotel, while Cala Bona Beach is 1.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca, 69 km from Tropicana Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Agua Beach
address: Paseo del Mar, 24, 07181 Palma Nova, Mallorca
description: Hotel Agua Beach "Adults only" - Adults Only is situated next to Majorca’s Palma Nova Beach, just 150 metres from Palma Nova centre. It offers free Wi-Fi in public areas and a shared pool. Each air-conditioned room at Hotel Agua Beach "Adults only" - Adults Only includes satellite TV and a safe. Amenities and a hairdryer are included in the private bathrooms. Some rooms have a balcony with views of the sea. Hotel Agua Beach "Adults only" has a buffet restaurant with extensive wine list. Guests can also enjoy a drink in the lounge bar or outside on the seafront terrace. The hotel offers a varied entertainment programme. The Agua Beach - Adults Only is just a 5-minute walk from many of Palma Nova’s lively bars and discos. Palma is 14 km away, and there are various golf courses within a 10-minute drive of the hotel.

name: Hotel Finca Ca N'ai - Adults Only
address: Camí Son Sales, 50, 07100 Soller, Mallorca
description: This rural adults only hotel, with outdoor swimming pool, is located in a renovated country house surrounded by the Tramuntana mountain range. Finca Ca N’ai is situated between Sóller and the seaside town of Puerto de Sóller. Rooms at Ca N’ai have a rustic decor and large balconies or patios with views of the mountains and lemon and orange groves. All rooms have a spacious private bathroom with amenities, including a bathrobe. The hotel is just 2,5 km from the pretty town Sóller, and visitors can get on the Sóller tram to Port de Sóller at the property's own tram stop. Other pretty mountain or seaside villages are within easy reach, including Fornalutx, Deià, and Valldemossa.

name: Hotel Voramar
address: Binicanella, 2, Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Set on the beachfront in Cala Millor Bay, Hotel Voramar boasts a terrace situated on the seaside promenade, a spacious reading lounger area and free WiFi throughout. Featuring plenty of natural light, each air-conditioned room at Voramar offers a satellite flat-screen TV and a full bathroom with a hairdryer. A minibar and a safety deposit box are available for a surcharge. This four floor hotel has buffet restaurant with varied show-cooking. There is also a bar and a cafeteria where guests can enjoy drinks and snacks by the beach. Guests can access the sauna and the Haman at specific times for free, otherwise a surcharge is required. There is a hot tub and massages are offered upon request and for an additional cost. Hotel Voramar has well equipped conference and meeting rooms. In addition, guests can make use of a swimming pool facility situated 150 metres from the hotel. The hotel offers an airport shuttle service on prior request and for a surcharge.

name: Bikini Island & Mountain Hotel Port de Sóller - Adults Only
address: Carrer de Migjorn 2, 07108 Soller, Mallorca
description: Enjoying an unbeatable location overlooking Majorca's Puerto de Soller Bay, Bikini Island & Mountain Hotel Port de Soller, part of the Designhotels, offers a heated outdoor pool, a spa and free bikes. Rooms at this hotel come with a flat-screen TV and a fridge. Some have coffee and tea making facilities and a sofa. All have private bathrooms with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Bikini Island & Mountain Hotel Port de Soller is well situated for outdoor activities, including sailing, diving and snorkelling. Yoga classes are also available on site. Palma de Mallorca is 40 minutes' drive away and Palma Airport is 37 km away.

name: Marriott's Club Son Antem
address: Ctra MA 19 Salida 20, Tourism Registry License A/2178, 07620 Llucmajor, Mallorca
description: Plan an unforgettable vacation at Marriott's Club Son Antem in Mallorca, Spain. Set on a manicured property, our vacation ownership resort offers spacious two- and three-bedroom townhouses filled with modern amenities. Our vacation rentals sit near some of the area's most popular attractions. Visit Llucmajor and Palma de Mallorca, relax on local beaches, browse the shops and tour castles, cathedrals, ruins and more. Swim in our resort's connected indoor/outdoor pool, work out in our fitness center, practice your swing on our two golf courses or pamper yourself in our spa. Perfect for families, our Mallorca resort offers Pepe’s Place Kid's Club and other child-friendly activities. Grab a snack at The Marketplace or indulge in global cuisine at La Terrassa Mediterranean Bar & Grill. Each townhouse provides separate living and dining areas, stylish bathrooms with whirlpool tubs, full kitchens, laundry facilities and furnished outdoor patios. Discover the difference at Marriott's Club Son Antem.Marriott

name: THB Gran Bahia Hotel And Apartments
address: Carrer Almirante Cervera, 1, 07458 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Situated on the seafront, Gran Bahia hotel has an outdoor swimming pool with spectacular views over the Bay of Alcúdia. Gran Bahia’s spacious rooms and apartments have parquet flooring and are air-conditioned. The apartments feature a living-dining space, and outdoor seating area with views of the Mediterranean Sea. The kitchenette includes a microwave, refrigerator and electric hob. All rooms have a balcony or terrace. Guests can also enjoy outdoor dining in the pizza restaurant overlooking the Can Picafort promenade and the sea. The hotel is 450 metres from the Artà-Port d’Alcúdia road for easy access to the island’s northwest and eastern coasts. Alcúdia ferry port is 13 km away.

name: Hotel Gabarda
address: Roses Bermejo, 26, 07181 Palma Nova, Mallorca
description: Hotel Gabarda is located 200 metres from Palma Nova's centre, the award-winning beach and marina, with all its restaurants, bars, shops etc. The lively resort of Magalluf with its famous nightclubs are at 20 minutes walk from the hotel. The beautiful city of Palma is at 14km and the airport at just 20km. Public transport and bus stops at 2 minutes walk from the hotel. The hotel feautres a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned lounge bar (serving hot and cold snacks), a pool-side snack bar, outdoor swimming pool with sun terrace and free unlimited WIFI throughout. Guests at the Gabarda & Gil can also enjoy the facilities at the nearby sister hotel, Martinez Apartments. Reception offers a range of services, including car-hire, excursions, attraction tickets. The Gabarda & Gil offers simple, bright décor. A choice of room types - all rooms having, as standard, a private bathroom, balcony, flat-screen satellite TV and mini-fridge. You can opt for air-conditioned room, king-size double bed, single beds. Guests have a choice of "Room-Only" or "Bed & Breakfast". Breakfast is served at the poolside snack-bar or in the hotel lounge. There breakfast menu has a range of options, including full English, continental style, fresh fruit, cereals. all freshly cooked to order and served from 08.30 to 11.00 daily. The breakfast includes 1 - 2 drinks.

name: Hotel Millor Sol
address: 7560 Avenida Juan Servera Camps Son Servera, 07560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: The Hotel Millor Sol is located in Cala Millor on Mallorca’s east coast. It has a swimming pool and the beach is only 400 metres away. All air-conditioned rooms in the Hotel Millor Sol have a private balcony, work desk and satellite TV. The Hotel Millor Sol has a games room complete with pool table and darts. There is also a buffet restaurant which serves a variety of Mediterranean and international cuisine. The hotel offers a car rental service and there is free parking on site. Son Servera Golf Club is 5 km away. The surrounding area also provides the opportunity to enjoy a range of sports such as sailing, scuba diving and horse riding.

name: Plazamar Serenity Resort
address: Avenida Golf 4, Santa Ponsa, Mallorca
description: Situated 450 metres from Santa Ponsa Beach, Plazamar Serenity Resort offers a lagoon-style pool surrounded by palm trees and sun loungers. Each bright studio has a kitchenette and a balcony with pool or mountain views. Plazamar Serenity Resort are situated in the popular Mallorcan resort of Santa Ponsa. A wide range of shops, restaurants and bars can be found within a 5-minute walk. Each air-conditioned Plazamar Serenity Resort studio has a sofa bed and a dining table. The kitchenette includes a microwave, fridge and kettle. Free WiFi is available at the property's lobby. You can enjoy international meals in the café or at the poolside snack bar.
