Have fun with friends and family on the mini-golf course or with a game of pool before the evening entertainment. All rooms feature a smart decor and have a balcony with views of the lake or the park. Each room has a private bathroom. Later in the evening, enjoy a delicious cocktail on the open-air terrace adjacent to the bar. Take the short walk down to the beach where you will find the mild Mediterranean waters.

name: Marins Beach Club Hotel Adults Only
address: Estanyol 7, 07560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Situated 300 metres from Cala Millor Beach, Marins Beach Club - Adults Only Hotel offers 4-star accommodation in Cala Millor and features a terrace, a restaurant and a bar. A hot tub and a bicycle rental service are available for guests. The property has a seasonal outdoor pool, fitness centre, sauna and garden. Free WiFi is accessible to all guests, while some rooms have a balcony. A Full English/Irish, Italian or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Staff speak German, English and Spanish at the reception. Sa Coma Beach is 2 km from the hotel, while Cala Bona Beach is 2.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca, 70 km from Marins Beach Club - Adults Only Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: La Residencia, A Belmond Hotel, Mallorca
address: Son Canals, Deia, Mallorca
description: La Residencia, A Belmond Hotel, Mallorca is located in the charming artist village of Deià, Mallorca. With its building dating back to the 16th century, the hotel features 2 outdoor pools, an award-winning restaurant and a spa. Offering sea and mountain views, the hotel has a hot tub and 2 tennis courts, and a tennis coach is available. There is also a sauna and a wellness centre. Complimentary boat excursions are offered during the summer. All rooms at the hotel are unique and feature traditional Mallorcan decor and antique furnishings. WiFi is free in all areas. There are fresh flowers and fruit in rooms every day. La Residencia, A Belmond Hotel, Mallorca boasts a permanent art exhibition and a sculpture garden. There are also classical music concerts and the hotel has a Steinway Piano. Fun donkey trails can be organised with the hotel´s resident donkeys in the olive groves. Staff can organise a private airport transfer. Owners of the property, artists themselves, can provide painting and sculpting lessons to the guests upon request. El Olivo is an award-winning à la carte restaurant. Café Miró is casual and offers tapas and local cuisine. There is also a pool restaurant and a snack bar. Free private parking is available.

name: Fincahotel Can Estades
address: Cami De Son Pillo,n°15, 07184 Calvià, Mallorca
description: This beautiful country hotel is set in the countryside outside Calvià. Can Estades is surrounded by attractive gardens and features an outdoor swimming pool and a terrace with views of the Tramuntana Mountains. Can Estades offers attractive rooms, studios and apartments. All accommodation has bright attractive décor with beamed ceilings. There is air conditioning, flat-screen satellite TV and a fridge. Apartments and studios have kitchen facilities and a seating area. A buffet breakfast including homemade bread and jams, as well as local cheese and hams, is served in the sunny terrace or dining room. Eggs can also be prepared on request. You can enjoy a drink from the honesty bar on the balcony or the terrace. The centre of Calvià is 1.5 km from the hotel and the nearest beaches are 10 minutes’ drive away. Palma and its airport are within 30 km of the Estades.

name: Zafiro Tropic
address: C/. Anselm Turmeda, 1, 07410 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Zafiro Tropic is located 200 metres from the beach in Port d’Alcúdia in northern Mallorca. It has a large garden, 3 swimming pools and a spa with Turkish baths. All apartments and studios at Zafiro Tropic are air-conditioned and have a private balcony. They also have satellite TV. Hotel Zafiro Tropic has one pool with a pirate ship and slides and one chillout pool with Balinese beds. In the garden there are loungers and parasols, and the hotel offers a varied entertainment programme for adults and children. Zafiro Tropic’s Caprice restaurant serves Mediterranean and international food. The hotel also has a poolside snack bar, La Palapa. El Patio bar and restaurant offers nightly shows, and you can enjoy cocktails in Cafe-Bar Babalú. The S’Albufera Nature Reserve is just 5 km away from Zafiro Tropic- The town of Alcúdia, located 2 km away, has a 14th-century wall.

name: Cabot Romantic- Adults Only
address: Passeig de Londres, 48, 07470 Port de Pollença, Mallorca
description: The Romantic is situated just metres from Puerto de Pollensa Beach and 5 minutes’ walk from the marina. This hotel features a restaurant and rooms with balconies. The Romantic has traditional décor with tiled floors. The air-conditioned rooms are spacious and most feature sea views. The hotel restaurant offers a range of buffet cuisine and traditional, Spanish dishes. Guests can enjoy a drink in the Romantic’s on-site bar or relax in the hotel lounge, which has a TV. There is also a 24-hour reception. The Romantic is within walking distance of the centre of Puerto de Pollensa, where there are a range of bars, cafés and restaurants. Local activities include horse riding, tennis and golf. The hotel can also arrange bike and car rental.

name: La Goleta Hotel de Mar - Adults Only
address: Paseo Saralegui 118, 07470 Port de Pollença, Mallorca
description: Featuring an a la carte restaurant and swimming pool, La Goleta Hotel de Mar - Adults Only is located 30 metres from the beach in Port de Pollença. This stylish hotel offers rooms with free WiFi. Each air-conditioned room comes with a flat-screen TV, minibar, desk, and laptop safe. There is a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. Modern cuisine is served at La Goleta Hotel de Mar’s on-site restaurant, while the hotel also has a terrace and bar. There is also a 24.hour reception, as well as a tour desk and ticket service. La Goleta de Mar - Adults only is equipped to welcome cyclists. It offers a bicycle garage and repair shop. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 52 km away.

name: Hotel Hsm Regana
address: Avenida Cala Agulla, Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: HSM Regana - Adults only features an outdoor swimming pool, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Cala Ratjada. With a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available. At the hotel, all rooms have a desk and a flat-screen TV. HSM Regana - Adults only features certain units with sea views, and the rooms are fitted with a balcony. At the accommodation every room comes with bed linen and towels. A buffet breakfast is available daily at HSM Regana - Adults only. Speaking German, English and Spanish, staff are willing to help at any time of the day at the reception. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Cala Agulla Beach, Cala Moltó Beach and Cala Gat Beach. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 80 km from HSM Regana - Adults only.

name: Sol House The Studio Calviá Beach
address: Calle Blanca, 2, 07181 Calvià, Mallorca
description: Sol House The Studio - Calviá Beach - Adults Only is 50 metres from Calvià Beach in Magalluf and features a terrace with Balinese beds, 2 outdoor pools. The hotel offers events such as live music, pool parties and sunset DJ sessions during the summer months. All guests enjoy the Fun Pass special offer at Katmandu Park or Golf Fantasia. The air-conditioned rooms feature modern décor, a furnished balcony and a flat-screen TV. Guests have access to an App with 24-hour Social Guest Service, event information and playlists. There is also a 24-hour gym where you can enjoy fitness activities and a personal trainer. Sol House The Studio - Calviá Beach - Adults Only has a buffet-style restaurant open for breakfast and dinner, offering international and regional dishes. Snacks and drinks are available at the lounge bar or outside at the pool bar. Palma de Mallorca city centre is 18 km away and the bus stop is just 50 metres from the hotel. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 26 km away.

name: Tacande Portals Wellness & Relax
address: Den Caldentei, 15, Calvià, Mallorca
description: Tacande Portals Wellness & Relax is situated in a residential area in Portals Nous, surrounded by natural beauty, away from the hustle and bustle of the town. The facilities the hotel offers make it the perfect place to relax and have fun. There are two swimming pools and a terrace with gardens where you can relax and soak in the Mediterranean sun. Two unique experiences in one hotel, the Cala Zone and the adults-only Costa Zone.The two areas of the complex near the sea and are less than 300 metres from each other. All rooms come with air conditioning, heating, safe and free WiFi. Some include VIP amenities and access to the executive lounge. The comfortable hotel is just a short walk to the beach, and to the town centre, where there is an attractive marina, dolphin aquarium and nearby a well-kept golf course. There are a number of restaurants around the marina and more along the main street.

name: Viva Eden Lago
address: Carrer De Les Savines, Urb. Lago Esperanza, 07410 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: The Eden Lago’s setting just 300 metres from the beach on Majorca’s Alcudia Bay makes it an ideal spot for a relaxing break in the sunshine. The aparthotel’s facilities also allow you to make the most of the island’s amazing climate, with an outdoor swimming pool and terraces surrounded by lush gardens. You can also enjoy the tranquillity offered by the nearby S’Albufera Nature Park and the historic seaside city of Alcudia.

name: Aimia Hotel
address: Carrer Santa Maria Del Cami, 1, 07108 Port de Sóller, Mallorca
description: Aimia Hotel & Spa is located just metres from the Sóller Port, in the northwest of Mallorca. It offers a magnificent outdoor pool, free internet and a well-equipped spa. Offering free spa access, the rooms at the Aimia are equipped with a private terrace, satellite TV and great views. All are air conditioned and also come with a bathrobe and hairdryer. The Aimia’s Blue Spa features an indoor pool, Turkish bath, hammam, hot tub and sauna. A resident therapist offers a range of beauty treatments and massages. The Airecel restaurant serves bistro lunch menus and gourmet-style cuisine. It has a large window with views over the garden and the Tramuntana Mountains.

name: AluaSoul Mallorca Resort - Adults only
address: Avinguda De Cala Egos, Cala D'or, 07660 Cala d'Or, Mallorca
description: AluaSoul Mallorca Resort - Adults only is a four-star hotel located in a beautiful cove in south-east Mallorca, facing Cala Egos Beach. It has 3 outdoor pools, one for My Favorite Club guests. AluaSoul Mallorca Resort has extensive solarium areas and chill out. The rooms at the AluaSoul Mallorca have all the facilities: rain shower, air conditioning, equipped balcony, safe, kettle, 42'' TV, free Wi-Fi, hair dryer. The modern rooms at this hotel feature a balcony and satellite TV. The private bathroom include free toiletries. This hotel has 5 restaurants with both à la carte and buffet options and 2 bars, one of which is a beach bar. The Mare Nubium Restaurant offers a selection of international dishes and the bar serves aperitifs and cocktails in the evening. The property offers a varied entertainment programme and has a beach club. The hotel also offers gym, wellness area, 3 swimming pools and solarium. AluaSoul Mallorca Resort - Adults only is just 2.5 km from the centre of Cala d’Or, with its shops, bars and restaurants. The establishment also offers My Favorite Club®, with exclusive services such as: -Personalized check-in and check-out -Access to the My Favorite Club Lounge with snacks and beverages -Reserved areas in indoor and outdoor areas -Selection of the best rooms including superior attributes

name: Hotel Stil Bonsai
address: Carrer Isaac Peral, 112, 07458 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Located in Muro, Stil Bonsai is a perfect starting point from which to explore Majorca. The property offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Stil Bonsai. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. For reliable service and professional staff, Stil Bonsai caters to your needs.Agoda

name: Jumeirah Port Soller Hotel & Spa
address: Belgica, 91, Port de Sóller, Mallorca
description: Located on Mallorca’s north-west coast, this modern hotel overlooks the Port de Sóller Bay. It offers an impressive infinity pool, a fitness centre and a spa, all with fantastic views. The stylish, air-conditioned rooms at Jumeirah Port Soller Hotel & Spa feature a private balcony, free WiFi and a flat-screen satellite TV. Each one has a coffee maker and a minibar. Jumeirah Port Soller Hotel & Spa has 3 restaurants which serve a wide range of dishes and offer fantastic sea views. Cap Roig offers traditional Mediterranean food and Es Fanals serves a creative selection of Spanish tapas and Sunset Sushi Lounge is popular for its selection of freshly prepared sushi, Asian-style tapas and locally inspired cocktails.There are also 2 pool-side bars. Talise Spa at Jumeirah Port Soller features a hammam suite, a heated hydropool and a thermal area. The town of Valldemossa is a 25-minute drive from the hotel. Central Palma and Palma Airport are each 35 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hotel Eolo
address: Ingeniero Gabriel Roca, 2, 07470 Port de Pollença, Mallorca
description: Set in the centre of Port de Pollença, in northern Mallorca, Hotel Eolo offers direct access to the beach. Featuring 49 bright rooms with Mediterranean design, the hotel has free WiFi throughout and secure bicycle storage. Each of the 49 bright rooms is air conditioned and decorated in vintage Mediterranean style. Each is equipped with a TV and a private bathroom. Most rooms come with a terrace and sea views. Professional bicycles and massage services are available on site for an extra charge and subject to availability. Hotel Eolo is set next to Puerto Pollensa Sailing Club, in the heart of the town. There are many bars and restaurants nearby. The resort of Alcúdia is just a short drive away. The Eolo has a café and a seasonal restaurant with a terrace. It serves Italian food, homemade fresh pasta and pizzas baked on a wood burning oven.

name: Hotel Bendinat
address: C/ Andrés Ferret Sobral, 1, 07181 Calvià, Mallorca
description: Located on the seafront, tucked away in the exclusive residential area of Bendinat, is this small Mediterranean style hotel with nice gardens and beautiful terraces, offering a peaceful, welcoming atmosphere. A stony cove with a big rock goes into the sea, a spot ideal for swimming and diving, there is also a sandy beach just 500 metres away. Las Terrazas de Bendinat restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine and offers a terrace overlooking the sea. Bendinat also has a poolside snack bar open in the summer. You can also enjoy a poolside massage, on prior request. There are computers with free internet access at reception, as well as free WiFi throughout the hotel.

name: THB Gran Playa - Adults Only
address: Paseo Colon 126, 07458 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Just 100 metres from the beaches of Ca’n Picafort, in northern Mallorca, the adults-only THB Gran Playa offers a pool, hot tub and sauna with sea views. All rooms have air conditioning and balconies. The THB Gran Playa’s spacious and light rooms all have free Wi-Fi and cable TV. The private balconies have a table and chairs, and some have sea views. THB Gran Playa offers a gym. The THB Gran Playa has a beer garden, a bar-café and a buffet restaurant. The breakfast buffet includes Mediterranean and international dishes. The centre of Ca’n Picafort is just a few minutes’ walk away, where you will find a variety of bars and discos. A bus stop just 2 minutes’ walk from the hotel offers a regular service into Palma de Mallorca city. Albufera Natural Park is less than 1 km away.

name: Hoposa Uyal
address: Paseo Londres 68 70Null, Port de Pollença, Mallorca
description: The Majorcan-style Hotel Uyal is set on the seafront in Port de Pollença, overlooking Pollença Beach. It features an outdoor pool and rooms with free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs and views of the mountains or sea. The typical whitewashed Hoposa Uyal lies by the sea, in the shadow of the Tramuntana Mountains. It is 1 km outside the centre of the resort of Port de Pollença. Guests can swim in Uyal Hotel’s outdoor swimming pool, or relax on the terrace’s sun loungers. Guests can explore the natural surroundings using a bicycle hired from the hotel. There is an on-site bicycle garage with space for 70 bikes, and there is also a bicycle-washing area where you can find tools. Mechanical services are available on request. The local golf course is 10 km away. Hotel staff can help you arrange green fees.

name: Seven Hostal
address: Carrer de Son Comparet, 1, 07560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: This stylish guest house is located 150 metres from Cala Millor Beach. It offers a charming rooftop terrace, rooms with free Wi-Fi and a range of massage therapies. Some rooms boast sea views. Rooms at the family-run SEVEN Hostal feature contemporary décor and rates include a donation to a local charity. All have a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Some also have a balcony and or lounge with sofa. A safety deposit box is available at the reception. The property offers a buffet breakfast. There is also a pleasant lounge-bar on the roof terrace with scenic views over Cala Millor Bay. You can rent a car or a bike and practice various watersports on the beach. Charming Cala Bona Harbour is 15 minutes’ walk away and the Pula Golf Resort is 10 minutes’ drive away. Seven is just 4 km from historic Son Servera and 70 minutes’ drive from Palma Airport.

name: Hsm Solivera
address: Eucaliptus, 16, 07160 Peguera, Mallorca
description: Situated 300 metres from Palmira Beach in Paguera, HSM S’Olivera offers a seasonal outdoor pool and a sun terrace with gardens. In winter, there is a free indoor pool, hot tub and sauna. Each air-conditioned room at HSM S’Olivera has a balcony and satellite TV. Decorated in light colours, rooms have tiled floors and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. The hotel’s spacious buffet restaurant offers a wide selection of cold and hot dishes, including homemade desserts. There is a poolside bar service in summer. HSM Hotel S’Olivera is just 250 metres from Paguera’s seafront promenade, which is full of shops, bars and restaurants. You can walk along the seafront to Santa Ponsa, Palmanova or Magaluf. Palma de Mallorca is 22 km away, and buses to the city stop just 250 metres away.

name: Hotel Sis Pins
address: Paseo Anglada Camarasa, 77, 07470 Port de Pollença, Mallorca
description: Hotel Sis Pins is located in a pedestrian area on the seafront in Mallorca’s Port de Pollença. Each air-conditioned room has a kettle, and most feature a balcony. Guests can enjoy great views of the sea from the café-terrace at Hotel Sis Pins. The hotel is just meters from away from the beach. All rooms at the Sis Pins Hotel come with satellite TV, a work desk and a full bathroom with shower and hairdryer. Palma and Palma Airport are around 60 km away from Sis Pins. A number of bars, restaurants and shops can be found within walking distance.

name: Sol Palmanova
address: Pinzones, Calvià, Mallorca
description: Located just 120 metres from the beach of Palma Nova, this Katmandu-themed hotel is ideal for a family break in the Majorcan sunshine. All rooms are air conditioned and come with a balcony and a desk. The bathrooms include a hairdryer. At Sol Palmanova All Inclusive children between 8 months and 17 years old are entertained all day at the 4 different kid’s clubs, divided between age groups. Sol Palmanova All Inclusive also offers guests special rates for Katmandu Park. You will find gardens, 2 outdoor swimming pools and a terrace. Sports activities for adults include aquagym, waterpolo, table tennis tournaments, spinning classes, pilates and varied evening entertainment. Sol Palmanova Mallorca is14 km from Majorca's capital of Palma. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 25 minutes' drive away.

name: Hoposa Bahia
address: Poligon Vora Mar, 29, Port de Pollença, Mallorca
description: This charming and typically Mediterranean-style hotel is set overlooking the seafront in the peaceful and beautiful town of Puerto de Pollensa. Bahía is a perfect accommodation for a relaxing break by the sea. Here you can enjoy breakfast in the morning, looking out to the sea, and then stroll down to the nearby beach and spend the day sunbathing and swimming in the Mediterranean Sea. In-room breakfast is available for free until December 2020 inclusive. Return to the hotel for a light lunch in the restaurant, set next to the sea, where you can sample local-style cuisine. Hoposa Bahía boasts modern, spacious and well-lit rooms offering fantastic views.

name: Morlans Garden
address: Gaviotas, 6, 07160 Peguera, Mallorca
description: This traditional-style, family-run hotel is set just a short walk from the beach in the resort of Peguera, on Majorca’s sheltered west coast. Spend your day relaxing on the nearby sandy beach, 200 metres away, or around the hotel’s own outdoor swimming pool. This pool is surrounded by attractive gardens, adding to the hotel’s tranquil ambiance. Meanwhile, facilities for more active guests include a fitness room.

name: HSM Atlantic Park Hotel
address: C/Calderon De La Barca 2, Magaluf, Mallorca
description: The hotel stands out mostly for its situation, very close to the beach and leisure centre of Magalluf, but at the same time in a quiet place, without the noise and hustle of the resort´s famous nightlife. It is set at 25 km away from the airport and 15 km from the centre of Palma. The hotel offers spacious rooms that present elegant and modern decoration and colours. Each room comes with air-conditioning, cable TV and a bathroom with bath amenities. The hotel also offers high standard facilities and service with spacious and modern restaurant offers buffet style. The hotel is specialised and certified in golf: it offers the general information about golf courses in Majorca, as well as discounts in “green fees” in the most important golf courses, etc. Possibility to practice sports in the area.FarePortal

name: Fergus Boutique Bon Repos - Adults Only
address: Avenida Rey Sancho 8, 07180 Santa Ponsa, Mallorca
description: Ideally located in the Calvia area, Bon Repos Hotel promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. Featuring a satisfying list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. 24-hour front desk, dry cleaning, bar are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Discover all Majorca has to offer by making Bon Repos Hotel your base.Agoda

name: Alua Calas de Mallorca Resort
address: Cala Antena, Cales de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Alua Calas de Mallorca Resort features an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a shared lounge and restaurant in Calas de Mallorca. This 4-star hotel offers a kids' club, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The hotel has an indoor pool, evening entertainment and an ATM. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Alua Calas de Mallorca Resort provides certain units with sea views, and every room is fitted with a balcony. All units include a wardrobe. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. You can play table tennis at Alua Calas de Mallorca Resort, and car hire is available. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Cala Antena Beach, Cala Domingos Gran Beach and Cala Domingos Petit Beach. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 63 km from Alua Calas de Mallorca Resort.

name: Ilusion Markus & Spa
address: Via Suiza,66, 7458 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Located in Majorcans Can Picafort and just 200 m from the beach, this hotel has great facilities including an outdoor pool and spa. Workout in the gym and dine in the buffet restaurant. The Markus Park allows you to make the most of Majorcas fantastic climate thanks to its proximity to the local beach and the great sun terrace located next to the pool. There is a childrens area of the pool. After exploring the surroundings, unwind in the Markus Parks spa with sauna and whirlpool. Alternately have a sit and chat with friends or family in the lounge areas of the Markus Park. All the Markus Parks bedrooms have private balconies and complete bathrooms with bathtubs. Choose from a wide range of hot and cold dishes in the Markus Parks buffet restaurant which also serves regional specialities. Accompany your meal with a fine Spanish wine. Begin the day with the continental breakfast.

name: Garden Holiday Village - Adults Only
address: Circuit Del Llac 105, 07458 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Ideal for a romantic break, Garden Holiday Village - Adults Only has swimming pools surrounded by lovely gardens. This adults-only property offers free WiFi throughout. The Garden Holiday Village - Adults Only has an outdoor hot tub, as well as a sauna. There is also a fitness centre, tennis and a multi-sports area. Bicycle rental, massages and treatments are offered at an extra cost. Each room at Garden Holiday Village - Adults Only has a balcony or terrace with views over the pool or gardens. The property is only 750 metres from the beaches of Alcudia Bay. The S’Albufera Natural Park is just metres from the hotel. The local area is ideal for hiking, horse-riding and water sports. Free parking is possible on site and a free shuttle to the beach is offered.

name: Occidental Cala Viñas
address: Carrer Del Coral, 2-4, 07181 Calvià, Mallorca
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. The Occidental Cala Vinas hotel is situated in one of the most beautiful spots on the Mallorcan coast on the edge of a white sand beach with crystalline waters. This brand new modern hotel offers magnificent rooms with sea views that you will enjoy from the moment you wake up. After getting up you will be able to have a dip in the incredible Majorcan waters before enjoying the exquisite cuisine of the hotel. This 4-star hotel has communal areas and facilities that are carefully designed to offer guests the utmost wellbeing. Enjoy bathing in the swimming pools of the hotel while your children have fun in the new swimming pool that features a water park. And to crown your holidays you can relax and pamper yourself with a session in the Thalassotherapy Spa while your children have fun in the Barcy Club featuring a ball pool.Barcelo.com

name: R2 Veronica
address: Calle Primavera, 2, 07560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Set on the beachfront, in Cala Millor, R2 Veronica offers an outdoor swimming pool and an on-site restaurant. This hotel features air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony. Each simply decorated room comes with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The private bathroom has a hairdryer and free toiletries. R2 Veronica features a bar with a poolside terrace. There is also a 24-hour reception and a tour desk. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 70 km from the hotel, while the Drach Caves are 12 km away. Canyamel Golf Course is 14 km from the property.

name: Leonardo Royal Hotel Mallorca Palmanova Bay
address: Carrer Torrenova, 3-5, 07181 Palma Nova, Mallorca
description: The apart-hotel was refurbished in 2017 and is very comfortable equipped. It is situated on the Torrenova headland next to the Leonardo Royal Mallorca, the excellent location in front of the sea makes a perfect holiday. The ideal environment for families and couples alike, where the beach and the mountains are always within sight. From the panoramic terrace you can enjoy the swimming pools, pool bar, the sea view and a lively atmosphere. A magnificent place that combines tranquillity and comfort. You can have fun with all types of watersports offered at the beach or just relax watching the sunset.

name: Bakour Garbi Cala Millor by Checkin
address: Urb. Son Moro, 07560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Perfect for families, this lovely hotel is located in Cala Millor. Nestled within 600 metre(s) from the town centre, the hotel allows easy access to all this destination has to offer. The property is close to the city's main public transport connections. The hotel is within 600 metre(s) from the nearest beach. The hotel is within 1000 metres from the harbour. The establishment consists of 170 units. This hotel was established in 1999. Wi-Fi internet connection is available for further comfort and convenience. The front desk offers 24-hour reception. Bakour Garbi Cala Millor does not offer cots on demand. There is a car park at Bakour Garbi Cala Millor. Guests may avail for airport transfer service. Visitors can enjoy the delicious dining options offered in the pleasant surroundings. An array of world-class entertainment options is available at Bakour Garbi Cala Millor for guests' convenience. Thanks to the wide range of health amenities, those staying at this hotel will be able to indulge themselves during their stay. There is a full programme of organised activities ideal for sports enthusiasts and for those wishing to enjoy an active stay. Some services may be payable.FarePortal

name: Hotel Triton Beach
address: Magallanes, 11, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: Set in a prime location of Majorca, Chillout Hotel Triton Beach puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The property offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Chillout Hotel Triton Beach. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Chillout Hotel Triton Beach.Agoda

name: Iberostar Playa de Muro
address: Avenida Albufera, 07408 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Iberostar Playa de Muro has an ideal setting overlooking Muro Beach, 100 metres from Albufera Nature Reserve. This resort has a main pool, two children's pools and an indoor pool in the Spa area, a spa and rooms with balconies. Free high speed WiFi is available throughout. The Playa de Muro features elegant décor throughout. Its rooms have TVs with satellite channels and a minibar. The hotel has 3 restaurants,1 snack bar with sea views and a food truck by the pool. The on-site spa features an indoor swimming pool, a hot tub, heated loungers, a rain-effect shower and 2 saunas. There is also a gym. A kid's club is available from May to October. Iberostar Playa de Muro offers unique services for cyclists and sports travelers. There is a repair shop, garage and a fully equipped gym. Bicycles are available for hire, there are special menus, sports shop and a dedicated team. S’Estany Gran Lake is just 15 minutes’ walk from the resort.

name: Marsenses Ferrera Blanca Hotel
address: Carrer Sa Partió, 1, 07669 Cala d'Or, Mallorca
description: Offering direct access to Cala Ferrera beach, and close to the most beautiful beaches in Majorca, this fantastic resort is perfect for an enjoyable holiday in the sun. Located in a quiet and peaceful area, this complex is the perfect place to relax. The apartments are fully equipped, and perfect accommodation for families. Take a dip in the hotel’s outdoor swimming pools, complete with sun bathing areas. You can also admire the views from the large terrace, stroll around the garden.

name: JS Ca'n Picafort
address: Via Alemanya, 2, Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Hotel Ca'n Picafort is on the front line of the marvellous beach of Ca'n Picafort, a short distance from the shopping centre and night life. It has a comfortable lounge, a satellite TV area and a snack bar, as well as a buffet restaurant. There is also a terrace with fantastic sea views. Outside, Hotel Ca'n Picafort has a swimming pool for children and adults. Guests can also use the spa facilities at the Sol de Ca'n Picafort Adults-Only Hotel, only 50 metres away. Seasonal hotel, open from May to October.

name: FERGUS Bermudas
address: Calle Pinzones, 20, 07181 Palma Nova, Mallorca
description: Footsteps from Palmanova beach, FERGUS Bermudas has a large garden with outdoor pool. Relax with the entertainment program and dine in the restaurant before heading to the bar. Enjoying an exotic position on the stunning island of Majorca, this hotel has a sunny, tropical feel with a privileged position near the beach and a design which makes the most of its surroundings. All bedrooms have private balconies where you can breathe the fresh sea air and soak up the Majorcan sunshine. Browse the nearby shops, bars and restaurants of Palmanovas centre and take the short stroll down to the beach for a swim in the Mediterranean and admire gorgeous sea views. Have fun taking part in the day and night entertainment programme. Kids will have fun and make new friends in the childrens miniclub. This hotel features 10.000 square metres of lush gardens. There is free private parking on site.

name: Hotel Creta Paguera
address: Carrer Eucaliptus 2, 07160 Calvià, Mallorca
description: Featuring a terrace and free WiFi, Hotel Creta Paguera is set in Paguera. Among the various facilities of this property are a shared lounge and a bar. The restaurant serves international cuisine. The units in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Rooms have a private bathroom, while some boast a sea view. All guest rooms at Hotel Creta Paguera feature air conditioning and a desk. The accommodation offers a continental or à la carte breakfast. Palma de Mallorca is 17 km from Hotel Creta Paguera, while Playa de Palma is 25 km away. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 24 km from the property.

name: Sol Guadalupe
address: Crta. La Porrasa, 4 - Calvia Beach, 07181 Magaluf, Mallorca
description: Sol Guadalupe is 200 metres from Mallorca’s Magalluf Beach, and offers a 24-hour self-service kitchen for families with babies. It features a large lagoon-style pool with hot tub, indoor pool and 2 children's pools. The bright, air-conditioned rooms have satellite TV and a small fridge. You can hire the safe, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. Rooms come with a spacious terrace overlooking the pool, mountains or sea. Sol Guadalupe restaurant offers buffet meals and show cooking in the dining room, which is air-conditioned in summer. There is also an Italian corner and a poolside snack bar. A daytime and evening entertainment programme is provided, including fitness sessions, Tai-chi and yoga. Children have their own playground and mini club. Free WiFi is available throughout. There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. On-site parking is available for an extra charge. Aquapark is 2 km away and Poniente Golf Club is a 5-minute drive from the hotel. Reservations include a free Sol Katmandu Fun Pass with discounts at the Katmandu Theme Park and the Wave House.

name: Sol Katmandu Park & Resort
address: Calle Galeón, 07181 Magaluf, Mallorca
description: Sol Katmandu Park & Resort is located just 5 minutes' walk from Magalluf Beach and it is within the Katmandu Theme Park. It offers 2 swimming pools, one of which is only for children, and free WiFi throughout. The property organises a varied entertainment programme for children with Boro & Friends Musical Buffet & Show. Guests have free access to Katmandu Theme Park's wide range of rides including a splash park, a soft play adventure area and a 4D cinema. Sol Katmandu Park & Resort offers rooms with a furnished terrace or balcony, offering views of the mountains or the pool and garden. There is a satellite TV, air conditioning, minibar, and telephone. A safe is available for an extra charge. The bathroom comes with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. The hotel’s themed buffet restaurant offers international food. There is also a lounge bar and a poolside bar. There are many golf courses nearby, and the Western Water Park is just 2 km away. Within 5 minutes you can walk to Magalluf's main shopping and leisure areas. Palma de Mallorca is 15 km away.

name: tent Palmanova
address: C/ Paris 1. Palmanova - Palmanova, 07181 Palma Nova, Mallorca
description: Boasting an outdoor swimming pool, a bar, a garden and free WiFi. Tent Palmanova is set in Palmanova, 250 metres from Palma Nova Beach and 500 metres from Son Maties Beach. The hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. The hotel provides guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. At tent Palmanova all rooms have bed linen and towels. Tent Palmanova offers a sun terrace. The hotel offers unlimited brunch from 8:00 to 13:30. Es Carregador Beach is 600 metres from the hotel. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 25 km from tent Palmanova.

name: Hotel Exagon Park
address: Ronda de Pleta, 46, 07458 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Hotel Exagon Park is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Majorca. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, family room, restaurant, tours are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, internet access wireless (complimentary), air conditioning, heating, wake-up service. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel's recreational facilities, including hot tub, sauna, outdoor pool, indoor pool, spa. Convenience and comfort makes Hotel Exagon Park the perfect choice for your stay in Majorca.priceline.com

name: Hoposa Cultural Boutique
address: Plaça Miquel Capllonch,13, 07470 Port de Pollença, Mallorca
description: Set in a square, just 100 metres from the beach and the Marina in Port de Pollença, Hoposa Cultural Boutique Hostal guest house offers a bar, a snack bar and free WiFi throughout. Bright and functional, the soundproofed rooms at this property come with a wardrobe, and a private bathroom. Bed linen and towels are provided. Some rooms offer a terrace. Centrally located, you will find many bars, restaurants and supermarkets in the surrounding streets. Cala Sant Vicenç is 8 km away and 20-minute drive will take you to Can Picafort Beach. Mallorca Airport is 50minutes’ drive away.

name: Aluasoul Alcudia Bay
address: Carrer De La Gavina, 4, 07410 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Set on Alcudia Bay, this tranquil hotel is ideal for a break on the long, sandy beaches of northern Majorca, or for simply lying back beside the pool. AluaSoul Alcudia Bay is surrounded by pine trees and lies just 300 metres from several kilometres of fine white sand and clear, Mediterranean waters. Take a dip in the sea or dive into the outdoor swimming pool at the hotel, which comes surrounded by comfortable sun loungers. You can choose to get involved in the organised aerobics, volleyball, tennis or football. After a delicious buffet meal, settle down to enjoy the live entertainment offered each evening.

name: Prinsotel Alba & Spa
address: Carrer de Conillera, 07660 Cala d'Or, Mallorca
description: Set in the resort of Cala d’Or, this recently renovated holiday complex is set just a few steps away from the crystal-clear Mediterranean waters of Cala Gran. Free WiFi is available throughout. The property has been built in a typical Balearic style, providing an authentic Majorcan experience. Relax in the sunshine on a sun lounger before diving into the large outdoor swimming pool. You can also enjoy a cool drink beside the pool from the outdoor bar. Refreshing drinks are also available in the lounge bar. The property is surrounded by Cala d’Or – one of Majorca’s most popular seaside and water sports resorts. From here, you can easily enjoy all that this beautiful island has to offer. Exploring at your own pace is made easy by the reception’s car and bike rental service.

name: Nordeste Playa
address: Via Francia, 10, 07458 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: This pleasant, all-inclusive hotel is located in the centre of the resort, 70 metres from pretty Can Picafort Beach. It offers an indoor and outdoor swimming pool, a sun terrace, gym and beauty salon. The comfortable, air-conditioned rooms at Nordeste Playa are bright and feature a furnished balcony. All include satellite TV, a safe and private bathroom with hairdryer. The hotel’s all-inclusive buffet restaurant serves international and local cuisine. Snacks are provided throughout the day and drinks are served at the bar until midnight. The Nordeste Playa offers a number of spa facilities, including a hot tub, sauna, Turkish bath and massage facilities. Alcudia and its ferry port are just 11 km away. The hotel offers car and bicycle rental and is located 50 minutes’ drive from Palma Airport. You can catch a bus to Palma and Inca 150 metres away.

name: Alua Boccaccio
address: Avda. Pedro Mas y Reus, 3, 07408 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Alua Boccaccio offers an outdoor pool, a fitness centre and air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony,and has a multi-sports court. Free WiFi is available in public areas. S’Albufera Nature Reserve is just 5 minutes’ drive away from the Boccaccio. Palma de Mallorca Airport can be reached in 45 minutes, by car. Alua Boccaccio is located in Puerto de Alcudia, standing just 150 metres from the sea, it is next to the iconic Lago Esperanza. Alua Boccaccio offers: buffet restaurant, pool bar,cocktail bar, beach bar for snacks and drinks, outdoor swimming pools, multi-sports court, miniclub, free wifi and gym. Reservations of more than 5 rooms are subject to supplements and special conditions

name: Aparthotel Alcudia Garden
address: Avinguda De La Platja, 1, 07408 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Located 80 m from the magnificent, spacious and sandy Alcudia Bay Beach, the hotel offers an ideal location for a relaxing holiday, with 2 swimming pools and 8000m² of beautiful gardens. Enjoy a fun-filled break for all the family at the Alcudia Garden Aparthotel, whose spacious, air-conditioned accommodation has a balcony where you can soak up the sun. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property. Relax in the sauna and hot tub, or spend the time swimming in the sea or the hotel’s pools. Choose from activities including free-of-charge sports such as archery, table tennis and aerobics, or visit the Alcudia Garden’s fitness centre. At night, enjoy performances and shows, including live music in the summer. There is a bar by the pool. Children can have fun at the playground, in the children’s pool, and with the entertainment programme led by the hotel’s monitors. There is also a mini-club for kids aged 4-12. The Aparthotel Alcudia Garden is also set close to s’Albufera, the top Natural Park in the Balearic Islands. You can explore the natural surroundings with a bike rented at the hotel, or head to the cosmopolitan Puerto del Alcudia for a range of activities.

name: Mar Hotels Playa Mar & Spa
address: Carretera Formentor s/n, 07470 Port de Pollença, Mallorca
description: Playa Mar & Spa offers bright studios, 50 metres from the beach in Puerto Pollença, Mallorca. There is a tennis court, outdoor pool, and spa with heated indoor pool, sauna and Turkish bath. Each apartment has a balcony, twin bedroom and living room with a sofa bed and TV. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. The complex has an air-conditioned restaurant, bar and snack bar. There are several lounges and a TV and video room. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Playa Mar & Spa has 24-hour reception and you can hire a car or bicycle. An airport shuttle service is available for an extra charge.

name: Inner Kompas Studios
address: Passeig Mar 54, 07181 Palma Nova, Mallorca
description: No description found

name: Hotel Can Simo Alcudia
address: Carrer de Sant Jaume, 1, 07400 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Can Simó is a small, exclusive hotel occupying a prime position in the historic town of Alcúdia just a few kilometres from both the Bays of Pollensa and Alcúdia with their beautiful sandy beaches and only 4 kilometres from the Alcanada golf course. A former 19th century mallorcan manor house, it has been refurbished to a high standard combining the traditional mallorcan style with modern day luxury. Here you will find the friendly and personal touch to make your stay an unforgettable experience.

name: Hotel Na Forana
address: Arquitecto Alomar, 5, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: Hotel Na Forana is set on Son Moll Beach, between Cala Rajada and Capdepera. It features a gym, hot tub, an indoor pool and a seasonal outdoor swimming pool overlooking the beach. Each bright, air-conditioned room at Hotel Na Forana has elegant décor, a TV, a safe and a minibar. Many rooms offer balconies with sea views. You can enjoy a range of Mediterranean dishes in the Na Forana’s buffet restaurant, which offers show cooking twice a day. There are also spacious lounge areas with free Wi-Fi. Free kayak tours are organised from the Hotel Na Forana reception desk. The centre of Cala Rajada is a 5-minute walk from the hotel, while Capdepera is a 20-minute walk away. There are 2 golf courses within 5 km of the Na Forana.

name: Hotel More
address: C. Tirant Lo Blanc, 8, 07409 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Featuring a sun terrace with sun loungers, garden and outdoor pool, Hotel More is a beachfront property featuring room with sea-view balconies. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Each room is air-conditioned and has a double bed or 2 single beds. It includes a safety deposit box and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom has a bath or shower and hairdryer. The hotel also has a buffet restaurant and bar. There is also an evening entertainment, but various bars can be found within a 15-minute walk. Alcanda Golf Course is 5 km from the property and Port of Alcudia and Pollentia are both 3 km away.

name: Aparthotel Novo Mar
address: Gavines, 3, 07181 Peguera, Mallorca
description: Aparthotel Novo Mar is 100 metres from Paguera’s Torá Beach, in south-western Mallorca. It offers a seasonal outdoor pool, free WiFi and air-conditioned apartments with a terrace and flat-screen TV. Each bright and modern Novo Mar apartment has tiled floors and a living room with a sofa. The private bathroom comes with amenities, and the well-equipped kitchenette includes a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. Most apartments have sea views. (upon request and subject to availability) A buffet breakfast is available at the Novo Mar complex. You can also have dinner in the restaurant on prior request, and show cooking is offered. Special diet menus can be requested and there is also a lounge with a flat-screen TV and a bar. Wi-Fi is offered throughout the complex, and is free in public areas. There is a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car or bicycle from the tour desk. Santa Ponsa Golf Course is 3 km away and Camp de Mar Golf Course is 3.5 km away.

name: Catalonia Atenas
address: Av. Meridiana, 151, 08026 Barcelona
description: Set 3 metro stops from central Barcelona, the Atenas Catalonia has a rooftop swimming pool, offering views of the nearby Torre Agbar and Sagrada Familia. It also features free WiFi, a gym and a spa with a Turkish bath. The bright rooms of Hotel Atenas Barcelona have simple décor with wooden flooring. Each has air conditioning, a mini fridge with complimentary water, and satellite TV. The hotel's buffet breakfast features a show kitchen. There is a snack bar and guests can enjoy stunning city views from the pool, set on the 11th floor. The Sagrada Familia is just over one kilometre from the hotel, while Glòries shopping centre can be reached in 15 minutes by foot. The Catalonia Atenas has a convenient left luggage service, on-site parking, and is 2 minutes’ walk from Clot Metro Station; and 200 metres from Clot Train Station; here you can take a direct train to Barcelona Airport.

name: Grupotel Gran Via 678
address: Gran Via de Les Corts Catalanes, 678, 08010 Barcelona
description: The stylish Gran Via 678 is situated 700 metres from Plaza Catalunya in central Barcelona and features an outdoor pool with a sun terrace. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. Modern rooms at this design hotel include satellite TV and a minibar. The private bathroom is complete with a hairdryer. Grupotel Gran Via 678 offers a restaurant which serves Mediterranean and international cuisine. Guests can enjoy meals on the terrace. Urquinaona Metro Station is 400 metres away while the Arc de Triomf monument is less than 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel.

name: Sercotel Caspe
address: Caspe 103-109, Barcelona
description: This design hotel is a 5-minute walk from Barcelona’s Arc de Triomf Metro Station and Estació del Nord Bus Station. It has a gym, and offers free Wi-Fi and free bottled water. Rooms at the Sercotel Caspe are air-conditioned and soundproofed. They feature satellite TV, a minibar and safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities. The Sercotel Caspe has an outdoor terrace, an attractive restaurant and a café-bar. Room service is also available. The hotel is a short walk from Gaudí's buildings on Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. Plaza Catalunya is approximately 20 minutes' walk away. There is a tour desk and 24-hour reception. Car hire is available and there is on-site parking for an extra charge.

name: Catalonia Eixample 1864
address: Roger De Llúria 60, 08009 Barcelona
description: Located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, this 19th-century building offers stylish modern interiors and free WiFi. It is just 300 metres from the designer shops and Gaudí buildings of Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. The Catalonia Eixample 1864 is housed in one of the Eixample’s oldest buildings, and its painted façade gives it the Speciality Monument status. All soundproofed en-suite rooms sleek wooden floors and furniture, air conditioning and all rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app. Some rooms have a private terrace and pool. A buffet breakfast with show cooking is offered every morning at the Sala Minerva; while the hotel's Les Finestres de Llúria restaurant serves traditional Catalan food with a creative twist. Room service is also available. Catalonia Eixample 1864 boasts a rooftop swimming pool, sundeck and bar; as well as a gym. The Catalonia Eixample 1864 is ideally located just a 5-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia Station. Plaza Catalunya Square is a 10-minute walk away. The hotel offers private parking on-site for an extra cost and an electric vehicle charging station.

name: Hotel Balmes, a member of Preferred Hotels & Resorts
address: Cl. Mallorca, 216, Barcelona
description: Balmes is located in central Barcelona, 5 minutes’ walk from the famous Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers a swimming pool, a gym/fitness center and modern rooms with satellite TV. The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Balmes feature parquet floors and smart, simple décor. They all come with a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. The hotel’s restaurant serves typical Catalan food using fresh market produce. B Bar, like the rest of the hotel, is decorated with works of African art. Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception can help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events. There is a computer in the lobby which guests can use for free. Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are both under 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel. You can walk to Las Ramblas and Barcelona’s charming Gothic Quarter in around 15 minutes.

name: Ilunion Les Corts Spa
address: Cardenal Reig 11, 08028 Barcelona
description: Ilunion Les Corts Spa features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a terrace and bar in Barcelona. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation provides a concierge service, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Ilunion Les Corts Spa every room comes with bed linen and towels. A gluten-free breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Camp Nou is less than 1 km from Ilunion Les Corts Spa, while Sants Railway Station is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from the hotel. The hotel is a 15-minute drive from Plaza España, from where the shuttles leave to the Montjuic field.

name: Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira
address: Carrer Dels Alts Forns, 40, Barcelona
description: Situated in Barcelona, 1.5 km from Palau Sant Jordi, Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira features air-conditioned accommodation and a bar. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant and an outdoor pool. Camp Nou is 2.9 km away and Boqueria Market is 4 km from the hotel. At Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira offers a terrace. Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 2 km from the hotel, while Montjuïc is 2.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 8 km from Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira.

name: Melia Barcelona Sarria
address: Avenida De Sarria 50, 08029 Barcelona
description: Meliá Barcelona Sarriá features a spa, a 24-hour gym and a restaurant. Gaudi’s major works, such as La Pedrera and Casa Battló are 2 km away. There is free WiFi available throughout. The Melia Barcelona Sarriá’s rooms feature chic, contemporary décor with 42-inch TVs and bathrooms with marble finishing and baths or showers. All Level Lounge Rooms offer superior services including exclusive private areas, a private reception area with personalized attention and 1 free access per stay to the on-site Serena spa. A welcoming international buffet breakfast, including gluten-free products and options and special dietary options, is served every morning. The Nonna Maria restaurant serves mediterranean and international cuisine. The city’s upmarket Avenida Diagonal shopping avenue is just 1 block away; while Barcelona Camp Nou is within 10 minutes by car. Francesc Macià square is just 200 metres from the hotel and you can walk to the elegant Passeig de Gracia Boulevard in about 20 minutes.

name: Hotel Granados 83, a Member of Design Hotels
address: Enrique Granados 83, 08008 Barcelona
description: Located 250 metres from Barcelona’s Diagonal Metro Station, Granados 83 offers a small gym and roof terrace with a small pool and cocktail bar. Rooms feature Zen-style design and LCD TV. This design hotel has an impressive glass and stone façade and it combines neoclassical details with industrial and natural components which has become representative of the entire city and which gives it the Speciality Monument status. It also features beautiful Art Deco interiors. Decorated with wood, leather and glass, the Granados 83’s stylish air-conditioned rooms include a minibar, bathrobe and slippers. The elegant restaurant serves creative Mediterranean cuisine and room service is available. There are many popular tapas bars within a 5-minute walk, on Rambla de Catalunya. Passeig de Gràcia is 400 metres away, and is home to Gaudí’s famous La Pedrera and Casa Batlló. There is a 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. You can hire a car from the tour desk, and on-site parking is offered for an extra charge.

name: Zenit Barcelona
address: Carrer De Santalo, 8, 08021 Barcelona
description: Zenit Barcelona is 250 metres from Plaza Francesc Macià on Barcelona’s Diagonal Avenue. This modern hotel offers stylish air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms, with free Wi-Fi and a pillow menu. The Zenit is a 15-minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, where Gaudí’s famous La Pedrera and Casa Batlló can be found. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are a further 15 minutes’ walk away. Rooms at the Zenit Barcelona feature satellite TV and a safe and minibar. There is a work desk and a kettle with free tea and coffee set; the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer. Zenit Hotel’s restaurant offers gourmet Spanish and international cuisine. A special gluten-free breakfast and children's menus are available, and packed lunches and room service can be requested. There is a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. A laundry, dry cleaning and ironing service is offered. Parking is available 10 minutes' walk away, for an extra cost.

name: Sonder Paseo de Gracia
address: 29 Passeig de Gràcia, 08007 Barcelona
description: No description found

name: NH Barcelona Stadium
address: Travessera de Les Corts, 150-152, 08028 Barcelona
description: Formerly known as NH Rallye, the NH Barcelona Stadium hotel is in a convenient location in the Les Corts area of Barcelona. Several local points of interest are easily accessible within walking distance such as the FC Barcelona stadium and museum, El Corte Inglés, and the L'illa Diagonal shopping mall. The metro station Les Corts with links to the city center is only a few minutes away. Contemporary comforts such as air-conditioning, Wi-Fi and satellite TV come as standard in each of our 106 modern guest rooms. Other rooms offer a spacious sitting area and a coffee or tea maker. A delightful breakfast buffet is freshly prepared for our guests every morning. Made-to-order hot meals and an early bird breakfast are also available upon request. The Ristorante Don Giovanni by renowned chef Andrea Tumbarello with its typical Italian flavors and top-quality seasonal products or enjoy an aperitif with some snacks at the Gastrobar right next to the restaurant. Our friendly staff is on hand to offer recommendations for excellent local restaurants for additional lunch or dinner selections. We are pleased to host events both large and small. The NH Barcelona Stadium has seven meeting rooms which hold up to a maximum of 250 guests. With advance notice, our special events services team can assist with menu planning, equipment and services.NH Hoteles

name: Well and Come Boutique Hotel
address: Carrer Girona 158, 08037 Barcelona
description: Featuring a rooftop terrace with a seasonal swimming pool and city views, Well and Come Hotel is located right beside Verdaguer Metro Station and 10 minutes’ walk from Sagrada Familia. This boutique hotel offers soundproofed rooms with free WiFi, a flat-screen TV and laptop safe. There is also a Nespresso coffee machine, kettle and minibar with free water in all rooms. Rooms have individually controlled air conditioning and heating. They also come with a private bathroom which includes a rain shower, free toiletries, hairdryer and vanity mirror. Some rooms come with a balcony, terrace or city views. Hotel Well and Come features a 24-hour reception, a lounge area with a fireplace, an on-site bar and a fitness area. The famous Passeig de Gracia Boulevard is 5 minutes’ walk from Well and Come hotel. Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló houses can be reached within a 15-minute walk.

name: El Avenida Palace
address: Gran Via De Les Corts Catalanes, 605, 08003 Barcelona
description: El Avenida Palace Hotel is set on Barcelona’s Gran Via, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya, La Rambla and Paseo de Gracia. Its grand interior features an impressive staircase and marble columns. Many famous guests have stayed at the Hotel Avenida Palace, including the Beatles in 1965. The elegant air-conditioned rooms feature satellite TV and carpeted or parquet floors. Rooms are soundproofed and have a minibar, work desk and a safe. The hotel's panoramic rooftop terrace offers views over the city, a sun deck and a swimming pool. There is also a lounge bar, a 24-hour front desk and both free WiFi and room service are available.

name: Ocean Drive Barcelona
address: Calle Aragon 300, 08009 Barcelona
description: Ocean Drive Barcelona features air-conditioned rooms with satellite flat-screen TV in the Eixample district of Barcelona. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a seasonal outdoor pool. Guests can enjoy a selection of international cuisine in the in-house restaurant. At the hotel, each room is fitted with a desk. Featuring a private bathroom, rooms at Ocean Drive Barcelona also offer free WiFi. All guest rooms include a wardrobe. Buffet and à la carte breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation. Guests will have free access to Urquinaona Holmes Place Gym, 800 metres from the hotel. Ocean Drive Barcelona offers a terrace. Casa Batllo is 300 metres from the hotel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

name: Novotel Barcelona City
address: Avinguda Diagonal 201, 08018 Barcelona
description: Upon arrival you will be greeted by our team in a close, friendly way. Enjoy our buffet breakfast and the magic of show-cooking, plus the Mediterranean cuisine served in our restaurant with fresh and seasonal products. Visit the 19th floor and enjoy the spectacular panoramic view of Barcelona, with a cocktail or some tapas. Immerse yourself in our pool under the sun's rays.accorhotels.com

name: Mercure Barcelona Condor
address: Via Augusta, 127, Barcelona
description: In the district of Sarrià-Sant Gervasi, enjoy the tranquility of the upper area and the proximity to several Barcelona landmarks. It is a 25-minute walk from downtown and 10 minutes from Diagonal and Gràcia neighbourhood. The railway is a 3-minute walk and reaches downtown in 10 minutes. It has a gym with views of Tibidabo and a breakfast with local and seasonal products. We will make you feel at home!accorhotels.com

name: NH Sants Barcelona
address: Carrer de Numancia, 74, 08029 Barcelona
description: The NH Sants Barcelona hotel, previously named NH Numancia, is located within walking distance of Sants station in the heart of Barcelona’s financial district. Situated just a few steps away from the trade fair, it is at the center of Barcelona’s financial district. Guests will find Camp Nou, the home ground of the Barcelona soccer team, and Gaudi’s Casa Batlló a few minutes’ distance from the hotel. Our bright, contemporary selection of 203 guest rooms offer free Wi-Fi, flat screen TVs, and minibars, with some suites overlooking the Olympic Village. The larger upgraded suites provide guests with a balcony or terrace and a sitting room with a sofa bed. A daily breakfast buffet is served and includes made-to-order hot dishes upon request. The NH Sants Barcelona restaurant, serving fresh Catalan cuisine in a modern dining area, is open for lunch and dinner. An á la carte menu, vegetarian, and children’s options are also available. For additional requests, our professional and friendly staff is ready to provide NH Sants Barcelona guests with an outstanding experience. We also have 4 meeting rooms available, which can hold up to 200 people.NH Hoteles

name: Catalonia Born
address: Rec Comtal 16-18, 08003 Barcelona
description: Set in a 19th-century building in Barcelona’s El Born district, Catalonia Born offers a rooftop pool, an attractive central courtyard and free Wi-Fi. Arc de Triomf Metro Station is 250 metres away. The classic rooms at Catalonia Born Hotel come with an elegant marble bathroom. They also include a satellite TV and centrally controlled heating or air conditioning, depending on the season. A buffet breakfast is served, and the snack bar is open for lunch and dinner. There is also a bar in the lobby. Located minutes from França Train Station, the hotel is well-connected to the rest of the city and its surroundings. Car rental is also available from the tour desk.

name: Acta City47
address: Nicaragua, 47, 08029 Barcelona
description: Acta CITY47 is 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Sants Train Station and 15 minutes from the Fira Exhibition Centre. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The rooms at Acta CITY47 feature simple, modern décor and a private bathroom. Each one comes with a TV, free safe, and a work desk. Guests have free access to an ironing room open 24 hours. The hotel’s modern Nass City restaurant serves international food and a gluten-free breakfast is available on prior request. There is also a bar where you can get a snack or a drink. The Acta CITY47 is 20 minutes’ walk from Barcelona FC’s Camp Nou Stadium. Sants Metro Station connects you with the centre of Barcelona in 15 minutes.

name: Hotel Barcelona Center
address: Balmes 103-105, 08008 Barcelona
description: Barcelona Center is 400 metres from Barcelona’s Passeig de Gràcia Avenue, and a 15-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya. Guests have free access to the small gym and rooftop hydromassage tub. The modern rooms at the Barcelona Center Hotel have satellite TV and free WiFi. There is a minibar and safe, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities. The Center Hotel has a traditional Spanish restaurant. There is also a bar and a terrace. There is a 24-hour front desk. Parking is available nearby for an additional charge.

name: Upper Diagonal
address: Passeig Manuel Girona, 7-21, 08034 Barcelona
description: Situated in Barcelona’s Pedralbes neighbourhood, Upper Diagonal offers modern accommodation with free WiFi and a gym just 1 km from the Camp Nou football stadium. All rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Every room is fitted with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. All rooms have ironing facilities. The hotel has an on-site restaurant serving seasonal food, and you can find more restaurants and shops on Diagonal Avenue, just 600 metres away, and in the L’Illa Diagonal shopping centre. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property and the hotel also offers car hire. La Pedrera is 3.3 km from Upper Diagonal, while Tibidabo is 3.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Upper Diagonal.

name: Allegro Barcelona
address: Carrer Del Rossello 205, 08008 Barcelona
description: Allegro Barcelona is a futuristdesing boutique hotel located in the well known neighbourhood of Eixample next to Rambla Catalunya and 3 minutes away from Passeig de Gracia The hotel desinged by the architect Nadal Moneo and the interiorist designer Tomas Alia integrates perfectly in the neighbourhood Its 56 modern bedrooms a functional and perfect comfort to all the travelers The hotel offers breakfast Room Service Concierge service Dry cleaning ecornerBarcelo.com

name: H10 Metropolitan
address: Rambla Catalunya 7-9, 08007 Barcelona
description: Conveniently located in the heart of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Barcelona. There is also a gym with a terrace and a swimming pool. There are a variety of amenities on offer to guests of H10 Metropolitan, such as a 24-hour reception, luggage storage and meeting facilities. In addition, the multilingual staff are on hand to offer assistance. The rooms are air-conditioned and feature soundproofed windows, an alarm clock, an in-room closet and a flat-screen TV. After settling in to their room, guests can discover the area with use of Placa de Catalunya Metro Station, which is a brief walk from the hotel. H10 Metropolitan features both a restaurant and a bar where guests can unwind at the end of the day with dinner and a drink. The hotel also provides breakfast each morning. H10 Metropolitan is close to Passeig de Gracia Train Station, making it easy for guests to travel around Barcelona and its surrounding areas. Barcelona Cathedral, the Liceu and La Rambla are a short stroll away.Revato

name: Ofelias Hotel
address: Carrer De Llanca, 24, 08015 Barcelona
description: Set just off Gran Vía and a 2-minute walk from Plaza Espanya Metro Station and the Fira Exhibition Centre, Ofelias Hotel offers stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi. It features a roof terrace with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool. Each bright, air-conditioned room at Ofelias Hotel has a flat-screen TV. Each one comes with a private bathroom. A free bottle of water is provided upon arrival. The hotel has an on-site bar where you can get a drink. There is a range of cafes and bars around Plaza Espanya. Restaurants can be found on Las Ramblas and in the Gothic Quarter, just 4 Metro stops away. Staff at the reception can give you information about different Slow Travel activities.These include free bicycles on request, allowing you to discover hidden places and enjoy local cultures. The Magic Fountains and Montjuïc Park are less than 1 km from the Ofelias, and Las Arenas Shopping centre is just opposite the hotel. The airport bus stops just 200 metres from the hotel. Bicycle rental is available on request from reception.

name: H10 Art Gallery
address: Enric Granados 62-64, 08008 Barcelona
description: Strategically located in the middle of the city, this 4.5-star hotel makes for an ideal base in Barcelona. It also offers a rooftop terrace, free Wi-Fi and a swimming pool. Guests staying at H10 Art Gallery Hotel can enjoy taking a dip in the plunge pool, working out in the fitness centre or relaxing with a drink at the on site bar. Staff are available 24 hours a day and can assist with booking tours and tickets. The rooms are air conditioned and include a private bathroom, heating and a mini bar. They all have ironing facilities and a telephone. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal place to enjoy a meal. Barcelona's attractions, such as Avinguda Diagonal, La Pedrera Casa Mila and Passeig de Gracia, are within easy walking distance of H10 Art Gallery Hotel. Guests can also visit University of Barcelona, the Casa Batllo and Casa Lleo Morera.Revato

name: Occidental Diagonal 414
address: Avenida Diagonal, 414, Barcelona
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility.Barcelo.com

name: Ilunion Almirante
address: Via Laietana, 42, 08003 Barcelona
description: Located between the Gothic Quarter and the fashionable Born district, this stylish hotel has a fitness centre and free WiFi in all areas. Barcelona Cathedral is just 200 metres from the Ilunion Almirante, and guests can walk to the famous Las Ramblas in less than 10 minutes. Jaume I Metro Station is 300 metres from the hotel. Rooms feature wooden furniture and an en suite bathroom with marble finishes. They all include a large flat-screen TV with satellite channels, safe and minibar. This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility, accessible rooms are available on request, also for people with auditory and visual impairment. The Ilunion Almirante features a stylish breakfast room where an à-la-carte breakfast is served daily. Room service is available during limited hours. This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

name: Holiday Inn Barcelona - Sant Cugat, An IHG Hotel
address: Carrer Del Danubi, 24,Sant Cugat Del Vallès, 08174 Barcelona
description: Welcome to Sant Cugat del Vallès The Holiday Inn Barcelona Sant Cugat is a modern 4-star hotel. The city hotel is located on Carrer del Danubi in the Sant Cugat district. Built with care and attention to detail, the hotel is of great value for families, business travellers, and all other discerning guests. You are guaranteed to feel at home at the Holiday Inn Barcelona Sant Cugat. Our comfortable rooms are equipped with a flatscreen TV and a desk. All rooms have air conditioning and a private bathroom with a shower. Our city hotel has event and meeting rooms for your convention or conference in Sant Cugat. A fitness room is available at our hotel. The reception is staffed 24 hours a day. With a delicious breakfast buffet our guests are ready to start the day and discover Barcelona. There are two train stations within 2-4 km, Rubi and FGC - Sant Cugat. The Sant Cugat Shopping Centre is very close to the hotel, as are several parks and a hiking area such as the Torrent dels Alous. You can arrive Barcelona by train in only 30 minutes. From here you can reach: Camp Nou several parks Teatre Joventut Palau Blaugrana many restaurants & bars port of Barcelona Aquarium Maremagnum shopping centre Barceloneta district with its city beaches Barcelona-El Prat Airport (BCN) is only 31 km from the hotel.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Arya Stadium Hotel
address: Carrer De Sants, 383, 08028 Barcelona
description: Situated in Barcelona, 1.1 km from Camp Nou, Arya Stadium Hotel features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a garden and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides room service, a concierge service and organising tours for guests. At the hotel, all rooms come with a desk and a flat-screen TV. The rooms come with a safety deposit box, while selected rooms also feature a balcony and others also feature city views. At Arya Stadium Hotel the rooms have bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Non-stop assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak Catalan, English, Spanish and French. Sants Railway Station is 1.8 km from Arya Stadium Hotel, while Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 3.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 11 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky
address: C/ Lope De Vega, 141-147, Barcelona
description: The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky is located in Barcelona’s Poblenou district. This stylish hotel offers a range of luxury services, including 1 on-site restaurant and free spa access. The Serena SPA Wellness includes a sauna, Turkish baths, bithermal shower and a heated pool with whirlpool. Guests also have access to a discount on massages. The modern, air-conditioned rooms at The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky feature free WiFi, a 55-inch flat-screen satellite TV, a coffee maker and a minibar. Each one has a private bathroom with a rain-effect shower, bathrobe and slippers. There is a restaurant serving Mediterranean dishes, and guests have the option of a buffet breakfast with views over Barcelona. The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky has a poolside bar. On the 24th floor of the hotel The Level at Meliá Barcelona Sky you can enjoy a cocktail or premium drinks at the Skyline 24 which offers views over the city. The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky offers a personalised reception with flexible check-out times, as well as helping to arrange tickets for trips, shows and car hire. Poblenou Metro Station is 450 metres from the hotel, and you can walk to the seafront in around 15 minutes. Torre Agbar Tower is 1 km away.

name: Catalonia Gracia
address: C/ Corcega 368, 08037 Barcelona
description: This hotel is located next to Avinguda Diagonal and Passeig de Gràcia, ideal for shopping. Guests can easily access Plaza Cataluña and the city’s historic gothic quarter. Free Wi-Fi is available. Situated along the modernist route, Hotel Catalonia Gracia is surrounded by much of the interesting architecture that Barcelona is famous for, such as Gaudí and Domenech i Muntaner's key buildings, including La Pedrera. A buffet breakfast is available at the on-site restaurant; room service is also available. Guests can easily enjoy this cosmopolitan city as Hotel Catalonia Gracia is within walking distance of Barcelona’s many attractions. As well as the excellent public transport links providing swift access to the entire city and the surrounding area, the hotel offers great value for money. The hotel also includes meeting amenities and conference rooms available for business events and banquets.

name: H10 Port Vell
address: Pas de Sota Muralla, 9, 08003 Barcelona
description: Conveniently located in the heart of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an ideal base in Barcelona. It also features a plunge pool and a rooftop terrace. This trendy hotel provides a concierge, a 24-hour reception and a coffee bar. In addition, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide local information. H10 Port Vell offers air conditioned rooms with slippers, a mini bar and a rain shower. Each includes a private bathroom with a hair dryer and bathrobes. H10 Port Vell is close to Estacio de Franca Railway Station, making it easy for guests to travel around Barcelona and its surrounding areas. Palau de la Musica Catalana, Barcelona Cathedral and La Rambla are a brief walk away.Revato

name: Alexandra Barcelona Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton
address: Mallorca 251, 08008 Barcelona
description: Welcome to the Alexandra Barcelona Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton. This designer boutique hotel is where fascinating history, modernist details, and avant-garde meet. Moments from Passeig de Gràcia – the fashion, culture, and commercial heart of Barcelona – our hotel is a quick walk to Rambla de Catalunya, Casa Batlló, La Pedrera, and other top attractions. Our fully renovated 19th-century building reflects the charm, elegance, and spirit of our Barcelona surroundings. You'll love the local photography that lines our walls, designer furniture from the ‘50s and ‘60s, original mosaic flooring, framed ceilings, and natural oak throughout the hotel. Every guest room features parquet flooring or modernist tiles, plush bedding, and complimentary WiFi. Upgrade to one of our spacious suites for a king size bed and a minimum 40-inch HDTV. Some of our suites feature a living room area with sofa, an indoor/outdoor bathtub plus bathrobe and slippers, and terrace. Alexandra Barcelona offers excellent dining experiences including a Catalan gastronomic breakfast buffet with local quality products, a brasserie featuring ingredients grown in our own vegetable garden, a Charcuterie bar with Catalan specialties, and a stunning patio terrace by the pool. We are also pleased to send delicious meals to your door, 24-hours a day. Pamper your mind and body in our outdoor pool with chill out sundeck, dry Finnish sauna, massage cabins, or fitness center.
