name: Hotel Madrid Centro Affiliated by Meliá
address: Gran Via 72, 28013 Madrid
description: Hotel Madrid Centro, managed by Meliá is ideally set in Madrid's commercial centre, just 100 metres from Plaza España Metro Station. It offers a fitness centre and a dining room with views of Gran Vía Avenue. Centrally located in the heart of Madrid, the hotel is 10 minutes' walk from Puerta del Sol, and you can walk to Plaza Mayor in under 15 minutes. Hotel Madrid Centro offers spacious rooms, with en suite bathrooms. They all have air conditioning/heating (depending on the season) and satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. The hotel serves a complete buffet breakfast in the dining room, where gluten-free products are available. There is also a vending machine corner. The hotel's tour desk and ticket service can book tickets to the Warner Theme Park, cinemas and theatres. The reception also offers car rental services.

name: Novotel Madrid Campo de Las Naciones
address: Calle De Amsterdam, 3, 28042 Madrid
description: Enjoy the modern facilities at the Novotel Madrid Campo de las Naciones hotel. In a quiet area, the hotel boasts excellent access to Puerta del Sol, 30 minutes away by metro, and the IFEMA exhibition center, a 5-minute walk away. It is home to nine meeting rooms and rooms that boast a contemporary design with every comfort, including complimentary WIFI. After a day playing golf on the adjoining course, relax at the poolside bar or in the restaurant and enjoy the Mediterranean cuisine served at Novotel.accorhotels.com

name: Holiday Inn Madrid - Las Tablas
address: Calle Maria Tubau 16, 28050 Madrid
description: Holiday Inn Madrid Las Tablas hotel is located in northern Madrid, in the geart of the residential and bussiness area of Las Tablas. It's a 10 minutes walk to Las Tablas Metro Station, which offers a direct connection to the city centre. The hotel is just off the M40 ring road and has covered parking. Here on business? The hotel has free WiFi, a 24 hours Business Centre and four fully equipped meeting rooms, the largest of which has space for 100 guests. Several high-profile companies have offices close by, and the IFEMA Feria de Madrid exhibition centre is a 15 minutes drive away. Madrid’s famous sights, such as the grand Plaza Mayor and Puerta del Sol public squares, the expansive Buen Retiro Park and the art-filled Prado Museum, are all within reach. Santiago Bernabéu Stadium, home of Real Madrid, is 20 minutes drive away. It's a 12 minutes drive to El Corte Inglés Sanchinarro shopping centre. The rooms have a trendy vibe and come with a work desk, tea- and coffee-making facilities and a pillow menu. Kids stay and eat for free. Enjoy a buffet breakfast, and relax in the spacious Open Lobby. In the evening, unwind with a cocktail in the bar, then sample delicious Mediterranean cuisine in the restaurant.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Catalonia Gran Via
address: Gran Via, 7-9, 28013 Madrid
description: Catalonia Gran Vía Madrid offers a terrace with a pool and views over Gran Via. There is free Wi-Fi and small gym. It is situated in central Madrid, between Puerta del Sol and Plaza de Cibeles. Built in 1917, this charming building features beautiful stained-glass windows. The rooms are decorated in neutral tones and come with satellite smart TV equipped with Chromecast app. and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. The restaurant serves Mediterranean and international cuisine. A buffet breakfast is available and the hotel’s bar offers a range of cocktails. The hotel also has a lounge and an internet corner. The Reina Sofía, Thyssen-Bornemisza and Prado Art Galleries are less than 10 minutes’ walk from the Catalonia Gran Vía Madrid. Atocha Station is 20 minutes’ away by foot, with a high-speed AVE service.

name: The Pavilions Madrid Hotel
address: C/ Amador de Los Ríos, 3, 28010 Madrid
description: The modern and elegant rooms at The Pavilions Madrid Hotel are situated 50 metres from Plaza Colón in Madrid. There is a small garden and a terrace bar. The rooms a The Pavilions Hotel include a bathroom equipped with a hydro-massage shower and hairdryer. The hotel is just a few steps from Serrano Street with many exclusive shops, and next to Paseo de la Castellana. Casino Gran Madrid is just a few minutes' walk away.

name: Suites Viena Plaza de España
address: Juan Alvarez Mendizabal 17, 28008 Madrid
description: This sophisticated designer building has a tranquil location near the Plaza de España. It offers large rooms with flat-screen TV, free internet and a kitchenette. The Suites Viena is in the Arguëlles business district, a short walk from the shops on Gran Via. The lovely Oeste Park and the Royal Palace are both nearby. The rooms at the Suites Viena Plaza de España are elegant, air conditioned and soundproofed. There is a microwave and fridge and a dining table. A varied buffet breakfast is served in the morning. A ticket service and tour desk are available. As well as free Wi-Fi in public areas, guests can also use the internet using the free computer in the PC corner.

name: Silken Puerta Madrid
address: Juan Rizi, 5, 28027 Madrid
description: This modern hotel, with a gym, is a 5-minute drive from Madrid’s Barajas Airport and IFEMA Convention Centre. Located next to the A2 Motorway, Silken Puerta Madrid is convenient for transport links. The 146 Bus stops in the next street and takes 30 minutes to central Madrid. The 114 bus will take you to the Avenida de América interchange station. Spacious air-conditioned rooms are soundproofed and have satellite TV. There is a trouser press, safe and minibar. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and luxury amenities. The hotel's La Orza restaurant offers fresh à la carte cuisine, a daily set menu and an extensive wine list. There is also a café where you can choose from a varied menu at lunch or dinner. There is a 24-hour reception with tourist information. On-site parking is offered for an extra charge. Cancha de Golf Alcalá 525 Golf Course is 3 km away.

name: Exe Zarzuela Park
address: Calle Dario Aparicio 32, Madrid
description: The Exe Zarzuela Park enjoys a peaceful setting, surrounded by beautiful gardens and only 6 km from Madrid city centre. It features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and modern rooms with air conditioning. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel and there is free on-site parking. The hotel also operates a 24-hour reception for guests’ convenience. Paddle-tennis courts are available. A 50 square metres meeting room is also available for holding meetings or banquets. The restaurant at Exe Zarzuela Park serves creative fusion cuisine. During summer months guests can enjoy meals on the terrace. Moncloa is just a 10-minute bus ride away from Exe Zarzuela Park, with a bus stop directly in front of the hotel. Madrid Adolfo Suarez Airport is 25 minutes' drive from the property.

name: Four Seasons Hotel Madrid
address: Calle De Sevilla 3, 28014 Madrid
description: Situated in Madrid, 500 metres from Gran Via Metro Station, Four Seasons Hotel Madrid features accommodation with a bar and private parking. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a concierge service and free WiFi. Guests can use the spa and wellness centre with an indoor pool, fitness centre, and hot tub, as well as a terrace. The hotel offers some rooms with city views, and rooms are equipped with a private bathroom. A continental, Italian or American breakfast is available each morning at the property. At Four Seasons Hotel Madrid you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean, local and Asian cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include Arabic, English, Spanish and French. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum, Gran Via and Reina Sofia Museum. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas, 12 km from Four Seasons Hotel Madrid, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Sercotel Convention Plaza Madrid
address: Ctra. Fuencarral a Alcobendas, Km 8, 28050 Madrid
description: Sercotel Convention Plaza Madrid design hotel is located 4.5 km from Paseo de la Castellana Boulevard. It features a gym and free WiFi. The spacious, air-conditioned rooms at Sercotel Convention Plaza Madrid feature free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with local and international channels. Each one comes with a minibar and a safe. Sercotel Convention Plaza Madrid offers a continental breakfast with room service. The hotel hosts a permanent luxury car exhibition. A shopping centre and movie theatre can be found within 500 metres of the hotel. Las Tablas Metro Station is 800 metres away, with a direct service to Chamartín, Santiago Bernabéu Stadium and Gran Via de Madrid. By making just one change you can reach metro stations Colon, Puerta del Sol, Ifema, Atocha, and the airport. There is a golf course and a paddle tennis court 1 km from the property.

name: Eco Alcala Suites
address: Calle Santa Leonor 24, 28037 Madrid
description: There is free WiFi and a flat-screen TV in these designer suites. The Eco Alcala Suites are in a residential and commercial area, 10 minutes´ drive from IFEMA Convention and Congress Centre. The building has a large sun terrace, and an outdoor swimming pool, open in July and August. All suites at the Eco Alcala have a living-room area with a dining table and a double sofa bed. There is also a microwave and a fridge. Ciudad Lineal Metro is within 600 metres, and the famous Alcalá Street is 50 metres away. The nearby M-30 and M-40 Motorways offer easy access around the city. There is a bar/cafeteria with a terrace that serves buffet breakfast every morning.

name: Pullman Madrid Airport & Feria
address: Avenida de la Capital de Espana 10, 28042 Madrid
description: Pullman Madrid Airport & Feria is in front of the Palacio de Congresos and just a few steps from IFEMA - Feria de Madrid. Its strategic location makes it perfect for a trip to the capital for business or pleasure. Enjoy its leisure spaces, like the terrace or pool, the excellent cuisine of the restaurant El Patio or Cosmopolitan Bar's special cocktails. Book and toast with us at this upscale hotel.accorhotels.com

name: Novotel Madrid City Las Ventas
address: Albacete 1, 28027 Madrid
description: Enjoy the best leisure and business offer in Novotel Madrid City Las Ventas, a modern, functional hotel with excellent communication and location. Its spacious, quiet & fully equipped rooms, some overlooking Madrid, offer a perfect rest from work or touring. After a day in one of its eight multipurpose rooms, it's time to relax in the outdoor pool or on the terrace of your fusion restaurant.accorhotels.com

name: Axor Feria
address: Calle Campezo 4, 28022 Madrid
description: Axor Feria is a modern, design hotel next to Madrid’s Barajas Airport, a 5-minute drive from IFEMA Convention Centre. It offers free Wi-Fi. The hotel has 24 hours free shuttle service to the airport and IFEMA, usually at the begining and at the end of the most important fairs. All air-conditioned rooms are soundproofed and have flat-screen satellite TV. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. The Axor Feria features themed lounges, including a Chill Out Zone and Wii Room with free access to video-games. Guests also have access to the spa and gym located in Axor Barajas Hotel. The hotel offers laundry, ironing and dry cleaning services. There is a 24-hour front desk and an on-site parking is available for an extra charge. Meeting and conference rooms are available for a surcharge in the Axor Feria. Wanda Metropolitano Stadium is 6.9 km from Axor Feria, while Faunia is 7 km away. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 4 km from Axor Feria.

name: Hotel Barajas Plaza Madrid
address: C/ Camarillas 5-7, 28042 Madrid
description: This hotel is located only five minutes' drive from Barajas airport and the Ifema fairgrounds. Rooms are comfortable, spacious and are distributed over the three floors of the building. The establishment also boasts a large outdoor terrace and free WiFi in all areas. It is also well-connected with all the main sites in Madrid. This is accommodation that is not only for business people, but also tourists; the hotel is in a tranquil zone perfectly communicated with the centre of the city and the Real Madrid stadium, the Palacio de Congresos and the Olivar de la Hinojosa golf course. A bus to and from Barajas Aiport stops in Plaza Barajas Square, just 50 metres from the hotel.

name: Hotel Porcel Ganivet
address: Calle de Toledo, 111, 28005 Madrid
description: Hotel Porcel Ganivet is centrally located 150 metres from Madrid’s Puerta de Toledo Metro Station and a 10-minute walk from Plaza Mayor. It offers air-conditioned rooms with laptop safes and free Wi-Fi. Rooms at the Porcel Ganivet are modern and comfortable. Each is soundproofed and has a flat-screen satellite TV. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and toiletries. A buffet breakfast is served at the hotel, and packed lunches can be requested. There is also a bar and a snack bar. The hotel has a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. Private parking is available onsite for a surcharge. Other facilities include an outdoor seasonal hot tub. The Porcel Ganivet Hotel is a 5-minute walk from El Rastro Market and 1 km from the Royal Palace. There is easy access to the M30 road.

name: Hostal Abadia Madrid
address: Calle Luis Velez De Guevara 2, 28012 Madrid
description: Set just off Calle Atocha Street and a 5-minute walk from Puerta del Sol, Hostal Abadia Madrid offers easy access to the centre of Madrid. It features stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi. Hostal Abadia Madrid has contemporary décor with wooden floors. Each of its air-conditioned rooms has a flat-screen TV, heating and a private bathroom. The Abadia serves a buffet breakfast. There is a range of cafes, bars and restaurants in the streets surrounding the guest house. The famous Prado, Reina Sofía and Thyssen-Bornemisza Museums are within 1 km of the Hostal. Anton Martín Metro Station is just 200 metres away, while Atocha Railway Station can be reached in 15 minutes by foot.

name: Ilunion Malaga
address: Paseo Marítimo Antonio Machado, 10, 29002 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Set in a contemporary eco-efficient building within the port area and overlooking the sea, Ilunion Málaga offers an on-site restaurant, wellness area with indoor pool, and a fitness centre. Maria Zambrano Train Station is just 5 minutes' walk away. Featuring wooden floors and decorated in warm colours, the spacious rooms at Ilunion Malaga have air conditioning and free WiFi. They include a 32-inch flat-screen satellite TV and a free safe. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Many rooms also offer sea views and some have a private terrace. Daily breakfast is served in the restaurant, while an à la carte menu is available at lunch and dinner. Room service can be ordered from the bar-cafeteria during the day. They all include special products for celiac and food intolerant guests. The wellness area includes a sauna, sensation showers and heated loungers. Beauty treatments are available. There is also an indoor swimming pool, which during the summer months is turned into an outdoor pool. The Picasso Museum is a 20-minute walk from Ilunion Málaga, while Malaga Historic Centre is just 10 minutes away. Private underground parking is available at extra cost. The nearby Maria Zambrano Train Station is 500 metres from the hotel, offering direct connection to Malaga Airport and the rest of the Costa del Sol. Málaga Airport is 9 km away. Pets are allowed. A supplement of 25 EUR per pet per night applies. Please confirm that this is a pet-friendly reservation and call the hotel to check availability and ensure that the room is fully stocked. Pets are only allowed in the pet-friendly double room. Pets are not allowed in the other rooms. Upon arrival at the property, guests will be provided with access rules, which they must read and accept.

name: Salles Hotel Malaga Centro
address: Marmoles 6, 29007 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Free Wi-Fi and a seasonal rooftop pool with impressive city views can be found at Salles Hotel Málaga Centro, set less than 5 minutes' walk from Málaga’s picturesque old town. Rooms at the Málaga Centro are brightly decorated and spacious. Each room has satellite TV and exterior views. The Málaga Centro’s Alborán Restaurant serves a range of Mediterranean and Andalusian cuisine. The café-bar serves drinks and snacks. Guests can relax and enjoy city views on the Centro’s rooftop terrace. There is a poolside bar, open in summer. The hotel is a 15-minute walk from the Picasso Museum and less than 1 km from Málaga Cathedral.

name: Gran Hotel Miramar Gl
address: Paseo Reding, 22, 29016 Málaga, Andalusia
description: The luxurious Gran Hotel Miramar GL is set in a listed XX century building and is located in Malaga, 10 metres from La Malagueta Beach. This beachfront hotel has a spa centre and a seasonal pool. Featuring views of the beach, the garden, or the city, the elegant rooms at this hotel are air conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and an entertainment media library, as well as Bluetooth sound system, USB and HDMI connections. All rooms are fitted with a private bathroom equipped with a bath, mirror with temperature and clock and Bulgari toiletries. The hotel restaurant Príncipe de Asturias offers International cuisine with a Mediterranean touch, as well as an informal snack bar. It also has roof-top chill-out terrace where guests can enjoy drinks, and stunning sea view. Breakfast is served at the pool level and it consist on an extensive buffet offering a great variety of fruit, cold meat and cheese, pastry, and a show-cooking part for your on-demand requests. Other facilities include a children's pool and a seasonal miniclub, or a wide range of meeting and conference rooms. Alcazaba is 700 metres from Gran Hotel Miramar GL, and the city centre is a 10-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 9 km from the property.

name: Barcelo Malaga
address: Estación Vialia Maria Zambrano Héroe de Sostoa, 2 | | Málaga | Andalucía | España, 29002 Málaga, Andalusia
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. Barcelo Malaga SpainAt the forefront of city hotelsThe Barcelo Malaga has established itself as one of the best and most modern business hotels in Spain thanks to its avant-garde design high-quality services and its excellent location in the city of Malaga. It has direct access to the high-speed AVE train station enjoys good links to the airport and is just a short walk from the citys main tourist attractions.Its 221 large modern rooms are designed in line with the new B-Room concept that ensures that every stay is a unique experience. This hotel has an exclusive and avant-garde design and boasts one of the most spectacular receptions in the country due to its unique EDHA Sliding Structure for Daring Humans an enormous steel slide that directly connects the first floor to the B-Lounge. In the El Anden restaurant guests can savour dishes prepared with fresh local produce. And if you would like a drink or cocktail after work a visit to its terrace or sophisticated B-Lounge is a must. Whats more the hotel was recognised by the magazine Wallpaper as one of the top 50 business hotels in the world thanks to its 1500 m2 of conference rooms. The Barcelo Malaga will impress even the most discerning guest whether with its unbeatable location its sophisticated design or its magnificent modern facilities. All this ensures an exclusive experience in an avant-garde hotel.Barcelo.com

name: Hilton Garden Inn Malaga
address: Avenida Velazquez 126, 29004 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Settle into a comfortable and spacious guest room or suite at this Malaga hotel, equipped with everything you need to relax and stay productive. Stay connected with complimentary WiFi at the well-lit, ergonomic desk. Feel at home with a mini-refrigerator, adjustable air-conditioning, tea/coffee making facilities, and a spacious bathroom with complimentary toiletries. Browse Freeview channels on the flat-screen TV, and get a great night's sleep in the plush bed, which is dressed in clean, crisp linens. Host your next corporate event or social function at this Malaga hotel with 300 sq. m. meeting space, including a divisible ballroom - ideal for important business meetings, stylish cocktail receptions and unforgettable weddings for up to 250 people. Find everything you need to stay productive in the 24-hour business center, and enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the hotel and in every guest room. Make the most of your leisure time at this welcoming new hotel in Malaga. Exercise with the latest cardio and resistance equipment in the complimentary 24-hour fitness center, or plunge into the sparkling outdoor pool. Dine on Spanish specialties and international favorites in the relaxed Garden Grille restaurant. Unwind in our stylish Lounge, or enjoy a selection of cocktails, beers, wines and light bites on the sunny outdoor terrace. Buy snacks, drinks and sundries at the 24-hour Pavilion Pantry®, or order something tasty and convenient from our room service menu.Hilton

name: Sercotel Rosaleda Málaga
address: Avenida de Luis Buñuel, 14. Centro comercial Rosaleda, local 88., 29009 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Located in Málaga, 1.5 km from Jorge Rando Museum, Sercotel Rosaleda Málaga provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.9 km from Museum of Glass and Crystal. At the hotel, all rooms come with a desk and a flat-screen TV. At Sercotel Rosaleda Málaga every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. A buffet breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Around the clock guidance is available at the reception, where staff speak English and Spanish. Picasso Museum is 3 km from Sercotel Rosaleda Málaga, while Alcazaba is 3.2 km away. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 9 km from the hotel.

name: Mariposa Hotel Malaga
address: Calle de Casas de Campos, 17, 29001 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Striking rooms with art deco-style design and flat-screen TVs feature in Hotel Mariposa Málaga, 400 metres from Málaga’s popular shopping street, Calle Larios. A buffet breakfast is available until 12.00. Hotel Mariposa Málaga features bright colours and chic décor throughout. All air conditioned rooms have a minibar and a fully equipped bathroom. Málaga’s old town is within 15 minutes’ walk of the Hotel Mariposa Málaga and features a selection of cafés, restaurants and traditional tapas bars. Sights including the Picasso Museum and Cervantes Theatre are less than 1 km from the hotel. Hotel Mariposa Málaga has an ideal setting in central Málaga, 10 minutes’ walk from the port. The city’s bus and railway stations are 1 km away.

name: AC Hotel Málaga Palacio by Marriott
address: Cortina Del Muelle 1, 29015 Málaga, Andalusia
description: The unbeatable location between the Málaga Cathedral and the Paseo del Parque, and the spectacular views of the port, make this hotel the most emblematic in the city. It is near the Picasso museum, the Alcazaba, Castillo de Gibralfaro Castle, Marqués de Larios street and La Malagueta beach. The AC Hotel Málaga Palacio restaurant menu is based on regional cuisine with a variety of dishes from all over the world. Check out Ático, the bar and restaurant on the 15th floor terrace, where you also can find our stunning rooftop pool, the ideal place to cool off during the sweltering months of summer while enjoying the magic views. With a new urban spirit we invite you to take a cocktail in our AC Lounge on the first floor with an informal, sophisticate and modern atmosphere in the main center of Málaga city. Our hotel on the Costa del Sol is ideal for business as well as leisure trips. The hotel is 2 km from the railway station and just a ten minute drive to Málaga Airport. R.T.A Register Number: H/MA/00671Marriott

name: Malaga Alameda Centro Affiliated by Meliá
address: Av de la Aurora, 25, 29002 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Hotel Hotel Málaga Alameda Centro Affiliated by Meliá Melia is located in Larios Shopping Centre, next to Málaga’s AVE High-Speed Train Station. It offers a fitness centre and air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi connection. The soundproofed rooms at Hotel Hotel Málaga Alameda Centro Affiliated by Meliá Melia are outward facing and feature wooden floors. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is served daily in the hotel’s restaurant and there are gluten-free options. There is also a variety of restaurants both within Larios Shopping Centre and in the surrounding streets. The 24-hour reception staff at Hotel Hotel Málaga Alameda Centro Affiliated by Meliá Melia can provide information about what to see and do in Málaga. You can also hire a car from the front desk. Málaga’s old town is 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel, and you can walk to the city's cathedral and the Picasso Museum in around 20 minutes.

name: Holiday Inn Express Malaga Airport
address: Avenida de Velazquez 294 Salida, 29004 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Smart Malaga hotel next to Malaga-Costa del Sol Airport, with breakfast and WiFi included Bus line A takes five minutes from Malaga Airport to Holiday Inn Express® Malaga Airport hotel. Present your ticket at the reception and get one-way ticket per person reimbursed. Bus line A connects to Malaga's old town. Harbor Boulevard or Torremolinos and Benalmádena beaches are a short drive away, and the nearby MA21 motorway makes access to the exciting Andalusia region easy. Plaza Mayor mall and Centro Comercial Málaga Nostrum leisure centres are also at hand. Business guests are close to Polígono Guadalhorce, Polígono Villarosa industrial areas and trade fairs at Palacio de Ferias y Congresos in Malaga and Torremolinos. At this hotel, you can enjoy: - Free WiFi - Free Parking (subject to availability) - Continental Express Start breakfast buffet included in the room rate Relax in the comfortable rooms, enjoying free tea and coffee, while watching movies on the flat-screen TV. Family rooms offer sofa beds, ideal for children. Kids under 17 years can stay free when sharing their parents' room. The inclusive continental breakfast buffet offers regional favourites, and dinner is served daily. Early bird breakfast is served from 4am with a limited selection. Enjoy a drink with friends at the bar, lobby or the lovely sunny terrace.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Molina Lario
address: Molina Lario 20-22, 29015 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Located in Malaga centre, Molina Lario has a sun terrace and rooftop pool, which offers views of Malaga Cathedral. Air-conditioned rooms offer free Wi-Fi. The Picasso Museum is 700 metres away The original 19th-century front hides a modern interior. Each of the soundproofed rooms has a sound system. There is also a bathrobe, slippers. There is an à la carte restaurant and chill-out bar on the 8th floor open during the summer months which offer stunning views over Malaga. The hotel organizes day trips. Málaga Airport is just 10 km away. The Roman amphitheater, the Alcazaba, Malagueta Beach and the Castle of Gibralfaro are all within walking distance.

name: Exe Málaga Museos
address: Calle Compañia 29, 29008 Málaga, Andalusia
description: This modern hotel is located in the historic centre, 100 metres from Plaza de la Constitución. It offers a seasonal rooftop outdoor pool, a sun terrace and free Wi-Fi, 400 metres from Malaga Cathedral. Rooms at Exe Málaga Museos feature chic, contemporary décor. All include a plasma TV, a laptop safe and a private bathroom with hairdryer. A minibar with soft drinks and water is available for an extra cost. A varied buffet breakfast is served daily and there is a reading room with a TV lounge. The Exe Málaga Museos is set just in front of the Thyssen Museum and 5 minutes’ walk from the Picasso Museum. You can walk to the famous Calle Larios Street in 1 minute. The hotel offers car rental and is 1 km from Malaga Port and 15 minutes’ walk from the city’s beaches. Malaga Airport is around 10 km away.

name: Sol Guadalmar
address: Moby Dick, 2 - Urbanization Guadalmar, 29004 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Surrounded by attractive gardens, the Sol Guadalmar features 2 outdoor swimming pools for adults and children. All air-conditioned rooms enjoy free Wi-Fi and views over the Bay of Málaga from the balcony. The hotel has direct access to Guadalmar and Bajondillo Beaches. Guests have free access to the tennis court and indoor heated pool. For a supplement, you can use the gym, sauna and hot tub. Sol Guadalmar Hotel serves a breakfast buffet. The Cenachero Restaurant offers a buffet dinner with show cooking. You can enjoy cocktails on the terrace at Bar Picasso. Málaga Airport is 3 km from Sol Guadalmar and the historic centre of Málaga is 5 km away. Horse riding, water sports and excursions can be arranged by the hotel. A bus to Malaga City Centre stops outside the hotel.

name: H10 Croma Malaga
address: Calle Prim, 246, 29005 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Within a 20-minute stroll from Malaga Train Station, the hotel offers guests an ideal base when in Malaga. It also offers a plunge pool, a swimming pool and free Wi-Fi. Guests can soak up the sun on the terrace or enjoy a drink at the bar. Staff are available 24 hours a day and can assist with booking tours and tickets. The rooms are air conditioned and include a flat-screen TV, an in-room safe and a mini bar. They all have an in-room closet, a desk and a ceiling fan. Each morning, guests can enjoy breakfast at Buffet Restaurant or Rooftop Restaurant. There is also the added convenience of an on-site restaurant. Malaga's attractions, such as Calle Larios, are within easy walking distance of H10 Croma Malaga. Guests can also visit the Picasso Museum, Alcazaba of Malaga and the Museum of Malaga.Revato

name: Residencia Universitaria Málaga Centro
address: Calle Agustín Parejo 7, 29007 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Conveniently set in the centre of Málaga, Residencia Universitaria Málaga Centro provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a shared lounge. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a terrace. Private parking is available on site. At the hostel, rooms come with a desk. At Residencia Universitaria Málaga Centro each room includes a private bathroom and bed linen. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Malaga María Zambrano Train Station, Jorge Rando Museum and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 9 km from Residencia Universitaria Málaga Centro.

name: Palacio Solecio, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World
address: Calle Granada 61, 29015 Málaga, Andalusia
description: In a prime location in the centre of Málaga, Palacio Solecio, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available. At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a desk. Every room is fitted with a private bathroom with a hairdryer, while some rooms will provide you with a terrace and others also provide guests with city views. All units at Palacio Solecio, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. Breakfast is available daily, and includes buffet, continental and American options. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include La Malagueta Beach, La Caleta Beach and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 11 km from Palacio Solecio, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World.

name: Hotel Málaga Vibes
address: Calle Gregorio Allegri, 29004 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Situated in Málaga, 1.9 km from Misericordia Beach, Hotel Málaga Vibes features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a terrace and a bar. Each accommodation at the 3-star hotel has city views and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.9 km from Sacaba Beach. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hotel Málaga Vibes rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. A buffet, American or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Round-the-clock advice is available at the reception, where staff speak English, Spanish, French and Italian. Automobile and Fashion Museum is 2.9 km from the accommodation, while Malaga María Zambrano Train Station is 5.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 3 km from Hotel Málaga Vibes.

name: Tottam Art & Healthy Garden
address:
9.1
Wonderful
146 reviews
description: Located in Málaga, 18 km from La Cala Golf and 19 km from Plaza de Espana, Tottam Art & Healthy Garden provides accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning, an outdoor swimming pool and a garden. The lodge provides guests with a terrace, mountain views, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge and a microwave, and a private bathroom with shower. A stovetop and toaster are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Benalmadena Puerto Marina is 26 km from Tottam Art & Healthy Garden, while Malaga María Zambrano Train Station is 31 km away. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 21 km from the accommodation.

name: Room Mate Valeria
address: Plaza Del Poeta Alfonso Canales, 5, 29001 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Featuring a seasonal rooftop plunge pool with views and a courtyard, Room Mate Valeria is 200 metres away from Calle Larios. Free WiFi is available throughout. All air-conditioned, soundproofed rooms in this design hotel include a flat-screen TV with USB and HDMI connection, full-length mirror, minibar, and a safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer, rain-effect shower and free toiletries. Room Mate Valeria offers a fitness centre and meeting facilities. Breakfast is served until 12:00. Malaga Cathedral is 300 metres away while La Malagueta Beach is 20 minutes’ walk. Malaga Airport is 8 km from Room Mate Valeria.

name: Hotel Don Paco
address: Salitre, 53, 29002 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Don Paco is set around an interior courtyard and is situated in the centre of Málaga. It is within within walking distance of the city's cathedral and the Picasso Museum. Don Paco is set close to Málaga's bus station, allowing you to easily explore the towns of the Costa del Sol. Before travelling, you can enjoy a buffet breakfast before planning your trips using the free Wi-Fi service on offer.

name: Only You Hotel Malaga
address: Alameda Principal, 1, 29001 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Only YOU Hotel Málaga has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a restaurant and bar in Málaga. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 1.5 km from La Malagueta Beach, and within 600 metres of the city centre. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Rooms include a kettle, while certain rooms have a terrace and others also boast city views. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Popular points of interest near Only YOU Hotel Málaga include La Caleta Beach, Port of Malaga and Malaga Cathedral. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 8 km from the accommodation.

name: Futurotel Malagueta Beach
address: Calle Maestranza 20, 29016 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Featuring a jacuzzi and a wellness centre, Futurotel Malagueta Beach is set in the centre of Málaga, 1 minute away from the beach. This property is situated a short distance from attractions such as Picasso Museum, Malaga Cathedral, and Museum of Glass and Crystal. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk and room service for guests. The accommodation offers private jacuzzi. At the capsule hotel every room has air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kitchenette, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a shared bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. At Futurotel Malagueta Beach all rooms have bed linen and towels. Futurotel Malagueta Beach has the most advanced technology offering guests services such opening doors from a mobile App, smart mirrors with video, touch screen taps, smart toilets with lid heating and temperature adjustable water jet cleaning. As if this were not enough, Futurotel has a spectacular Gaming Zone with PS5, Arcade Machines, Gaming Computers, Table Football, Billiards and Dartboard. Enjoy your stay in your capsule room with the greatest comfort and advanced technology: Pillow menu, Air Conditioning/Heating, Multifunctional clock, Plug, USB plug, Safe, Flat screen with multifunctional program with games and booking of tourist activities, Mattress adapted to your weight and height, Mini Bar, Locker, Reading light, Choice of ambient light, Table. Popular points of interest near Futurotel Malagueta Beach include Alcazaba, Malaga Park and Malaga Museum. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 9 km from the capsule hotel.

name: Hotel Trebol
address: Moreno Carbonero, 3, 29005 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Enjoying a privileged location right in the heart of Málaga, this modern townhouse lies just off the famous main street near of Calle Marques de Larios. The Trebol occupies a new building surrounded by the city’s main shopping district. It is also set a short distance from the most popular tourist sites of this Andalusian city – the Cathedral, Picasso Museum and birthplace, the Alcazaba and the port are all within 500 metres. The hotel boasts a welcoming, family atmosphere and a stylish, modern interior. Each room is decorated with pieces of modern art and furnished in clean pine.

name: Vincci Seleccion Posada Del Patio
address: Pasillo Santa Isabel No. 7, 29005 Málaga, Andalusia
description: The Posada del Patio is 5-star hotel, situated in the centre of Málaga, with a rooftop swimming pool and free Wi-Fi. It features a fascinating exhibition of historic objects. All rooms come with welcome products, a safe and a flat-screen TV. They feature a contemporary design and include a modern bathroom. Vincci Selección Posada del Patio also offers the exclusive Essence experience, with rooms located separately on an independent floor. Some of the services offered for these rooms include a daily bottled water, national and international daily press, and a private terrace. Snacks and beverages are also available. Important archaeological remains have been found beneath the Vincci Selección Posada del Patio. These include part of the city's Arabic walls, which guests can visit from the hotel. Restaurante Entremuros serves nouvelle mediterranean cuisine. The hotel's breakfast includes products for celiacs. The hotel also has a stylish bar. The Posada del Patio is just 10 minutes’ walk from the AVE high-speed Train Station. The Cathedral and the Picasso Museum are 500 metres away.

name: Hotel Ms Maestranza
address: Avd Canovas Del Castillo 1, 29016 Málaga, Andalusia
description: MS Maestranza Málaga is in central Málaga, just 100 metres from Malagueta Beach and Centre Pompidou. It offers a rooftop terrace and hot tub with panoramic city views, and rooms with free WiFi. The hotel is set next to the bullring and the Alameda Gardens. The Alcazaba and Gibralfaro Castle are also nearby. The historic city centre and the Picasso Museum are 10 minutes' walk away. Guests have free use of the hotel relaxation area, which includes a sauna, hot tub and Turkish bath. A massage service is also available, at an extra cost. Rooms have warm colours and stylish décor. They offer a minibar, hairdryer and satellite TV. There is a bus stop just a few metres from the hotel providing transport links to Málaga Airport.

name: Hotel Eliseos
address: Paseo de Reding, 19, 29016 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Offering superb views of the bullring directly opposite, Hotel Eliseos offers free Wi-Fi, rooftop terrace with a small seasonal pool and on-site parking suitable for vans and caravans for a daily fee. This hotel offers air-conditioned rooms, some with a balcony. Kettles and hairdryers are available upon request. Throughout your stay, make use of Hotel Eliseos' 24-hour reception. Here you can get useful tips, such as local restaurant recommendations. The Picasso Museum is just 800 metres away, and Playa de la Malagueta Beach is 350 metres away. Malaga Airport can be reached in 22 minutes by car.

name: Parador Málaga Gibralfaro Hotel
address: Castillo De Gibralfaro, 29016 Málaga, Andalusia
description: This Parador Hotel has an unbeatable central position in Málaga beside the castle. Situated on top of Mount Gibralfaro, you can look over the city and the Mediterranean Sea from a unique perspective. Head to the roof terrace for a fabulous swimming pool and sun terrace with incredible views. Stay active this holiday thanks to the Parador de Málaga Gibralfaro's location beside the Parador del Golf which boasts facilities for practising tennis and golf. Interiors of the Parador de Málaga Gibralfaro are welcoming and charming. Sit and chat with friends in the lounge areas where you can admire the elegant antique furniture, rich fabrics and warm Mediterranean tones. Sample Andalusian specialities in the Parador de Málaga Gibralfaro's restaurant which among other dishes serves delicious fresh fish and seafood.

name: Hotel Villa Guadalupe
address: Calle Bandaneira, 6, 29190 Málaga, Andalusia
description: This charming hotel rests in a residential area in the outskirts of Malaga and has breathtaking views of the city and coast. Newly constructed, the hotel is furnished with quality materials like marble and wood. White walls and large windows create a naturally bright space. The hotel is finished off with tapestries, mosaics, frescoes and edgings from the artist Irene van Vlijmen.

name: Hotel Zeus
address: c/ Canales, 8, 29002 Málaga, Andalusia
description: The modern Hotel Zeus is set 150 metres from Málaga´s train station, giving it good connection to the rest of the Costa del Sol and beyond. This 2-star, family-run hotel is located a 10-minute walk from the attractions of central Málaga, which include the famous Cathedral and Picasso´s birthplace.

name: Hotel Zen Airport
address: Camino de Los Fresnos, 9, 29620 Torremolinos, Andalusia
description: Featuring a heated outdoor pool and 2 terraces, Hotel Zen Airport is located in Torremolinos. This hotel offers air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi. A free airport and beach shuttle service is available. Rooms at Hotel Zen Airport are built around an interior patio. Some offer modern design and décor, and others are in the classic Andalusian part of the hotel. All are en suite and include a TV. Hotel Zen Airport is surrounded by tropical gardens and offers views of the sea. Guests can enjoy snacks out on the terrace and drinks at the pool bar. There is a restaurant pizzeria open all year round. A gym, games room and children´s play area are available for guests. The hotel is just 300 metres from La Colina Train Station and 4 stops from Málaga Airport, 4 km away. There is a bus stop within 50 metres. The beaches of the Costa del Sol are 1.5 km away. Private parking is available on site for an extra cost.

name: Novotel Suites Malaga Centro
address: Calle San Jacinto 7, 29007 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Ten minutes from city center, Novotel Suites Málaga Centro is ideal for exploring Malaga. After resting in its comfortable, spacious, soundproofed suites, start the day in the fitness room and enjoy a continental breakfast. You can use your suite's kitchenette with a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. The hotel is pet-friendly and offers 24-hour snacks and paid public parking if you come by car.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Plaza Del Castillo
address: Calle De Fedra (Calle Albania 3-5), 29196 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Featuring a unique medieval design, Hotel Plaza Del Castillo has a distinctive façade resembling a castle and beautiful ornate gardens. Its rooms have air conditioning, heating and a minibar. Featuring stained-glass windows, stone walls and medieval paintings, Plaza del Castillo offers several banquet rooms and a restaurant that serves both traditional and creative cuisine. Room service is available for a surcharge. There is a 24-hour reception and free parking. Free Wi-Fi is offered throughout. Hotel Plaza Del Castillo is conveniently located between the A-7 and the A-357 motorways, only 2 minutes’ drive from Mercamálaga wholesale market. The Congress Palace and the Cortijo Torres Fairground are less than 10 minutes by car. The city centre is 10 km away, while Malaga Airport is 12 km away. A bus stop located just 300 metres away connects you with the city centre and Malagueta Beach.

name: Tandem Soho Suites
address: Calle Barroso, Numero 2, Málaga, Andalusia
description: Tandem Soho Suites features air-conditioned guest accommodation in the centre of Málaga, 1.7 km from La Malagueta Beach, 1.8 km from San Andres Beach and 2.1 km from La Caleta Beach. The units come with tiled floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a dining area, a flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Popular points of interest near the apartment include Malaga Cathedral, Port of Malaga and Malaga Museum. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 8 km from Tandem Soho Suites.

name: Malaga Lodge Guesthouse
address: Hospital Militar, 14, 29013 Málaga, Andalusia
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including free WiFi and a billiards table, as well as an ironing board and an airport shuttle. Other amenities include towels, table tennis, multilingual staff, and a computer station.Expedia

name: Posadas de España Malaga
address: Calle Graham Bell, 4, 29590 Málaga, Andalusia
description: This hotel is situated in Andalucia’s Technology Park, near Malaga’s Botanical Gardens and the A-7 Motorway. It offers free parking and internet and an outdoor swimming pool with terrace and sun loungers. All rooms at Posadas de España Malaga have air conditioning and heating, a bathroom with hairdryer and lots of natural light. They feature wooden floors and furniture. The Posadas Malaga serves buffet breakfast and a range of specials and chef’s suggestions for dinner. There is also a separate bar. The Posadas de España is 12 km from Málaga Airport and 13 km from central Málaga. Málaga’s Conference Centre is only 8.5 km away, while the beaches of the Costa de Sol are within a 15-minute drive.

name: NH Málaga
address: Calle San Jacinto, 2, 29007 Málaga, Andalusia
description: The elegant modern building of the NH Málaga hotel, completely renovated in 2019, is in a prime location and offers its guests lovely views of the famous Esperanza church. A short 15-minute walk from the hotel takes you to the stunning Spanish beaches and the Muelle 1 shopping center. You can also explore further afield as the train station is near to the hotel. The rooms at NH Málaga ensure deep comfortable sleep with soundproof windows and allow you to stay connected throughout your trip with free Wi-Fi. Each room is outward facing with views over Malaga, the river, or the Esperanza church. The breakfast is spectacular and filling, with a wide range of fresh and healthy options, including cooked-to-order eggs, cold cuts, cheeses, and fresh pastries. For a special experience with a new gastronomic concept, head to our hotel restaurant, Tablafina, a place where you can enjoy good wine with quality tapas. Snacks and drinks can be enjoyed at the Cafeteria Bar. You can also unwind with a glass of delicious local wine on our terrace. The hotel has a gym for workouts and an outdoor pool for relaxation. Meetings or conferences can be easily accommodated in one of our 14 rooms, the largest of which can hold over to 1,500 people.NH Hoteles

name: Essence Hotel Boutique by Don Paquito
address: Avenida Del Lido S/N, Málaga, Andalusia
description: The Essence Hotel Boutique by Don Paquito is situated in Torremolinos, 100 meters from Playamar and Bajondillo beaches and the seaside promenade. A swimming pool, hot tub and free hammam are featured. Their air-conditioned and heated rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, kettle, coffee maker, safe and minibar. The private bathroom includes hair dryer, bathrobe, shower and free toiletries. The hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool, sun terrace, a hot tub and a turkish bath. Their buffet restaurant offers a range of culinary options. Free WiFi is featured. The Essence Hotel Boutique by Don Paquito is within easy reach of all kinds of attractions, places of interest and the renowned nightlife. Malaga Airport is 12 minutes drive away.

name: Hotel Málaga Nostrum Airport
address: Calle Herman Hesse, No.17, 29004 Málaga, Andalusia
description: NEWLY REFURBISHED HOTEL Hotel Málaga Nostrum is located in a key point of Málaga, just 5 minutes by car from the airport, 10 minutes from the center and 10 minutes from the beach. We offer a unique experience aiding rest and relaxation. Our modern and bright rooms have free Wi-Fi, Smart TV with access to Netflix, air conditioning, desk and minibar. The private bathroom has a hairdryer and toiletries. Discover our breakfasts at Global Restaurant & Lounge, located on the ground floor of the hotel, which also houses our Sport Bar and a large leisure terrace. On the 4th floor you can enjoy the views of the sky of Malaga from our pool, and a splendid Chill Out area. We have a 24-hour reception and covered parking for €5/night for all our clients. Dogs are allowed according to availability with an extra cost of €15/night. Dogs weighing more than 10 kg will not be allowed.

name: Parador de Malaga Golf
address: Autovía MA-20 Málaga-Algeciras Salida 1, 29004 Málaga, Andalusia
description: This luxury hotel blends great golfing with an authentic Andalusian feel and fantastic sea views. Come and enjoy a round beneath the warm, Mediterranean sunshine of the Costa del Sol. The Parador de Málaga Golf sits beside its own magnificent and historic 18-hole golf course. Originally dating from 1925, this course was designed by Tom Simpson, who also built the courses at Muirfield and Turnberry. It also includes 3 putting greens and 2 approach greens. After a round in the sunshine, refresh yourself with a dip in the outdoor swimming pool. Then head to the restaurant to try the delicious local specialities on offer. The hotel building itself is a fine example of Andalusian architecture. Its interior is full of fashionable, contemporary design features which create a unique feel. A seasonal outdoor pool is featured. Plaza Mayor shopping centre can be found 500 metres from the property while Malaga town centre is 10 km away. Malaga Airport is 4 km away from the property.

name: Hotel Romerito
address: C/Espacio 50, 29006 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Hotel Romerito is in Malaga's Los Prados neighborhood, set on the same street as Malaga's Convention Centre, Trade Fair and Auditorium, 800 metres away. It is approximately 5 km from Malaga’s historic centre. The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Romerito feature free WiFi, a plasma TV and a private bathroom. Some rooms have a private terrace. The hotel also has a bar and an excellent restaurant, with à la carte and daily set menus serving Malagan specialities. There are regular bus connections to central Malaga. The nearest beach is 5 km away and Malaga Airport is a 15-minute drive from the Hotel Romerito. On-site parking is available at the hotel.

name: Hotel Humaina
address: Carretera De Colmenar, 29013 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Hotel Humaina offers accommodation in the Mountains of Málaga Nature Reserve, a 40 minutes’ drive from Málaga city centre. It features an outdoor pool and charming rooms with balconies offering mountain views. Each air-conditioned room at Hotel Humaina has been carefully decorated and features plenty of natural light. Rooms include a TV and a private bathroom with hairdryer and free toiletries. Hotel Humaina has a restaurant which serves a variety of regional and traditional dishes. There is also a lounge area where guests can relax while reading a book or having a glass of wine by the fireplace. Bicycles are available for an extra charge. The area is ideal for hiking, cycling or horse riding. Staff at the tour desk can also provide tourist information about the area. The city center is 23 km from the property. Málaga Airport is 50 minutes’ drive from the hotel.

name: El Nogal Home
address: Av. Juan Sebastián Elcano 62, 29017 Málaga, Andalusia
description: This charming guest house features a typical Andalusian patio with a sun terrace. It is located in the peaceful residential area of Pedregalejo, east of Málaga city and close to the beach. The guest house's air-conditioned rooms are decorated in an attractive traditional style. Each room has a private bathroom and offers free Wi-Fi. Hostal El Nogal has an outdoor hot tub which can be used for free during the summer months. Guests have access to a shared kitchen. Beside Hostal El Nogal there is a small café where guests can have breakfast. As well as the beach, the hotel is also just a short journey from the old historic centre, the Picasso museum and all of the bars and nightlife. Regular bus services leave from a stop located outside the building, taking you to Teatinos, Puerta Blanca and the Olympic Stadium.

name: Elcano
address: Avd. Juan Sebastian Elcano 103, 29017 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Located just 250 metres from the beach in Málaga’s eastern district of Pedregalejo, this hotel provides a peaceful setting for your stay in the capital of the Costa del Sol. Free WiFi is available throughout. The Elcano lies a 10-minute journey from the historic centre of this Andalusian port city. The nearby seafront promenade is also a great place to sample the city’s famous seafood cuisine. The hotel’s interior blends cheerful colors with charming traditional furnishings in wrought iron or attractive woods. Outside, the terracotta and whitewashed buildings create an authentically Andalusian feel. The hotel’s glassed terrace provides a great place to enjoy a quiet coffee or beer with a book. A natural Andalusian breakfast is offered at the property. A bike rental service is available. El Candado Nautical and Golf Club is 3 km away. Málaga city centre is 12 minutes' drive from the hotel. A-7 Motorway is a 3-minute drive away. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 20 minutes's drive from the hotel.

name: Toc Hostel Malaga
address: Calle Comedias 18, 29008 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Well set in Málaga, TOC Hostel Malaga provides air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a bar. Popular points of interest nearby include Alcazaba, Museum of Glass and Crystal and Jorge Rando Museum. The accommodation features a shared kitchen, a concierge service and organising tours for guests. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, certain rooms at the hostel also provide guests with a city view. All units include bed linen. Continental and gluten-free breakfast options are available daily at TOC Hostel Malaga. You can play billiards at the accommodation, and bike hire and car hire are available. Speaking English, Spanish, French and Italian at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical guidance on the area. Popular points of interest near TOC Hostel Malaga include La Malagueta Beach, La Caleta Beach and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Malaga, 11 km from the hostel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Domus
address: Calle Juan Valera, 20, 29017 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Situated in Málaga’s quiet Pedregalejo district, Domus is just a 5-minute walk from Pedregalejo Beach. Each stylish room features air conditioning/heating, flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi access. Rooms at the Domus have functional modern design and wooden floors. They all have a work desk and a private bathroom. The Domus serves a simple continental breakfast each morning, and guests can enjoy a drink on the garden terrace. The Domus hotel is located 4 km from Málaga city centre, which can be reached in 10 minutes by bus. The streets around the hotel have a wide range of restaurants and bars.

name: Hotel Brö-Adults Recommended
address: Calle Victoria 22, 29012 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Boasting an outdoor swimming pool, a shared lounge as well as a terrace, Hotel Brö-Adults Recommended is set in the centre of Málaga, 1.3 km from La Malagueta Beach. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.6 km from La Caleta Beach. At the hotel, all rooms have a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Rooms come with a safety deposit box, while some rooms also offer a balcony and others also have city views. All guest rooms feature a wardrobe. Popular points of interest near Hotel Brö-Adults Recommended include Picasso Museum, Alcazaba and Museum of Glass and Crystal. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 10 km from the accommodation.

name: Soho Boutique Castillo de Santa Catalina
address: Ramos Carrión, 38, 29016 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Hotel Soho Boutique Castillo Santa Catalina is located in Malaga and offers free Wi-Fi. It also provides a coffee bar, massage services and an express check-in and check-out feature. This 5-star hotel offers a concierge, luggage storage and a 24-hour reception. Guests can also enjoy free private parking on site. There are 24 rooms at Hotel Soho Boutique Castillo Santa Catalina, each offering all the essentials to ensure a comfortable stay. Honeymoon suites are also available. Hotel Soho Boutique Castillo Santa Catalina offers disabled parking and is an easy car ride from the Picasso Museum, Malaga Cathedral and Malaga (DO). The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Malaga.Revato

name: Casa Hermosa
address: 36 Calle Valencia, 29730 Rincón de la Victoria, Andalusia
description: Located in Torre de Benagalbón in the Andalucía region, with Los Horizontes Beach and Rincon de la Victoria Beach nearby, Casa Hermosa provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking, as well as access to beauty services. Every unit features a private bathroom and shower, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a microwave. A fridge is also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The bed and breakfast offers a terrace. Guests can swim in the outdoor swimming pool, relax in the garden, or go cycling. Los Rubios Beach is 1.9 km from Casa Hermosa, while Gibralfaro Viewpoint is 16 km away. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 30 km from the accommodation.

name: Private, Bright, Spacious House with Pool & Hot Tub
address: Calle Reina 2 - Urbanización Las Colmenillas, 29754 Málaga, Andalusia
description: When you stay at Private, Bright, Spacious House with Pool & Hot Tub in Competa, you'll be in the mountains, within a 15-minute walk of Plaza Almijara and Paseo de las Tradiciones. Featured amenities include express check-out, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Hotel Boutique Villa Lorena by Charming Stay
address: Calle República Argentina, 16A, 29016 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Located in El Limonar, a quiet residential area only 5 minutes’ walk from the beach, Villa Lorena is a charming villa offering a private outdoor swimming pool and free WiFi. Bikes are also available at an additional cost. Hotel Boutique Villa Lorena by Charming Stay Adults Recommended features 7 bedrooms, which have been perfectly decorated. All air-conditioned rooms offer a private bathroom with hairdryer, a safe, flat-screen TV and coffee maker. The Villa has a garden and a sun terrace. Staff at the tour desk is happy to provide tourist information about the area. Malaga City Centre is 5 minutes’ drive from Hotel Boutique Villa Lorena by Charming Stay Adults Recommended or a 10-minute bike ride away. Guests can visit the Picasso Museum or taste the local food in one of the numerous bars and restaurants nearby.

name: Soho Boutique Equitativa
address: Alameda Principal 3, 29001 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Soho Boutique Equitativa features an outdoor swimming pool, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Málaga. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 600 metres from the city centre and 1.5 km from La Malagueta Beach. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Guest rooms include a wardrobe. A buffet breakfast is available daily at Soho Boutique Equitativa. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include La Caleta Beach, Port of Malaga and Malaga Cathedral. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 8 km from Soho Boutique Equitativa.

name: Moon Dreams Calabahia
address: Calle Manuel Fernandez Moreno 6-7, 29720 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Located in Cala del Moral, Moon Dreams Calahabia features a modern sun terrace with swimming pool. This hotel is set 100 metres from the Cala del Moral Beach. The spacious rooms at this property include a flat-screen TV, safe, desk, fridge, and free internet connection. Each private bathroom comes with free toiletries, a bath, and hairdryer. The property has free WiFi in the reception area and free wired internet in the rooms. There is an outdoor swimming pool available for guests. The property also offers a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, and ticket services. Málaga Airport is a 20-minute drive from Moon Dreams Calahabia, and Málaga City Centre is 15 km away.

name: Rincón Sol
address: Avenida Del Mediterraneo, 174, Málaga, Andalusia
description: Rincón Sol is set at the beachfront of Rincón de la Victoria. It offers a range of leisure facilities such as a restaurant and cafeteria, a nightclub and a seasonal beach bar. Air-conditioned rooms at Rincón Sol are modern and spacious, featuring a private terrace with views of the promenade, the main street or the sea. They have a minibar, a satellite TV and a private bathroom, as well as free Wi-Fi and a safe. Guests can rent bikes onsite, and activities such as golf, tennis and paddle tennis can be practiced on the area. Other facilities include meeting and banquet rooms. Set on the Axarquía Route, this hotel is 10 km away from Málaga. Private parking is offered for an extra cost.

name: Residencia Universitaria Campus Málaga
address: Calle Mesonero Romanos 13, 29010 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 304 guestrooms featuring microwaves. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms with showers are provided. Amenities Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including a fitness center and a seasonal outdoor pool. Additional features at this hostel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a communal living room. This hostel is 3 mi (4.8 km) from Málaga Cathedral and 4 mi (6.4 km) from Picasso Museum Malaga. name: Welcome Hostel
address: Calle Peñuelas, 26, 29140 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Offering air-conditioned rooms in the Churriana district of Churriana, Welcome Hostel is 2.6 km from Campo de Golf Beach. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and a shared lounge, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is set 9.2 km from Automobile and Fashion Museum. The units in the hostel are equipped with a kettle. At Welcome Hostel all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Benalmadena Puerto Marina is 10 km from the accommodation, while Malaga María Zambrano Train Station is 11 km away. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 1 km from Welcome Hostel.

name: Hotel Best Siroco
address: Carril del Siroco, s/n, 29630 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Hotel Best Siroco is situated just 250 metres from Torre Bermeja Beach. Set in gardens, this hotel has 2 seasonal outdoor swimming pools and rooms with balconies. Hotel Best Siroco has brightly decorated rooms with wooden floors and furnishings. Each room has a TV and air conditioning. Free WiFi is available. Buffet meals and Spanish dishes are prepared and served in Best Siroco’s restaurant with its show kitchen. Guests can enjoy a drink in the terrace bar, where there is free WiFi access. Gluten-free food is available. Facilities include a gym, and a Turkish bath and sauna are available at an extra cost. Hotel Best Siroco is just 10 minutes’ walk from Torre Bermeja Marina and Torrequebrada Golf Course is approximately 3 km away.

name: Hotel Malaga Picasso
address: Calle Acacias de Guadalmar, 153, 29620 Torremolinos, Andalusia
description: The Málaga Picasso Hotel is set near Guadalmar Beach and just 2.5 km from Málaga Airport. An outdoor swimming pool and a hot tub are set within attractive gardens. Free WiFi is provided. Rooms at the hotel are simply decorated and feature air conditioning and tiled, terracotta floors. Rooms have access to the gardens and swimming pool. The Málaga Picasso has a lounge and terrace where guests can sit and relax. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. The Parador de Málaga Golf Resort is just over 1 km from the Picasso and the Aqualand Water Park is 5 km away. Málaga Picasso is close to public transport links to Málaga city centre, 5km away. Attractions include the Moorish castle, the Alcazaba and the Cathedral. The city also has many museums, shops and restaurants.

name: Hotel Maria Cristina
address: Avda. De Málaga, 18, 29720 Rincón de la Victoria, Andalusia
description: The 2-star Maria Cristina Hotel offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in RincÃ³n De La Victoria. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. To be found at the hotel are facilities for disabled guests, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, airport transfer, meeting facilities. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Enjoy the hotel's recreational facilities, including golf course (on site), before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that RincÃ³n De La Victoria has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Maria Cristina Hotel.priceline.com

name: Villa Antumalal B&B
address: Camino Santa Paula 4, 29016 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Located in Málaga, less than 1 km from La Caleta Beach and a 17-minute walk from La Malagueta Beach, Villa Antumalal B&B provides accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning, pool with a view and a garden. There is a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer in each unit, along with free toiletries. Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy a continental breakfast. Villa Antumalal B&B offers a sun terrace. Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area. Baños del Carmen Beach is 2 km from the accommodation, while Gibralfaro Viewpoint is 2.2 km away. The nearest airport is Malaga, 11 km from Villa Antumalal B&B, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Soho Boutique Las Vegas
address: Paseo Sancha 22, 29016 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Situated on the seafront overlooking La Malagueta Beach, Soho Boutique Las Vegas offers an outdoor pool, gardens and airy rooms with a private balcony. Malaga city centre is just 2.5 km away. Rooms at Soho Boutique Las Vegas are spacious and air conditioned. They all include free Wi-Fi, a safe, satellite TV and a marble bathroom with a hairdryer. A continental breakfast buffet is served in the hotel's poolside café. There is also a café-bar at reception. Luggage storage and visitor information are available from the 24-hour reception. Limited parking is available on site for a surcharge and reservations are not possible. There is a range of bars and restaurants within 50 metres of the Soho Boutique Las Vegas. Málaga Cathedral and the Picasso Museum are a 30-minute walk away, and regular buses to the city centre stop near the hotel.

name: Sunset Beach Club Hotel Apartments
address: Av. Del Sol, 5, Benalmádena, 29630 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Sunset Beach Club Hotel Apartments are located on the shores of the Mediterranean Sea, and feature 2 large outdoor pools, and 2 children’s pools. Facilities include 6 seasonal bars and restaurants, a large supermarket, and free wi-fi. All Apartments at the Sunset Beach Club have a balcony or terrace, fully equipped kitchenette, individually controlled air-conditioning/heating, satellite TV, and safe. A hair & beauty salon and fitness centre are also available (fees apply). Free guest activities and entertainment are offered all year round. Guests can enjoy hot buffet breakfasts and dinners inside the Oasis Restaurant. A la carte lunches and dinners, afternoon snacks and cocktails, are available at La Terraza terrace restaurant. The Panorama Bar boasts spectacular sea views, and shows live international sports on TV.

name: Hostal Tilos
address: Grilo, 3, 29006 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Located 500 metres from Malaga Train Station, Hostal los Tilos offers free Wi-Fi. Well connected with public transports, it is 100 metres from Malaga Bus Station. Rooms at Hostal los Tilos come with single and double rooms with a private bathroom with free toiletries and bath or shower. Rooms feature a flat-screen TV, wardrobe and some have a private balcony. Bed linen and towels are also provided. You can find several restaurants and traditional chiringuitos serving fish, seafood, paella and sangria along the coast. El Corte Inglés Shopping Center open till late is 700 metres away. Hostal los Tilos is 15 minutes’ walk from Malaga sandy beach. Famous Alcazaba Moorish Castle is 2 km away and you can walk to the city center ion 20 minutes. Free bike parking is available on site.

name: Finca Serrato
address: Diseminado Lagar Serrato 1, Piso Pbj, Málaga, Andalusia
description: Located in Colmenar, 28 km from Picasso Museum, Finca Serrato offers accommodation with free WiFi, a terrace or a balcony and access to a garden and a seasonal outdoor pool. Some units are air conditioned and include a seating and/or dining area and a flat-screen TV. A continental breakfast is available daily at the bed and breakfast. Finca Serrato offers a picnic area. If you would like to discover the area, hiking is possible in the surroundings. Jorge Rando Museum is 28 km from the accommodation, while Alcazaba is 28 km away. The nearest airport is Malaga, 36 km from Finca Serrato, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Casa María
address: Calle Poniente, 29750 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Situated in Málaga, Casa María offers accommodation with a terrace or a balcony, free WiFi and flat-screen TV, as well as a shared lounge. There is a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer in each unit, along with free toiletries. Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Playa de la Mezquitilla, Algarrobo Costa Beach and Playa de la Caleta de Vélez. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 52 km from Casa María.

name: Bed & Breakfast Villa Botánica
address: 4 Calle Bogor, 29190 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Located in Málaga, 5.9 km from Malaga María Zambrano Train Station and 6.3 km from Jorge Rando Museum, Bed & Breakfast Villa Botánica provides accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning, an outdoor swimming pool and a garden. Some units include a terrace and/or a balcony with sea or pool views. A continental breakfast is available daily at the bed and breakfast. Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area. Automobile and Fashion Museum is 6.8 km from Bed & Breakfast Villa Botánica, while Picasso Museum is 7.1 km away. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 11 km from the accommodation.

name: Rooms in Seafront Villa
address: Calle Islas Canarias 23, 29018 Málaga, Andalusia
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a seasonal outdoor pool and free WiFi, as well as an outdoor entertainment area and a garden. Other amenities include down comforters, laundry facilities, towels, and a picnic area.Expedia

name: Hostal Doña Manuela
address: Marianela, 1-3, 29590 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Situated in the Campanillas district in Málaga, next to Andalusia Technology Park, Hostal Doña Manuela features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. Every room is equipped with a flat-screen TV. You will find a coffee machine in the room. There is luggage storage space at the property. Carmen Thyssen Museum is 11 km from Hostal Doña Manuela, while Calle Larios is 11 km from the property. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 8 km from Hostal Doña Manuela.

name: Fay Victoria Beach
address: Avenida Del Mediterraneo, 230, 29730 Rincón de la Victoria, Andalusia
description: Situated on the beachfront in Rincón de la Victoria, The Fay Victoria Beach Hotel belongs to Añoreta Golf, a golf course located just 2.5 km from the Hotel where you can enjoy special conditions. Hotel Fay Victoria Beach’s terrace café is set directly on the seafront promenade. Rooms at the Hotel Fay Victoria Beach have wooden floors and bright décor. They include satellite TV, a rental safe and a bathroom with a hairdryer. Information about the region is available from the hotel’s 24-hour reception desk. Hotel Fay Victoria Beach is located on the Costa del Sol, a 5-minute drive from the A7 Motorway. Málaga city centre is 15 km away, while Málaga Airport is within a 30-minute drive.

description: Set a 10-minute walk from the beach, Camping Torremolinos offers air-conditioned bungalows and mobile homes with a private patio and TV. The campsite features a bar and a restaurant. Some bungalows or mobile homes have a bathroom and a kitchen. Camping Torremolinos offers free WiFi throughout its premises. Malaga Airport is 4 km from the campsite and Malaga city centre is a 10-minute drive away. You can reach Aqualand Water Park and Plaza Mayor Shopping Centre in a 5-minute drive. Free parking is available on site.

name: Hotel Complejo Los Rosales
address: Urbanización El Olivar, Avenida Ricardo Gross, 8, 29620 Torremolinos, Andalusia
description: Hotel Complejo Los Rosales is located in the El Olivar residential estate, just 5 minutes’ drive from Málaga Airport. It has an outdoor pool and a multi-sports court. The air-conditioned rooms at Los Rosales feature a private terrace with views of the sea and the airport. Each one comes with free Wi-Fi, a TV and a private bathroom with a bath. tThe hotel offers traditional Spanish food during July and August.There is also a snack bar open all year and a daily buffet breakfast is available. A shuttle service to Playamar beach is available upon request subject to availability. Hotel Complejo Los Rosales is 300 metres from a bus stop which connects you with central Málaga, which is 12 km away. You can drive to the beach and Torremolinos town centre in 5 minutes. Shopping centers are within 15 minutes walk of the property.

name: El Manantial
address: Cenit, 2, 29190 Málaga, Andalusia
description: El Manantial guest house features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and garden with barbecue facilities. It is located 8 km from the centre of Málaga on the south coast of Andalucía. The house is set in spacious gardens and includes a terrace and small children’s pool in addition to the large outdoor pool. The guest house has an on-site restaurant which offers local Mediterranean specialities. The double or twin bedrooms are spacious and modern and offer views of the town. They include free Wi-Fi, air conditioning and private bathroom with shower and hairdryer. Rooms also have a TV, and towels and bed linen are provided. El Manantial is 7.5 km from the beach and 20 km from Montes De Malaga Nature Reserve. It is located 20 km from the ancient towns of Torremolinos and Benalmádena.

name: 2 Bed Townhouse with garden patio overlooking La Cala Cove & Sea
description: Featuring a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, a garden, and a terrace, 2 Bed Townhouse with garden patio overlooking La Cala Cove & Sea provides accommodation in Málaga with free WiFi and sea views. This property offers a private pool and free private parking. The air-conditioned chalet consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the chalet. A private beach area is available on site. Popular points of interest near the chalet include Playa de La Cala - La Butibamba, Playa El Bombo - Cabo Rocoso and Playa de Calahonda - Rocas del Mar. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 37 km from 2 Bed Townhouse with garden patio overlooking La Cala Cove & Sea.
