It features a variety of on-site activities, including tennis, basketball and children’s entertainment. The hotel spa has a sauna and spa bath. Guests can also enjoy a range of massage and beauty treatments. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. Blue Sea Hotel Puerto Resort’s air-conditioned rooms feature carpeted floors and a balcony with sea, mountain or pool views. They are equipped with satellite TV and a mini bar. The hotel serves an international buffet breakfast and dinner. There is also a snack bar and a poolside bar. Puerto Resort is just 1.5 km from Lago Martíanez, and 5.5 km from the town of Orotava. Teide National Park is 40 km away and Tenerife North Airport can be reached in 20 minutes by car.

name: Don Gregory by Dunas, Adults Only
address: Calle de Las Dalias, 11, San Agustin, Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Don Gregory by Dunas - Adults Only is next to Gran Canaria’s Las Burras Beach, in the San Agustín area of Playa del Inglés. It has an outdoor swimming pool and gym. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. All air-conditioned rooms at the Don Gregory have a private balcony/terrace with Atlantic Ocean views. Rooms feature satellite TV, and a minibar and safe are available to hire. Don Gregory by Dunas - Adults Only has gardens and sun terraces. There is a poolside snack bar and the on-site restaurant serves buffet meals, with regular themed dinners. The hotel is located 3 km from the centre of Playa del Inglés, in an area full of shops and bars. San Agustín Shopping Centre is opposite the hotel, and Maspalomas Golf Course is 4 km away. There is a 24-hour front desk, and parking is available for an extra charge.

name: Hotel Diamar
address: Avda. Fred Olsen nº 8, 35500 Arrecife, Lanzarote
description: Overlooking the sandy Reducto Beach, Hotel Diamar is set in the city of Arrecife, capital of the island of Lanzarote. The 3-star hotel features a restaurant and free Wi-Fi. Each air-conditioned room features a TV with satellite channels. Featuring a bath, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer. Some rooms have a sea view. Besides the restaurant, guests can enjoy a bar and a breakfast buffet. Hotel Diamar also features a meeting room and a terrace. Set in the city centre, a large variety of shops, bars and restaurants can be found within 5 minutes’ walk. The charming Charco de San Ginés can be reached in 10 minutes on foot. Lanzarote Airport is 5 km away, as well as Arrecife Port.

name: Hotel Zentral Center
address: Avenida Arquitecto Gomez Cuesta, Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Hotel Zentral Center is next to Tenerife’s Las Americas Golf Club, 400 metres from Playa de las Americas Beach. It has an outdoor swimming pool, a hot tub and sauna. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. Rooms at the Zentral Center are modern and air-conditioned. They all include a TV, safe and minibar. Rooms also have a private bathroom. The Zentral Center Hotel has an elegant restaurant and a bar. There are also spacious lounge areas. The 24-hour reception offers currency exchange, and car and bicycle rental. Hotel Zentral Center is set in a quiet area of Las Americas, in southern Tenerife. Tenerife Sur Airport is around 15 km away.

name: Mirador Maspalomas by Dunas
address: Calle Einstein Sonnenland, E-35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria, Spain., 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Mirador Maspalomas by Dunas is located in the Sonnenland area of Maspalomas, in Gran Canaria. It offers 2 outdoor pools with loungers, a hot tub, and rooms with private balconies. All rooms at the Mirador Maspalomas by Dunas feature tiled floors and light furniture. They are also equipped with ceiling fan, flat screen TV with international channels, and a balcony or a terrace. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Pool towels are available for an additional cost. The Mirador Maspalomas’ restaurant serves a variety of Spanish and international food. There is also a poolside bar and a Discotheque (only open in winter (Nov-Apr). Children can enjoy a separated pool and a club with an entertainment program. Guests can benefit from a pool table. Other facilities include a wellness centre with beauty treatments and massages for a surcharge. Playa del Inglés Beach and Playa Meloneras Beach are 3 km from the hotel, and there is a free bus service 4 times a day. Here you can find a range of watersports facilities, and there are 2 golf courses within 2 km.

name: Gf Victoria
address: Calle Fernando Lopez Arvelo, 1, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Located in Costa Adeje just 150 m from Playa del Duque Beach, GF Victoria offers 4 bathing areas and 2 restaurants. Free private parking is available on site. The 242 Suites offer a bedroom with ensuite bathroom, lounge area with separate WC, kettle, coffee-maker and minibar. Smart TV, safety deposit box, air-conditioning and amenities are provided. Free WiFi is available in public areas. Guests will find an adult pool, a family area and naturist pool on the property. GF Victoria also features a glass pool, with transparent walls and bottom which overhangs the façade of the hotel. Children will enjoy the aquatic park, which includes a surf pool. Guests will find sun loungers service. The wide gastronomic offer includes the cuisine of the à la carte restaurant Donaire, and the buffet restaurant Chaboco, where children can learn about healthy food choices. Guests can visit the chill-out Sky Bar Zambra only for adults. Plaza del Duque Shopping Centre is a 2-minute walk from the accommodation, while Gran Sur Shopping Centre is 1.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tenerife Sur Airport, 17 km from GF Victoria.

name: Seaside Grand Hotel Residencia
address: Avenida Del Oasis, 32, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: This luxury complex, set in tropical gardens, is 400 metres from Gran Canaria’s Maspalomas Dunes. Spanish colonial-style villas have private balconies or terraces, and there is a free spa and a heated outdoor pool. Air-conditioned villas at Seaside Grand Hotel Residencia are decorated in relaxing blues and yellows by French interior designer Alberto Pinto. They have modern facilities like satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. Grand Hotel Residencia guests have free access to the spa’s gym, hydro-massage saltwater pool, sauna and Turkish bath. Free Taichi and agua-gym classes are also available at the neighbouring Seaside Palm Beach. The restaurant serves Canarian and international cuisine. It has an outdoor terrace with views of the lush gardens and mountains. There is a poolside snack bar and a piano bar. Guests have free access to a tennis court and other facilities in the Hotel Seaside Palm Beach complex 200 metres away, and Meloneras Golf Course is 2 km from the hotel. There is also a DVD library with films in various languages.

name: ClubHotel Riu Gran Canaria
address: Urb. Las Meloneras, 35106 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: This wonderful hotel is located in Meloneras, lying close to the sea. The hotel is nestled amidst 30,000 m² of gardens, enjoying an air of peace and serenity. Guests will find themselves just 1 km away from the sprawling dune beach of Maspalomas. The hotel is situated just 100 metres away from links to the public transport network. This wonderful hotel comprises elegantly-appointed guest rooms, suites and apartments, meeting the needs of every type of traveller. The accommodation options feature modern amenities, for added comfort and convenience. Guests will be pleased to find the wide array of exemplary facilities and services that this wonderful hotel has to offer.FarePortal

name: Iberostar Selection Lanzarote Park
address: Avenida Archipielago, 7, 35580 Yaiza, Lanzarote
description: This beachfront hotel is situated a short walk from the bay of Playa Flamingo, enjoying impressive views of the Atlantic Ocean around Lanzarote. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Rooms at Iberostar Selection Lanzarote Park feature a TV and the bathroom includes free toiletries. Beach towels, bathrobe and slippers, a Nespresso Coffee machine, kettle and free safe are provided in the Star Prestige rooms. This hotel features 4 outdoor swimming pools for adults and 3 for children. There is a free gym and sun terrace with sun loungers. The spa, available for a surcharge, includes a sauna, a hammam and a hot tub. Timanfaya National Park is 20 km from Iberostar Selection Lanzarote Park, and a 30-minute drive will take you to Lanzarote Airport.

name: Barceló Corralejo Bay - Adults Only
address: Avenida Grandes Playas, 12, 35660 Corralejo, Fuerteventura
description: The hotel Barcelo Corralejo Bay - Adults Only hotel 4 stars has an unparalleled location 80 m from the beach and 3 km from the Dunas de Corralejo Natural Park in the north of Fuerteventura. Only for adults aged 18 and older a heaven for anyone looking for relaxation and rest.Its 241 rooms are perfect for unwinding for a few days in the utmost tranquillity. The hotel has a wonderful U.Spa where you can enjoy a massage or hydromassage and keep in shape in the fitness studio or regain energy at the poolside bar-restaurant. For a romantic holiday by the shores of the Atlantic Ocean or a business trip in unbeatable surroundings well away from the daily grind Barcelo Corralejo Bay- Adults Only is undoubtedly the best choice for adults only.Barcelo.com

name: Hotel Fariones
address: C/ Roque Del Este 1, 35510 Tías, Lanzarote
description: Set within tropical gardens, Hotel Fariones has direct access cove in Puerto del Carmen. The main infinity pool is surrounded by palm trees and an infinity pool on rooftop with panoramic views. All rooms offer views of the Atlantic Ocean. Hotel Fariones has restaurants, a la carte restaurants with Macaronesia cuisine and Asian restaurant. The property also has a snack bar located in the main pool and a main buffet. The Hotel Fariones has a tennis court, a sauna and massage service which can be found at the Fariones Sports Center 50 meters from the hotel. Puerto del Carmen's main beach is just 50 metres from Hotel Fariones and has a direct access from hotel. Lanzarote Airport is 10 km away from Fariones while Arrecife is 16 km away.

name: Aloe Vera Shared House
address: Calle Orquidea 5, 38612 El Médano, Tenerife
description: Offering a year-round outdoor pool and a patio with seaviews, Aloe Vera Shared House is located in El Médano in the Tenerife Region. The property offers filtered drinking water, green electricity and sustainable furniture. The rooms come with a shared bathroom. Aloe Vera Shared House features free WiFi throughout the property. You will find luggage storage space at the property. The area is popular for diving, snorkeling, surfing and hiking. Playa de las Americas is 20 km from Aloe Vera Shared House, while Puerto de la Cruz is 40 km away. The nearest airport is Tenerife Sur Airport, 5 km from the property.

name: HD Beach Resort
address: Avenida Islas Canarias, s/n, 35509 Costa Teguise, Lanzarote
description: Located 250 metres from Las Cucharas Beach, on Lanzarote’s Costa Teguise, HD Beach Resort offers tennis courts, gym, spa and outdoor pool. The spa includes an indoor pool, sauna, hot tub and Turkish bath. Air-conditioned suites have a balcony with views of the Atlantic Ocean or mountains. There is a seating area with a sofa bed, safe and flat-screen satellite TV. A fridge, toaster and coffee maker are provided, and a microwave is available on request. The HD Beach Resort features 2 restaurants. It also has a bar and snack bar, and packed lunches can be requested. The complex has free Wi-Fi and on-site water sports facilities. There is a night club and entertainment staff. Free parking is offered nearby, and you can hire a car or bicycle from the tour desk. An airport shuttle service is available for a supplement.

name: Hotel Livvo Costa Taurito & Aquapark
address: Alcazaba, 1, 35138 Taurito, Gran Canaria
description: Hotel LIVVO Costa Taurito & Aquapark is located in Gran Canaria’s Taurito Valley, a 5-minute bus or car ride from the fishing village of Mogán. Surrounded by gardens, this elegant hotel offers tennis, paddle and squash courts, a mini golf course and an outdoor pool. The water park includes Gran Canaria’s largest saltwater pool, as well as slides and a pirate ship. Each modern air-conditioned room at Hotel LIVVO Costa Taurito & Aquapark has a private balcony and a minibar. Bathrooms include a hairdryer. Hotel LIVVO Costa Taurito & Aquapark has a Mediterranean restaurant with show cooking and thematic evenings, and a snack bar by the pool. The 24-hour reception offers car rental, and there is free public parking on site. When making a reservation at the Hotel LIVVO Costa Taurito & Aquapark, the entrance to the water park is included: Lago Oasis every day except the day of departure. All services included do not apply inside the water park. Lago Taurito water park will be partially closed (children's area is affected) from 24/04/23 to 31/05/23 and totally closed from 01/11/23 to 12/12/23 due to improvements to the facilities. We apologize for the inconvenience.

name: Aqua Suites
address: Anzuelo, 23, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Lanzarote
description: Aqua Suites is a boutique hotel in Puerto del Carmen. This property features a swimming pool and hot tub. It is 10 walking minutes away from the beach. Each modern suite Aqua Suites has a private furnished terrace and air conditioning. There is a satellite TV, a living area with kettle and fridge and a bathroom with hairdryer, free toiletries. This resort is 12 km from Arrecife Airport. The property offers free parking.

name: Sol Tenerife
address: Avenida Rafael Puig Llivina, 12, 38640 Arona, Tenerife
description: Sol Tenerife is located 200 metres from the beach in Tenerife’s Playa de las Américas Resort. It offers 3 outdoor pools with sun loungers, a tennis court and rooms with a furnished balcony with partial or front sea views. The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Sol Tenerife feature tiled floors and cheerful colours. They are equipped with satellite TV, fridge, desk and chair. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer. There is free WiFi available in all areas of the hotel. The hotel has a kids' club, hairdressers and supermarket on site. Sports facilities include a volleyball court and a small football pitch. There is also a massage service. The Tenerife Sol’s restaurant serves international buffet meals. There are also 2 bars, including a poolside bar. Las Américas Golf Course is 500 metres away from the hotel. Tenerife Sur Airport is 14 km away. You can take a boat to La Gomera Island in 35 minutes.

name: Tui Blue Suite Princess - Adults Only
address: Calle Alcazaba, 4, 35138 Mogán, Gran Canaria
description: Stop at Suite Princess to discover the wonders of Gran Canaria. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the property's facilities and services. All the necessary facilities, including infirmary, wheelchair accessible, 24-hour front desk, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, are at hand. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Suite Princess is an excellent choice from which to explore Gran Canaria or to simply relax and rejuvenate.Agoda

name: Hotel Lava Beach
address: Calle Marte 6, 35510 Tías, Lanzarote
description: Set in Puerto del Carmen, Hotel Lava Beach offers 5-star accommodation with a fitness centre, a garden and a terrace. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a restaurant. The tour desk is available to assist guests in planning their days out. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the property. You can play mini-golf at the hotel. Puerto del Carmen is 2 km from Hotel Lava Beach. The nearest airport is Lanzarote Airport, 6 km from the property.

name: Sbh Costa Calma Palace Thalasso & Spa
address: Avenida Jahn Reisen, 35627 Costa Calma, Fuerteventura
description: This elegant hotel, 50 metres from Fuerteventura’s Costa Calma Beach, features indoor and outdoor pools, a spa and free parking. All air-conditioned rooms have a private balcony with sea views. The SBH Costa Calma Palace & Spa offers 2 tennis courts, a giant chess board, and a golf area with a putting green. You can also go windsurfing and diving for an additional charge. The large, bright rooms at the SBH Costa Calma Palace & Spa come with satellite TV. You can rent a safe, and the private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer. Guests can relax in the Costa Calma Palace thalassotherapy spa, with its indoor seawater swimming pool and treatments. There is a gym and sauna, and massage is available. The hotel has a restaurant and 2 bars. You can also have lunch or a drink at the poolside snack bar. Live music and shows are offered daily.

name: Hotel Spa Villalba
address: Calle San Roque, 38613 Vilaflor, Tenerife
description: Hotel Spa Villalba has a peaceful setting, high in the mountains of Tenerife. It offers a spa, indoor and outdoor swimming pools and free WiFi in public areas. The hotel is 15km from the Teide National Park. This UNESCO World Heritage Site contains El Teide, Spain’s highest mountain. The hotel is set in the village of Vilaflor. There are many natural parks nearby. These include the Natural Monument of Montaña Colorada. Rooms at the Spa Villalba are comfortable and bright. They have air conditioning, a minibar and satellite TV. There are also bathrobes to use in the spa. The spa and fitness centre includes a Turkish bath, sauna, sanarium, pebble path, a pool and hot tub. Massage treatments are available. The hotel also has a relaxing sun terrace and garden.

name: Caybeach Sun
address: Las Breñas 2, Playa Blanca, Lanzarote
description: Apartments at Caybeach Sun are located beside the beach in Playa Blanca and are set around a series of fantastic open-air pools and landscaped gardens with palm trees – enjoy playing on the tennis courts. Each of these bright and airy Cay Beach Apartments has 1 or 2 bedrooms. You can cook up a feast in the well-equipped kitchen and then dine with friends. Soak up the glorious sunshine which Lanzarote enjoys the majority of the year and then cool off in one of 2 pools. Children will have fun and make friends in the children’s play area and in their own, separate pool. Let yourself be entertained by the Cay Beach Sun Lanzarote’s fantastic entertainment programme with activities for all the family. Stay outdoors and active with a game of tennis and then relax with a drink from the poolside bar. You can also enjoy a light snack from the bar. Enjoy a good book or an afternoon siesta in the pleasant shade of the Cay Sun Beach’s palm trees.

name: Marylanza Suites & Spa
address: Calle Los Arenales, 20, 38650 Arona, Tenerife
description: This modern hotel with original architecture offers everything is needed for a perfect holiday. The ample and comfortable rooms have an independent bedroom, lounge, kitchen, full bathroom and balcony/terrace. The gastronomical choice includes our Buffet Tagoror, a snack at La Palapa or an exquisite sampling menu at Kentia. Can be fond too a wide selection of drinks at any of the bars by the Pool or in the Lobby, as well as the Belingo Disco featuring shows and musical performances. This complex offers three pools and varied entertainment with a playground, table tennis, billiard and squash among other activities. The combination of these magnificent facilities with the exclusive health centre (spa, wellness, fitness and pilates) results in a unique holiday experience.FarePortal

name: Bungalows Cordial Sandy Golf
address: Campo Internacional
description: Set in the old touristic town of Maspalomas, the bungalows are ideally located next to the golf course and just 2 km from the spectacular nature reserve of the Dunes of Maspaloma. Just a few minutes away from the shopping centre, Faro 2, these comfortable and completely-renovated bungalows are also within easy reach of golf and tennis facilities. In addition to this, a free shuttle bus is offered to the beach of Maspalomas and the centre of Playa del Inglés. The bungalows are completed by access to the resort’s swimming pool (heated in winter), and poolside snack bar. Meals are offered at Cordial Green Golf, just in front of the complex.

name: H10 Sentido White Suites
address: Calle Janubio 1, 35580 Playa Blanca, Lanzarote
description: Boutique Hotel H10 White Suites - Adults Only is built in a traditional, whitewashed Canarian style, and is set in Lanzarote’s Playa Blanca. It is in a small fishing village in the south of the island. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. The air-conditioned suites feature a private balcony or terrace. Each one will come with an iPod docking station and an LCD TV with international channels. There is also a minibar, 1 free bottle of water on arrival, and a Nespresso coffee maker with 4 free capsules per day. The private bathroom includes a bathrobe, slippers and hairdryer. The property offers 2 outdoor pools, a fitness and beauty centre and stylish accommodation with views of the pool or garden. The property’s beauty centre offers a range of personalised massages and treatments. There is also a sauna, a hot tub and a sun terrace. The property also offers a daily programme of Pilates, Tai Chi and other activities. Boutique Hotel H10 White Suites - Adults Only’s Galeón Restaurant serves buffet meals with show cooking, which you can enjoy on the terrace. There are also 3 bars, including a poolside bar with Balinese beds and another which offers lunch and an extensive entertainment programme. Diabetic and celiac menus will be available on request. Private parking is available for an extra cost, and 24-hour medical assistance is available on site. There is a supermarket next to the property, and Arrecife and its airport are around 30 km away.

name: Park Club Europe
address: Avenida Rafael Puig, 23, 38660 Arona, Tenerife
description: Set in tropical gardens just a few metres from the sea, Europe Park Club offers 2 outdoor pools, tennis courts and a free Wi-Fi zone. It is a short walk from some of the best beaches in the south of Tenerife. Rooms at Europe Park Club have a balcony and a ceiling fan. Decorated in warm colours, rooms include satellite TV, a seating area and a private bathroom. Each evening, you can dine in one of the complex’s restaurants, where you can enjoy buffet-style meals. Barbecue meals are served on the terrace of the Gavina restaurant, open seasonally. Park Club Europe features a gym, and offers a wellness program. It also offers a variety of activities including archery, volleyball, and football, among others. Europe Park is located in the popular resort of Playa de las Americas. You can walk to the beach in 7 minutes. The centre of Los Cristianos is only 2 km away.

name: Iberostar Grand Salomé - Adults Only
address: Calle Londres 15, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: These luxury suites on the Costa Adeje all have a balcony and a hot tub. Grand Hotel Salomé has a Spa Sensations, wellness centre and a modern gym. Free high speed WiFi is available throughout. This boutique hotel has a large outdoor swimming pool, surrounded by a sun terrace and a pool bar. There is also a tennis court. The Grand Hotel Salomé has a huge outdoor relaxation area, with armchairs and sea views. The hotel restaurant also has a terrace with sea views. The hotel is set between Duque and Fañabé Beach in Tenerife. The area is ideal for diving, golf and windsurfing. All rooms have a flat-screen TV and a bathrobe. 50 meters from the beach. Costa Adeje all have a balcony OR TERRACE and a hot tub. This boutique hotel features a large outdoor pool AND INFINITY POOL.

name: Salobre Hotel Resort & Serenity
address: Calle Swing, Salobre Golf Resort, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Set within the 18-hole Salobre Golf Course, Salobre Hotel Resort & Serenity features 7 outdoor swimming pools and a spa. This hotel is 15 minutes' drive from Maspalomas. Guest rooms at the resort are equipped with a terrace with mountain views as well as a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a bath. A safe is available at no extra charge. Salobre Hotel Resort & Serenity features 3 restaurants offering a wide range of international and local dishes. Guests can also have a drink in one of the 3 bars available. The wellness centre offers a variety of facial and body treatments. Guests can also join the on-site gym or sports activities such as yoga, basketball or cycling. The property offers a free shuttle to Meloneras Beach. Playa del Ingles is 7 km from Salobre Hotel Resort & Serenity, while Playa de las Burras is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 31 km from the property. Please note that both the Sunset Pool and the Spa Centre are adults only. Please note beach transfer is possible every hour from 11:00 to 18:00, subject to availability. Please note that the Gala dinner on the 31st December is included for all rates. Half board dinners are buffet-style. All guests will need to provide a valid ID, including children. Please note that guests must present the credit card used to make the reservation on arrival. Since 17th October 2022, The New and The Old Course merged to feature three different loops by combining the Old Course’s 18 holes and holes 1 to 3 and 13 to 18 of par 36 New Course that will defy you to enjoy the challenges of a course with unparalleled personality.

name: Barceló Santiago - Adults Only
address: Calle La Hondura, 8, 38683 Santiago del Teide, Tenerife
description: The hotel is situated in the area of South Tenerife that has the most beautiful landscapes with unique views of the island of La Gomera and the cliffs of Los Gigantes. Recently renovated this unique and attractive hotel has a wide variety of facilities for your complete relaxation. Enjoy large and comfortable rooms with sea views its 3 swimming pools one of them heated its spa and direct access to the beach from the hotel only 200 m away. In addition lovers of good food will enjoy the hotels fabulous cuisine ranging from the most traditional to the most international of cooking.Barcelo.com

name: H10 Conquistador
address: Avenida Rafael Puig, 36, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: H10 Conquistador is situated on Tenerife and offers 4-star accommodation as well as outdoor tennis courts and a Turkish steam bath. This modern hotel is close to everything Playa de las Americas has to offer. There are a range of facilities at H10 Conquistador that guests can enjoy, such as body treatments, a swimming pool and a golf course. The hotel's amenities, such as meeting rooms, kids pool, kids club and playground, and massage make this an ideal choice for business travellers, families and couples alike. After a day of exploring the nearby area, guests can relax in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. All provide a mini bar, a flat-screen TV and an in-room safe. H10 Conquistador is within walking distance of Playa de las Vistas. The hotel's multilingual staff will make sure that every guest has a comfortable stay.Revato

name: Plus Fariones Suite Hotel
address: C/. Acatife, 2, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Lanzarote
description: The Plus Fariones Suite Hotel offers direct access to the beach and 3 outdoor pools. It offers rooms with terrace and views of the Atlantic Ocean and is a 10-minute drive from Lanzarote airport. Free sun loungers and towels are provided. The bright suites have a living room with satellite TV. The property offers free safes. Plus Fariones Suite Hotel has a buffet restaurant and a poolside snack bar. There are shops and restaurants nearby. There is a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. Puerto del Carmen Marina is 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Lanzarote Golf Course is 3 km away.

name: Caybeach Princess
address: Sonneland
description: Caybeach Princess features an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a restaurant and bar in Maspalomas. This 3-star resort offers a kids' club, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The accommodation offers evening entertainment and free shuttle service. At the resort every room comes with air conditioning, a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a terrace with a garden view. Caybeach Princess provides certain units with pool views, and all rooms come with a coffee machine. All units will provide guests with a fridge. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or a Full English/Irish breakfast. Caybeach Princess offers a children's playground. Meloneras Beach is 2.8 km from the resort, while De Las Mujeres Beach is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 30 km from Caybeach Princess.

name: Bahia Principe Sunlight Costa Adeje
address: Calle Idafe, 38670 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Set in Adeje, 600 metres from Playa Las Salinas, Bahia Principe Sunlight Costa Adeje provides accommodation with a garden, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. Among the facilities at this property are an ATM and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, karaoke and a kids' club. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. Bahia Principe Sunlight Costa Adeje features some units with sea views, and each room includes a balcony. At the accommodation all rooms have bed linen and towels. A continental, American or vegetarian breakfast is available every morning at the property. Bahia Principe Sunlight Costa Adeje offers a children's playground. You can play table tennis, darts and tennis at this 4-star hotel, and bike hire is available. Languages spoken at the reception include German, English, Spanish and French. Playa del Puertito is less than 1 km from the hotel, while Playa El Pinque is a 14-minute walk from the property. The nearest airport is Tenerife South Airport, 27 km from Bahia Principe Sunlight Costa Adeje.

name: Tivoli la Caleta Resort
address: C/la Enramada 9, 38670 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Immerse yourself in luxury at Tivoli La Caleta Tenerife Resort, the first Tivoli property to open in Spain. A fully renewed property, the hotel benefits from an astonishing seafront setting in Tenerife’s exclusive Costa Adeje resort. The hotel itself has a distinctive southern Moroccan style that includes sensual lines and soft edges. Inside, guests will find 284 guest rooms and suites that have been designed as inviting spaces. During their stay, guests will enjoy use of a luxurious collection of leisure facilities, including three swimming pools, a 24-hour gym, a spa, paddle/tennis courts and a terrace with gardens. A dining destination in itself, Tivoli La Caleta Tenerife Resort provides guests with a fantastic selection of food and beverage options, including four restaurants and five bars. From the signature Tivoli Breakfast Buffet to the widest cocktail offering in the area and the three restaurants signed by Olivier, guests will find an option that suits their cravings at any time of day.NH Hoteles

name: Sol La Palma Hotel
address: Calle Punto Del Pozo nº 24, Puerto Naos, 38769 Santa Cruz de la Palma, La Palma
description: Set in a prime location of La Palma, Sol la Palma Hotel puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. All the necessary facilities, including free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, taxi service, 24-hour front desk, facilities for disabled guests, are at hand. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature closet, separate living room, mirror, internet access wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include hiking trails, mini golf course, fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool. Convenience and comfort makes Sol la Palma Hotel the perfect choice for your stay in La Palma.priceline.com

name: H10 Costa Adeje Palace
address: Playa La Enramada La Caleta, 38679 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Situated just 50 metres from La Enramada Beach in Tenerife, H10 Costa Adeje Palace features large outdoor pools, a hot tub and spa. The chic rooms include a furnished balcony. The hotel runs a free shuttle service to the popular resort of Playa de las Americas, 4 km away. Costa Adeje Golf Course is less than 2 km away. The hotel also offers golf packages and special green fees for some courses. The luxurious Despacio Spa Centre has a heated indoor pool, gym and Turkish bath. Guests can also book health and beauty treatments. A full programme of sport and other activities is available. H10 Costa Adeje Palace offers many dining options, including buffet and á la carte restaurants. There is a poolside bar

name: Hotel Riu Buenavista
address: c/ Horno; 35; Urb., Callao Salvaje, Tenerife
description: No description found

name: Iberostar Grand El Mirador - Adults Only
address: Avda de Bruselas, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Located in Adeje, Iberostar Grand Hotel El Mirador - Adults Only is a perfect starting point from which to explore Tenerife. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, facilities for disabled guests, Wi-Fi in public areas are just some of the facilities on offer. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer television LCD/plasma screen, dressing room, free welcome drink, slippers, sofa to ensure a restful night. Entertain the hotel's recreational facilities, including hot tub, fitness center, golf course (within 3 km), outdoor pool, indoor pool. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Iberostar Grand Hotel El Mirador - Adults Only.Agoda

name: Sbh Crystal Beach Hotel & Suites - Adults Only
address: Avda. Jahn Reisen, 3, 35627 Costa Calma, Fuerteventura
description: Set on the southern coastline of the island of Fuerteventura, Crystal Beach features an outdoor pool and terrace with sun loungers. Unwind with a glass of sangria on the terrace of the pool bar, where you can also grab a snack for lunch. From Crystal Beach Hotel & Suites you can go on a day trip to the stunning nearby sandy beaches, where you can take a dip in the Atlantic waters. Return to the hotel in the evening to dine with all the family. Sample typical Canarian-style dishes accompanied by a bottle of wine or sangria. Rest up in your spacious room in the late evening equipped with satellite TV and air conditioning. Alternatively, head down to the complexs bar and socialise with friends or fellow guests over a refreshing drink.

name: Sbh Monica Beach Resort
address: Avenida Ltu 1 (Also Avenida Jahn Reisen ), Costa Calma, Pajara, Fuerteventura, 35627 Costa Calma, Fuerteventura
description: Metres from Fuerteventura's beautiful Costa Calma coastline and stunning beaches, this hotel has bedrooms overlooking the gardens or the Atlantic Ocean. Enjoy entertainment, 3 pools and fine dining. Set in 77,000 m², the SBH Monica Beach Resort enjoys a fabulous setting for enjoying Fuerteventura's sun, sea and sand. Take part in the entertainment programme which also performs live music and children's activities. Kids will also make new friends in the mini club. All the SBH Monica Beach Resort bedrooms boast a private balcony or terrace. Each one comes with satellite TV, a mini-fridge and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Stay active this holiday with a game of tennis, a challenging workout in the SBH Mónica's gym or a surf lesson. Then treat yourself to a massage or a session in the sauna, available for an extra cost. After a buffet meal head to the bar for a delicious cocktail. You can also enjoy afternoon tea and biscuits in the cafe.

name: Panoramica Garden
address: La Longuera, 38410 Los Realejos, Tenerife
description: Situated in northern Tenerife, Hotel Panoramica Garden has a heated freshwater pool, extensive gardens, and apartments with sea or mountain views. It offers a free shuttle to Puerto de la Cruz. Each Panoramica Garden studio and apartment has functional décor and tiled floors. All accommodation includes a balcony, a living-dining area, a private bathroom and a well-equipped kitchenette. The aparthotel offers a buffet restaurant, a bar and a games room. There is also an entertainment team and 24-hour reception service. Hotel Panoramica Garden is located in Los Realejos, just 400 metres from the Atlantic Ocean. The nearest beaches are 3 km away, while Puerto de la Cruz is 5 km away.

name: Adrián Hoteles Colón Guanahaní Adultos Only
address: Avenida de Bruselas,9, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Situated in the exclusive area of Costa Adeje, on the island of Tenerife, this small and attractive colonial-style property is just a short walk from Playa Fanabe beach. Adrián Hoteles Colón Guanahaní offers various heated pools surrounded by beautifully tranquil gardens. There are also sun loungers surrounding the pool, providing you with the perfect place to relax during the day. Follow this with a relaxation session in the beauty salon. Breakfast and dinner can be enjoyed in the main restaurant, which is next to the swimming pool, and boasts a large terrace. During the day, you can sample a light snack or an à la carte lunch by the pool.

name: Relaxia Lanzaplaya
address: Calle México no 2, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Lanzarote
description: Set in the Puerto del Carmen resort, this apartment complex is set overlooking the beach. It offers outdoor pools for adults and children, surrounded by sun terraces and loungers. The attractive apartments feature a private balcony or terrace. They come with a well-equipped kitchen and a lounge area with satellite TV. Relaxia Lanzaplaya offers a buffet restaurant, which often hosts themed dinners. Light meals are available from the poolside snack bar. Facilities at Lanzaplaya include ping pong and billiards. The lounge-bar has a TV with international channels. Located in the south of Lanzarote, the resort of Puerto del Carmen has many bars, restaurants and shops. Lanzarote Airport is 10 km away.

name: H10 Tindaya
address: Punta Del Roquito, 35627 Costa Calma, Fuerteventura
description: Set on the beautiful, white sandy beaches of the Costa Calma, this hotel is an ideal spot to enjoy a sunny break in Fuerteventura. This new hotel has been built in a modern, Canarian style and is set around 3 outdoor swimming pools. When not relaxing in the pool or on one of the sun loungers beside it you can head to the hotel’s spa centre for a session of pampering. Here you can enjoy a dip in the hydromassage or indoor pool, experience showers, a sauna, and a range of massage and beauty treatments. Out in the sunshine, you can have fun playing mini-golf whilst children enjoy themselves at the mini club. Then, round off the day with a meal at the buffet restaurant and drink at the bar.

name: Club Atlantico
address: Calle Pedro Barba 16, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Lanzarote
description: Centrally located in Puerto del Carmen, Club Atlántico is just 200 metres from the beach, and features a heated outdoor swimming pool and children's pool. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Each apartment is south-east facing and offers pool views from its balcony or terrace. They have a lounge with sofa bed, a full bathroom and a kitchenette with ceramic hob, toaster, microwave and kettle. Apartments also have satellite TV with a range of international channels. The Club Atlántico also has a poolside club house and there are plenty of sun beds available for relaxing by the pool. Every Friday there is a barbecue for all guests, and there is live entertainment on some evenings. The multi-lingual reception staff can assist with car and bike rental, organising trips and more. Puerto del Carmen is well known for its restaurants, bars and shops. Lanzarote Airport is about 10 minutes’ drive away.

name: Paradise Park Fun Lifestyle Hotel
address: C/ Hawaii 2, 38650 Los Cristianos, Tenerife
description: Paradise Park Fun Lifestyle Hotel is ubicated in Los Cristianos in the south east end of the island of Tenerife, very close to Costa Adeje and Playa de las Americas. These are three of the most recognized touristic areas and is known for its excellence, pleasure ant entertainment is guaranteed. It has also become a reference for family tourism thanks to our facilities. If you are looking for a family hotel in Tenerife where you can enjoy a family vacation to the fullest. Despite being an unrestricted hotel for adults only, among the hotel facilities you will find Adults Only spaces where you can enjoy the tranquility, comfort and relaxation so characteristic of an adults only hotel in Tenerife.FarePortal

name: Neptuno Costadeje
address: Calle Cataluña Nº3, 38670 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Located 1.5 kilometres from the beach, this family friendly hotel has much to keep you active and outdoors, and a great pool to relax in the sunshine by. Playa de las Américas is set a short journey from Aparthotel Neptuno Costadeje. Guests at the aparthotel also have discounts at the spa and sports centre, 300 metres away. Enjoy your holiday at your own pace with the property’s great balance of self-catered accommodation complemented by great facilities. You can cook basic meals in the well-equipped kitchen of your apartment or take the night off and dine in the Neptune’s onsite restaurant. The property has badminton and volleyball facilities. Children will have fun and make friends in the play area while grownups will like the traditional-style bar with plenty of seating. Challenge yourself to a workout in the property’s gym before treating yourself to a relaxing massage.

name: Bakour Lanzarote Splash
address: Avenida Juan Carlos I, 35, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Lanzarote
description: The privileged location of this hotel, only 10 minutes' walk from Playa de Puerto del Carmen Beach, provides a large number of services nearby. This is ideal accommodation to relax as a family and see the island. The apartments are modern, functional and fully-equipped and are of either one or two rooms. There is also an attractive swimming pool for adults and children, with a hydro-massage facility. WiFi is available in areas and carries a surcharge. In the region there is a varied gourmet offering, in particular, in the old town of Tiñosa with its local atmosphere. On the island you can go on numerous excursions to visit the impressive landscapes and the magnificent cultural centres designed by César Manrique. Situated 1.8 km from Lanzarote Golf Resort, Bakour Lanzarote Splash features rooms with air conditioning in Puerto del Carmen. The property is located 2.9 km from Rancho Texas Park, 13 km from Campesino Monument and 19 km from Montañas de Fuego Mountains. Costa Teguise Golf Course is 21 km away and Lagomar Museum is 23 km from the hotel. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Parque Nacional de Timanfaya is 24 km from Bakour Lanzarote Splash, while Jardí­n de Cactus Gardens is 29 km from the property. *For reservations of five rooms or more, special conditions may apply in case of cancellation. *Information note: During November of 2023, some maintenance work will be carried out in the water parks. The main pool and one of the two parks will always remain available, as well as all other hotel facilities and services, which will continue running as usual.

name: H10 Ocean Dreams Boutique Hotel - Adults Only
address: Las Palmeras, 2, 35660 Corralejo, Fuerteventura
description: H10 Ocean Dreams Only Adults features an outdoor pool as well as a pool-side bar. It is also steps from Corralejo's popular attractions. Guests of the hotel can unwind with a range of relaxation amenities at Despacio Thalasso Centre, which features a sauna. Free Wi-Fi is available for those wishing to stay online while travelling. Just minutes from nearby bars and clubs, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to easily discover what the local nightlife has to offer. Rooms are air-conditioned and have top-of-the-range amenities such as a rain shower, a coffee maker and a mini bar. They feature slippers, a flat-screen TV and an in-room safe. H10 Ocean Dreams Only Adults's in-house restaurant, Restaurant Citrus, is a popular spot to have a meal. H10 Ocean Dreams Only Adults is near eateries and shops, as well as Waikiki Nightclub. The staff at the tour desk are available to organise tours and activities in Corralejo.Revato

name: Garden City
address: Avenida de Los Pueblos, TF-481, 14, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Situated in Playa De Las Americas, a 5-minute walk from Puerto Colon Beach, Club Olympus in Garden City features 2 shared pools with sun loungers and a poolside bar with flat-screen TV. Some apartments feature a private terrace and all of them have an open-space living and dining area with a TV and fan. The cooking corner includes a microwave, fridge, and kettle. Each apartment or studio has a private bathroom with a bathtub. Washing machines and tumble dryers are available at the reception and carry a surcharge. The property also offers car rental services and excursions. Shops and restaurants are located within 100 metres of the apartments. Staff at the reception will provide you with information on a wide variety of activities, such as scuba diving or excursions. You can walk to Siam Park Water Park and Siam Mall in 15 minutes.

name: Rosamar Resort Lanzarote
address: Arpon, 3, Puerto Del Carmen, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Lanzarote
description: No description found

name: Catalonia Oro Negro
address: Arq. Gómez Cuesta 14, 38660 Arona, Tenerife
description: Catalonia Oro Negro is less than 10 minutes’ walk from Playa de las Américas Beach in southern Tenerife. The hotel features free WiFi, a large outdoor swimming pool and rooms with satellite TV. All rooms are bright and simply decorated with air conditioning. They have either a private balcony or terrace, some of which have sea views. Premium rooms have access to a rooftop pool, available only for guests over 18. Hotel Catalonia Oro Negro offers a buffet breakfast, lunch and dinner in the hotel restaurant. There are 2 bars, including the Show Bar which provides evening entertainment. A modern gym is also available at the Oro Negro. Daytime activities include aerobics, table tennis and volley ball. The hotel has a terrace with loungers, a garden and children’s playground. The Alegria onsite spa features massage services. Catalonia Oro Negro is located less than 1 km from the centre of Playa de las Américas and 20 km from Tenerife Sur Airport.

name: Blue Sea Callao Garden
address: El Jable, 39, 38678 Callao Salvaje, Tenerife
description: This comfortable apartment complex is situated in the southwest of Tenerife. It offers a relaxing atmosphere in a natural setting with 4 swimming pools, a tennis and squash court and mini-golf. Blue Sea Callao Garden apartments feature a balcony and offer a lounge area with a sofa bed. A satellite TV and safe are available for an extra charge. The kitchenette feaures a fridge and coffee maker. The complex has a bar and restaurant serving international cuisine. There is a playpen for children and volleyball is available on the beach. Free WiFi is available in reception.

name: City Room Las Palmas
address: Calle Valencia, 62, 35006 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Gran Canaria
description: Located within 1.8 km of Poema Del Mar Aquarium and 3.5 km of Alfredo Kraus Auditorium, City Room Las Palmas offers rooms in Las Palmas de Gran Canaria. Featuring a shared kitchen, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The property is allergy-free and is set 700 metres from Las Alcaravaneras. The units come with an oven, microwave, a coffee machine, a a bath or shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. With a shared bathroom equipped with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer, rooms at the guest house also have free WiFi, while some rooms come with a patio. At City Room Las Palmas all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Las Canteras Beach, Parque de Santa Catalina and Parque Romano. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 23 km from City Room Las Palmas.

name: H10 Gran Tinerfe
address: Av. Rafael Puig Lluvina 13, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: H10 Gran Tinerfe is situated on Tenerife and provides 4-star accommodation as well as outdoor tennis courts. Guests also have exclusive access to the casino and Bar Discoteca Teide nightclub. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or have a beverage at the bar. Guests can take advantage of the recreational activities available, such as an outdoor pool, billiards and a sauna. H10 Gran Tinerfe is an adults-only hotel. After a day of exploring the nearby region, guests can relax in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They also offer a range of entertainment options, including a flat-screen TV. Guests of H10 Gran Tinerfe Hotel can sit down to a satisfying breakfast daily at Asensen Food & Experience, plus dinner at Los Menceyes after a day of sightseeing. Places to dine at the hotel include Mike's Coffee and El Mirador Brasserie. There is also a variety of beverages to choose from at the outdoor bar, which offers a view of the beach. There are a range of cafés and restaurants close to H10 Gran Tinerfe Hotel Tenerife, and Adeje and Costa Adeje are a brief drive away. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Playa de las Americas.Revato

name: H10 Ocean Dunas - Adults Only
address: Calle la Red 1, 35660 Corralejo, Fuerteventura
description: H10 Ocean Dunas Only Adults is set on Fuerteventura and provides 4-star facilities as well as free Wi-Fi. This hotel is close to everything Corralejo has to offer. Guests staying at H10 Ocean Dunas Only Adults can enjoy taking a dip in the outdoor pool, working out in the gym or relaxing with a drink at the bar. Guests can also unwind in the hotel's garden. The rooms are air conditioned and include a private bathroom, a mini bar and a private balcony. They all have an in-room safe and a flat-screen TV. Guests staying at H10 Ocean Dunas Only Adults can sit down to a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, suitably situated for those who want to stay nearby for a meal. The hotel also serves breakfast each day. H10 Ocean Dunas Only Adults is close to Corralejo's popular attractions, with Abyss Fuerteventura only moments on foot from the property. Parque Natural de Corralejo is just a short car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: Alegria Barranco
address: Avenida Santiago Puig, 3, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: This apartment complex is situated in the south of Tenerife, in Playa de las Américas and provides excellent facilities, including a large heated outdoor swimming pool. Located just a short walk from the beach in Playa de las Américas, this complex is the ideal accommodation for a fun-filled family holiday in the sunshine. Stroll down to the golden sands of this top Tenerife beach, and enjoy a swim in the cool Atlantic waters. Alternatively, you can spend the day by the swimming pool in Bungalows Barranco, enjoy sunbathing and take a cooling dip when the temperatures get too hot. You can also enjoy a drink in the bar restaurant or pub (in a building next to the hotel). WiFi is available throughout the complex, for an extra charge. Each of Barrancos apartments comes with a kitchen, where you can prepare your own meals. Alternatively, you can finish the day by dining in the restaurant just next to the Bungalows with all the family.

name: Hipotels Natura Palace - Adults only
address: Urbanización Montaña Roja, 35580 Playa Blanca, Lanzarote
description: Located on the sea front of Playa Blanca, the Natura Palace offers 2 large outdoor swimming pools set within landscaped gardens. All elegant rooms feature a balcony or terrace. This hotel includes a snack-bar and a buffet restaurant with a variety of regional, national and international dishes. The Talasso Natura Spa offers beauty treatments and facilities such as a sauna and steam room. There is also a hair salon and fitness centre with views of the Atlantic Ocean. Within Hipotels Natura Palace guests can relax with drinks in the cosy bar and also enjoy the hotel’s discotheque.

name: R2 Rio Calma
address: C/ Artistas Canarios 8, 35627 Costa Calma, Fuerteventura
description: The attractive R2 Rio Calma complex is located next to the beaches of Costa Calma, southern Fuerteventura. It has 2 swimming pools, beautiful gardens and a range of dining options. All of the rooms in Rio Calma have air conditioning. They also have panoramic windows offering great views of the sea, gardens or swimming pool. The complex offers a children’s entertainment programme and evening shows. It also offers a range of water sports on the beach, including windsurfing, diving and sailing. The Rio Calma’s popular restaurant offers a range of Canarian flavours, as well as traditional Spanish dishes. Apart from the buffet, à la carte and snack restaurants, there are 5 bars around the complex.

name: Hotel Concorde
address: Calle de Tomas Miller, 85, 35007 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Gran Canaria
description: Hotel Concorde is set just 50 metres from Las Canteras Beach, in Las Palmas de Gran Canaria. It offers a rooftop terrace with an outdoor pool and panoramic views. Each of the Concorde’s air-conditioned rooms includes satellite TV and a minibar. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and toiletries set. Guests can enjoy buffet breakfast and dinner in the Mirador restaurant, which offers wonderful sea views. The hotel also has its own bars, and there are many other bars and cafés in the streets nearby. The Concorde Hotel is in the centre of Las Palmas, 600 metres from Santa Catalina Park and El Muelle Shopping Centre. Puerto de la Luz Harbour is within a 10-minute walk and offers regular ferries to other Canary Islands.

name: Hd Parque Cristobal Tenerife
address: Rafael Puig Lluvina, 15, 38660 Arona, Tenerife
description: This extensive holiday complex offers spacious bungalow accommodation in the heart of Playa de las Américas, just 200 metres from the beaches of southern Tenerife. Enjoy a relaxing and fun family break in the year-round sunshine of this unique Canary Island with a stay at the Parque Cristóbal Tenerife. Its tropical gardens surround 2 huge outdoor swimming pools for adults, both heated in winter. Children can enjoy themselves in the supervised mini club or their own 2 swimming pools. Alternatively, stay active with a game on the tennis court or a session in the gym. Each apartment opens onto a private terrace and features a well-equipped kitchen.

name: Grupotel Flamingo Beach
address: AV. de Las Canarias, 35580 Playa Blanca, Lanzarote
description: Located in Playa Blanca in the Lanzarote region and Flamingo Beach reachable within 300 metres, Grupotel Flamingo Beach provides accommodation with free WiFi, a children's playground, an outdoor swimming pool and free private parking. Each unit comes with a sofa, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a well-fitted kitchen, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Breakfast is available daily, and includes buffet, continental and Full English/Irish options. The aparthotel offers 2-star accommodation with a fitness room and sun terrace. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Grupotel Flamingo Beach. La Campana Beach is 1.4 km from the accommodation, while Playa Blanca is 1.6 km away. The nearest airport is Lanzarote Airport, 30 km from Grupotel Flamingo Beach.

name: Sol Barbacan
address: Av de Tirajana, 27, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Located in Playa del Inglés, Sol Barbacan is only 2 km from the nearest beach. The complex features a swimming pool, 2 hot tubs, and free WiFi in all areas. Sol Barbacan offers a buffet restaurant and an a la carte restaurant, as well as a pool bar and an evening lounge with a terrace. Set in gardens, the complex includes minigolf and beach volleyball facilities. There is also a gym and entertainment activities, including a kids’ club and teens’ club. Maspalomas Golf Course is a 5-minute drive from the property.

name: Skyview Hotel
address: Avenida Fernandez Perdigon 8, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: The Skyview Hotel Tenerife is set just 200 metres from the beach in Puerto de la Cruz and features an outdoor swimming pool. It features rooms with balconies and small kitchenettes. The Ving offers simple, bright décor. Its rooms are spacious and each has a seating area. Kitchenettes have tea and coffee makers and a fridge. The Ving’s restaurant offers a range of Spanish cuisine and serves a buffet breakfast. A 24-hour reception is available. The centre of Puerto de la Cruz, where there is a range of restaurants and bars, is just 10 minutes’ walk away. Mount Teide National Park is approximately 15 km from the Ving, whilst the island’s Norte Airport is around 20 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hotel Tropical Park
address: Avda.el Jable N41, 38678 Callao Salvaje, Tenerife
description: Featuring apartments with balconies set around an outdoor pool with free sun loungers, Hotel Tropical Park is set just 150 metres from Callao Salvaje Beach. It has a buffet restaurant and a gym. Each apartment at the Hotel Tropical Park has modern décor with tiled floors. All come with air conditioning and a seating area with satellite TV. Kitchenettes are equipped with a microwave, fridge and kettle. Guests can enjoy a range of Spanish cuisine in the Tropical Grill Restaurant. Drinks are not included in half board. There is an on-site supermarket and a range of smaller shops within 5 minutes’ walk of the Hotel Tropical Park. The lively town of Playa de Las Américas is a 10-minute drive from the hotel, while Tenerife Sur Airport is just 15 km away.

name: Avanti Lifestyle Hotel - Only Adults
address: Delfin, 1, 35660 Corralejo, Fuerteventura
description: AVANTI Lifestyle Hotel - Only Adults is located opposite the beach, in the old town of Corralejo. It features a restaurant and a roof terrace with a hot tub. This small, adults-only hotel offers room looking onto the ocean or the town of Corralejo. The chic rooms at AVANTI Lifestyle Hotel - Only Adults have minimalist, white décor with turquoise finishes. All rooms have free WiFi, air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. The restaurant serves Spanish cuisine and specialises in seafood, paella and fish dishes. The terrace offers ocean views. There is a lounge on the terrace. On the rooftop guests will find a solarium, a bar and a restaurant. Guests can practice a wide range of water sport activities in the area such as paddle surf, kite-surf, diving, and sailing. Corralejo Nature Reserve is within 3 km of the hotel. Puerto del Rosario and Fuerteventura Airport are less than 45 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hotel Livvo Corralejo Beach
address: Victor Grau Bassas 1 - la Ol, 35660 Corralejo, Fuerteventura
description: Hotel LIVVO Corralejo Beach is set on the seafront in Fuerteventura’s Corralejo, just 50 metres from the beach. Guests will find an outdoor swimming pool and free WiFi throughout. All rooms come with a private bathroom, living room, telephone, satellite TV, WiFi and adjustable air conditioning. A safety deposit box is available for an extra charge. Hotel LIVVO Corralejo Beach offers 24-hours reception, elevator, gym, and a restaurant. The hotel has a covered parking, car and bike rental, a snack bar, and a solarium with sunbeds and sunshades. Also, you can relax with the massages service or play billiard or darts. Corralejo Harbour is 400 metres away and offers direct ferries to Lanzarote. Corralejo Sand Dunes are less than 2 km away.

name: Be Live Experience Orotava
address: Avenida Aguilar y Quesada, 3, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: The Be Live Experience Orotava is situated in Puerto de la Cruz, 200 metres from the beach and Lago Martianez. It offers modern accommodation with sea or mountain views. All accommodation includes a balcony, and the majority of the rooms feature sea views or views of Mount Teide. They are also equipped with air conditioning, WiFi and satellite TV. La Cascada restaurant serves breakfast, lunch, a buffet dinner. There is also a poolside snack bar and à la carte restaurant. Other facilities at the hotel include a Gym and a solarium next to the pool. The Be Live Experience Orotava is located 24 km from Los Rodeos Airport and 40 km from Santa Cruz de Tenerife, the island's main port.

name: Hotel Suite Villa Maria
address: Av. De Los Acantilados, 38679 Adeje, Tenerife
description: This 5-star hotel complex is located 1 km from La Caleta de Adeje Beach, in south-west Tenerife. It offers villas with furnished terraces and views of the Atlantic Ocean and the island of La Gomera. Some villas at Hotel Suite Villa María have a hot tub and others have a private pool. All have free internet access and feature a lounge with flat-screen satellite TV, a fully equipped kitchen and bathroom with hydromassage shower. A buffet breakfast is served daily at Villa María. The á la carte La Torre Restaurant serves traditional Canarian dishes while the Pool Bar offers light snacks and drinks. The hotel can organise excursions, including green fees for Costa Adeje Golf Course, located less than 1 km away. Car rental service can also be arranged at the property. A free shuttle service to Plaza del Duque Shopping centre is provided twice a day. Tenerife South Airport can be reached by car in 25 minutes.

name: Arena Beach
address: Gomera 5, Corralejo, 35660 Corralejo, Fuerteventura
description: Set just off Corralejo Sand Dunes National Park, Arena Beach features a spa, sauna and gym. It has an outdoor pool, children’s pool and sun terrace. All of the air-conditioned apartments come with either a balcony or terrace overlooking the pool. Interconnected apartments are available. Arena Beach has a buffet restaurant which has a terrace beside the pool. There is also a children’s club, and guests can enjoy live entertainment at night. There is a 24-hour reception where you can rent a car or exchange money. Staff at the tour desk can help you plan excursions around the island. Set in a quiet area of Corralejo, you can reach the nearest beaches in a 10-minute walk from the property.WebBeds

name: Apartamentos Parque del Sol
address: Calle Londres 11, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Set in Adeje, 400 metres from Playa de Fanabe, Apartamentos Parque del Sol offers accommodation with free WiFi, a terrace or a balcony and access to a garden and a year-round outdoor pool. Featuring a kitchen with an oven and a microwave, each unit also comes with a safety deposit box, a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area with a sofa. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. At Apartamentos Parque del Sol you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean, Mexican and Spanish cuisine. The accommodation offers 3-star accommodation with a beauty services, fitness room and solarium. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Apartamentos Parque del Sol, while cycling and hiking can be enjoyed nearby. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Torviscas Beach, El Duque Beach and Enramada Beach. The nearest airport is Tenerife South Airport, 21 km from Apartamentos Parque del Sol.

name: Elba Carlota Beach & Convention
address: Avenida de Las Marismas 3, 35610 Antigua, Fuerteventura
description: Elba Carlota Beach & Convention Resort is set within Fuerteventura Golf Club and a few metres from the beach. This resort features a casino, 2 outdoor swimming pools, sports facilities and 2 restaurants. Rooms at the Elba Carlota are spacious and bright. All rooms are air conditioned and have a minibar and satellite TV. The resort offers guests a wide range of dining options, including Tindaya Buffet Restaurant and El Arrecife Restaurant, which serves Italian dishes. The Chiringuito Restaurant and Bar is set on a small island opposite the hotel and serves seafood cuisine. The Elba features a heated swimming pool, a hot tub and gym. There are beach volley ball courts, tennis courts and a shooting range. There is also evening entertainment for adults and daytime activities arranged for children. Gran Casino Antigua Fuerteventura is located inside the hotel. It offers a range of games including Roulette, Black Jack and Texas Hold 'Em. The Costa Calma is an ideal location for activities such as golf, sailing and surfing.

name: H10 Las Palmeras
address: Avenida Rafael Puig, 28, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: H10 Las Palmeras is situated on Tenerife and offers 4-star accommodation in addition to free Wi-Fi and outdoor tennis courts. This modern hotel is close to everything Playa de las Americas has to offer. Guests can soak up the sun on the terrace or have a drink at the bar. Guests can benefit from the in-house fitness centre and outdoor pool. The hotel also has its very own gym, Swimming Pool. After a day of exploring the nearby area, guests can relax in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. All offer an in-room safe, an in-room closet and a telephone. Guests of H10 Hotel Las Palmeras Tenerife are invited to sample Italian cuisine at Specchio Magico, or try Asian dishes at Sakura Teppanyaki. Places to dine at the hotel include Mike's Coffee and Garoé. Tenerife South Airport is less than a 20-minute drive from H10 Las Palmeras Hotel Tenerife. It is also a short drive from Adeje and Los Cristianos.Revato

name: Villa Vik - Hotel Boutique
address: Calle Hermanos Diaz Rijo, 11, 35500 Arrecife, Lanzarote
description: Villa VIK - Hotel Boutique is situated in a quiet residential area of Playa del Cable, just 200 metres from the beach. The guest rooms are stylish and spacious and all feature a luxury private bathroom and a balcony or terrace where you can unwind. Guests can sample some culinary delights in the à la carte restaurant and to follow enjoy an exotic cocktail in the bar. Playa del Cable is a 300 metre stretch of fine golden sands and calm waters. In addition the hotel is conveniently situated for the islands airport.

name: Coral Ocean View - Adults Only
address: Avenida de Los Pueblos, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Coral Ocean View - Adults Only is set on Tenerife and provides 4-star accommodation in addition to free Wi-Fi. It is also moments from Playa de las Americas's well-known tourist spots. Guests staying at Coral Ocean View - Adults Only can enjoy taking a dip in the swimming pool, working out in the gym or relaxing with a drink in the on site bar. Staff are available 24 hours a day and can help with booking tours and tickets. Coral Ocean View - Adults Only is an adults-only hotel. The rooms are air conditioned and feature a kitchenette, a private balcony and a refrigerator. Bathrooms are equipped with necessities such as slippers and bathrobes. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient place to enjoy a meal. Guests can also try one of the various bars and cafés nearby. Local attractions close to the hotel include Aqualand Costa Adeje, Siam Park and The Patch. Those wishing to discover the region are able to visit Adeje, situated within an easy drive of the property.Revato

name: Los Olivos Beach Resort
address: Paris, 1, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: With a stay at Los Olivos Beach Resort in Adeje (Costa Adeje), you'll be a 4-minute walk from Fanabe Beach and 13 minutes by foot from El Duque Beach. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Hotel Mirador Papagayo By Livvo
address: C/ Las Palmas, 5, 35570 Playa Blanca, Lanzarote
description: The 4-star Iberostar Papagayo Resort offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Lanzarote. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Take advantage of the hotel's safety deposit boxes, bicycle rental, restaurant, salon, elevator. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer air conditioning, balcony/terrace, mini bar, television, shower to ensure a restful night. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as spa, massage, steamroom, water sports (non-motorized), fitness center. Convenience and comfort makes Iberostar Papagayo Resort the perfect choice for your stay in Lanzarote.Agoda

name: Hotel Benahoare
address: Las Adelfas 12, 38760 Los Llanos de Aridane, La Palma
description: Hotel Hotel Benahoare is 200 metres from Plaza España Square in Los Llanos de Aridane, on the island of La Palma. It offers comfortable accommodation with a roof terrace with mountain views. The air-conditoned rooms at the Hotel Benahoare have tiled floors and plenty of natural light. They all offer free WiFi, satellite TV, a safe and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries. The hotel has a lounge area with plasma TV and bar and cafeteria, and the rooftop terrace offers sun loungers and a lounge bed. A varied breakfast is offered every morning. Situated in a quiet street, the hotel is opposite the Archaeological Museum and within a 5-minute walk of various shops and bars. Tazacorte Beach and Puerto Naos Beach are both within a 10-minute drive of Hotel Benahoare.

name: Elba Sara Beach & Golf Resort
address: Carretera de Jandia, Km. 11, 35610 Antigua, Fuerteventura
description: Located on Caleta de Fuste Beach in Fuerteventura, Hotel Elba Sara has an outdoor pool, tennis court and free parking nearby. Fuerteventura Golf Course is a 10-minute drive away. All air-conditioned rooms at the Elba Sara Beach & Golf Hotel have a private balcony, most with superb ocean views. There is a minibar, TV and private bathroom. The hotel’s restaurant serves buffet meals, and has a terrace overlooking the Atlantic Ocean. There is also a poolside grill bar, and a snack bar at the beach. The Sara Beach & Golf Resort features a gym, hot tub and sauna. There is also mini golf, ping pong and a pool table. Children have a dedicated pool, play area and supervised activities club. Fuerteventura Thalasso Spa is 400 metres from the hotel.

name: Hotel Bahía Flamingo
address: Avda. La Gaviota 3 Urbanizacion Varadero, 38686 Puerto de Santiago, Tenerife
description: Set on Playa de la Arena’s seafront promenade, Sholeo Los Gigantes features a ORIGINAL HUB a place where everything happens. It is our reception, restaurant, lobby bar, entertainment and relaxation area. One of the key points of the hotel is FEELGOOD GARDEN, located at the back of the hotel, is an excellent place to enjoy an excellent drink outdoors, in a very cool place to meet new people. We offer a gym, swimming pool, massage rooms and a co-working area with multipurpose rooms. Just 350 metres from the beach, it offers easy access to the resort’s cafés, bars and shops. Offering sea and pool views, the simply decorated rooms at Sholeo Los Gigantes have a private bathroom. Buses stop just 50 metres away and the centre of Puerto de Santiago is just 1 km from the hotel. Tenerife Sur Airport is 45 km away.

name: Elba Lanzarote Royal Village Resort
address: Avenida Faro Pechiguera, 1, 35580 Playa Blanca, Lanzarote
description: Set in Playa Blanca, Lanzarote, and designed as a typical Lanzarote town, Elba Lanzarote Royal Village Resort is located a 15-minute walk from Flamingo Beach. This property offers free WiFi throughout. This complex offers air-conditioned rooms with satellite LED TV, safe, minibar, coffee and tea service, and fan. The private bathroom includes a spacious shower, hairdryer, and magnifying mirror. There are 4 restaurants on site, with options of a la cartè menu and buffet options. A pool bar is also available to all guests. The hotel has several pools, including waterfalls and a children's area, as well as a solarium with sun beds. There are several on-site activities such as football, tennis, and volleyball, including a gym with yoga, Pilates, and Zumba lessons. There is also a spa with different treatment options and services. Playa Blanca is a 5-minute drive from Elba Lanzarote Royal Village Resort. Timanfaya National Park is 10 km away. Lanzarote Airport is 28 km from the property.

name: Catalonia Las Vegas
address: Avenida Colón, 2, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: This lovely hotel is perfectly placed in front of the Martiánez Lakes, boasting stunning views of Teide mountain. It offers free WiFi throughout. Located in the centre of Puerto de la Cruz, there is a taxi rank opposite the hotel. A bus from the nearby stop will take you to any corner of the island. Whatever the purpose of your stay, this hotel has all kinds of modern facilities to cater for your needs.

name: Coral Teide Mar
address: Aceviño 6, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Coral Teide Mar is a comfortable base when visiting Puerto de la Cruz and is close to everything the area has to offer. It also offers an outdoor pool, free Wi-Fi and a playground. The hotel boasts a range of leisure facilities, such as billiards and Outdoor Swimming Pool. For families Coral Teide Mar offers a games room. It also has a fitness centre with outdoor tennis courts. Coral Teide Mar provides 120 rooms, each equipped with a private balcony, a kitchenette and a refrigerator. The private bathroom includes complimentary toiletries in addition to a hair dryer. Guests staying at Coral Teide Mar can enjoy a unique dining experience at the on-site restaurant, ideally based for those who want to stay nearby when looking to sit down to a meal. The hotel also serves a daily breakfast. The area surrounding Coral Teide Mar is well-known for its vibrant nightlife, with plenty of places to go for a drink or dance. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to organise tours and activities in Puerto de la Cruz.Revato

name: Gran Melia Palacio de Isora
address: Avenida Los Océanos, s/n, Alcalá, 38686 Guía de Isora, Tenerife
description: With its privileged Oceanfront location, this spectacular Design Hotel offers stunning views of the island La Gomera and Mount Teide. It is perfectly integrated in the South west coast of Tenerife, in the fishing village Alcala, Guia de Isora. The resort is at five minutes car distance from the beautiful Los Gigantes cliffs, while offering an inspiring proposal to live magic moments and new sensations. Highlights are the impressive colonial Plaza with fountains and chill-out corners and the huge sea water lagoon infinity pool. In addition various fresh water pools, including a pool only for adults, a family pool and a separate childrens pool, as well as the exclusive RedLevel pool. 6 Restaurants, 6 Bars, Yhi Spa with thermal circuit and Yhi Moves, a 24 hours fitness centre. The resort also offers a programme of life enriching activities, professional animation, tennis and paddle courts, archery, miniclub and subtropical gardens. The glorious room facilities are all very spacious with beautiful garden and ocean views and a minimum of 48sqm with private terrace of balcony. The exclusive RedLevel Demi Suites and Oceanfront Garden Villas offer an even superior level of luxury and personalised service, for adults only.priceline.com

name: H10 Ocean Suites
address: Las Palmeras, 1, 35660 Corralejo, Fuerteventura
description: H10 Ocean Suites is located on Fuerteventura and provides 4-star facilities as well as outdoor tennis courts and miniature golf. It is also within walking distance of Corralejo's well-known tourist attractions. There are a variety of amenities available to those staying at the hotel, including a swimming pool, a kids pool and meeting facilities. For those wanting to get outdoors the hotel has a wide variety of activities, such as hiking and scuba diving. The rooms at H10 Ocean Suites are air-conditioned and offer a private bathroom, a mini bar and a private balcony. They feature a seating area, an in-room safe and a flat-screen TV. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient place to have a meal. Each evening, guests can wind down in the comfortable lounge bar. Guests are also able to try one of the various bars and cafés in the area. H10 Ocean Suites is an ideal place to discover Lobos Island and Dunas de Corralejo. Those wanting to explore the region are able to visit El Cotillo, located an easy car ride from the property.Revato

name: Ona Las Casitas
address: Calle Fuerteventura 1, Playa Blanca, Yaiza, 35580 Playa Blanca, Lanzarote
description: Featuring a shared swimming pool and an on-site restaurant, Ona Las Casitas is located in Playa Blanca. It offers air-conditioned apartments with a private terrace. Free WiFi is available. All apartments include 1 bathroom with a bath, shower, hairdryer, and free toiletries. Bed linen and towels are provided. Guests can make use of washing machines available at the resort. The living area has a sofa set and a flat-screen TV, while the kitchen comes equipped with an oven, microwave, and a coffee machine. A dining table is also available. The complex also offers a children’s playground and a tennis court. Dorada Beach is 10- minutes’ drive from the property, and Timanfaya Nature Reserve is 21 km away. Lanzarote Airport is 30 km from Ona Las Casitas.

name: Hostal Kasa
address: Calle General Vives 75, 35007 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Gran Canaria
description: Hostal Kasa is 1-Star-Hotel located in the center of the city and 3 minutes away from Las Canteras beach, you'll enjoy our rooms (exterior/interior), and a terrace to share experiences with other travelers, or to enjoy the maximum comfort of a Hotel. Hostal Kasa is placed in a marvelous place in the city; near the shops, pubs, restaurants, and close to the nightlife. The Bus station of Las Palmas is about 200 meters away. It offers a regular service practically to every place on the island. Hostal Kasa offers free Wi-Fi and rents surfboards.

name: Hacienda San Jorge
address: Playa de Los Cancajos, no 22, 38712 Breña Baja, La Palma
description: Hotel Hacienda San Jorge offers free WiFi throughout, a sauna, a gym and a large seawater swimming pool. There is direct access to Los Cancajos Beach. The resort has a buffet restaurant with amazing sea views. There is a cocktail terrace, and tapas and snacks are available at the pool bar. Vegetarian options are also available. All apartments have a kitchen, satellite TV and a balcony or terrace. The resort was designed by Canarian painter Facundo Fierro and has typical design. Hotel Hacienda San Jorge is set just 3 kilometres from La Palma Airport. There is a bus stop 100 metres away. The island is famous for its black sand beaches. The local area is ideal for hiking.

name: Parque San Antonio
address: Carretera General Puerto De La Cruz Las Arenas 51, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Parque San Antonio is set in attractive, tropical gardens, 1.5 km from the centre of Puerto de la Cruz. This hotel features an outdoor swimming pool and rooms with balconies.
