The San Antonio’s rooms are spacious and feature bright décor. Each has satellite TV, a desk and centralized air conditioning. The San Antonio offers guests various dining options in the buffet restaurant. There is also a poolside bar, which serves snacks during the day. The hotel has impressive views of Mount Teide and is less than 2 km from Puerto de la Cruz Beach.

name: Vincci Selección La Plantación del Sur
address: C/ Roque Nublo, 1, 38670 Adeje, Tenerife
description: This colonial-style hotel on the Costa Adeje features a luxurious spa and beautiful views of the Atlantic Ocean. It offers 5 swimming pools, surrounded by sun terraces and gardens. The elegant rooms at the Vincci Selección La Plantación del Sur have a balcony and sea views. They include an interactive flat-screen TV, and a separate hydromassage shower and bath. Vincci Selección La Plantación del Sur includes the Nammu Spa with thermal circuits. Massage and beauty treatments are also available. Duque Beach is just 500 metres from the hotel and there is also a fitness centre on-site. Bicycle and car rental can be organised for guests. There are 2 restaurants at the Vincci La Plantación del Sur, one serves creative Canarian cuisine using local produce; the second one, is specialised in charcoal-grilled meat. The hotel's breakfast includes products for celiacs. There is also a bar. Vincci Selección La Plantación del Sur is 20 minutes’ by car from Reina Sofía Airport.

name: H10 Lanzarote Princess
address: Calle La Maciot, 1, 35570 Playa Blanca, Lanzarote
description: The H10 Lanzarote Princess is located just 200 metres from Playa Blanca Beach, offering views of the Atlantic Ocean. Set in gardens, it features 2 outdoor swimming pools and rooms with balconies. H10 Lanzarote Princess offers bright, stylish décor and its rooms are air conditioned. All rooms come with satellite TV and a desk. Buffet cuisine and show cooking are on offer in the hotel’s main restaurant. La Choza Restaurant is located in the hotel gardens and also has a bar. There are 2 further bars in the resort. Staff at the Princess’ 24-hour reception can provide information on Playa Blanca and the surrounding area. Free WiFi is available in the lobby of the hotel and some rooms. The Lanzarote Princess has tennis and volleyball courts, minigolf and a giant chess board.

name: Kn Aparthotel Panoramica Heights
address: Baleares, 17, 38670 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Aparthotel Panorámica's apartments and studios have a living room with a sofa bed, free satellite TV, while a safe is available for an extra fee. There is an outdoor pool available to guests. Kitchenettes include a fridge and ceramic hob. Apartments also have a separate bedroom, and some offer air conditioning. Free WiFi is available in public areas. The complex has 24-hour reception. You can hire a car from the tour desk. Siam Water Park 2 km away.

name: Tabaiba Princess
address: Avda. Tour Operador Tui, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: When you stay at Hotel Tabaiba Princess in San Bartolome de Tirajana, you'll be next to a golf course, within a 5-minute drive of Maspalomas Dunes and Yumbo Shopping Center. Featured amenities include express check-in, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Limited parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Royal Sunset Beach Club
address: Calle Londres 6, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Royal Sunset Beach Club offers the convenience of at-home living, fantastic on-site amenities and close proximity to the beach. When youre not relaxing in your spacious Apartment, youll have the choice of playing pool, table tennis, squash or other recreational games on-site. Royal Sunset Beach Clubs great location one block from Playa de Fanabe allows you to instantly grab a sunset drink at a beachside bar, swim in the sea or experience the many restaurants and shops along the coast. No matter if youre a sunseeker or a foodie, you and your group will find everything you need in or around Royal Sunset Beach Club.iHotelier/iStay

name: Buendía Corralejo
address: Calle Atalaya 2, 35660 Corralejo, Fuerteventura
description: With Charco De Bristol reachable in 700 metres, Buendía Corralejo nohotel features accommodation, a restaurant, an outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and a bar. Complimentary WiFi is available. Featuring a kitchenette with a dishwasher and a microwave, each unit also comes with a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area with a sofa. There is a fully equipped private bathroom with bath and a hairdryer. Continental and buffet breakfast options are available each morning at the restaurant. Buendía Corralejo nohotel offers a terrace. There is a shared lounge at this property and guests can go cycling nearby. Corralejo Viejo is 1.4 km from the accommodation, while Las Clavellinas is 1.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Fuerteventura, 42 km from Buendía Corralejo nohotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Floresta
address: Calle Mercurio, 2, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Lanzarote
description: Hotel Floresta offers spacious apartments located 200 metres from Lanzarote’s Playa de los Pocillos Beach. Facilities include an outdoor swimming pool and tennis courts. The apartments are modern and practical with a seating area and air conditioning. They can accommodate up to 2 adults and 2 children. Guests can enjoy a restaurant and bar at Floresta apartments Lanzarote, as well as a terrace to enjoy meals and drinks outside. There are also gardens, play areas for children and an entertainment programme for all ages.

name: Club Tenerife
address: Los Diamantes II Urb. Oasis Del Sur, 38650 Los Cristianos, Tenerife
description: Featuring a shared outdoor heated swimming pool, Club Tenerife Apartments is located in Los Cristianos, a 15-minute walk from the beach. This property offers a sun terrace and a pool snack bar. All apartments have a living space with a sofa, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safe to rent, and a dining table, as well as a kitchen equipped with an oven, fridge, microwave, and electric kettle. There is a private bathroom and a balcony. Some apartments offer views of the pool. The property has a shared terrace, games room, and library. A shuttle service to the airport is available for an extra charge. You can find a restaurant, bar, and grocery shop within a 5-minute walk of Club Tenerife Apartments. Los Cristianos Port, with ferry services to La Palma and La Gomera, is 2.6 km from the property, and Tenerife Sur Airport is 15 minutes away by car.

name: Hotel Riu Oliva Beach Resort
address: Avda. Grandes Playas Corralejo, 35660 Corralejo, Fuerteventura
description: No description found

name: Hotel Riu Garoé
address: Doctor Celestino González Padrón, 3, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 190 guestrooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private furnished balconies or patios. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Amenities Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as a health club, an outdoor pool, and an outdoor tennis court. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge). Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the complimentary area shuttle. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a computer station, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours). Property Location With a stay at Hotel Riu Garoé in Puerto de la Cruz, you'll be connected to a shopping center, just a 1-minute walk from Orotava Valley and 8 minutes by foot from Botanical Gardens. This 4-star hotel is 1.6 mi (2.6 km) from Plaza del Charco and 1.7 mi (2.7 km) from Lago Martianez Swimming Pools. Dining Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Snacks are also available at the 2 coffee shops/cafes. Relax with a refreshing drink from the poolside bar or one of the 2 bars/lounges. Optional Charges Airport shuttle fee: EUR 80.00 per vehicle (one-way, maximum occupancy 7) In-room safe fee: EUR 2 per day Spa fee: EUR 15 per day The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. This property enforces a smart-casual dress code during dinner at the restaurant, which includes long trousers for men. name: Be Live Experience Lanzarote Beach
address: Plaza Del Janubio, 2, 35508 Costa Teguise, Lanzarote
description: Overlooking Costa Teguise Beach, in Lanzarote, Be Live Experience Lanzarote Beach Hotel offers a gym, and outdoor pool with loungers. Modern, air-conditioned rooms have flat-screen TV, a private balcony or terrace, and seating area. The spacious, bright rooms have a safe and work desk. They are stylishly decorated and feature tiled floors. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer and free toiletries. This hotel has an à la carte restaurant and a poolside snack bar The Half Board service does not include drinks. The Be Live Experience Lanzarote Beach Hotel offers table tennis, air hockey and billiards. You can play also squash and there are archery and aerobics classes. The hotel features a 24-hour reception. Free parking is available nearby and Costa Teguise Golf Course is a 10-minute drive away. Reservations of 9 or more rooms may be subject to supplements and special conditions.

name: Hotel Melia Bilbao
address: Lehendakari Leizaola, 29, 48001 Bilbao, Biscay
description: Next to the Bilbao Estuary and just a few metres from the iconic Guggenheim Museum and the Euskalduna Palace, our 5-star hotel is the ideal place to relax and savour true Basque gastronomy. A modern hotel, designed by the prestigious architect Ricardo Legorreta and paying homage to the work of the Basque sculptor Eduardo Chillida. Travel to Bilbao and live a comprehensive experience. Meliá Bilbao, with its elegant avant-garde architecture, provides comfortable rooms and suites with fantastic views. Enjoy the Aizian Restaurant serving the most delicious classics of Basque cuisine with local and organic produce, and end your day in our Wellness Centre equipped with a gym, sauna and semi-covered swimming pool with heated water and mountain views. And if you are travelling for work, you can hold all kinds of meetings and events in our meeting rooms."

name: Radisson Collection Bilbao
address: Calle Gran Via 4, 48001 Bilbao, Biscay
description: Radisson Collection Bilbao has a fitness centre, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Bilbao. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 500 metres from the city centre and 1.1 km from Bilbao Fine Arts Museum. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Radisson Collection Bilbao offers some units with city views, and all rooms have a kettle. At the accommodation the rooms come with bed linen and towels. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Guests can make sightseeing and ticketing arrangements at the tour desk, or conduct business at the business centre. Popular points of interest near Radisson Collection Bilbao include Arriaga Theatre, San Mamés Metro Station and San Mamés Stadium. The nearest airport is Bilbao Airport, 8 km from the hotel.

name: Hesperia Bilbao
address: Campo Volantin, 28, 48007 Bilbao, Biscay
description: Located just across the River Nervión from Bilbao’s Guggenheim Museum, Hesperia Bilbao has an eye-catching coloured glass façade. Bilbao’s old town and city centre are 10 minutes’ walk away. It offers spacious, stylish rooms with free WiFi and 42-inch satellite TV. All of the modern rooms are air-conditioned, soundproofed and feature a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. La Orilla terrace bar offers views of the city centre and the Bilbao estuary. Hesperia Bilbao offers large spaces for meetings, wedding and other events. The hotel is 5 minutes’ walk from Bilbao’s main shopping streets and tapas bars. Concordia Train Station is around a 10-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Nyx Hotel Bilbao By Leonardo Hotels
address: Areatza Kalea 4, 48005 Bilbao, Biscay
description: NYX Hotel Bilbao by Leonardo Hotels has a fitness centre, shared lounge, a restaurant and bar in Bilbao. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 200 metres from Arriaga Theatre, and within less than 1 km of the city centre. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At NYX Hotel Bilbao by Leonardo Hotels the rooms have bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and American options. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at the accommodation. A business centre and vending machines with snacks and drinks are available on site at NYX Hotel Bilbao by Leonardo Hotels. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Abando Train Station, Catedral de Santiago and Guggenheim Museum Bilbao. The nearest airport is Bilbao Airport, 9 km from NYX Hotel Bilbao by Leonardo Hotels.

name: Hotel Abando
address: Colon De Larreategui, 9, 48001 Bilbao, Biscay
description: The Abando Hotel is located in central Bilbao, opposite Abando Metro Station and 150 metres from Abando Indalecio Prieto Railway Station. Its air-conditioned rooms all offer free Wi-Fi and satellite TV. Abando is just 200 metres from Bilbao’s main shopping streets, and 500 metres from the Guggenheim Museum of contemporary art. The old town is just 300 metres away. There is a tram stop 150 metres away. The hotel offers a varied breakfast, while the stylish Epaia Restaurant serves typical Basque cuisine. It specializes in fresh fish, and has an extensive wine list. Abando has a free gym with sauna and Turkish bath. There is also a gift shop and internet terminals.

name: Hotel Ilunion Bilbao
address: Calle Rodriguez Arias 66, 48013 Bilbao, Biscay
description: Located in the commercial heart of Bilbao, Hotel Ilunion Bilbao is 100 metres from San Mamés Bus and Metro Stations. There is a gym, and free WiFi is offered. All modern, air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Ilunion Bilbao include a minibar and flat-screen satellite TV. They also come with a private bathroom and a hairdryer. This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility, accessible rooms are available on request, also for people with auditory and visual impairment. You can have a varied breakfast at the hotel's restaurant La Kedada Bar & Restaurant where you can also find traditional Basque cuisine. The hotel also has spacious lounge areas and a 24-hour reception with tour desk. Situated next to Iturriza Casilda Park, Hotel Ilunion Bilbao is just 600 metres from Bilbao Fine Arts Museum and Euskalduna Conference Centre. The Guggenheim Museum can be reached within a 15-minute walk. Pets allowed, under availability with the hotel. Supplements per night apply. Guests should contact the hotel to check and confirm availability of this room type. Once at the property, guests will receive the rules of access, which must be read and approved.

name: Occidental Bilbao
address: Av Zumalacarregui, 40, 48006 Bilbao, Biscay
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. The Occidental Bilbao is an urban hotel designed to provide maximum comfort. The strategic location of the hotel just a few minutes from the historic centre makes it the perfect base for visiting the main tourist attractions. It has good transport links with the airport and train station. Its 200 modern rooms have been designed to ensure that you have the most comfortable stay. For those seeking tranquillity the hotel offers an exclusive Spa area and a heated indoor pool extra charge. Whats more the hotel offers meeting rooms for holding events and conferences. The Occidental Bilbao hotel is the perfect place to discover the impressive modern architecture of Bilbao and of course its delicious local cuisine. This Basque city offers an array of cultural activities streets full of charm and the biggest indoor market in Europe the Mercado de la Ribera.Tourism Registry HBI00337Barcelo.com

name: Hotel Ercilla de Bilbao, Autograph Collection
address: Ercilla, 37-39, 48011 Bilbao, Biscay
description: From industrial beginnings comes a city revitalized. An independent region with an independent soul.Infused by British soul. A place full of flavor, full of heart. Passionately revitalized by its people to signal the dawn of a new era.There is a place that stands out. Here you will find glamorous individualist rubbing shoulders with like-minded local;opening each others mind and awakening their senses. Where food and drink spark love, laughter and the fiery passion that´s within us all. It´s the best of Bilbao with all its proud British history. Passion for culture. Desire for flavor. And love for people are all ignited in one majestic destination.A new kind of hotel where you can experience 70´s glamour. Ercilla de Bilbao a hotel exactly like nothing else.Marriott

name: Catalonia Gran Vía Bilbao
address: Gran Vía de Don Diego López de Haro, 73, 48009 Bilbao, Biscay
description: Set in Bilbao, 600 metres from San Mamés Metro Station, Catalonia Gran Vía Bilbao offers accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is 700 metres from the city centre and 700 metres from San Mamés Stadium. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Catalonia Gran Vía Bilbao provides some units that feature a balcony, and each room comes with a kettle. At the accommodation the rooms come with bed linen and towels. Guests at Catalonia Gran Vía Bilbao can enjoy a continental or a gluten-free breakfast. The hotel offers a terrace. Popular points of interest near Catalonia Gran Vía Bilbao include Euskalduna Conference Centre and Concert Hall, Bilbao Fine Arts Museum and Guggenheim Museum Bilbao. The nearest airport is Bilbao Airport, 7 km from the accommodation.

name: Mercure Bilbao Jardines De Albia
address: San Vincente 6, 48001 Bilbao, Biscay
description: The Mercure Jardines de Albia Bilbao is next to the city's main points of interest: The Guggenheim Museum Bilbao, Museum of Fine Arts and the Old Town, with easy access to Euskalduna Palace. An ideal spot for enjoying the city, close to restaurants, bars and shops. The hotel has 138 rooms, breakfast, a spa to relax in and 3 meeting rooms, as well as paid parking with direct hotel access. No pets allowedaccorhotels.com

name: Sercotel Coliseo Bilbao
address: Calle Alameda De Urquijo 13, 48001 Bilbao, Biscay
description: Sercotel Coliseo is located amongst Bilbao's popular restaurants and eateries, just a brief stroll from Bilbao-Abando Railway Station. The various amenities this modern hotel offers include a 24-hour reception, a hair salon and luggage storage. This 4-star hotel provides a safe, a tour desk and laundry facilities. Those staying at the property can unwind with a book in the on-site library. Coliseo has 100 rooms that are fitted with all the essentials to ensure an enjoyable stay. Those staying at Sercotel Coliseo Hotel Bilbao can relax at the on-site bar, conveniently based for a drink. Sercotel Coliseo is ideally located for discovering Bilbao with Alhondiga and the Arenal Bridge within walking distance. It is also within walking distance of Bilbao Fine Arts Museum, the Guggenheim Museum Bilbao and Casco Viejo.Revato

name: Hotel Zenit Bilbao
address: C/ Autonomía, 58, 48012 Bilbao, Biscay
description: Zenit Bilbao is in central Bilbao’s Indautxu district, 10 minutes from Atlétic Bilbao FC’s San Mamés Stadium. It offers stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV. The hotel’s Abando Restaurant has a private outdoor terrace, where guests can enjoy traditional Basque cuisine. There is also a lounge bar and terrace. Hotel Zenit Bilbao offers access to a fitness centre located nearby. The Zenit’s 24-hour reception allows guests to come and go at any time. Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do in Bilbao. Bilbao Cathedral and the city centre is a 15-minute walk from Zenit Bilbao, and you can walk to The Guggenheim Museum in 20 minutes. It is also 5 minutes’ walk from Indautxu Metro Station.

name: Hotel Bed4U Bilbao
address: Kirikiño Etorbidea 1, 48012 Bilbao, Biscay
description: Boasting a shared lounge, bar and views of city, Hotel Bed4U Bilbao is situated in Bilbao, 1.3 km from Catedral de Santiago. Featuring a fitness centre, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.1 km from Abando Train Station. At the hotel, every room has a desk and a flat-screen TV. At Hotel Bed4U Bilbao rooms come with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, vegetarian or gluten-free options. Speaking English, Spanish and French, staff are ready to help around the clock at the reception. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include San Mamés Metro Station, Bilbao Fine Arts Museum and Arriaga Theatre. The nearest airport is Bilbao Airport, 8 km from Hotel Bed4U Bilbao.

name: Gran Hotel Domine Bilbao
address: Alameda de Mazarredo, 61, 48009 Bilbao, Biscay
description: Designed by Javier Mariscal, this stylish hotel is located opposite Bilbao's Guggenheim Museum. It features a roof terrace with spectacular views. The air-conditioned rooms at the Gran Hotel Domine Bilbao feature carpeted floors and a private bathroom with bathtubs, bathrobe and slippers. Each room has free WiFi, USB connection and a 40" flat-screen TV with international satellite channels, HDMI. Breakfast is served on the roof terrace with panoramic views of the city. Guests can enjoy different dining options at either the Belz restaurant, Le Café or at the Sixty-One Lobby Bar. The hotel has a wellness centre with fitness area, sauna and Turkish bath. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Bilbao. The Museum of Fine Arts and the Maritime Museum are both within 500 metres of the hotel. The city’s shopping area, including the Zubiarte Shopping Centre, are 5 minutes’ walk away.

name: Hotel Tayko Bilbao
address: Erribera Kalea 13, 48005 Bilbao, Biscay
description: Situated in Bilbao, 200 metres from Arriaga Theatre, Hotel Tayko Bilbao was built in 1924. The property is within just 0.2 km of Catedral de Santiago and 15 minutes' walk from Guggenheim Museum. All rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV, private bathroom with free toiletries. Michelin-star restaurant Ola and La bodega de Ola at Hotel Tayko Bilbao are both managed by the Michelin-starred chef Martin Berasategui. Speaking German, English, Spanish and Basque, staff at the 24-hour front desk can help you plan your stay. Euskalduna Conference Centre and Concert Hall is 2.2 km from Hotel Tayko Bilbao, while Bilbao Fine Arts Museum is 2.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Bilbao Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Silken Indautxu
address: Plaza Bombero Etxaniz, 48010 Bilbao, Biscay
description: A central hotel in Bilbao for sightseeing comfortably, 400 meters from the Indautxu metro station. Urban hotel in Bilbao is located in the epicenter of Bilbao's museum triangle, between the Guggenheim Museum, the Fine Arts Museum and the Azkuna Alhóndiga. Three essential tourist stops that are also located in the heart of the commercial and gastronomic area of the city, with the best shops and pintxo bars. The hotel's Etxaniz restaurant with a careful proposal that bets on the local product with elaboration of reference the traditional one in the Basque gastronomy. Menu of the day and a la carte are offered to adapt to the preferences of all our travellers. The Gastro bar El Muelle, recently renovated, has an outdoor terrace with a green environment. Perfect atmosphere for a more informal stop, dinner and drinks are served in this bright and spacious space. The Meat & Soul cafeteria allows you to taste its pintxos and express breakfasts with sweet and savory dishes from the area.

name: Hotel Carlton
address: Plaza Federico Moyua 2, 48009 Bilbao, Biscay
description: Centrally located in Plaza de Federico Moyúa square, this elegant hotel stands as an impressive landmark in Bilbao. It offers free access to its gym and spacious rooms with luxurious décor. The rooms at Hotel Carlton feature a classic or contemporary design and include a private bathroom. They also come with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Hotel Carlton offers a business centre with a PC and free internet access. There is also a printer and complimentary minibar. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. The grand restaurant serves Basque specialities and international classics. The menu changes daily, from Monday to Friday. Set next to Gran Vía, Carlton Hotel is less than 10 minutes’ walk from the Guggenheim Museum. Moyua Metro Station is next to the hotel, providing easy access to Bilbao and its surroundings. The airport bus stops nearby.

name: Micampus San Mamés Residencia Universitaria Solo Estudiantes
address: Plaza Garellano 4, 48013 Bilbao, Biscay
description: Well situated in the centre of Bilbao, Micampus San Mamés Residencia Universitaria SOLO ESTUDIANTES offers air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a shared lounge. Featuring a bar, the hostel is close to several noted attractions, around 800 metres from San Mamés Metro Station, less than 1 km from San Mamés Stadium and a 13-minute walk from Euskalduna Conference Centre and Concert Hall. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.7 km from Bilbao Fine Arts Museum. At the hostel, every room includes a desk. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower, while certain units at Micampus San Mamés Residencia Universitaria SOLO ESTUDIANTES also provide guests with a seating area. The units feature bed linen. Guggenheim Museum Bilbao is 2.9 km from the accommodation, while Catedral de Santiago is 3 km away. The nearest airport is Bilbao Airport, 10 km from Micampus San Mamés Residencia Universitaria SOLO ESTUDIANTES.

name: Holiday Inn Express Bilbao
address: Zarandoa Kalea, 5, 48160 Derio, Biscay
description: Comfortable hotel close to Bilbao, with breakfast, free Wi-Fi and free airport shuttle. Holiday Inn Express Bilbao is only 2 km from Bilbao Airport and 20 minutes from the city centre by bus. There are plenty of green areas around to go for walks. The sights of Bilbao city centre can be reached by car or by bus that departs from outside the airport. The iconic, Frank Gehry-designed Guggenheim Museum Bilbao houses a world-renowned collection of modern art. There's also a Fine Arts Museum, and in the delightful Old Town, you can eat traditional pintxos and browse independent shops. At this hotel, you can enjoy: - A free shuttle bus to and from the airport - A continental Express Start Breakfast, included in the room rate - Free Wi-Fi - Complimentary on-site parking during your stay - Family rooms that sleep up to 4 guests, max 2 adults/room. In the spacious lobby, you can sit back on one of the comfy sofas and enjoy a drink from the bar. For lunch or dinner you don’t need to head far: next door to the hotel, Urbe Restaurant offers seasonal Spanish dishes, and there are plenty more options within a short drive.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hotel Gran Bilbao
address: Indalecio Prieto Hiribidea, 1, 48004 Bilbao, Biscay
description: Hotel Gran Bilbao offers a stylish setting while in Bilbao. It also provides a coffee bar, free Wi-Fi and massage services. The hotel features luxury accommodation, and is an ideal base for either the holiday maker or business traveler. Corporate amenities include a business centre and meeting rooms. Those staying at Hotel Gran Bilbao can relax in their stylish rooms that offer an in-room safe, an in-room closet and a mini bar. All provide heating and a telephone. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient spot to enjoy a meal. In the evening, guests can enjoy a drink in the comfortable lounge bar. Each morning a buffet or an a la carte breakfast is served in the dining room. The position of Hotel Gran Bilbao permits easy access to many tourist attractions. H-BI-01233.Revato

name: Hotel Miro
address: Alameda Mazarredo 77, 48009 Bilbao, Biscay
description: Situated opposite Bilbao’s Guggenheim Museum, this boutique hotel was created by fashion designer Antonio Miró. It offers free WiFi and a 24-hour honesty bar. The Hotel Miró's rooms are decorated in a minimalist style. All are equipped with a smart TV. The bathrooms have Molton Brown toiletries, bathrobes and slippers, and free mineral water is provided. A buffet breakfast with selected local products is offered. Hotel Miró has a well-equipped gym. Guests benefit from a personalized concierge service. Massage services are available on request for an extra charge. The area surrounding the Miró is rich in traditional Basque restaurants. The historic city centre is 5 minutes’ walk away.

name: NH Collection Villa de Bilbao
address: Gran Via, 87, 48011 Bilbao, Biscay
description: The stylish and contemporary NH Collection Villa de Bilbao hotel is reputed as one of the best hotels in the city. It’s set in Bilbao’s commercial district, just steps away from the Guggenheim, Bilbao Fine Arts Museum, Palacio de Congresos, and the San Mamés stadium. Restaurants showcasing the city’s exceptional gastronomy, including Michelin-starred restaurants, are within easy walking distance and the nearby metro station provides great links to rest of the city. NH Collection Villa de Bilbao has 142 spacious and elegant rooms. Many of these come with spectacular views of Bilbao and the surrounding mountains, while each one is perfectly designed for your relaxation thanks to pillow menus and luxurious mattresses. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. Each morning we serve a lavish breakfast that features hot and cold dishes along with fragrant coffee and fresh fruit juices. Gluten-free options are also available. Our popular Le Bol Blanc restaurant has a creative menu based on traditional Basque cuisine. Unwind with a drink at the Corner bar where we have a hand-picked menu of specialty gins and vodkas. Guests have free access to our rooftop gym. Our courteous staff can organize VIP treatment at the city’s top attractions. We also have 7 function rooms for up to 340 people.NH Hoteles

name: Hotel Conde Duque Bilbao
address: Paseo Campo Volantin, 22, 48007 Bilbao, Biscay
description: Set overlooking the Calatrava Bridge on the River Nervión, this city-centre hotel is 750 metres from Bilbao’s world-famous Guggenheim Museum. Hotel Conde Duque Bilbao offers a restaurant and a cocktail bar. Guests have free access to the fitness centre and sauna. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. The modern rooms feature a Smart TV with screen mirroring and central heating and air conditioning. A coffee maker is available upon request. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries, magnifying mirror, bath or shower, and hairdryer. A breakfast buffet is available daily at the Conde Duque. The restaurant Campo Volatín offers local dishes for lunch and dinner. The hotel also offers luggage storage, a laundry service and a business centre. Bilbao’s old town, with its bustling pintxo bars, is a 10-minute walk from the property. Abando Train Station is 1 km away.

name: Hotel Sirimiri
address: Plaza de la Encarnación, 3, 48006 Bilbao, Biscay
description: Hotel Sirimiri is located in Bilbao's old town, a 5-minute tram journey from the Guggenheim. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. Rooms at the Hotel Sirimiri are exterior and offer lots of natural light. Rooms also have air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV, and an en suite bathroom with a hairdryer. The Hotel Sirimiri is set a few metres from Atxuri Tram Station that can take you to the bus terminal. From here there is access to the city centre and to the airport. The Santiago Cathedral, La Ribera market, and the Arriaga Theatre are a short walk away.

name: Residencia Universitaria Blas De Otero
address: C/ de Las Cortes, 38, 48003 Bilbao, Biscay
description: Residencia Blas de Otero offers value accommodation in the historic centre of Bilbao, 400 metres from the Cathedral. Rooms include a private bathroom, small kitchen and free internet access. Residencia Blas de Otero is a short walk from Abando Train Station and Bilbao’s Old Town. The world-famous Guggenheim Museum is around 2 km away. The Residence is home to students of the University of the Basque Country. It includes a TV and DVD lounge, a games room, a gym and a self-service laundry room. Snacks and drinks are available from vending machines. Breakfast is provided at a nearby restaurant. There is free Wi-Fi access in public areas of the Blas de Otero. The Residence also has a 24-hour reception with a tour desk, which can provide information about the city. This residence is open to the university community all year round. If you are not a member of the Educational or University Community, a membership card by any Hostel Association in the IYHF must be presented.

name: Ganbara Hostel
address: Prim, 13 Bajo, 48006 Bilbao, Biscay
description: Ganbara Hostel - Self Check In is set in the heart of Bilbao’s old town, on one of its famous Siete Calles, or Seven Streets. It offers free Wi-Fi, 2 communal lounges and a shared kitchen. Each of the simply decorated, modern dorms at Ganbara Hostel - Self Check In has heating, air conditioning and access to a shared bathroom with a hairdryer. Bed linen and lockers are included. The hostel is a 5-minute walk from the Basque Museum and nearby Casco Viejo Metro station. Buses to the famous Guggenheim Museum stop 10 minutes’ walk away. Bilbao Railway Station is less than 1 km from the Ganbara.

name: NH Bilbao Deusto
address: Francisco Macia 9, 48014 Bilbao, Biscay
description: NH Bilbao Deusto is a comfortable and modern hotel in the heart of Bilbao. Everything is close by, including the famous Guggenheim museum of modern art and the Euskalduna Conference Center and Concert Hall. Nearby, you will also find two universities, Deusto and the University of Basque County, both of which are within a five-minute walk. There are 71 spacious rooms at NH Bilbao Deusto, each decorated with warm colors and featuring hardwood floors. If you are in Bilbao for work, there is a desk in each room and you can stay connected with our free hotel-wide Wi-Fi. Comfort is our number one priority, which is why rooms come with comfy mattresses, extra-large beds, and pillow menus. Connecting rooms are available and some come with terraces or balconies. A huge breakfast is served each morning, featuring fresh pastries, cold cuts and cheeses. There is a restaurant available for private bookings, and you can find many tapas bars and great dining options near the hotel. For a snack, there is a self-service lobby bar. If you are driving, make use of our on-site parking. For functions, there are three meeting rooms that can accommodate up to 60 people.NH Hoteles

name: Micampus Bilbao
address: Gabriel Aresti Hiribidea 40, 48004 Bilbao, Biscay
description: Situated in Bilbao and with Catedral de Santiago reachable within 2.6 km, Micampus Bilbao Residencia Universitaria SOLO ESTUDIANTES features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi throughout the property and a shared lounge. Boasting a shared kitchen, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation offers a tour desk, and luggage storage for guests. At the hostel, all rooms are fitted with a desk. At Micampus Bilbao Residencia Universitaria SOLO ESTUDIANTES rooms include air conditioning and a private bathroom. You can play table tennis at the accommodation. Funicular de Artxanda is 3 km from Micampus Bilbao Residencia Universitaria SOLO ESTUDIANTES, while Calatrava Bridge is 3.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Bilbao Airport, 7 km from the hostel.

name: Pensión B4R
address: Cocherito de Bilbao Kalea 2, 48004 Bilbao, Biscay
description: Set in Bilbao, 1.8 km from Catedral de Santiago, Pensión B4R features rooms with city views and free WiFi. The property is situated 2.9 km from Calatrava Bridge, 2.2 km from Arriaga Theatre and 3.1 km from Funicular de Artxanda. The guest house features family rooms. The units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a microwave, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. At the guest house all rooms come with a wardrobe and a private bathroom. Bilbao Fine Arts Museum and Guggenheim Museum Bilbao are 3.6 km from Pensión B4R. The nearest airport is Bilbao Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Habitación con baño privado
address: Santa Ana de Bolueta, 48004 Bilbao, Biscay
description: Situated in Bilbao, Santa Ana Bolueta features free WiFi, and guests can enjoy a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. Private parking is available on site. Each unit features a terrace, a satellite TV, a seating area, a well-fitted kitchen and a private bathroom with bidet and a hairdryer. Some units have a dining area and/or a balcony. Catedral de Santiago is 2.6 km from the apartment, while Arriaga Theatre is 3.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Bilbao Airport, 9 km from Santa Ana Bolueta.

name: Residencia Universitaria Resa San Mamés
address: Gurtubay Kalea 1, 48013 Bilbao, Biscay
description: Conveniently set in the centre of Bilbao, Residencia Universitaria Resa San Mamés provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a shared lounge. The property is located 1.9 km from Bilbao Fine Arts Museum, 3.2 km from Guggenheim Museum Bilbao and 3.5 km from Catedral de Santiago. The student accommodation offers city views, a terrace and a 24-hour front desk. At the student accommodation, all rooms have a desk. Each room includes a private bathroom with a shower, while selected rooms have a kitchen with a stovetop. At Residencia Universitaria Resa San Mamés each room is equipped with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a continental or gluten-free breakfast. You can play table tennis at Residencia Universitaria Resa San Mamés. Popular points of interest near the student accommodation include San Mamés Metro Station, San Mamés Stadium and Euskalduna Conference Centre and Concert Hall. The nearest airport is Bilbao Airport, 10 km from Residencia Universitaria Resa San Mamés.

name: Hotel Af Valle Orotava
address: C/ Cupido 12, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Hotel AF Valle Orotava is a 4-star hotel, completely renovated, located in the center of Puerto de la Cruz, 10 minutes walk from Playa Jardín, equipped with modern facilities and rooms with views of the sea and Teide, rooftop with large terrace, heated saltwater pool. Buffet restaurant and à la carte restaurant are present. Bright, cozy, and comfortable rooms to provide the best experience and stays to each of our clients. They are fully equipped, air conditioning, free WIFI, safe included, telephone, TV, heating, electronic security lock and optional minibar. Private bathrooms with hairdryer and shower. They also have a balcony or terrace with artificial grass. Puerto de la Cruz has numerous tourist attractions that you can access walking from the Hotel AF Valle Orotava, such as the Loro Parque 20 minutes away, Playa Jardín 10 minutes away, the Castillo de San Felipe 10 minutes away, the Botanical Garden 30 minutes away or Paseo de San Telmo at 10 minutes, as well as the Lago Martiánez leisure complex at 15 minutes, formed by an artificial lake and seven swimming pools, where everyone can enjoy a pleasant dip. You can access Las Cañadas del Teide within 60 minutes by car or bus. The Hotel AF Valle Orotava is close to the bus station, medical center, post office, shops. It is located 36.50km from Santa Cruz de Tenerife, 26km from the North Airport and 84km from the South Airport. Paseo San Telmo Boulevard is a 10-minute walk from the property. Lago Martiánez is 1.2 km away.

name: Hotel Vallemar
address: Avenida de Colon 4, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Just 300 metres from Puerto de la Cruz’s beaches and the pools at Lago Martiánez, Hotel Vallemar offers stylish rooms with balconies. It features an outdoor swimming pool and a terrace with fantastic views over the Atlantic Ocean. Each spacious, air-conditioned room at Hotel Vallemar features classic-style décor. All rooms come with a TV, minibar and a private bathroom. Rooms offer garden or ocean views. A buffet breakfast is served in the Vallemar’s restaurant, which also hosts themed dinners with a range of Canarian and international dishes. You can enjoy a drink and snacks on the poolside terrace, and there is also a bar with live entertainment. The hotel is next to Puerto de la Cruz’s oceanfront promenade, and shops, bars and restaurants can be found nearby. Plaza del Charco Square is a 5-minute walk away. Los Rodeos Airport is a 15-minute drive from the hotel.

name: Blue Sea Costa Jardin & Spa
address: Guerrero, 14, Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Set in tropical gardens, Blue Sea Costa Jardin & Spa is just over 1 km from the beaches at Puerto de la Cruz. It features a spa, outdoor swimming pool and rooms with balconies. Blue Sea Costa Jardin & Spa offers bright, air-conditioned accommodation with satellite TV and a minibar. Each of its rooms has a fully equipped bathroom. The hotel’s El Drago buffet restaurant serves a selection of Mediterranean cuisine. There is also a poolside bar overlooking the hotel’s attractive grounds. The spa features a hydromassage tub and sauna, and offers a range of treatments including massage. There is also a gym on site. The centre of Puerto de la Cruz can be reached in around 5 minutes by foot and there is a golf course just 2 km from the hotel. The impressive Mount Teide Park is approximately 15 km from Blue Sea Costa Jardin & Spa.

name: Sol Puerto de la Cruz Tenerife
address: Avenida Jose Del Campo Llanera, 2, Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Featuring a swimming pool and garden area, Sol Puerto de la Cruz Tenerife is set at the heart of the tourist resort of Puerto de la Cruz, in the north of the island of Tenerife. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Set overlooking the sea, you can enjoy excellent views from the hotel. Stroll down to the beach from this hotel, and relax on the fine sands. You can cool off by taking a dip in the Atlantic Ocean. Sol Puerto de la Cruz Tenerife is equipped with a sun terrace, where you can enjoy a sunbathe. Take a walk from here to the Plaza del Charco and the small, fishing port of Puerto de la Cruz – popular destinations in Tenerife.

name: RF Astoria - Only Adults
address: Calle Enrique Talg, 15, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Hotel RF Astoria - Adults Only is situated in the heart of the tourist centre of Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife, just a stone’s throw away from the beach. The elegant apartments are fully-equipped to ensure that you and your family have a relaxing and enjoyable holiday. Among its facilities you can enjoy the outdoor swimming pool, where you can take a dip and take pleasure in sunbathing in the warmth of the sun. All apartments provide everything you need to make your stay as comfortable as possible. Puerto de la Cruz is located in the north of Tenerife, away from the hustle and bustle of the more popular tourist destinations in the south of the Island. There is a lively atmosphere, with numerous shopping facilities as well as restaurants and bars close to the apartments. The apartments are located near the town centre, where the nearest transport links to visit the enchanting island is available.

name: Be Live Adults Only Tenerife
address: Avenida Blas Pérez González 11, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Located 270 metres from Jardin Beach in in Puerto de la Cruz, Be Live Adults Only Tenerife features a shared swimming pool and an on-site restaurant. This hotel has a 24-hour reception. All rooms at Be Live Adults Only Tenerife offer air conditioning, modern décor, and parquet floors. The private bathroom comes with a shower, hairdryer, and free toiletries. Some of them feature views of the sea. WiFi is available for free. Loro Parque Zoo is a 5-minute drive from the hotel, and Teide Nature Reserve is 37 km from the property. Tenerife North Airport is 20 minutes’ drive from the hotel.

name: Aparthotel los Dragos del Sur
address: Avenida Maritima Puerto De Santiago, 38683 Puerto de Santiago, Tenerife
description: This aparthotel offers Atlantic Ocean views from its position above Tenerife’s Playa de la Arena. With an outdoor pool, it is a 5-minute drive from Los Gigantes Harbour and Cliffs. Los Dragos del Sur apartments have private terrace, all with ocean or swimming pool views. Each air-conditioned apartment has a private bathroom and satellite TV. The kitchen comes with a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. Aparthotel Los Dragos del Sur includes a gym available free of charge. Breakfast is served at the hotel's restaurant, and there is a poolside snack bar and a chill out area. Free WiFi is available throughout. Water sports are available on the beach, and Abama Golf Course is 10 km away. You can hire a car or bicycle from the tour desk and rent beach towels or a safe. There is a 24-hour front desk. Tenerife South Airport is 41 km away.

name: Mynd Adeje
address: Calle el Jable 36, 38678 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Situated in Adeje, 500 metres from Playa de Ajabo, MYND Adeje features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. 1.6 km from Las Galgas Beach and 2.2 km from Playa El Pinque, the property offers a restaurant and a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a desk. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hairdryer, all rooms at MYND Adeje have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms also boast a terrace. At the accommodation the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers American, vegetarian or vegan options. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at this 4-star hotel. Playa Las Salinas is 2.6 km from MYND Adeje, while Aqualand is 11 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tenerife South Airport, 29 km from the hotel.

name: Barceló Tenerife Royal Level
address: Avenida Greñamora 1, 38639 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: Barcelo Tenerife Royal Level has 59 fully equipped and renovated rooms. A range of exclusive gastronomy options and the Magma performance hall. It also includes other original proposals for leisure and rest such as a navigable lake; a climbing wall; a gym; a recreational sports area with a beach volleyball court; basketball; tennis and paddle tennis; eight swimming pools /two of which are heated throughout the year/ and a Wellness area.Barcelo.com

name: Alua Atlantico Golf
address: Avenida Del Atlántico, 3, 38639 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: Alua Atlantico Golf - All Inclusive has a restaurant, fitness centre, a bar and garden in San Miguel de Abona. Boasting a kids' club, this property also provides guests with a children's playground. The hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool, indoor pool, karaoke and a 24-hour front desk. All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a bath and a desk. At the hotel the rooms are equipped with a wardrobe and a private bathroom. The establishment also offers My Favourite Club®, with exclusive services and special attributes in room categories. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at Alua Atlantico Golf - All Inclusive The accommodation offers a terrace. You can play table tennis, and tennis at Alua Atlantico Golf - All Inclusive, and car hire is available. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Playa San Miguel de Abona, Playa El Barranco and Playa de San Blas. The nearest airport is Tenerife Sur, 10 km from Alua Atlantico Golf - All Inclusive, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Fergus Puerto De La Cruz
address: Avda. Marques Villanueva Del Prado, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Featuring 2 outdoor swimming pools surrounded by gardens, Hotel Puerto de la Cruz offers spacious rooms with balconies. It is within 5 minutes’ walk of central Puerto de la Cruz and 1.1 km from the oceanside Lago Martianez salt-water lake. Free WiFi is available. Each bright room at FERGUS Puerto de la Cruz has simple, modern décor and air conditioning. All rooms have satellite TV and a bathroom with a hairdryer. Air conditioning is available only during the summer months, and it is subject to limited operating hours. A safe and minibar are available for an additional cost. The hotel has a buffet restaurant and a bar, where there is live entertainment and music. There is also a poolside bar. One of the swimming pools is heated and there is also a children’s swimming pool. The hotel offers a free shuttle service to Martianez Shopping Centre, available from Monday to Friday, and Saturday morning as well. Mount Teide National Park with its famous volcano can be reached in 1 hour by car. Santa Cruz de Tenerife, its port and the island’s North Airport are within 30 minutes' drive of the hotel. Private parking is subject to availability.

name: Mediterranean Palace
address: Avda De Las Americas 1, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 535 air-conditioned guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and bidets. Amenities Dip into one of the 2 outdoor swimming pools or enjoy other recreational amenities including a sauna and a fitness center. Additional features at this resort include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting (surcharge), and an arcade/game room. Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the area shuttle (surcharge). Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Event facilities at this resort consist of conference space and a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at Mediterranean Palace in Arona, you'll be on the beach, within a 10-minute drive of Siam Park and Arona Pyramid. This 5-star resort is 0.6 mi (1 km) from Playa de las Américas and 4.2 mi (6.8 km) from Fañabe Beach. Dining Satisfy your appetite for lunch or dinner at Mediterranean Palace, a restaurant which specializes in international cuisine, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Unwind at the end of the day with a drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. name: Coral Compostela Beach Golf
address: Calle Arenales, 16, 38660 Arona, Tenerife
description: Apartment complex situated n the south side of the Las Américas Golf Course, and only 800 metres from Las Vistas Beach. Two-floor building comprised of fully-equipped apartments of one or two rooms, creating a pleasant ambience. The premises also comprise an a la carte restaurant, bar, and a fresh water swimming pool that is heated in winter. The offering of nearby restaurants and leisure possibilities is considerable, owing to the hotel’s advantageous location. The complex also offers an entertainment program and sells green fees for the golf course. It is, without a doubt, an ideal place for golfers, or families who want to spend their holidays in a tranquil atmosphere. A children's club is also available.

name: Hotel Estefania Boutique Suites
address: 2 Calle Llano del Grillo, 38652 Los Cristianos, Tenerife
description: No description found

name: Apartamentos HG Tenerife Sur
address: Avenida de Ámsterdam, 3, 38650 Arona, Tenerife
description: Hg Tenerife Sur Apartments are a 10-minute walk from Los Cristianos Beach, in southern Tenerife. Set in gardens, they offer 2 outdoor pools, a sauna and squash court. All Canarian style apartments at HG Tenerife Sur have a private terrace and TV. Satellite TV is available for surcharge. There is a private bathroom, and a kitchenette equipped with a fridge, kettle, toaster and electric hob. There is a bar and a restaurant at the Hg Tenerife Sur apartment complex. Wired internet is available in public areas for an extra charge, and there is a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. The complex has a games room and a children’s play area. There is easy access to the TF1 Motorway, and Playa de las Americas and Las Americas Golf Course are a 5-minute drive away.

name: El Marques Palace by Intercorp Group
address: Las Rosas, s/n, 38683 Puerto de Santiago, Tenerife
description: El Marques Palace is located in Puerto de Santiago, near the impressive Gigantes cliffs. It offers apartments with classic decor, a shared outdoor swimming pool which is heated in the winter, and a sunbathing area. Each bright air-conditioned apartment includes a living area with a flat-screen TV. The kitchenette has a microwave, fridge, washing machine and kitchenware. Some apartments also offer views of the Gigantes cliffs and Atlantic Ocean from their private terraces. El Marques Palace has a poolside snack bar and you can play table tennis. There is a selection of supermarkets, shops, bars and restaurants in the surrounding area. Playa de la Arena Beach is just 15 minutes’ walk from the property, while Los Gigantes Marina is 1.8 km away. Playa Las Américas is 30 km from el Marques Palace and Tenerife South Airport can be reached in a 45-minute drive.

name: Ona Las Rosas
address: Calle Las Rosas 2 Puerto de Santiago Santiago Del, 38683 Santiago del Teide, Tenerife
description: Featuring a shared swimming pool and an on-site restaurant, Ona Las Rosas is located in Puerto de Santiago. It offers air-conditioned apartments with a private terrace. All accommodation includes 1 bathroom with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. The living area includes a sofa and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, while the kitchen comes equipped with an oven, hob, microwave, and a coffee machine. A dining table is also available. The private terrace comes with an additional table and sun loungers. The apartment complex offers a bar and a mini-market on site, as well as a games room. Other shared facilities available include a garden area and a communal lounge. Arena Beach is 5 minutes’ drive from Ona Las Rosas, and Los Gigantes Port is 2 km away. The Teide Nature Reserve is 20 km from the property, and Tenerife South Airport is a 40-minute drive away.

name: Las Terrazas de Abama Suites
address: Carretera General, TF- 47 Km9, 38687 Guía de Isora, Tenerife
description: Offering an outdoor pool and views of the sea, Las Terrazas de Abama Suites is situated within the Abama Golf Course, and features stunning views of La Gomera and the Teide Volcano. Set in a luxurious complex, this property is surrounded by beautiful gardens. Some suites feature views of the sea and the golf course, while others feature views of the complex. Guests can benefit from a free transfer to the facilities within the property and the beach. Featuring a terrace, each air-conditioned suite features a dining area and a living space with a satellite flat-screen TV. There is also a kitchen, equipped with a dishwasher, oven and microwave. A refrigerator and kettle are also featured. Other facilities on site include the Melvin Restaurant, offers guests a variety of dining options. The menu, designed by Berasategui, is a special selection of local products that constitutes a unique culinary offer. There is also a gourmet shop at Abama Terraces, offering a wide range of local artisan products and an exquisite selection of wines. Puerto de la Cruz is 37 km from Las Terrazas de Abama Suites. The nearest airport is Tenerife Sur Airport, 26 km from the property.

name: Gf Fañabe
address: Avda de Bruselas 13, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Situated 500 metres from Fañabe Beach in Costa Adeje, Tenerife, GF Fañabe has a large year-round outdoor pool and sun terrace. The colourful rooms have air conditioning and balconies. GF Fañabe has a basketball court and mini golf. The wellness centre offers massages, sauna and hot tub. Two more pools can be found on the roof terrace. There is also a separate area for naturists. There is a kids’ club and an entertainment team that organizes a range of daytime and night time activities. A pool for children is also available. The GF Fañabe’s restaurant offers a varied buffet with show cooking and regular themed dinners. The informal pool bar serves light meals and cocktails, while the hall bar offers live music. Free WiFi is also provided.

name: Amarilla Golf Residences
address: Avenida María Ángeles Ascanio Cullen, 38639 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: With Playa El Barranco reachable in less than 1 km, Amarilla Golf Residences offers accommodation, a restaurant, an outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and a garden. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The aparthotel provides guests with a terrace, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge and a dishwasher, and a private bathroom with shower and a hairdryer. A microwave and kettle are also provided. Guests at Amarilla Golf Residences can enjoy a buffet breakfast. If you would like to discover the area, hiking is possible in the surroundings. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Playa San Miguel de Abona, Playa Colmenares and Golf del Sur. The nearest airport is Tenerife South, 6 km from Amarilla Golf Residences, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Ritz-Carlton, Abama
address: Carretera General, TF-47, km 9, 38687 Guía de Isora, Tenerife
description: The Ritz-Carlton Tenerife, Abama is an oasis of tranquility and seclusion, where sea, land and subtropical vegetation effortlessly collide with Moorish-inspired architecture. The 459 guest rooms & suites - divided between the Citadel and four exclusive rows of villas - enjoy magnificent views over the Atlantic Ocean, Mount Teide or our lush gardens. The resort offers a collection of restaurants ranging from light, simple cooking to world-class gourmet cuisine. At the top end of the scale, our Michelin-starred restaurants - M.B awarded with two stars and Kabuki with one. Providing a heaven of escape, this timeless island retreat features 7 swimming pools, a 2500m2 Spa & Fitness Center and the largest Ritz Kids in Europe. Guests can enjoy an 18-hole championship golf course designed by Ryder Cup player Dave Thomas, the Abama Tennis Academy, and an exclusive area on the Abama beach with complimentary use of sunbeds and umbrellas, serviced by our Ladies & Gentlemen.Marriott

name: Klayman Diamond Aparthotel
address: Calle Tabaiba, 5, 38690 Los Gigantes, Tenerife
description: Apartamentos Diamond is set 250 metres from Los Gigantes Beach and Port. It offers an outdoor pool, free WiFi, and apartments with furnished terrace and scenic sea views. The air-conditioned accommodation features stylish decor. Lounge-diners include plasma satellite TV, sofa bed and dining table, while modern kitchenettes have microwave, oven and toaster. A buffet breakfast is served daily and the cafeteria bar offers drinks, snacks and set menus. There also are several bars and restaurants within 10 minutes’ walk. The complex offers car and bike rental. Diving and snorkeling are popular nearby, and the Los Gigantes Cliffs are 250 metres away. Diamond is 10 minutes’ drive from the Abama Golf Resort and 25 km from Playa de las Americas. Tenerife Sur Airport is 40 minutes’ drive away.

name: Flamingo Suites Boutique Hotel
address: Avda De Espana 6 - San Eugenio Bajo, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Hotel Flamingo Suites is a popular choice amongst travelers in Tenerife, whether exploring or just passing through. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. Facilities like Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, airport transfer, babysitting, family room are readily available for you to enjoy. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include hot tub, sauna, golf course (on site), outdoor pool, diving. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Tenerife, Hotel Flamingo Suites will make you feel instantly at home.priceline.com

name: Kn Aparthotel Columbus
address: Avenida Santiago Puig, 6, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Aparthotel Columbus is near Playa de las Americas Golf Course, in southern Tenerife. It has 4 outdoor swimming pools including a children's pool, a hot tub and a fitness centre. The nearest beach is 7 minutes' walk away. All units at Aparthotel Columbus have a balcony. Studios and apartments have a small kitchen area with a fridge, hob and toaster, as well as tea and coffee-making facilities. The aparthotel has a 24-hour reception, and WiFi is available in communal areas. It offers currency exchange and car rental services. There is also a beauty salon, a supermarket and a cash machine. Spa is available at an extra cost. You will faind a Buffet Restaurant at the property as well as a Bar Hall, Pizzeria Snack Bar and an English Pub. The Colombus is set next to the Antonio Dominguez Sports Stadium and 5 minutes walking from the night life area of Playa de Las Americas.

name: Iberostar Las Dalias
address: Gran Bretaña, Urbanizacion San Eugenio 1, 38679 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Perfectly situated in the heart of Playa del Bobo, this family-friendly hotel is just a few steps from the excellent beaches of Costa Adeje. Many sports facilities, outdoor pools, one restaurants and a variety of bars are offered on site. Numerous shops, restaurants, bars and cafés are in the immediate vicinity of the hotel, while one of Europe's largest water parks is within easy reach. Visitors will find plenty of useful facilities on-site, including large outdoor swimming pools for a refreshing bath, as well as luxurious dining facilities to taste exquisite dishes. Those travelling as a couple will find the perfect room for them with breath-taking views to the sea and families will appreciate the functional communicated rooms with everything necessary for a pleasant stay.FarePortal

name: Villa de Montaña Ilusión
address: Camino Las Chozas 7, 38300 La Orotava, Tenerife
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and an oven, as well as a stovetop and free WiFi. Other amenities include kitchenware and utensils, rollaway beds, a crib, and a dining area.Expedia

name: Weare Hotel La Paz
address: La Haya, 3, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Hotel Weare La Paz is a popular choice amongst travelers in Tenerife, whether exploring or just passing through. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the property provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Hotel Weare La Paz. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Take a break from a long day and make use of the spa, kids club. Discover all Tenerife has to offer by making Hotel Weare La Paz your base.Agoda

name: Green Garden Eco Resort & Villas
address: Calle Landa Golf, 1, 38650 Arona, Tenerife
description: Set in magnificent tropical gardens, 1 km from water park Siam Park, the colonial-style Green Garden Eco Resort & Villas features 3 outdoor pools. It offers a free shuttle bus to the beach, a 20-minute walk away. Bright, spacious apartments and suites have air-conditioning, and living room with a TV and sofa bed. Private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities. All apartments and suites have a dining area and kitchenette with a fridge, microwave, kettle and coffee maker. Green Garden Eco Resort & Villas has a restaurant, and the snack bar overlooks the pools. A buffet breakfast with show cooking is offered, and there is a mini-market on-site. Green Garden Eco Resort & Villas features a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. There is parking on-site.

name: Coral Compostela Beach
address: 8 Av. Las Américas, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: On the beach front of the popular "Las Américas", this is a pleasant complex with gardens, and very near the commercial area of the town and the famous atmosphere at Arona. The rooms are distributed between 8 buildings and over 4 floors and all comprise a double room, balcony or terrace, kitchen and lounge. The restaurant offers a la carte service and menus, and there is also a snack bar where you can grab a bite. This is a great option to enjoy holidays with the family in complete independence, with all services within easy reach. Sport lovers can take advantage of the various golf courses nearby, or the water sports on offer.

name: Los Jardines de Abama Suites
address: Carretera General, TF 47 KM 9, 38687 Guía de Isora, Tenerife
description: Situated in Guía de Isora, 2.8 km from Playa del Barranco de Erques, Los Jardines de Abama Suites features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Boasting room service, this property also provides guests with a children's playground. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a dishwasher, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. The rooms are equipped with a kettle, while some rooms include a balcony and others also boast pool views. At Los Jardines de Abama Suites rooms come with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and American options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving American, Mediterranean and Spanish cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. The area is popular for hiking and cycling, and bike hire is available at this 5-star hotel. Los Gigantes is 13 km from Los Jardines de Abama Suites, while Aqualand is 17 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tenerife South Airport, 34 km from the hotel.

name: Wyndham Residences Tenerife Costa Adeje
address: Calle Finalandia No 8, 38670 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Thank you for choosing our Wyndham Hotels and Resorts. Wyndham Hotels and Resorts is the crown jewel of the Wyndham family. Situated in spectacular resort and urban destinations, each Wyndham Grand provides a one-of-a-kind experience with compelling local flavor, attentive service, relaxing surroundings and thoughtful touches. Guestrooms are comfortable and refined, dining experiences are crafted by master chefs and artfully appointed lounges invite you to linger.  Flexible meeting spaces, elegant halls and sophisticated media offerings ensure a memorable and successful social or business event.Wyndham

name: 7Lizards - Ocean View Apartments
address: Avenida Jose Gonzalez Forte n. 73, 38683 Los Gigantes, Tenerife
description: Providing sea views, a rooftop pool and free WiFi, 7Lizards - Ocean View Apartments provides accommodation conveniently set in Puerto de Santiago, within a short distance of Playa de Santiago, Los Gigantes Beach and Puerto Santiago Beach. Featuring a kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, each unit also comes with a safety deposit box, a cable flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, wardrobe and a seating area with a sofa. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy cycling and hiking nearby, or make the most of the sun terrace. Los Gigantes is less than 1 km from 7Lizards - Ocean View Apartments, while Aqualand is 25 km away. The nearest airport is Tenerife South, 42 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hovima Costa Adeje - Only Adults
address: Avda. Ernesto Sarti, No 8, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Next to the beach, in one of the most beautiful and peaceful areas of Costa Adeje, in Tenerife, this luxurious establishment offers the best accommodation for sport lovers visitors. Playa Fañabe beach, just a few steps from the property, is the best place to practice water sports or just to relax while sunbathing. Tenerife Sur Airport is just a 13-minute drive while Teide National Park is some 38 kilometres away. The spacious and bright guest rooms have been decorated in a nautical style, offering a choice of services for guests to feel right at home. The extensive range of onsite facilities and activities on offer will not disappoint anyone. The buffet restaurant serves a number of delicious dishes and the 2 outdoor swimming pools are ideal to take a refreshing dip. Business travellers may also appreciate the onsite meeting rooms, perfect for team meetings or client presentations.FarePortal

name: Gran Oasis Resort
address: Meandro, 3, Golf las Américas, 38650 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Gran Oasis Resort is a luxury aparthotel, set next to Las Américas Golf Course. Set in gardens, this complex has a large outdoor swimming pool and views of the Atlantic Ocean. The hotel is set between Playa de Las Américas and Los Cristianos. The nearest beach is less than 2km away. The Oasis resort offers a bus service to the beach and Siam Park. The Gran Oasis has comfortable, bright apartments with one or 2 bedrooms. They all have a kitchenette, air conditioner and satellite TV. The complex has a bar and a restaurant. There is a 24-hour reception in the hotel, offering currency exchange, car rental. There is also a tour desk and a small supermarket. The rooms have air conditioning.

name: Atlas Suites Tenerife
address: Avda. San Francisco, 1, 38650 Los Cristianos, Tenerife
description: When you stay at Atlas Suites Tenerife in Arona, you'll be in a shopping district, within a 5-minute drive of Siam Park and Los Cristianos Beach. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Parque la Paz
address: Luis Díaz de Losada, 2, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Hotel Parque La Paz Tenerife is located just 150 metres from the Playa de las Americas. Situated in the resort centre, it offers free parking. The apartments are practical and light, with a living room and a bedroom. They also have a kitchenette and a terrace. All apartments have a TV and safe. The Parque La Paz complex has a large freeform swimming pool, plus a small one for children. It also has a large area for sunbathing. You can find plenty to choose from in the hotel’s buffet restaurant. The hotel also organises occasional poolside barbeques. Drinks can be found in the bar lounge or poolside bar. Playa de las Americas is a popular area in the south of Tenerife. Parque La Paz is surrounded by shopping centres, restaurants, bars, parks and gardens, and entertainment.

name: Red Level at Gran Melia Palacio de Isora - Adults Only
address: Calle La Costa, 38686 Guía de Isora, Tenerife
description: This adults-only oceanfront complex offers a personalised butler service in all rooms. The outdoor pool has Balinese beds and hydromassage loungers. Each room has a private terrace with ocean or garden views. The Red Level at Gran Melia Palacio de Isora is an exclusive private area of the Gran Melia Palacio de Isora. Guests have access to all hotel facilities, including a wide range of international restaurants, 8 bars, including a beach bar, a lagoon-style infinity pool, sun terrace and tennis courts. Each spacious, elegant room at the Red Level comes with a coffee machine, an iPod dock and free WiFi. Bathrooms include a hydromassage shower and an over-sized bath tub. The exclusive Red Level lounge offers free tea and coffee all day. It also includes a poolside bar service and a business centre. There is direct access to Alcalà Beach from the hotel. 40 minutes’ drive from Las Cañadas del Teide National Park, and 35 minutes from Tenerife Reina Sofia Airport. The centre of Alcalá is a 10-minute walk away. Please note that all guests at this hotel must be 16 years old or older.

name: Hovima Santa María
address: Avenida De Espana 10, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Just 300 metres from La Pinta Beach in Playa Fañabe, HOVIMA Santa María offers tennis courts and outdoor pools, 1 heated in winter. Apartments and studios have furnished terraces and well-equipped kitchenettes. Each bright HOVIMA studio has 2 single beds, a sofa bed, satellite TV and a rental safe. Apartments have separate bedrooms and living areas. Kitchenettes include a hob, toaster and kettle. HOVIMA Santa María’s restaurant serves varied buffet meals. You can relax with a drink in the bar, or enjoy the nightly entertainment. The complex has a 24-hour reception, where beach towels, currency exchange, car hire and babysitting services can be arranged. Staff are happy to provide information about the surrounding area. A range of shops and restaurants can be found within a 5-minute walk, while Colón Marina is 350 metres away. Tenerife Sur Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Okeanos Eco Guest House
address: C. el Cabo 4, 38618 Granadilla, Tenerife
description: Situated in Los Abrigos, OKEANOS Eco Guest House features various facilities, such as a shared lounge. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property. All rooms at the guest house are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. At OKEANOS Eco Guest House rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. The area is popular for fishing, and car hire is available at the accommodation. The nearest airport is Tenerife Sur Airport, 2 km from OKEANOS Eco Guest House.

name: Servatur Caribe
address: V Centenario, 38670 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: These apartments are in Tenerife’s Playa de las Américas resort, 100 metres from Magma Conference Centre and 600 metres from Siam Park. There is an outdoor pool and all apartments have a private balcony. There is a tennis court and a games room at Servatur Caribe. Golf Las Americas is under 1 km away. The property has a tour desk and you can hire a car, electric motorbikes or bicycles at the apartments. a 24-hour reception is available for guests. Only a few kilometres from the Caribe Apartments you can discover rural attractions such as Barrance del Infierno Cliff, Teide National Park and several charming, small towns. Premium One Bedroom Apartment Pool View + Premium One Bedroom Apartment Sea View offer improved bedroom comfort, reclinable chairs, bedroom towards pool, bathroom with hairdryer as well as a bottle of sparkling wine and snacks on arrival.

name: Hovima La Pinta Beachfront Family Hotel
address: Avenida De Espana, 5, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: HOVIMA La Pinta Beachfront Family Hotel features apartments with views of the Atlantic Ocean, the hotel gardens or its 2 outdoor swimming pools. WiFi is available throughout the property. Each spacious, air-conditioned apartment at HOVIMA La Pinta Beachfront Family Hotel has modern décor. There is a living area with a sofa bed and satellite TV. The kitchen includes a ceramic hob and a toaster. A safe is available for an additional charge. This large resort has a buffet restaurant offering international cuisine, a theme restaurant and a large sun terrace. There is also a bar, a poolside snack bar and a TV room. The resort has a children’s playground, splash zone and there is also children’s club (Miniclub 4-8 years / Juniorclub 9 - 12 years). HOVIMA La Pinta Beachfront Family Hotel features table tennis and a pool table. Colón Port is set next to the hotel, while Playa de las Américas is less than 4 km away. Tenerife Sur Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Guayarmina Princess - Adults Only
address: C/ Londres Nº 1, 38670 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Live the Princess-experience in a completely renovated hotel and enjoy wonderful sea views and amazing sunsets. The The 16+ adults-only hotel is located in Costa Adeje, one of Spain's most attractive and prestigious tourist destinations due to its diversity, quality, climate and stunning beaches. Find pure relaxation at the 4 star hotel Guayarmina Princess: Enjoy its modern design and relaxed atmosphere. Treat yourself to a cocktail in one of the 5 bars or wine and dine in one of the 2 restaurants. Unwind in the water circuit of the new wellness area or get a manicure and pedicure at the hotel's own hairdresser. Reward yourself with a soothing massage after a strenuous workout in the modern fitness studio. Book a Platinum Junior Suite or Platinum Suite, which offers you personalized customer service, spacious rooms and bathrooms as well as access to all the amenities included in this upgrade: private restaurant, infinity pool with private bar and amazing views of Playa Fañabe, the harbour and the neighbouring island of La Gomera. Built in Greek-Roman style, the Guayarmina Princess Hotel has a total of 506 rooms and is situated in a prime location on Fañabé Beach, with direct access to the beach promenade. The two most prestigious golf courses of Tenerife, Costa Adeje Golf and Golf Las Américas, are located about 3 km away. The international airport, Reina Sofía, is conveniently located just 17 kilometres from the hotel.FarePortal

name: Hotel Botanico & The Oriental Spa Garden
address: Avenida Richard Yeoward, 1, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
