The property features private parking. Each of the air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Atlantic El Tope have satellite TV and a fridge. Some rooms have a balcony. Show cooking and Mediterranean cuisine are offered at the hotels restaurant. A lounge bar is also available. The centre of Puerto de La Cruz is a 10-minute walk from the El Tope and Lagos de Martiánez Shopping Centre is just 100 metres away. Tenerife Norte Airport can be reached in 20 minutes, by car.

name: Kn Hotel Arenas Del Mar - Adults Only
address: Avda. Europa, N 2, 38612 El Médano, Tenerife
description: This adults-only design hotel is set right next to Jaquita Beach and has a well-equipped spa, available for an additional cost. The Arenas del Mar’s outdoor swimming pool and bar area have amazing sea views. There is a large outdoor terrace, a garden and a gym. Free WiFi is offered in the property. There are also several restaurants in Arenas del Mar. La Jaquita offers buffet meals while El Ancla specialises in fish dishes with a traditional Canarian twist. The pool bar offers fresh juice, snacks and cocktails. Café Babor has a terrace with views of Medano Bay. There is also a disco with shows and entertainment. Suites have a private balcony, a double bed and a sofa bed. The bathroom has a hairdryer.

name: Palm Beach - Excel Hotels & Resorts
address: Avenida V Centenario, 11, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Offering stunning views of the Canary Islands, this attractive apartment complex is set just 10 metres from Troya Beach. It features an adult and children’s outdoor pool, a gym, hot tub and sauna. Apartments and studios at Palm Beach - Excel Hotels & Resorts Club feature elegant décor and pool or sea views. Lounges have a sofa bed and plasma TV with DVD player and modern kitchens include microwave, fridge and toaster. DVDs and a safe can be rented at reception. The complex has a cafeteria, bar and a selection of restaurants, as well as on-site supermarket and beauty salon. It is within 5 minutes’ walk of numerous shopping centres, bars and restaurants. You can rent a car, exchange currency and book excursions at Palm Beach - Excel Hotels & Resorts’s 24-hour reception. Las Americas Golf Resort is 10 minutes’ walk away and Tenerife South Airport is 15 minutes’ drive away.

name: Royal Tenerife Country Club
address: Calle San Andreas, 38620 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: Royal Tenerife Country Club can tee up an exceptional holiday for golfers and beachgoers alike. This family-friendly resort within two kilometres of the shoreline offers an outdoor pool, book library, on-site car rental and a variety of other services and amenities that complement the spacious self-catered Suites. These 1- and 2-Bedroom Apartments are only minutes from Tenerife Sur Airport, helping you maximize your holiday without spending valuable time driving to and from the terminal. With plenty of on-site amenities and a great location near some of Tenerifes most popular attractions, Royal Tenerife Country Club is a fantastic option for a self-catered getaway in Spains Canary Islands.iHotelier/iStay

name: Vincci Tenerife Golf
address: Urbanizacion Golf Del Sur. Carretera de Los Abrigos, 38639 Los Abrigos, Tenerife
description: Located 100 metres from Tenerife’s Golf del Sur Golf Course, this seafront hotel offers an outdoor pool and a spa. Many rooms at Vincci Tenerife Golf include a private balcony, some with sea views. The Vincci Tenerife’s spacious rooms are decorated in soft, natural colours. They are all air conditioned and include flat-screen satellite TV and a modern bathroom with toiletries. The hotel’s Nammu Spa has a sauna, steam room and dynamic swimming pool, and massages and beauty treatments can be booked. The hotel also has a sun terrace with loungers. Vincci Tenerife Golf offers a buffet restaurant and a bar with a terrace, overlooking the sea. Upon request, the hotel can offer products for special diet requirement including celiacs. Room service is available. The Vincci’s reception can arrange car rental and currency exchange. Staff can also provide information about the region and help to book excursions, including tours of the impressive Mount Teide National Park.

name: Sunset Bay Club
address: Calle Antonio Navarro, 1, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Youll discover multiple reasons to spend your vacation at Sunset Bay Club when you learn about the many on-site services and amenities throughout the property. Just beyond your spacious Apartment, youll find two sparkling pools, a solarium, a fitness center and other great recreational facilities. The convenient on-site services include golf cart and car rentals, laundry facilities, a book library, a currency exchange and a babies accessories catalogue. Sunset Bay Club is ready to provide young families, couples and solo travelers everything they need for a comfortable and convenient stay.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Ecolife Tenerife
address: C. Garañaña 43, 38620 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: Situated within 9.4 km of Golf del Sur and 18 km of Aqualand, Hotel Ecolife Tenerife features rooms in San Miguel de Abona. This 3-star hotel offers a tour desk and luggage storage space. The property offers bike hire and features a garden and year-round outdoor pool. At the hotel, rooms are equipped with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Rooms are fitted with a safety deposit box, while some rooms include a terrace and others also boast sea views. Los Gigantes is 43 km from Hotel Ecolife Tenerife, while Golf Las Americas is 17 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tenerife South Airport, 12 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Casa del Sol
address: Finlandia 4, Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: This hotel is one kilometre from the centre of Tenerife’s Puerto de la Cruz. It has a rooftop terrace, with an outdoor pool, which offers views of Mount Teide. Each room at the Hotel Casa del Sol has a TV, a private balcony or terrace, and a fridge. The private bathrooms are equipped with a hairdryer. Use of the safe is available on request for a surcharge. Casa del Sol has a reading room and games room. There are ping pong and the TV lounge has satellite TV with international channels. The hotel has a buffet restaurant, where guests can relax. The 24-hour reception can provide tourist information, and the famous Lagos de Martianez Pools are 10-minute walk away.

name: Meliá Jardines del Teide
address: Urbanizacion Mirador del Duque, 38670 La Caleta (Tenerife)
description: Melia Jardines del Teide - Adults Only is built around a pool complex and 12,000m² of tropical gardens. It has views of the coast and mountains, including Mount Teide. All rooms at the hotel have air conditioning and satellite TV. Each room has a balcony or terrace, with views of the pool, sea or mountains. Free WiFi is available throughout. The Level services are available in some rooms, including a private lounge with free coffee and tea, private check-in area and daily cocktail hour, as well as private pool and rooms with, pillow menu, coffee maker with a selection of coffees and designer toiletries. Melia Jardines del Teide - Adults Only offers 2 swimming pools, one being exclusive for The Level guests. Dining options includes a buffet restaurant, there are 2 a-la-carte restaurants, one has a bar and there is also a lobby bar with large terrace and panoramic ocean views. The hotel is set just 5 minutes’ walk from Playa del Duque beach, in southern Tenerife. Costa Adeje Golf Club is 1.5 km away. There is also a free shuttle service to a nearby shopping centre. There are also several shops on site.

name: Hostal Pension Neon Tenerife
address: Lomo de la Fuente 8, 38632 Guaza, Tenerife
description: No description found

name: Hostel Blue Lagoon
address: Calle Lorenzo Rodríguez, 38588 La Mareta, Tenerife
description: Boasting a terrace, BBQ facilities and views of sea, Hostel Blue Lagoon is set in La Mareta, a few steps from Playa Callao Hondo. The property is situated 600 metres from Playa Puerto de Tajao, 21 km from Golf del Sur and 31 km from Aqualand. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Playa De Tajao is 200 metres away. At the guest house, the rooms are equipped with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. At Hostel Blue Lagoon all rooms have bed linen and towels. Activities such as hiking, windsurfing, diving can be enjoyed in the surroundings, and guests can relax along the beachfront. Golf Las Americas is 30 km from the accommodation, while Siam Park is 31 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tenerife South Airport, 14 km from Hostel Blue Lagoon.

name: Casa Buganvilla
address: Calle Buganvilla 6, 38410 Los Realejos, Tenerife
description: Boasting an outdoor swimming pool and a garden, Casa Buganvilla is situated in Los Realejos, 600 metres from Playa de la Fajana and 1.8 km from Playa de los Roques. The property is around 1.8 km from Playa de Castro, 4.7 km from Taoro Park and 4.8 km from Plaza Charco. Rooms come with a terrace with garden views and free WiFi. The rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, toaster, a coffee machine, a bath, a hair dryer and a desk. All units have a private bathroom, free toiletries and bed linen. Botanical Gardens is 6.3 km from the guest house, while Leal Theatre is 33 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tenerife North–Ciudad de La Laguna, 28 km from Casa Buganvilla, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Turia
address: Calle Del Profesor Beltran Baguena, 2, 46009 Valencia, Valencia
description: Hotel Turia is next to Valencia Bus Station, and 350 metres from Turia Metro Station. Set across the Turia Park from the Botanical Gardens, it is a 20-minute walk from the cathedral. All air-conditioned rooms at the Turia Hotel have a TV and most feature a private balcony. There is a safe, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. Nuevo Centro Shopping Centre and El Corte Inglés Department Store are opposite the hotel. Excellent public transport makes it easy to reach City of Arts and Sciences, airport and Convention Centre. The Turia has a bar on site, as well as a tour desk and a 24-hour front desk. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. There is on-site parking at an extra cost. The Hotel is being renovated please note that there might be noises during the day.

name: Hotel Conqueridor
address: Calle De Cervantes, 7-9, 46007 Valencia, Valencia
description: The Hotel Conqueridor consists of two annex buildings that are the Hotel Conqueridor and the Boutique Hotel Petit Conqueridor, in whose building our Economic Rooms have been located. The modern Hotel Conqueridor is located in central Valencia, just 250 metres from Norte Railway Station. The spacious, air-conditioned rooms have free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV. The hotel is just 300 metres from Valencia’s main shopping area, and 300 metres from Plaza Espanya Metro Station. Buses from Plaza Espanya also offer easy access to the beach. The Conqueridor Hotel’s restaurant is located on the ground floor and offers a varied breakfast. In the evenings it offers modern versions of classic Spanish dishes. Please note that from March 2022 to March 2024 we are carrying out restoration work at the hotel. During the renovation, some services as Gym and Sauna will remain close. Sorry for the inconvenience.

name: Hotel Medium Valencia
address: Avda. d'Amado Granell Mesado, 48, 46013 Valencia, Valencia
description: Situated 700 metres from Valencia's impressive City of Arts and Sciences, this design hotel offers a gym and seasonal outdoor pool. The spacious rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV. Each air-conditioned room at the Medium Valencia has wooden floors and elegant modern décor. Each one has a private bathroom with toiletries and a hairdryer. Some have views of the spectacular City of Arts and Sciences. Mediterranean cuisine served in Hotel Medium Valencia’s on-site restaurant. The hotel also has a lounge bar in the lobby. The Medium Valencia is around 2.5 km from the historic centre of Valencia, and 4 km from the city’s beaches. The hotel offers private on-site parking, and frequent bus services stop nearby.

name: Hotel Malcom and Barret
address: Av Ausias March 59, 46013 Valencia, Valencia
description: Hotel Malcom and Barret is located in Valencia, 5 minutes' drive from the City of Arts and Sciences and Estació del Nord Station. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and a 40” flat-screen TV. The rooms at Hotel Malcom and Barret come with a safe and a desk. The private bathroom has a shower, magnifying mirror, hairdryer and toiletries. The hotel offers a restaurant with a buffet breakfast. Hotel Malcom and Barret also has a 24-hour reception, 5 meeting rooms and luggage storage. There are various restaurants, bars and nightclubs in the area. Valencia’s Old Town is 2 km away and can be reached in 30 minutes by foot, while Malvarrosa Beach is 5 km away. Private on-site parking is available for an extra cost. You can drive to Valencia Airport in around 20 minutes.

name: Hotel Valencia Oceanic Affiliated by Meliá
address: C/ Pintor Maella, 35, 46023 Valencia, Valencia
description: Overlooking Valencia’s City of Arts and Sciences, Hotel Valencia Oceanic Managed by Melia Hotels International offers a gym, an outdoor pool and a sun terrace. Each bright, air-conditioned room includes satellite TV and a laptop safe. Hotel Valencia Oceanic Managed by Melia Hotels International's soundproofed rooms are simply decorated in warm tones. They all have a private bathroom with amenities and a hairdryer. The hotel offers a varied buffet breakfast, and Mediterranean dishes are served in the à la carte restaurant. Hotel Valencia Oceanic Managed by Melia Hotels International also has a lobby bar and a poolside snack bar. El Corte Inglés Department Store can be found right next to the hotel, and the City of Arts and Sciences is a 5-minute walk away. The beach is a 10-minute bus ride away, and city’s historic centre is within 3 km.

name: Catalonia Excelsior Hotel
address: Carrer de la Barcelonina, 5, 46002 Valencia, Valencia
description: Catalonia Excelsior is located in Valencia’s Old Town, just a few metres from Plaza del ayuntamiento Square. This elegant hotel features a café, free Wi-Fi access, rooms with satellite TVs. The Excelsior’s rooms are bright and air conditioned. Each has air conditioning, a small fridge and a well-equipped bathroom. Guests can enjoy a daily, buffet breakfast in the Catalonia’s café. There is a range of cafés, bars and restaurants within walking distance of the hotel. Valencia Cathedral is a 5-minute walk from the Excelsior whilst the Plaza de Toros Bullring is less than one kilometre away. The nearest Metro Station, Colón can be reached in 10 minutes, by foot.

name: Meliá Plaza
address: Placa De L Ajuntament, 4, 46002 Valencia, Valencia
description: Melia Plaza Valencia is set in a classical building overlooking Valencia’s main square. It offers free Wi-Fi and features a gym, sauna and rooftop sun terrace. Air-conditioned rooms feature wooden floors, a minibar, safe and flat-screen TV. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities. The hotel restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine and specializes in rice dishes. It has a summer terrace and a varied wine list. Room service is available 24 hours a day and gluten-free meals are offered. You can hire a car from the Melia Plaza’s 24-hour reception. Private parking is offered nearby for an extra charge. Valencia Train Station is 5 minutes’ walk away, and the Cathedral is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Dimar
address: Gran Via Marques del Turia, 80, 46005 Valencia, Valencia
description: Situated in Valencia’s Cánovas Square, this modern design hotel offers a gym and free Wi-Fi. Each stylish room at Hotel Dimar has tea and coffee making facilities and flat-screen TV. The Hotel Dimar’s air-conditioned rooms have elegant décor and wooden flooring. They all offer a minibar and a private bathroom with amenities and a hairdryer. A continental buffet breakfast is served in the Hotel Dimar’s restaurant, while sandwiches and pastries are available in the bar. There is also a range of restaurants and bars in the surrounding streets. Set next to the Turia Gardens, Hotel Dimar is within a 15-minute walk of Valencia Cathedral. Colon Metro Station is 600 metres away, while the famous City of Arts and Sciences is just 1.5 km from the hotel.

name: Sh Valencia Palace
address: Avenida Paseo De La Alameda 32, 46023 Valencia, Valencia
description: Located in front of the Palau de la Música in Valencia, this elegant hotel features a rooftop swimming pool and sun terrace. It offers spacious rooms with a classic design and free Wi-Fi. SH Valencia is 10 minutes’ drive from the impressive City of Arts and Sciences. Malvarrosa Beach is just 3 km away while the airport is 25 km away. There is also a snack bar and a lobby bar. A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas.

name: Melia Valencia
address: Avenida Cortes Valencianas 52, Valencia, Valencia
description: This modern Melia hotel is next to Valencia’s Palacio de Congresos Congress Centre and 5 km from the AVE Train Station. Beniferri Metro Station is just 400 metres away. The spacious rooms feature contemporary design and offer spectacular views and a 49' flat-screen satellite TV. All are air conditioned and have free WiFi and modern bathrooms. The hotel has a play area for children. Meeting rooms are available. Some areas of the hotel are dedicated to The Level rooms and exclusive services, such as a private check-in and check-out area, exclusive buffet breakfast, daily snacks and drinks in a private area, as well as concierge service and organization of activities in the hotel. city. Manises International Airport is just 15 minutes’ drive from the Melia Valencia. The hotel's Socarrat restaurant specializes in Valencian paellas, as well as Mediterranean and international cuisine. The Oval Bar has a small snack and drink menu for every hour of the day.

name: Only You Hotel Valencia
address: Plaza Rodrigo Botet,5, 46002 Valencia, Valencia
description: Located in Valencia and with Norte Train Station reachable within 700 metres, Only YOU Hotel Valencia provides concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a tour desk. The property is 200 metres from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts, and within 400 metres of the city centre. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Each room is equipped with a kettle, while some rooms are equipped with a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and a microwave. At Only YOU Hotel Valencia each room comes with bed linen and towels. A continental, Full English/Irish or Italian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean, Spanish and local cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Speaking Arabic, Bulgarian, Catalan and English at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always on hand to help. Popular points of interest near Only YOU Hotel Valencia include Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados, Turia Gardens and Jardines de Monforte. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from the hotel.

name: Zenit Valencia
address: Bailen, 8, 46007 Valencia, Valencia
description: Zenit Valencia boasts a fantastic central location opposite Valencia’s Estación del Norte and the city’s bullring. It offers free Wi-Fi and has a fitness centre, sauna and car park. All rooms at the Zenit are stylishly furnished, with a private bathroom complete with hairdryer. Each room also contains a work desk, safety deposit box and plasma TV with satellite channels. The hotel serves a buffet breakfast from Monday to Saturday at the restaurant El Azahar. The Zenit is just 200 metres from Valencia Town Hall, and the Cathedral is a 15-minute walk away. The City of Arts and Sciences is 2.5 km away from the hotel. Xàtiva Metro Station is just outside the Zenit Valencia.

name: Sweet Hotel Renasa
address: Avenida De Catalunya 5, 46010 Valencia, Valencia
description: Sweet Hotel Renasa, located next to Valencia University, offers large, modern rooms and a restaurant. All rooms have air conditioning, laptop safe and satellite TV, as well as a seating area. Facultats Metro Station is just 600 metres away, and offers a direct link to the centre of Valencia city. A bus stop 50 metres from the hotel offers easy access to different parts of the city. The Sweet Hotel Renasa's restaurant offers a range of Valencian specialities, while the light, modern café offers tapas. The hotel also offers packed lunches.

name: Sh Colon Valencia Hotel
address: Carrer de Colón 6, 46004 Valencia, Valencia
description: AC Hotel Colón Valencia is located in the heart of the city, next to the North train station, in the commercial and financial area and surrounded by the main tourist attractions. The hotel is a unique combination of quality, comfort and true authenticity, and it is the perfect rest place and the ideal starting point for visit Valencia. Since you enter the hotel you can enjoy our permanent art gallery with different works of Spanish artists, all from Valencian Community. La Lonja de la Seda, the Cathedral, The Mercado de Colón.All are just a short and pleasant walk from the hotel. The 91 rooms, three meeting rooms, a Fitness room, AC Lounge, with limited temporary schedule, free Wifi throughout the hotel, complete the offer of the newest hotel in the capital of the Turia. This Valencia hotel also offers guests a terrace, with temporary limited schedule, perfect for relaxing after work, and three spacious meeting rooms designed and equipped to hold all kinds of seminars, conferences and other social events.Marriott

name: You & Co. Saler Beach Boutique
address: Avinguda dels Pinars 8, 46012 Valencia, Valencia
description: YOU & CO. Saler Beach Boutique is located in Valencia, 1.3 km from Playa de El Saler and 2.5 km from Playa de l'Arbre del Gos. The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. The accommodation provides room service, a concierge service and organising tours for guests. Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. At YOU & CO. Saler Beach Boutique each room has bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a sun terrace. Guests at YOU & CO. Saler Beach Boutique will be able to enjoy activities in and around Valencia, like hiking. L'Oceanografic is 9.4 km from the hotel, while Puerto de Valencia is 10 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia, 19 km from YOU & CO. Saler Beach Boutique, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: NH Valencia Las Artes
address: Avenida Instituto Obrero, 28, 46013 Valencia, Valencia
description: The NH Valencia Las Artes hotel is ideally situated close to the Joaquín Sorolla Station and is a 13km bus or car ride from Valencia Airport. It is conveniently located near several attractions including the City of Arts and Sciences, the aquarium and an IMAX cinema. The Palau de les Arts Reina Sofia, the Valencia Cathedral, and Malvarrosa Beach are also all within a 1km to 7km distance and are easily accessible by foot or bus. Both the Central Market and the El Saler Centro Comercial shopping centers are also close by. Each of our 174 comfortable guest rooms have contemporary amenities including room service, free Wi-Fi, and comfortable mattresses. The junior suite has a coffee and tea maker, a sitting area, and sofa for guests who require additional space, not to mention the fantastic view of the opera house. A breakfast buffet is available daily and made-to-order hot dishes are cooked upon request. The elegant NH Valencia Las Artes Restaurant opens for lunch and dinner with its cuisine focused on local Mediterranean fare. A gym with a sauna, a children’s play area, a year-round heated swimming pool, wake up service, and three terraces are additional features for our guests enjoy.NH Hoteles

name: NH Collection Valencia Colón
address: Calle Colon 32, 46004 Valencia, Valencia
description: Elegantly decorated and housed in a classic 19th-century building, the NH Collection Valencia Colón opened in 2018. It’s conveniently situated in the commercial area of the city on Carrer Colón, one of Valencia’s main shopping streets. The hotel is within walking distance of the city’s biggest tourist sights, including the Marqués de Dos Aguas Palace, the cathedral and the central market. It’s also close to the metro with links to the airport and harbor, and convenient for the main train station and other public transport or sights such as the Oceanografic or Ciutat de les Arts i les Ciències. The hotel has 47 rooms, all decorated under the watchful eyes of renown designer Lorenzo Castillo in a cozy British style, or with French or Indian touches, all with calming tones making them ideal for unwinding after a day of exploring the city. Each room has a Nespresso machine as well as free Wi-Fi and a 36” LCD/LED TV. Guests can relax in complimentary NH bathrobes and slippers, and enjoy a good night’s sleep with a choice of pillows. A generous breakfast buffet is available every day, featuring pastries, breads, cold cuts and eggs any style, as well as local specialties and gluten-free options. The hotel has its own restaurant, Kamikaze Restaurant, and is close to the bars, coffee shops and restaurants of Gran Via. There’s also a gym and a bar. On-site parking is available.NH Hoteles

name: L&H Gran Via Valencia
address: 63 Gran Via de Ferran el Catòlic, 46008 Valencia, Valencia
description: Featuring a restaurant, bar and views of city, L&H Gran Vía Valencia is located in Valencia, less than 1 km from Church of Saint Nicolás. With a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides room service, a concierge service and organising tours for guests. All units in the hotel are equipped with a coffee machine. Every room includes a desk and a flat-screen TV, and certain units at L&H Gran Vía Valencia have a balcony. At the accommodation every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental, American or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Languages spoken at the reception include English, Spanish and French, and guests are invited to request guidance on the area when needed. Popular points of interest near L&H Gran Vía Valencia include Norte Train Station, Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados and González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 7 km from the hotel.

name: The Valentia Corretgería
address: Calle Corretgería 28, 46001 Valencia, Valencia
description: Featuring 4-star accommodation, The Valentia Corretgería is set in Valencia, 300 metres from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados and 500 metres from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts. Featuring a fitness centre, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. The units at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. The Valentia Corretgería offers certain units that feature a balcony, and each room is equipped with a coffee machine. At the accommodation all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at The Valentia Corretgería. Speaking English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are willing to help at any time of the day. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Turia Gardens, Norte Train Station and Jardines de Monforte. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from The Valentia Corretgería.

name: Palacio Santa Clara, Autograph Collection
address: Calle Pascual y Genis 22, 46002 Valencia, Valencia
description: Valencia is unique for many reasons, in its streets, history and avant-garde coexist perfectly knowing how to complement the city and so it is our new Autograph Collection, Hotel Palacio Santa Clara. Located close to the famous and commercial street of Valencia, Carrer Colón, it is the perfect example of the modernista spirit. Designed by the renowned architect Francisco Javier Görlich in 1916, this initial essence is preserved in our hotel. The delicious aesthetic design with different textures, curved lines, vegetables motifs. brings you a sense of harmony that perfectly combines with our best services and facilities. Explore our hotel in Valencia, find out our bar, drink a selected cocktail and evoke old times, unwind in one of our guest rooms totally equipped with everything you need plus small design touches that will lift your experience and after taking a dip in our pool, refresh yourself in our Dome Bar in the terrace. Live the real modernista experience. Discover Hotel Palacio Santa Clara.Marriott

name: Vincci Mercat
address: C/ de la Llanterna, 31, 46001 Valencia, Valencia
description: Featuring a restaurant and bar on site, Vincci Mercat is located in Valencia, less than 100 metres from the city’s Central Market. This hotel offers free Wi-Fi throughout and a rooftop terrace with a mini swimming pool and views of the old city. Each air-conditioned room in this hotel has a flat-screen TV, wardrobe, safe, minibar. The private bathroom comes with a bath or shower, free toiletries, and a hairdryer. You can find several restaurants and bars within a 5-minute walk of Vincci Mercat. Valencia Cathedral is 600 metres from the property, and the City of Arts and Sciences is 3 km away.

name: Caro Hotel
address: Carrer de l'Almirall, 14, 46003 Valencia, Valencia
description: The unique Caro Hotel is housed in a 19th-century palace in central Valencia, just 200 metres from Valencia Cathedral. Combining historical features with modern design, it has an outdoor pool open all year round. Designed by Francesc Rifé, each of the elegant rooms in the Caro is totally individual, with exquisite touches of minimalist design. All have a flat-screen satellite TV, air-conditioning and a free minibar. The bathrooms include Bvlgari toiletries, a bathrobe and slippers. The cuisine of restaurant Alma del Temple offers a relaxed service that based on traditional ingredients and gives a protagonism to the kitchen. Architecturally unique, parts of Caro Hotel date from up to 2000 years ago. Original features include a 2nd-century Roman mosaic, part of the 13th-century Arabic city walls and Gothic arches. The façade dates from the 19th century. Plaza de la Virgen and Valencia's basilica are within 5 minutes’ walk of the hotel. La Lonja de la Seda, the medieval market and a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Neptuno
address: Paseo Neptuno 2, 46011 Valencia, Valencia
description: This design beachfront hotel overlooks Valencia harbour and has a small spa and a gym The modern, air-conditioned rooms have flat-screen TV, free WiFi and sea or marina views. Marina Real Juan Carlos I tram stop can be found just outside the hotel, and offers a link with central Valencia. There is also direct access to the beach. Attractively located in the Poblats Maritims district, this hotel provides a popular beachside bar and a restaurant. The restaurant offers a range of traditional rice dishes and fresh seafood for dinner. Oceanografic is 2.4 km from the hotel, while City of Arts & Sciences is 2.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 13 km from the property.

name: Sercotel Sorolla Palace
address: Avda. de Las Cortes Valencianas, 58, 46015 Valencia, Valencia
description: The elegant Sorolla Palace is 50 meters from Valencia's Congress Centre, offering a beautiful terrace with an outdoor pool,It also features a hot tub, gym and free Wi-Fi. Rooms at the Sercotel have bright, attractive décor and include air conditioning and flat-screen satellite TV. The upper floors of the Sorolla Palace enjoy impressive views of the city, and the outdoor pool contains a retractable roof that covers it in winter, spring and autumn. In the cafeteria L'Estany, which prepares tapas and a wide variety of cocktails, Mediterranean and international dishes are served. The Sercotel Sorolla Palace is located a 5-minute walk from the Beniferri metro station, which connects in 9 stops with the City of Arts and Sciences. Beniferri Park is just 100 meters from the hotel.

name: AZZ Valencia Táctica
address: C/ Botiguers, 1, 46980 Valencia, Valencia
description: Located just 10 minutes’ drive from Valencia’s Congress Centre, Hotel Táctica provides air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TVs. The rooms at the Táctica feature parquet floors. Each one has satellite TV and a private bathroom. The hotel’s cafeteria serves drinks and snacks. Free WiFi is available in all areas. The hotel offers a charging station for electric vehicles, available for an extra charge. The Recinto Ferial de Valencia Exhibition Centre and Heron City Shopping Centre are within 2 km of the property. The hotel is 7 minutes’ drive from Valencia Airport and 15 minutes from central Valencia.

name: One Shot Mercat 09
address: Calle Músic Peydró, 9, 46001 Valencia, Valencia
description: Featuring free WiFi, a seasonal outdoor pool and a sun terrace, One Shot Mercat 09 offers accommodation Ciutat Vella district, located on the historic center of Valencia. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and is equipped with a flat-screen TV. Certain rooms feature a seating area where you can relax. Rooms come with a private bathroom fitted with a shower. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. Gourmet buffet breakfast is available at Restaurant Karak. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Barrio del Carmen is 600 metres from One Shot Mercat 09, while City of Arts & Sciences is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from One Shot Mercat 09.

name: Port Feria Valencia
address: C/ Cullera 67, 46035 Valencia, Valencia
description: Located next to the Feria de Valencia and very close to the city center, Port Feria Valencia is the best option to discover and get to know Valencia, thanks to its excellent communications to and from any point of the city, its complete facilities and quality of their services. Modern hotel with excellent communications with the historic center, the Plaza del Ayuntamiento, the City of Arts and Sciences and the Airport. The Port Feria Valencia has, among its excellent and complete services, an à la carte restaurant with Mediterranean cuisine and Valencian specialties, an outdoor swimming pool and solarium, a gym, a restaurant and a cafeteria. Our clientele will be able to enjoy free Internet connection throughout the hotel (Wi-Fi) and parking and airport transfer service (both for an additional fee). In addition, Port Feria Valencia has magnificent rooms equipped with all the necessary amenities to have an unbeatable stay and three meeting rooms with a maximum capacity of up to 78 people, among other services and facilities. Benimàmet Metro Station is 400 metres away, and the hotel has good access to main roads. Valencia Airport is a 10-minute drive away.

name: L'Otelet By Sweet
address: Carrer de Fortaleny, 15, 46035 Valencia, Valencia
description: No description found

name: The Westin Valencia
address: Amadeo De Saboya 16, 46010 Valencia, Valencia
description: The Westin Valencia is ideally located in the city centre close to the historic center, the commercial area and the City of Arts and Science of Valencia. Our 135 elegant Art Deco style rooms and suites have a warm, relaxing atmosphere with plenty of natural light and some of them even feature private terraces with a Jacuzzi. Come relish in our rooms, relax at our spa, enjoy our exquisite dining and let our lovely staff take care of you on your next vacation.Marriott

name: Hotel Sabbia by Gabbeach
address: Passeig De Neptuno, 30, 46011 Valencia, Valencia
description: Hotel Sabbia by Gabbeach brings a 360º proposal for your stay with high quality shows with dancers and live music. This stylish, design hotel is located next to Valencia's Las Arenas Beach, and it is just one minute's walk from Valencia Harbour. The themed rooms at Hotel Sabbia by Gabbeach feature unique, contemporary decor. All have a TV and bathroom. Some offer a terrace, sea or garden views and spa bath or shower. All have free fast broadband internet connection via WiFi and cable. Breakfast is served daily and the Sabbia by Gabbeach restaurant offers a fusion of modern international and Spanish cuisine. The hotel also has a pub which closes at 03:00. The property offers banquet facilities and meeting rooms. There are a number of bars, restaurants and shops on the same street as the Sabbia by Gabbeach. At Sabbia by Gabbeach we practice Hatha Yoga under the sun rays and the sea breeze. Buses to the centre pass from a stop opposite the hotel, and the Ciutat de les Arts i les Ciències is 3 km away. Ferries to Mallorca, Menorca and Ibiza all leave from the port. The Sabbia by Gabbeach is 300 metres from the Marina Real Tram Stop and Metro Station.

name: Holiday Inn Express Valencia-Ciudad Las Ciencias
address: Escritor Rafael Ferreres 22, 46013 Valencia, Valencia
description: Welcoming Valencia hotel near the City of Arts and Sciences, with breakfast included and a bar Holiday Inn Express® Valencia - Ciudad Las Ciencias is the closest hotel to the Oceanogràfic aquarium, a short walk away. It's a five-minute walk to the striking City of Arts and Sciences, while dining and shopping is just next door, at the El Saler mall. There's a bus stop directly in front of the hotel for easy access to Valencia city centre. You can drive to popular Las Arenas beach or the handsome Old Town in 15 minutes. Business guests have access to 4 naturally lit meeting rooms, and the Palacio de Congresos de Valencia conference centre is less than 20 minutes by car. Valencia Airport is 14 km away. At this hotel you can enjoy: - Free Wi-Fi - Parking for a daily fee - A continental Express Start Breakfast buffet included in the room rate The comfortable rooms provide single beds for business guests, or sofa beds and connecting suites for families. Some rooms have views of the City of Arts and Sciences, and kids under 19 stay free with their parents. Breakfast is served in a spacious dining room overlooking seasonal outdoor pool. For dinner, you can sample the many restaurants in the adjacent shopping mall, or head to Alqueria del Pou, a rustic restaurant surrounded by fields, just 1 km away. End the day with a drink in our lobby bar.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: NH Ciudad de Valencia
address: Avenida del Puerto, 214, 46023 Valencia, Valencia
description: The NH Ciudad de Valencia hotel is in one of the city’s main streets, Avenida del Puerto. Many attractions can be found nearby, including the City of Arts and Sciences Museum, the Palace of Arts, and the Opera House. There is a subway and bus stop by the hotel for connections to the rest of the city and the surrounding areas. After a five minute drive, you will find yourself at the Las Arenas and La Malvarrosa sandy beaches. Each room at NH Ciudad de Valencia is equipped with free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV, a mini-bar, and a desk, in case you need to get some work done. There is a total of 149 rooms including triple rooms and two Junior Suites that have a separate living area and an outdoor terrace. All are designed in a contemporary style with red accents and a laid-back color scheme. Breakfast is an exciting affair, with many delicious options to choose from. They include cold cuts, cheeses, yogurt, cereals, and much more besides. From Monday-Thursday dinner is available in the restaurant, and although the hotel does not have an on-site restaurant for lunch and dinner on the weekends, we recommend that you try the world-famous Valencian paella at one of the local restaurants. We also have 2 meeting rooms for up to 70 people and a compact gym.NH Hoteles

name: Las Arenas Balneario Resort
address: Eugenia Vines 22-24, 46011 Valencia, Valencia
description: This 5-star resort has a superb seafront location with direct access to Valencia's Las Arenas Beach. The Las Arenas Balneario Resort features 2 seasonal outdoor pools surrounded by loungers, and a luxurious spa. All rooms at this design hotel are elegantly decorated with neutral colours. They include free Wi-Fi and a 32-inch flat-screen TV. The Sorolla restaurant serves traditional but creative cuisine. Guests can enjoy a breakfast buffet and light refreshments are available from the pool bar. The spa at Las Arenas Balneario Resort Valencia includes a heated indoor pool with views to the gardens. Massage and beauty treatments are available, and there is a gym. The Palacio de la Música and the America’s Cup Port are a short walk from the hotel. There are 2 metro stations and many bus stops nearby the Hotel Las Arenas Balneario Resort.

name: Myr Plaza Mercado & Spa
address: Plaza Del Mercado, 45, 46001 Valencia, Valencia
description: Offering a 100 m2 spa centre and hot tub, MYR Plaza Mercado & Spa is set in Valencia in the Valencia Community Region. Barrio del Carmen is 400 metres from the property. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. For an additional cost, guests can have access to a hammam, Turkish steam bath, relaxing pool with hot tub, cold tub, relaxing area, massage treatments at the hotel's spa. Access to the SPA is allowed for people over 12 years old. All units have a smart, flat-screen TV, and a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and electric kettle. Guests can enjoy a meal at the on-site restaurant, followed by a drink at the bar. City of Arts & Sciences is 2.8 km from MYR Plaza Mercado & Spa, while Bioparc Valencia is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from the property.

name: AZZ Valencia Congress
address: Calle Botiguers 49, 46980 Paterna, Valencia
description: Valencia Congress Hotel&Spa is situated in Parque Empresarial Táctica in Paterna, 7 km from Valencia. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar, the spa as well as the restaurant and the gardens. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and is equipped with a flat-screen TV. Certain rooms include a seating area where you can relax. The rooms have a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. Guests can benefit from massages, health and aesthetics treatments in private cabins in the hotel's spa for a surcharge. Meeting rooms for events and congress that host over 1400 attendees is also available. Metro station is 1.5 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 3 km from the property.

name: AC Hotel Valencia by Marriott
address: Avenida De Francia, 67, 46023 Valencia, Valencia
description: AC Hotel Valencia is in the northern part of the city near the Oceanografic, the Museum of Arts and Sciences. It is a magnificent location to get to know in Valencia.The hotel rooms are redesigned for you to have an excellent experience with all the offered amenities. They are equipped with high-quality mattresses to provide the best rest, spacious closets, a plasma TV with international channels, a minibar with all kinds of drinks, and a private bathroom. You can choose from 6 types of rooms according to your needs and preferences.This hotel offers the AC Lounge space, a recently renovated place, where it is possible to enjoy private areas to read, work and/or taste all kinds of dishes and drinks typical in Valencia.Our hotel in Valencia offers access to the Fitness Room, available to all guests. It has high-quality equipment for the best training. In addition, the AC Hotel Valencia has several rooms to hold meetings and events of all kinds, where the staff will take care of its organization.Marriott

name: Hospes Palau de La Mar
address: Avenida de Navarro Reverter, 14, 46004 Valencia, Valencia
description: Set in a 19th-century building, Hospes Palau de La Mar features a striking lobby, a spa and restaurant. Located in Valencia's Eixample Noble district, it is a 15-minute walk from the city's AVE Railway Station. The Hospes Palau de la Mar has elegant, modern rooms with queen-size beds and marble bathrooms. Wi-Fi is available in rooms and public areas. These include an interior patio. Traditional recipes using local produce and fresh fish are available at the gourmet restaurant. The Palau de la Mar’s Spa has 3 massage and treatment rooms. A hot tub, a sauna and a Turkish bath are also included. There is also a small gym. Valencia’s cathedral and surrounding old town are within 10 minutes' walk of the Hospes Palau, while the City of Arts and Sciences is 2 km away. There is also easy access to the Lonja, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

name: Primus Valencia
address: Calle Menorca 22, 46023 Valencia, Valencia
description: This ultra-modern hotel is just 600 metres from Valencia’s impressive City of Arts and Sciences. It has a spa, gym, an all-year round outdoor swimming pool and its elegant rooms feature plasma satellite TV and free WiFi. The air-conditioned rooms at the Valencia Primus have attractive wooden flooring and bright, modern décor. Each one is soundproofed and has a work desk and laptop safe. For a surcharge, guests have access to the hotel’s extensive spa, which features a dynamic swimming pool, cold pool, hot tub, sauna and hammam. A range of massage and beauty treatments are available for a surcharge. There is also a fitness centre. The hotel’s stylish restaurant serves traditional Mediterranean food with a modern twist. It has an outdoor terrace, and there is also a café-bar overlooking the charming decked garden. Aqua Multiespacio Shopping Centre is just opposite the Primus Valencia. There is a bus stop 75 metres away, connecting you with the city centre and beaches.

name: Barcelo Valencia
address: Avenida Francia 11, 46023 Valencia, Valencia
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. A hotel that coexists with the City of Arts and Sciences.The Barcelo Valencia hotel oozes urbanism and modernity in the City of Arts and Sciences offering a unique experience in this city by the Turia river. Well-connected with the airport it is ideal for business or leisure visits.This 4-star hotel boasts 187 light spacious rooms 10 of them Junior Suites and 2 Suites giving you easy access to all the leisure and business possibilities in Valencia. In addition to the excellent gastronomy the hotel offers a magnificent terrace with views of the city and bar service and our new swimming pool. The hotel also benefits from a fantastic U-Wellness centre spread over 500 m2 and located on the 10th floor with spectacular views of the City of Arts and Sciences. This health and beauty centre offers 2 treatment rooms a fitness studio and a full water circuit with a Finnish sauna an ice room a footbath hydromassage beds pressure jets an activation shower an aromatic central shower a Turkish bath and a variety of health and beauty treatments. The Barcelo Valencia hotel offers design and comfort with cutting-edge facilities giving guests the chance to combine work with fun.Barcelo.com

name: Port Azafata Valencia
address: Cuesta Aeropuerto 15, 46940 Manises, Valencia
description: Port Azafata Valencia is located just 500 meters from Valencia Airport and offers free transportation to the airport, an outdoor pool, gym, sauna and restaurant services. Rooms at Port Azafata Hotel features wooden floors and modern design. Each air-conditioned room includes an LCD TV, safe and a bathroom with hairdryer. In addition, it has 7 meeting and convention rooms. An extensive buffet breakfast is served each morning at Port Azafata Hotel. The hotel´s restaurant specialises in rice dishes such as typical local paella. The hotel is situated just 15 minutes by car from the centre of Valencia, and a 5-minute drive from Manises Golf Club. Tickets for the City of Arts and Sciences are available at the Port Azafata’s reception.

name: Sea You Hotel Port Valencia
address: 5, Plaça Del Tribunal De Les Aigües, 46011 Valencia, Valencia
description: SEA YOU HOTEL PORT VALENCIA is a four-star boutique hotel located in La Marina de Valencia. It is located just 10 minutes walk from the beach of Las Arenas. This charming city hotel offers its guests an exceptional experience with its elegant rooms overlooking the Tribunal de Les Aigües square and the Royal Shipyards. It has a Sky Bar "El mirador del Grao" a unique space with views of the city and the Mediterranean Sea. This space is ideal to relax with a refreshing drink watching the wonderful sunsets that Valencia offers us. It is one of the best views of Valencia. The rooms at SEA YOU HOTEL PORT VALENCIA are modern and meticulously decorated to provide convenience, comfort and style. Each room features top-notch amenities such as a hot tub, minibar, safe, air conditioning, free Wi-Fi, and flat-screen TV, ensuring guests feel at home during their stay. The hotel also has a buffet breakfast where guests can enjoy a varied selection of hot and cold dishes, allowing them to start their day in the best possible way. The privileged location of SEA YOU HOTEL PORT VALENCIA is another of its attractions. Surrounded by connections with public transport such as the metro, bus, tram, bike path, you will be able to move around the city comfortably. Just 20 minutes away by bus is the famous City of Arts and Sciences, one of the most emblematic tourist destinations in Valencia. In addition, the hotel is only a 3-minute walk from La Marina de Valencia and only 1,000 meters from the most famous beach in the city. For guests arriving by plane, the hotel is approximately 15 km from Valencia Airport, making it easy to get in and out. In summary, SEA YOU HOTEL PORT VALENCIA is the perfect choice for those looking for an unforgettable experience in Valencia. With its elegant rooms, its delicious buffet and its location near the beach and the Marina, it is a unique opportunity to enjoy the best nautical, gastronomic and tourist experiences. Book now and enjoy an exceptional stay in Valencia!

name: Hotel Valencia Center
address: Avda. De Francia 33, 46023 Valencia, Valencia
description: Hotel Valencia Center is 400 metres from Valencia’s City of Arts and Sciences, 3 km from the city centre. It offers a sauna, gym and outdoor pool, and free Wi-Fi. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from Ayora Metro Station, which connects to the city centre and the airport. It takes 5 minutes by bus to the beach or city centre, and there is a bus stop opposite the hotel. All air-conditioned/heated (according season) rooms have a satellite TV, safe and minibar The hotel restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine. There is a bar and room service is available. There is a 24-hour front desk and you can hire a car at the tour desk. On-site parking is available for an extra charge.

name: Eurostars Rey Don Jaime
address: Avenida Baleares 2, 46023 Valencia, Valencia
description: Eurostars Rey Don Jaime is located opposite the pretty River Túria Gardens and Valencia's Palau de la Música. It features a roof top terrace with a pool and free WiFi throughout. The impressive 14-floor tower of the Rey Don Jaime offers rooms with air conditioning, heating and satellite TV for an extra cost. All rooms have a large wardrobe. The City of Arts and Sciences can be reached in around 15 minutes, on foot from the hotel. Valencia’s seafront and the closest beach are 3.6 km away. The local bus 19 stops at the corner of Eurostars Rey Don Jaime and connects with the city centre and the beach.

name: Eurostars Gran Valencia
address: El Valle De Ayora, 3, 46015 Valencia, Valencia
description: This modern hotel, next to Valencia’s Congress Centre, offers views over the city centre and free Wi-Fi. The Eurostars has a gym, sauna and rooftop pool. All air-conditioned rooms at the Gran Valencia feature a flat-screen satellite TV, a safe and a minibar. The hotel has a bar, and the restaurant serves typical Mediterranean cuisine, such as fresh seafood. Room service is also available. A packed breakfast is served in the room. The Eurostars Gran Valencia offers a laundy and dry cleaning service. Valencia's Old Town is 3 km away. There are Metro, train and bus stops nearby.

name: Colegio Mayor La Concepción
address: Av. De Suecia, 23, 46010 Valencia, Valencia
description: Located next to Mestalla Football Stadium and 1 km from the Cathedral, Colegio Mayor La Concepcion offers air-conditioned studios with private bathrooms. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout Each modern studio is fully furnished and has a private kitchenette with a microwave and fridge. The private bathroom includes a shower. The property features a fitness centre and terrace. There is also a quite study area and games room with a pool table. Facultats Metro Station is within a 5-minute walk of the property. The residence is open to the university community all year round.

name: Ilunion Valencia 4
address: Calle Del Valle De Ayora, 1, 46015 Valencia, Valencia
description: Featuring an outdoor swimming pool, and free WiFi throughout, Ilunion Valencia 4 is just 800 metres from Valencia’s Palacio de Congresos and a 3-minute walk from Beniferri Metro Stop. Rooms are decorated with warm colors and provide an integrated seating area, air conditioning, and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. They also include a sofa, a fridge and a safe. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and complimentary toiletries. Some of them provide stunning city views. The Ilunion Valencia 4 serves a daily breakfast and offers à- la-carte dishes. Guests can enjoy relax in the seasonal swimming pool. Private parking is available for an extra cost. This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility, accessible rooms are available on request, also for people with auditory and visual impairment. Guests will find a shopping centre and a range of restaurants within a 15-minute walk of Ilunion Valencia 4. Valencia’s Historic Centre is 3 km from the property, and Malvarrosa Beach is 15 minutes' drive away. Valencia Airport is a 40-minute metro ride away. Supplements per night apply. Guests should contact the hotel to check and confirm availability of room for a reservation with pet. Hotel will check there's availability and that room complies with specifications needed. Pets are only allowed in "Pet Friendly Double room" room type. Pets are not allowed in the other types of rooms. Once in the establishment, guests will receive the access regulations, which they must read and approve.” Parking is reserved upon arrival at the hotel and always subject to availability.

name: Hotel Xon's Valencia
address: Avenida Comarques Del Pais Valencia, Parallel to Highway A-3, Exit 345, 46930 Valencia, Valencia
description: Located just 7 km from Valencia Airport, Hotel Xon's offers free Wi-Fi and modern rooms with satellite TV. It features an outdoor swimming pool and a gym with sauna. The stylish, air-conditioned rooms at the Xon's feature parquet floors and smart décor. Each one comes with a private bathroom with a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel’s restaurant. Guests can also enjoy Mediterranean and international specialities for dinner. There is a terrace bar. The Bonaire Shopping Centre is next to the Hotel Xon’s Valencia. Opposite the hotel there is an ice rink, and the Ricardo Tormo de Cheste Race Circuit is 10 minutes' drive away. The hotel can organise car rental for guests as well as excursions. The Manises Golf Club is less than 3 km away.

name: Hotel Miramar Valencia
address: Paseo Neptuno 32, 46011 Valencia, Valencia
description: This small, contemporary-styled hotel overlooks the Mediterranean Sea from its setting at the Playa de Las Arenas Beach, near the Marina Real Juan Carlos I in Valencia city. Free WiFi is available. Located on the beach, the hotel's Lounge-Restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine and cocktails. The bar is open all day long. Modern rooms include air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Valencia city centre can be reached in around 20 minutes' drive or 30 minutes by public transport.

name: Ilunion Valencia 3
address: Calle Valle de Ayora, 5, 46015 Valencia, Valencia
description: Ilunion Valencia 3 boasts an outdoor pool and free WiFi throughout. It is located 800 metres from the Congress Centre. Featuring Nordic-style décor in light colors, the air-conditioned rooms at the Ilunion Valencia 3 have parquet floors. They come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and the bathroom includes a shower, free toiletries, and a hairdryer. Some of the rooms offer stunning views over the city. The Ilunion Valencia 3 serves a daily breakfast and offers à- la-carte dishes, including a typical Valencian paella. A special menu for celiac and food intolerant guests is available. Guests can relax on the terrace by the swimming pool. A shopping centre and a range of restaurants are available within a 10-minute walk of Ilunion Valencia 3. Beniferri Metro Station is 250 metres away, and there is a bus stop nearby connecting the hotel with Valencia City Centre in less than 10 minutes. Private on-site parking is available for an extra cost. Rental license HO03/2012/13

name: Kris Consul Del Mar
address: Avenida del Puerto 39, Valencia, Valencia
description: Kris Consul Del Mar offers a comfortable setting when in Valencia. There are 62 rooms at the hotel, each offering all the necessities to ensure a comfortable stay. Kris Consul Del Mar provides easy access to Valencia Cathedral, L'Oceanografic and City of Arts and Sciences. Mestalla Stadium is within walking distance.HotelsCombined

name: Casual de las Artes Valencia
address: Avenida del puerto 39, 46021 Valencia, Valencia
description: Casual de las Artes Valencia is located 15 minutes’ walk from the City of Arts and Sciences. It offers free Wi-Fi. Spacious, air-conditioned rooms include a minibar, a safe and flat-screen TV. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. One room is adapted for guests with reduced mobility. There are many bars, restaurants and shops in the streets surrounding the Casual de las Artes Valencia. Valencia’s old town is 3 km away and also offers a wide selection of dining options and a lively nightlife. Amistat Metro Station is 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel and connects with the rest of the city. Valencia Port and the beach are 3 km away, while Valencia Airport is a 20-minute drive away. Private parking is available at a surcharge.

name: Residencia Universitaria Damia Bonet
address: C/ Serpis, 27, 46022 Valencia, Valencia
description: The Damia Bonet Residence Hall offers well-priced studios with private kitchen and bathroom close to Valencia University. They have air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. All of the modern Damia Bonet studios have a study area with desk and sleeping area. The kitchens have a microwave and fridge. The studios have heating. Residencia Universitaria Damia Bonet has a fitness centre and a games room. It also offers services such as a 24-hour reception. The nearest Metro station is Amistat, about 10 minutes’ walk away. Private parking is possible on request. The Residencia offers accommodation to all members of the educational or university community.

name: Hostal Blayet
address: Avenida de Las Gaviotas 17, 46012 Valencia, Valencia
description: Located in Valencia, 400 metres from Playa La Devesa, Hostal Blayet provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a private beach area. Among the facilities at this property are a concierge service and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The guest house features family rooms. At the guest house, every room has a desk. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, guest rooms at Hostal Blayet have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms are equipped with a patio. At the accommodation each room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Hostal Blayet offers a children's playground. Activities such as hiking, snorkelling, cycling can be enjoyed in the surroundings, and guests can relax along the beachfront. Speaking English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock. Recati Beach is 400 metres from the guest house, while L'Oceanografic is 18 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 28 km from Hostal Blayet.

Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, tour/ticket assistance, and a ballroom. Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. name: NH Valencia Center
address: Ricardo Mico, 1, 46009 Valencia, Valencia
description: Situated in the serene city center area of Valencia, the NH Valencia Center hotel is located near a quiet park and is less than a kilometer from Quart Tower. The Joaquin Sorolla and Estacion Norte stations are within two kilometers of the hotel and provide access to local transport. Each of our 192 rooms provides an optimal level of comfort and style. Contemporary amenities include 24-hour room service and free Wi-Fi. Select rooms have Turia park views. Suites offer the added luxury of coffee machines, bathrobe, and slippers. A fresh breakfast buffet is served each day and guests are welcome to request made-to-order hot dishes or an early bird breakfast. For lunch and dinner, the NH Center Restaurant serves delectable international and Mediterranean cuisine in laid back surroundings. Next to the lobby is our bar-café which serves light refreshments including cocktails and a range of snacks. NH Valencia Center has 8 function rooms which can accommodate up to 400 guests. Allow our special events services team to assist in planning an impeccable menu for everything from a straightforward business meeting to a chic gala. Our friendly staff is on hand to ensure guests have the perfect stay.NH Hoteles

name: Micampus Galileo Galilei
address: Avda. De Los Naranjos, 46022 Valencia, Valencia
description: The Galileo Galilei hall of residence, next to the Universidad Politécnica de Valencia and Tarongers Metro Station, offers well-priced, spacious accommodation with a fitness centre. All rooms have free Wi-Fi and a private bathroom. The rooms in Colegio Mayor Galileo Galilei are decorated in a unique style. All rooms have a seating area as well as a work area. Children under 12 stay for free when using existing bedding. The Colegio Mayor Galileo Galilei has a games room and 24-hour reception. It also has a shared kitchen for guests where they can cook. The residence is about 1 km from the beach. Its proximity to the Metro means you can quickly reach Valencia city centre.

name: Senator Parque Central Hotel
address: Plaza Sanchis Guarner, 46006 Valencia, Valencia
description: Senator Parque Central Hotel is situated in central Valencia, 15 minutes’ walk from Xativa Station and the Old Town. This modern hotel offers free Wi-Fi, a fitness centre and sauna. Rooms at the Senator Parque Central are air conditioned and soundproofed, and feature a safe. A hairdryer and amenities are included in the private bathrooms. 2 free bottles of mineral water are provided upon arrival. The Senator has an air-conditioned dining room, where a daily buffet breakfast is served. There is also a bar. The hotel has a 24-hour reception desk. Las Arenas Beach and Valencia Port are 5 km from the hotel, and regular public bus services stop outside the hotel. There are also many shops and bars in the surrounding streets. The nearest airport is Valencia airport, 10.5 km from the property.

name: The Valentia Cabillers
address: Calle Cabillers 3, 46001 Valencia, Valencia
description: Featuring an outdoor pool located on the rooftop terrace (4 x 2.5 mts and 1.2 mts. deep), The Valentia Cabillers is located in Valencia's historic centre, just 50 metres from Valencia Cathedral. Free WiFi is provided. Each air-conditioned room features modern decor. All rooms come with a flat-screen satellite TV and kitchenette. Private bathrooms include free toiletries and towels. Guests can enjoy drinks, snacks and traditional tapas at The Valentia Cabillers' bar. Room service is also available. City of Arts & Sciences is 2.7 km from The Valentia Cabillers, while Bioparc Valencia is 3.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from the property.

name: Relais Pollo Loco
address: Camino Pla Del Bou sector 4 parcela 78, 46500 Valencia, Valencia
description: Relais Pollo Loco features mountain views, free WiFi and free private parking, set in Valencia, 29 km from Jardines de Monforte. There is also a microwave, fridge and a coffee machine. The bed and breakfast offers a picnic area. Guests at Relais Pollo Loco can enjoy darts on site, or go hiking or walking tours in the surroundings. Turia Gardens is 29 km from the accommodation, while González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts is 29 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 36 km from Relais Pollo Loco.

name: Plaza Alaquas
address: Hermanas Mirabal, 1, 46970 Valencia, Valencia
description: Plaza Alaquas is ideally located near Valencia Airport and a short drive from Valencia city centre. This modern design hotel offers free Wi-Fi. The hotel is set in a quiet area, with convenient access to public transport. Biopark Valencia is just 4 km away and the City of Arts and Sciences is 8 km away. The Alaquas has a bar-café serving snacks and drinks. The restaurant serves typical Spanish food and a buffet breakfast. The hotel also has a 24-hour reception desk. Rooms at the Plaza Alaquas are bright and spacious. They all have a small seating area. Rooms are comfortable and air-conditioned, with extra-long beds.

name: ibis budget Valencia Aeropuerto
address: Carrer Camp de L'Olivereta, 46940 Valencia, Valencia
description: Discover our Ibis Hotel at Valencia Airport. Carmen Baviera, in charge of the management, welcomes you to our Ibis Hotel located just 10 minutes walk from the Manises-Valencia International Airport and 200 m from the Rosas Metro, which connects to central Valencia. The fully equipped rooms have AC, heating and state-of-the-art WiFi. The hotel has a restaurant, breakfast buffet, bar and parking.accorhotels.com

name: Parador de El Saler
address: Avda. De Los Pinares, 151, 46012 El Saler, Valencia
description: This Parador is located on the famous El Saler golf course, within a coastal nature reserve. Luxurious and contemporary, it has a spa and free Wi-Fi. The rooms of the Parador Campo de Golf El Saler are modern and spacious. All have heating, air conditioning and TV. Many of them have views of the golf course. In the spa you will find a range of exclusive treatments and massages. It also has saunas and a heated swimming pool. During the summer the hotel has an outdoor swimming pool. The Parador has free parking. The restaurant of the El Saler specialises in local rice dishes, above all paella. The El Saler golf course is ranked in the top 10 in Spain. Alternatively, you can explore the Albufera Nature Reserve which is home to a wide range of plant and wildlife. The city of Valencia is just 18 km away.

name: Quart Youth Hostel
address: Calle Guillem De Castro, 64, 46001 Valencia, Valencia
description: Set 300 metres from the Torres de Quart Medieval Tower, Quart Youth Hostel offers free luggage storage and free Wi-Fi. Rooms have individual lockers and adapters are provided. Featuring a modern décor, each room features a ceiling fan and wardrobe. Rooms come with single or bunk beds and a shared bathroom with bath or shower. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at Quart Youth Hostel. There are vending machines which sell snacks and drinks inside the property and a shared kitchen is also available to prepare your own food. Toaster, kettle and coffee machine are provided. Centrally located, Quart Youth Hostel is 5 minutes’ walk from the old town of Valencia. The property is well communicated by public transport. Buses connected to City of Arts and Science and to the beaches of Valencia leave from a bus stop located 150 metres away.

name: Purple Nest Hostel
address: Plaza Tetuán 5, 46003 Valencia, Valencia
description: Located in the centre of Valencia, just 10 minutes’ walk from the cathedral, Purple Nest Hostel offers bright, air-conditioned rooms. It has free WiFi, a roof terrace and a lively bar. Rooms are decorated in cheerful, vibrant colours, with tiled floors and original designs painted on the walls. Guests use shared bathrooms and towels are provided. Purple Nest Hostel has computers with internet that can be used for an extra charge. The hostel features vending machines, and free coffee and tea is offered. The Purple Nest is a great base for exploring the sights of Valencia and enjoying its nightlife. The bus station is around 2 km away, and the bus for the beach stops close to the hostel.

name: Blanq Carmen Hotel
address: Calle Blanquerias 11, 46003 Valencia, Valencia
description: Set in a historic building that still preserves its original façade, just 25 metres from the Serranos Towers, Blanq Carmen Hotel is located in Valencia’s old town. Free WiFi is available. All air-conditioned rooms at this hotel feature satellite TV and a seating area. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. The hotel features a seasonal rooftop terrace with a plunge pool. Blanq Carmen Hotel is just a 2-minute walk from the cathedral and Miguelete belfry, 5 minutes from the central market, silk market and one of the most important financial and commercial areas.

name: Bungalows Park Albufera
address: Carrera Del Riu 556, 46012 El Saler, Valencia
description: A short distance from bicycle rentals, the sea, and more, this beach mobile home lets you experience it all. Albufera Natural Park is just steps away and Platja del Saler is within an easy 8-minute walk, so leave your car at the property, which offers onsite parking. Spend a day at the nearby beach, relax by the seasonal outdoor pool, or sip a drink in the garden of this mobile home, which also features a picnic area. For a change of scenery, come inside and enjoy the free WiFi and TV. As you settle into this 3-bedroom rental, you'll find a living room, premium bedding, a BBQ grill, and air conditioning. The kitchen is equipped with a refrigerator, a microwave, and cookware. And you can even travel light because you'll have access to laundry facilities.Expedia

name: Yours Boutique Stay
address: 19 Carrer de Cuba, 46004 Valencia, Valencia
description: YOURS boutique stay features an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a terrace and bar in Valencia. Located around 700 metres from Norte Train Station, the hotel with free WiFi is also 1.9 km away from Turia Gardens. Certain units at the property feature a balcony with a city view. Some rooms come with a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and a microwave. The units include bed linen. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a vegetarian or a gluten-free breakfast. Popular points of interest near YOURS boutique stay include González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts, Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados and Church of Saint Nicolás. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 10 km from the accommodation.

name: Hostal Orange Vibes
address: Dr Machi 2 Dr Machi 2, 46980 Paterna, Valencia
description: Located in Paterna, 7.4 km from Bioparc Valencia, Hostal Orange Vibes provides accommodation with a garden, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. The property is set 7.5 km from Church of Saint Nicolás, 8.8 km from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados and 8.8 km from Jardines de Monforte. Free WiFi and a shared kitchen are provided. At the inn, each room has a patio. Each room is fitted with a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Guest rooms at Hostal Orange Vibes include air conditioning and a desk. Turia Gardens is 8.9 km from the accommodation, while González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts is 9.1 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 8 km from Hostal Orange Vibes.

name: AC Hotel Algeciras by Marriott
address: Ctra Del Rinconcillo Esq C/ Hnos Portill, 11204 Algeciras, Andalusia
description: The AC Hotel Algeciras is located next to the northern access to Algeciras, which is less than 10 minutes from the historical center. A great alternative to disconnect from the routine.Our hotel in Algeciras has rooms that offer maximum comfort and functionality. All of them have plasma TV, comfortable beds, minibar and private bathroom. In addition, the hotel has free WiFi connection in all rooms and common areas. The meeting rooms are also here for any kind of celebration, whether family or a professional event, adapted to your needs.AC Hotel Algeciras has an AC Lounge on the ground floor, where you can work, reunite with people and enjoy local dishes and tapas. Our hotel in Algeciras has a fully equipped Fitness Room and more facilities, such as parking and AC Store for the perfect stay in the province of Cadiz.Marriott

name: Globales Reina Cristina
address: Paseo De La Conferencia S N, 11207 Algeciras, Andalusia
description: Globales Reina Cristina was originally opened in 1901 and houses ancient ruins, such as parts of an 8th-century Mosque and a Moorish well. It features indoor and outdoor swimming pools. Globales Reina Cristina has welcomed famous visitors, including Winston Churchill and King Juan Carlos I of Spain. It offers elegant rooms with a private balcony, free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV. Surrounded by beautiful gardens, the hotel is situated next to Algeciras Port. The beaches of Tarifa are 20 minutes away by car and free parking is available on site. Facilities at the hotel include 2 tennis courts and a gym. Table tennis are also available. The hotel restaurant serves buffet meals and guests have the option of à la carte dining in the evening, or at lunchtime. There are also 2 bars and a café. Barbecues are organised during the summer months. There is also live music, on occasion. Gibraltar Airport is 35 minutes drive from the property.

name: Mercure Algeciras
address: Calle Malta No. 1, 11204 Algeciras, Andalusia
description: The Mercure Algeciras hotel is located 5 minutes from the center of Algeciras, the city's port and Rinconcillo beach, 20 minutes from Sotogrande and 30 minutes from Tarifa. Its 73 modern and sophisticated rooms are equipped with all the necessary comforts to make sure you enjoy an unforgettable stay: Free WIFI, fitness center and classes, restaurant with indoor courtyard, buffet breakfast and bar/cafe. Ideal for visiting Los Alcornocales Natural Park or beaches like the one in Getares.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Alborán Algeciras
address: C/ Alamo, 11205 Algeciras, Andalusia
description: Hotel Alborán Algeciras is a traditional Andalusian hotel, situated in a quiet residential area of Algeciras. Just 2 minutes’ drive from El Rinconcillo Beach, it offers attractive rooms with free Wi-Fi. The elegant rooms in Alboran Algeciras are arranged around a central patio. All rooms have modern design and include a private bathroom, minibar and safe. The El Claustro Restaurant offers a varied à la carte menu, as well as a good-value daily lunch and dinner set menu. The all-day café offers set menus and baguettes. The hotel is located at the entrance to the city, next to the A7 Motorway. It is just 2 km from Algeciras Port and 3 km from the city centre.

name: Odyssey Rooms
address: 9 Carrer Gravina, 03002 Alicante, Valencia
description: Situated in Alicante, 200 metres from Postiguet Beach and 400 metres from the centre, Odyssey Rooms Alicante features air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a rooftop pool. Private parking is available on site. The aparthotel offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, free toiletries and a bath or shower. Some units have a terrace and/or a balcony with city or quiet street views. Continental and gluten-free breakfast options are available each morning at Odyssey Rooms Alicante. The wellness area at the accommodation is comprised of a public bath, a solarium and an open-air bath. A bicycle rental service is available at Odyssey Rooms Alicante. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Alicante Train Station, Alicante Museum of Contemporary Art and Explanada de España. The nearest airport is Alicante–Elche Miguel Hernández Airport, 17 km from Odyssey Rooms Alicante.

name: Hospes Amerigo
address: Rafael Altamira 7, 03002 Alicante, Valencia
description: With beautiful views of Alicante Cathedral and Santa Bárbara Castle, Hospes Amerigo’s free rooftop spa features a sauna, pool and gym. Rooms offer free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV. This elegant design hotel is set in a 19th-century Dominican Convent in Alicante’s old town, 300 metres from Postiguet Beach. Hospes Amerigo is within 50 metres of the cathedral and Alicante Town Hall. Stylish room at Hospes Amerigo have high ceilings and large windows. Some rooms feature abstract silk paintings. In summer, guests can enjoy the views from the rooftop lounge bar, situated next to the open-air pool.

name: Eurostars Pórtico Alicante
address: Rafael Altamira 19, 03002 Alicante, Valencia
description: Situated conveniently in the centre of Alicante, Eurostars Pórtico Alicante offers air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a shared lounge. Featuring room service, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant and a terrace. Guests can have a drink at the bar. At the hotel, all rooms come with a desk. The units feature a safety deposit box. Staff at the 24-hour front desk speak English and Spanish. Popular points of interest near Eurostars Pórtico Alicante include Postiguet Beach, Alicante Train Station and Explanada de España. The nearest airport is Alicante–Elche Miguel Hernández Airport, 17 km from the accommodation.

name: Eurostars Mediterranea Plaza
address: Ayuntamiento 6, 03002 Alicante, Valencia
description: Eurostars Mediterranea Plaza is 100 metres from Alicante’s Postiguet Beach, and has a roof terrace with city views. It offers a free sauna and gym, and free Wi-Fi. The elegant Mediterranea Plaza offers modern, air-conditioned rooms. They all have satellite TV and a minibar. The hotel serves a daily buffet breakfast. Staff at the Hotel Mediterranea Plaza’s 24-hour reception can help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events. You can also hire a car at reception Hotel Eurostars Mediterranea Plaza is set in the historic city centre, next to Alicante Town Hall. Saint Nicholas Cathedral and Santa Barbara Castle are a short walk away. Alicante Airport is just 9km from the hotel.

name: Dormirdcine Alicante
address: Calle Gravina, 5, 03002 Alicante, Valencia
